name: Bright modern top floor Mosman apartment
summary: Top floor modern, quiet, light & bright renovated apartment with views of North Sydney, the Harbour Bridge & Mosman Bay.  The apartment is conveniently located apartment is walking distance to popular Mosman strip shops, many beaches including Sirius Cove, transport and Mosman Bay ferry wharf. It is also very close to Balmoral Beach, Taronga Zoo and Sergeants Mess. Two large bedrooms with built in robes, polished floorboards throughout, large kitchen with Bosch appliances and undercover car space.
description: Top floor modern, quiet, light & bright renovated apartment with views of North Sydney, the Harbour Bridge & Mosman Bay.  The apartment is conveniently located apartment is walking distance to popular Mosman strip shops, many beaches including Sirius Cove, transport and Mosman Bay ferry wharf. It is also very close to Balmoral Beach, Taronga Zoo and Sergeants Mess. Two large bedrooms with built in robes, polished floorboards throughout, large kitchen with Bosch appliances and undercover car space. Available on phone 24/7 Quiet area with plenty to do surrounded by beautiful bushland and beaches. Walking distance to shops any many beaches. Free bus out the front to Balmoral Beach. Bus stop on street to city and ferry to the city walking distance.
neighborhood_overview: Quiet area with plenty to do surrounded by beautiful bushland and beaches.

interaction: Available on phone 24/7
house_rules: - No heels on floorboards please! NO SMOKING!

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 13 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Very Clean, tidy and nice place. Host is very hospitable, helpful and accomodatable.

My Aunty and her friends had a good time over there. They were suppose to go around Sydney but they jus fell in love with laura home and prefer to spend more quality time at home. 

Laura is a very nice lady and helpful. I love the way she decorated her home and with all the convenient she provided at home just perfect. You need nothing except your luggage :) 

Highly recommended! 

I will book again for any of my friends and family for the next trip!

We really enjoyed our stay at Laura's apartment. It was clean, cosy and had an amazing view of the city. We made good use of the local ferry, which was only  a short walk from the apartment. Laura was a helpful and friendly host.
Appartement très bien situé, proche du centre ville mais dans un quartier très calme. Très bon rapport qualité/prix. Je recommande

Fabulous apartment in a lovely suburb of Sydney. Full facilities for a thoroughly enjoyable stay. Foolishly I had a lot of luggage and probably would have struggled with the stairs had my cousin not come to my rescue. Once my luggage was in the apartment the stairs weren't an issue at all. From the couch in the lounge room and the bed in the Main bedroom you can admire the spectacular harbour bridge and surrounds.

Good value for money 
Good location 
Short stroll to ferry

We enjoyed our stay at Laura's place a lot. The ferry terminal to the city is just a few steps away, and the view is just overwhelming. It's a quiet and pretty neighborhood and shops, cafes, and restaurants are not too far away. The apartment is quite spacious and the kitchen has everything we needed. The instructions on where to find the key were a bit unclear to us at first, but in the end everything worked out well.
All o.k once we got over a problem at check in.
Laura’s apartment was great - fantastic location with amazing views, clean and comfortable. We particularly liked the large kitchen, air conditioner and iron and ironing board. Thanks Laura!
Great apartment! Highly recommend.
Very modern, bright apartment with all necessities including lovely toiletries. it was a short walk to the ferry and Laura was a great host. I would definately stay here again.

Laura's place was lovely and immaculate. The proximity of her listing to the ferry and the available parking spot made it easy to commute around Sydney. The only drawback was the flight of stairs leading up to the apartment, but this was easily outweighed by the views outside once you arrive.

The place is well located if you want to visit Sydney downtown and northern suburbs.
The apartment is very clean and quite convenient. The neibourhood is pretty calm. 
Laura is reactive and answer to all question very quickly.
Great place really enjoyed our stay
Lovely clean apartment with lovely views of the harbour bridge!  Close to the Ferry and walking distance from the shops on Military Road. I’d definitely recommend this apartment to friends

We enjoyed staying at Laura's place.  She provides a great Airbnb at a value. She was quick to respond to any communication.  The beds were comfortable.  It was great having wifi!  The ferry was a small hike away, which made it easy for us to get around the city.  There are six flights of stairs up to the unit which ended up being a bonus to us, in helping us work off all the great food we had been eating all day.  There are towels, toiletries and some basic condiments in the kitchen for cooking.  I would recommend her place to other travelers.

The apartment was very well maintained and clean. It is located in a fabulous and secluded area of Sydney. Catching the ferry to the city, and discovering the rowing club (for drinks) were highlights. Late afternoon visits by the cockatoos was a treat too. You will need to have a car to visit the local shops for groceries.
Great location with view of the Harbour Bridge and walkable to catch a ferry across to Circular Quay. Great value and great place.
Great little appartment, very clean and tidy! Laura was easy to communicate with. Comfortable beds too :)
We enjoyed our stay so much at  Laura's place! It was so comfortably clean, well furnished and  strategic! we enjoyed the amazing view and beautiful birds waking us up every morning!!!

It was a very good stay at Laura’s house, we had a little problem with the internet signal, but nothing important due that we spend almost all the time in the city, a little hike to the pier wish let you very close to the opera house. Was a nice trip. Very fast response.

Great location to reach the ferry to city or walk to beach and military road for great food. Beautiful view. Not big but great for mostly just sleep overnight. Cleanness could be approved. But overall great value!
Thanks Laura, the apartment is beautiful and very comfortable. I'd stay again if visiting Sydney in the future!
Lovely house and good value. Laura was good with communication and very helpful.
The apartment was very nice with an amazing view over north Sydney and the Harbour bridge. The apartment is perfect for 3 or 4 people and has everything you need.

O apartamento é limpo e novo, exatamente como nas fotos, e o bairro tranquilo. As estações de trem ficam um pouco distantes, mas tem uma balsa bem próxima que te leva rapidamente para o centro. Laura responde as mensagens na hora.
If you want to experience a ferry, Laura’s place is just about 15 mins walk to the Bay. Clear view to the Bridge.
Lovely place away from the hustle and bustle, at the same time just a short trip away to Sydney CBD. Clean accommodation with tons of amenities provided, also comes with a parking slot.
Great location, close to ferry. Very clean and Laura was a great host!

Laura was an incredibly helpful host, While i was staying there the power went out and she kept in contact with me throughout the day with updates on when it would be back on. 
The apartment was really clean and spacious. I will defiantly stay here again if im ever in need of a place to stay in Mosman.

Thanks to Laura, a very nice and thoughtful host. My friends & I really enjoyed our stay at  Laura's apartment. Everything was perfect as described, it's stylish, clean, comfortable and much better than we expected which this place makes us feel like home. It is convenient as located few minutes walking distance to Mosman bay (20 minutes to city by ferry. Would definitely recommend this place to my friends if they traveling at Sydney.

멋진 장소입니다. 멋진 시드니의 경치를 경험하세요. 아침과 저녁 페리를 타고 다니는 경험 또한 놀라운 경험입니다.
다만 가방이 무거운 사람들은 조금 힘들수가 있어요. 페리에서 내려서 언덕과 계단을 올라가야 하고, 아파트 계단을 올라야 합니다. 짐이 많은 사람들은 체크인과 체크아웃을 할때 우버를 이용하심이 좋겠네요.
Location was perfect for what we needed.  Nice neighborhood away from the main city.  Walking distance from the harbor which took us to and from Circular Quay.
Its a great unit with a beautiful view where you can stay comfortably while exploring all over Sydney.  The unit is beautiful and has everything you need and more!
The place is the same as shown in photos. Laura is very responsible and very responsive to messages.
The place is lovely, it has a great view of the city and is located in residential and  leafy  suburb, short and beautiful ferry trip to CBD. Laura is a great host, who gave us some very useful tips.
If future travellers wish to stay somewhere stylish, affordable, clean and with fabulous views...then this IS the place in Sydney for you!!

Great location with an amazing view. 
Host is responsive and friendly. 
Hope to stay here again.

Our flat 1+1 - 100 m2 and next to Osmanbey metro station. 1 large living room with sofa and a bedroom with 2 sofabeds which can be bed

name: Apartamento aconchegante Copacabana
summary: Apartamento aconchegante em Copacabana, para até seis pessoas. Quartos e sala de estar com ventilador de teto. Próximo à estação de metrô Siqueira Campos e localizado à cinco minutos da praia. Cozinha equipada com microondas, fogão, geladeira, louça, panelas e talheres. Área de serviço com máquina de lavar 12kg e varal.

name: Waikiki private big room #2
summary: This is a Third floor apartment and our apartment is 3bedrooms, 1 bathroom, 1 living room, 1 kitchen. This room has a Queen bed, sofa, side table, lamp and closet.  We provide towels, shampoo & conditioner and body wash. Located close to Waikiki off kapahulu.  *take 10mins by bus to Waikiki, KCC, Diamond head. Laundramat with coin Washer/dryer machine at the corner.   Please do not eat in the room to prevent infestation of pest. You are welcome to enjoy the Tv in the living room with netflix.
space: This is a breezy 3rd floor apartment.  You must be able to go up and down stairs carefully with your luggage as it has no elevator.  It is a shared apartment so everyone has access to kitchen, living room, front/back patio and bathroom.
description: This is a Third floor apartment and our apartment is 3bedrooms, 1 bathroom, 1 living room, 1 kitchen. This room has a Queen bed, sofa, side table, lamp and closet.  We provide towels, shampoo & conditioner and body wash. Located close to Waikiki off kapahulu.  *take 10mins by bus to Waikiki, KCC, Diamond head. I got couple so its easy and convenient to book and use.   You'll need the Turo App  Check out this car on Turo! (Website hidden by Airbnb)  If you need a truck or bigger car let me know i have others.

host.host_about:
Alohaaa, I'm Ken and I like to share my island with you through my airbnb ,turo rental cars or my private hikes.

Line me at Kensum33

reviews.comments: Jimmy was very welcoming and a great host. Thanks!

Super easy to get in and out of. Jimmie was flexible with check-in and check-out. Definitely best for singles or couples. If you plan to be out most of your trip and don't need to come back often, this is the place.
thanks!!
Simple place, great value and communication. Would stay again.
The host canceled this reservation 107 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Jimmy was very hospitable, honest, and nice. He even came back to the house one afternoon when I accidentally locked myself out. No problems at all. The location is great and close to several bus lines. The room was exactly as advertised.
The host canceled this reservation 66 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Jimmy was very nice. The place is worth the price. The bathroom and kitchen could use some deep cleaning but all in all it's an ok place
Accommodation was nice and clean and for a reasonable price. Jimmy is friendly host. Only negative aspect is a lack of restaurants or shops close to the apartment.
Jimmy is nice and the room he provided is clean and neat.
An honest place for the price with a clean and comfortable room. The host was carring. An ideal place if you want a spot to only sleep and for cheap.

We had a good time at jimmys apartment. He explained very precisely how everything works in his place. He is a great host, the room is comfortable, and close enough to Honolulu’s activities.
I recommend it!
Great location, it’s very close to downtown/waikiki and all the cool places.

Je recommande cette place pour une courte durée La chambre est relativement bien située. Pour ceux qui n’ont pas de voitures, Diamond Head, la plage et les restaurants étaient tous dans une distance raisonnable à la marche. La chambre est correcte sans plus, mais les autres pièces sont sales. Nous avons pas eu la chance de parler à Jimmy puisqu’il était dans sa chambre ou absent.
Good hospitality. Quick responses. Clean and neat place. Bed linens, pillows, and blanket provided.
Excellent value for money in Waikiki. Jimmy is really nice!

ｼﾞﾐｰからの返信は早くて安心してやり取りできました｡
日本語は通じませんが､親切に接してくれて好印象です｡
ﾁｪｯｸｲﾝの時間も何度も変更してしまいましたが､柔軟に対応してくれました｡
部屋は土足禁止なのでｽﾘｯﾊﾟを持って行くと便利です｡
ｱﾒﾆﾃｨはないので､ﾊﾞｽｾｯﾄやﾀｵﾙ類や部屋着などは持参した方がいいです｡
ﾄﾞﾗｲﾔｰは借りれますし､ｺﾝｾﾝﾄは日本と同じで､延長ｺｰﾄﾞもあるので便利です｡
ﾍﾞｯﾄﾞは大きく､部屋も広いので充分でした｡
家と部屋の鍵は渡されるので自由に出入りできました｡
近所にｾﾌﾞﾝｲﾚﾌﾞﾝがあり便利です｡
中心部からはUberで8ﾄﾞﾙ前後で行けるので､宿泊費と交通費を足してもﾎﾃﾙに泊まるよりは安いです｡
海までは歩いて15分ほどで行けます｡
宿泊者は2組だけなので､お風呂やｷｯﾁﾝを使う時間は被らなかったので気を使わず良かったです｡
3泊4日楽しめて感謝しています☆

Very clean apartment, Jimmy was very friendly,  helpful and quick with communication. location was perfect, walking distance to the beach, bars and restaurants. close enough to diamond head that we bused there and walked back (about an hour from the top back to apartment). great value, would stay again!
The room was prefect for what I needed and a great value. Jimmy was friendly, efficient and always got back to me quickly when I had a question/concern.
Good location. The room is very simple and crude.  Bath room need improvement as well.
Great location near Waikiki. Friendly host. Clean place. Famous Rainbow Drive In is at the end of the block.
Nice and clean room at a 10 mins walk from Waikiki! Near grocery stores, bus routes and many attractions. Would definely go there again. Jim was very nice and welcoming.
Clean and comfortable place. Jimmy is a very nice host.
It was clean and confortable room. Jimmy is nice guy.

Should ask to Jimmy to get towels before check in. We got towels from Jimmy even though we didnt ask before. Thanks.
Need to read instructions carefully. 
The room was little hot to sleep (there’s one fan). 
Other than that the room was pretty okay.
Very convenient location and perfect place to crash when you just need a place to spend the night arriving late in Hawaii

Super great place. Easy to check in. Great location. Walking distance to Waikiki, great view of diamond head. What is more is that the neighborhood has so many great photos spots! if you walk up the hill of castle street. You will get this amazing overview of the city. Turn right on top of the hills and follow the street. There s a curve to see the  entire diamond head. And there is even a burned down abandoned house somewhere in the neighborhood!

Great location in southeastern Honolulu, very close to Waikiki and Diamond Head. You could walk to the beach in less than 20 mins if you wanted to. Plenty of shops and restaurants nearby too. There is street parking if you need it. I usually found a place a few blocks away to the southeast which was fine.

The place itself had all my basic needs covered. Bed, desk, wifi, shared bathroom with shower. Jimmy was responsive to my messages and sent simple directions for checking in. It was clean and comfortable. Note that this being Hawaii, there wasn't any AC used; instead, just open windows and fans. It got a bit humid at points but it wasn't bad or anything; just all part of the experience! There was a fan in the room that I turned on at night for sleeping, which helped. The room didn't come with a towel but I sent a message to Jimmy and asked him for one, which he provided. 

The place was good value for the money and I would stay here again if I could. Other than the flight, almost everything else in Hawaii was cheaper than traveling around Seattle and Vancouver, which was a big surprise for me. There's no reason not to come back soon. Thanks Jimmy!

Local area tip: Rainbow Drive-in is about a 3 minute walk from the apartment, and is a prime spot for a classic plate lunch if you want to get a sense of what the locals eat. Not the best plate lunches out there but a solid place to start!
This place was a great way of staying right near Waikiki, without having to pay a ton for a hotel. Jimmy was very easy to work with, and responded quickly.
Great budget option in an excellent location just a few blocks from Waikiki. Minimalist furniture and interior, but very clean. Quiet and peaceful place to rest.
Jimmy是个非常热心的小伙子,问他的所有问题都可以很快的解决!还帮助我提行李!房子的位置也很方便,就在主街道旁边,距离Waikiki海滩步行过去大概15分钟,周边的餐厅也很多!谢谢Jimmy这两天的热心照顾!

Great location with local flavor and good bars/restaurants around but also close to beaches and Waikiki shopping area. Public transportation is easy to catch. It is a favorable old style Honolulu apartment that provides a laid-back Hawaiian atmosphere.  Ken and Wendy are very kind and friendly, always give back timely responses. Nice place !

お部屋もお家もきれいでしたし､快適でした｡
ｱﾒﾆﾃｨは女性はお持ちした方が良いかもしれないです｡
Kenは本当におもてなしの心と優しさ溢れる人でした｡
Kenからはﾊﾜｲのｽﾃｷなものを学びました｡
ありがとうKen(^^)
Ken was very responsive, the location was great, and the room was as expected. I'm glad I stayed here!

name: Homebase for your Hawaii adventures!
summary: Newly renovated house in quiet convenient neighborhood in Kailua. Enjoy your own private master wing/in-law suite with your own private entrance. Gorgeous backyard with sweeping mountain views to enjoy the sunsets. Close to the beach, to town, and to the various highways to get to other sides of the island make this an awesome landing pad for your adventures!
space: You have your own master bed and bathroom with private entrance. Tv with roku and mini fridge/freezer and keurig in bedroom. The backyard is also a shared space. There is ample street parking in front of the house.
description: Newly renovated house in quiet convenient neighborhood in Kailua. Enjoy your own private master wing/in-law suite with your own private entrance. Gorgeous backyard with sweeping mountain views to enjoy the sunsets. Close to the beach, to town, and to the various highways to get to other sides of the island make this an awesome landing pad for your adventures! You have your own master bed and bathroom with private entrance. Tv with roku and mini fridge/freezer and keurig in bedroom. The backyard is also a shared space. There is ample street parking in front of the house. You have your own guest wing. It includes a bedroom and master bathroom. You have a tv with roku as well as a mini fridge. The guest space is separated from the rest of the house by a locked door with NO access for us to you and you to us, but the backyard is a shared area to enjoy. I work full time. With the guest wing tucked away, you can have as little interaction as desired when here, though I'm available to answer
neighborhood_overview: Kailua town Kailua beach park Lanikai beach Kalama beach park Pali highway H3 Target Whole foods
notes: We have well behaved cats and (non shedding) dogs. They are not allowed in the guest wing to reduce any allergies people may have, but otherwise have free roam of the main house.  If you choose to use the back yard, you will likely interact with the friendly dogs!
transit: I recommend car or motorized bike. We have ample street parking.  Apparently the bus system is excellent here, and there are stops at the bottom and top of the street, but as I have never used it, I cannot attest to it!
access: You have your own guest wing. It includes a bedroom and master bathroom. You have a tv with roku as well as a mini fridge. The guest space is separated from the rest of the house by a locked door with NO access for us to you and you to us, but the backyard is a shared area to enjoy.
interaction: I work full time. With the guest wing tucked away, you can have as little interaction as desired when here, though I'm available to answer any questions.
house_rules: Aloha! No shoes in the house. Please close all doors behind you as this is Hawaii and we like to keep the wildlife outside. Feel free to use the AC when home, but it is hawaii and resources are scarce, so please turn off ac and all lights when you leave for the day!

host.host_about: Hi!  I am a native new englander who did my training in NYC. I moved north for a time after residency only to discover if I never dealt with another winter again I would be happy! So now I'm off to Hawaii!  In my spare time, I enjoy hiking, competitive weight lifting and my rescue animals. And Netflix. And pizza.

reviews.comments: Amylynne was an extremely gracious and wonderful host. We enjoyed our time at her beautiful home immensely. We needed to extend our stay and she was extremely helpful and understanding as this was our first time using this service. Highly,  highly recommend Amylynn's house for your stay!!
We enjoyed our time at amylynes

Amylynne and her home were perfect. When I arrived, I was greeted by Christina for check in and a cocktail.

The place is beautiful, clean and peaceful. My hosts gave me space but where friendly and informative when I wanted to interact.

I was looking for a place to have some solitude and a bath (baths are my favorite). This place did not disappoint. The bathroom was luxurious, and the tub has jets!  The bed was firm and comfortable. The decor was minimalist which is what my cluttered mind needed.

The garden was lovely. I enjoyed my meals on the lawn listening to the birds.

I had such a wonderful time; I hope to return again. Thanks Amylynne and Christina!
Awesome hosts! So kind & welcoming! Beautiful home & lovely bathroom! Would definitely stay there again! Location was just perfect for my girlfriend & I...
Great value for your money in Kailua. Clean, tidy and quiet.

Perfect place to stay in Kailua! Very comfortable and the tub is even a “whirlpool” ;) 
Would book that one definitely again!

Centrally located, airy and comfortable. Friendly easy going hosts with great response time. Located in a very safe neighborhood and great for walks and exercising as well. I highly suggest Amylynne’s place!

This was a perfect fit for me. The location was easy to find in a nice quiet neighborhood in Kailua and just a short drive to the beach and airport. The room was very clean and comfortable with a great private bath. The entry was private and easy to access. I found it very easy to come and go throughout my day between activities. No crowds, no noise, easy communication and surrounded by beauty! Just what I needed!

I didn't like the place. The bed is not comfortable because the slatted fram is not good at all, you can hear everything from above like steps, shower and talks. There's is no chair. The bathroom is bigger than everyting else. If your are open the frontdoor you're standing 10 cm next to the toilet and that isn't a joke. Amylynne doesn't like to talk to you. She prefers sending txtmessage. The dogs are going crazy when you going in or out to your unit. No metter if you're trying to be silent as much as you can.

Wir hatten eine tolle Zeit. Alles war sehr unkompliziert auch unsere späte Anreise war kein Problem und mit dem Late-Checkout konnten wir den Tag noch für eine Wanderung nutzen. Ohne Mietauto ist es glaub schwierig - aber das braucht man meiner Meinung eh. Die Wohngegend ist ruhig und wirkt sehr einladend. Restaurants, Tankstelle, Shops, Strände und Wanderwege sind in wenigen Fahrminuten zu erreichen. Sehr schöne dort. :)
Very beautiful place, nice location. Amylynne was so very kind and accommodating. Easy check in, always quick response if needed. Thank you!

Absolutely one of the most beautiful neighborhoods in Hawai’i!  I was born and raised on the island and I have to say that this home is in one of the best kept areas.   Easy access to anywhere you wanna venture to but secluded enough to have a bit of privacy away from the hustle and bustle.   Super clean, the bathroom is awesome and the tub has (Website hidden by Airbnb) amazing,  compact refrigerator/freezer in room, flat screen TV with Netflix etc,  mirrored full size closet with hangers, the whole place is either laminate or tile flooring so it’s easy to cleanup if you happen to track a little bit of sand inside, the bed is new and it was perfect for us (not too soft), the AC is fantastic and super quiet with a remote control,  Kailua Beach Park and Lanikai Beach are close and great for relaxing!  Lots of places to eat in the area,  grocery stores close by and I can’t forget to mention Starbucks for coffee lovers, if you don’t wanna leave to get coffee a Keurig is provided with k-cups and assorted tea as well, laundromat nearby and you will be blown away by its cleanliness, ample parking on the street is an understatement  we never had a problem and I promise you, anywhere else would likely be an issue, you will be greeted at the top of the stairs by their doggies saying hello from behind the glass/screen door to the main house but you won’t hear them any other time and their cats, well they’re cats, you won’t hear them or even see them most days   if you go to Waikiki Beach (20 minutes away) park at the Zoo and walk across the street it’s $1 an hour but parking is scarce in waikiki so it’s your best bet.  I know this was long and super detailed but I want everyone to know how much we enjoyed our 5 days here.  Finally,  Amylynne  and Christina are awesome hosts and we would highly recommend staying here and hope to return someday

Beautiful neighborhood. Really quick drive to the beach. It was super easy check in and out with the key pad. Very nice private space was perfect for our stay as we had to book last min. Our hosts were very responsive and welcoming they even let us check out late since we had an evening outgoing flight. We didn't spend too much time in the room but the backyard was so pretty we would have loved to hang there and just take in the view.

Quaint private space in beautiful Kailua. Only min from the beach and Kailua town. Perfect location. You have all the necessities without the hassle of a hotel. Parking is plentiful. Backyard is serene. We loved our stay and hope to visit again soon. Amylynne is very fast at responding and checking in.

Amylynne’s felt like a secret tropical hideaway :) Even though it was close to everything! 
The space is not only stylish and cute, but is private and right next to her gorgeous backyard. There’s an awesome walk in shower next to a lovely bathtub, a kurig for fresh morning coffee, and a roku already setup with Netflix for movie nights. The mini fridge made grabbing and keeping snacks super easy and I especially loved that it had a freezer section. Our stay was peaceful and relaxing, and the amenities helped us feel right at home.
Amylynne is an exceptional host. Her thoughtfulness and speedy response time made everything about our experience simple to setup and pleasurable. 
Mahalo for a wonderful stay Amylynne!
Beautiful clean place, with a gorgeous bathroom. Great location in a nice neighborhood. Amy is really nice and has some great suggestions for your stay. Highly recommend!
Clean and accurately described. Very beautiful and friendly neighborhood with plenty of street parking. A/C was a lifesaver during some of the warmer nights. Adorable dogs and cats.
Amylynne was quick to respond to any questions, the place was spotless, the bed comfortable and the area is convenient to the highway without it being noticeable.  A very nice spot.
Amy Lynn’s place was great!  Her communication was outstanding and the home fit our needs. Great for 2 people, similar to a hotel with a mini fridge. It was  clean and with nice decor
Clean, safe, wonderful bathroom!
A+ If I need an AirBNB this is where I'll be! Great host, great location and place to stay!
Clean and quiet place, great location in a nice neighborhood.
Great location and local tips! We had several awesome meals thanks to Amylynne's recommendations. Also, communication and hospitality were great.
This place has a great bathroom. Very clean, lovely place to stay with all you need.
A nice play to stay that was super convenient to the Kailua area - would be happy to stay there again.

We'd stayed 5 days Amylynne's place. It's very well situated and central to a bunch of attractions on the Oahu island. 
Thanks
Great place! Located in a quiet neighborhood, with a beautiful beach and hikes just minutes away.

Great place to stay! Was super clean and Amylynne got back to every single text we had immediately. Anything we needed, she had. Was very quiet at night and dogs only barked when prompted. Would stay here again for sure. Great backroom. There is a mini fridge and also a keurig for coffee in the morning.

We had a great experience at Amylynne's. The space is clean and beautiful with lots of great amenities. My favorite is the Keurig coffee machine: it allows me to get out in the morning without having to stop by a coffee shop; a great time saver. We are really impressed by Amylynne's attention to details: there is sunscreen and aloe lotion for us to use, there are extra pillows in the closet, there are beach amenities we can borrow. Will definitely stay with Amylynne again when we return to Oahu.
Das Zimmer ist wie beschrieben, das Bett nicht ganz bequem. (Es fehlen ein paar Latten.) Die Dusche ist toll und Amylynne und ihre Hundebande ebenso.

We had a lovely stay in Kailua! Amylynne was great with communication and helping us find spots to eat. Kono’s was one of the restaurants we went to and it was SO yummy - highly recommend their Chun’s bomber! The location of the Airbnb was great and super close to Lanikai Beach! Overall our experience was awesome and we’d definitely stay there again!

name: Perfect Place To Rest, Close to All in NYC!
summary: Clean and great place to rest your head and have a hot shower. The room features a full size bed, a big closet, a balcony and nightstand. Perfect for 2 people. Located just 15 minutes from Manhattan. Starting in August, you can take a ferry, that is located two blocks from the house, to the city, go into the city while enjoying the magnificent view.  Close to bars, shops, restaurants and a rock's throw from the NYC skyline view, a must see!
space: You rent a nice bedroom with one bed that can sleep up to two people, a nightstand and a closet. However, you are free to use the kitchen and living/dining room. The kitchen is fully equipped with everything needed for cooking and cleaning, just clean up after yourself when you are done. The other two rooms are occupied by other Airbnb guests and they are also free to use the kitchen and living room/dining room area. This is a great place to mingle and meet interesting people from all over the world :)
description: Clean and great place to rest your head and have a hot shower. The room features a full size bed, a big closet, a balcony and nightstand. Perfect for 2 people. Located just 15 minutes from Manhattan. Starting in August, you can take a ferry, that is located two blocks from the house, to the city, go into the city while enjoying the magnificent view.  Close to bars, shops, restaurants and a rock's throw from the NYC skyline view, a must see! You rent a nice bedroom with one bed that can sleep up to two people, a nightstand and a closet. However, you are free to use the kitchen and living/dining room. The kitchen is fully equipped with everything needed for cooking and cleaning, just clean up after yourself when you are done. The other two rooms are occupied by other Airbnb guests and they are also free to use the kitchen and living room/dining room area. This is a great place to mingle and meet interesting people from all over the world :) Guests have access to their room, the kitchen/l
neighborhood_overview: Astoria/Long Island City is one of the safest neighborhoods in New York City. The house is  conveniently located close to 24 hr supermarket, shops, cafes, bars and a five minute walk to The Noguchi Museum and Socrates Sculpture Park. Check out bar Barn on 21st street and 30th ave, also check out Astoria Park and its view of New York City or just walk to 31st ave and Vernon Blvd and check out the view of the city : )
notes: Myself or my cleaning lady/sister comes around between 11am and 3pm to clean the apt so please be respectful. We don't clean your room daily but we do take care of the common area.  We offer the living room area where guests who want to drop off their bags before check in time or after check in time can do so, and go about the city. So if you have a late flight or travel plans you can enjoy your last day without carrying your bags around :)
transit: The apt is a 10 minute walk to the N/Q  Broadway Subway stop and 20 minutes outside of midtown Manhattan. Don't forget an all American breakfast around the corner at Bell Aire Diner .
access: Guests have access to their room, the kitchen/living room/dining room area and bathroom which is shared with the other guests.
interaction: I'm working a lot but in case you need anything please message me via AIRBNB. My sister or I will be at the house usually 12pm-3pm please feel free to ask her anything.
house_rules: Do not smoke marijuana or cigarettes in my house. If you do so you will be asked to leave without a refund and I will not return your security deposit. Please respect my home and other guests.

host.host_about: I am a young professional who has a large townhouse in Astoria.  I enjoy, traveling, family and meeting new people and their cultures. My cousin,and I enjoy meeting all the different people through Airbnb. We work together and help make our guests stay pleasant and comfortable. Our rooms are clean and very convenient to all attractions across the city. We look forward to meeting you soon : ).  Make our house your house.

reviews.comments:
Une maison très belle et elle contient tout ce que vous cherchez, conforme à l'annonce
Je recommande
Bloz's place was just as described, nice and clean apartment, quiet and safe neighbourhood with many grocery and other stores on the way from public transport. Nic and cozy.
Good place for a great price!  Don't expect anything fancy but it was a perfect place to sleep for a low- cost trip.
As pictured. Nice apartment that was super easy to check in and clean. A little off the beaten path to get to public transit, but I like to walk and it was near my sister.

This was our second stay at this airbnb and we loved it! Close to the train, parking was a breeze, and the other people staying in airbnb were quiet and kept to themselves. It was ideal for a staycation. We will definitely be back!
Our stay in Bloz's place was pleasant and purposeful and we were satisfied. Everything was nice to stay over one night.

Overall a really great place! Free street parking, easy to get to public transportation and the room was nice! The bathroom was a bit gross but not the end of the world. I'd recommend this place for sure

The room was just as advertised and had a nice comfy bed.  Check-in was easy and the host was careful to make sure we had all the right information to get into the apartment and on the internet easily.  Would stay here again, though note that of course it's a little bit of a walk to the subway / restaurants.  Thanks for hosting us!
Very nice place to stay. Very clean and convenient location

Good place near buses and metro. We ve never seen the owner but we communicated before our arrival.
I recommend this place.
Great communication and good location
Good Host, cleam room!
Everything was fine. Very big plus is the location, very close to Manhatten and the main attractions. Room and apartment clean, cozy and quiet. Good place to rest between visiting New York.
Room was clean and it was 15 min away from metro station. Bloz didnt answear for any questions.

Very basic affordable spot, very close to the Astoria ferry and metro so easy to get in to the city! Close to great Greek food in Astoria and the room was comfortable and the neighborhood was nice and quiet. The bathroom is a little dirty but otherwise a great stay!

Staying at Bloz's place was really perfect for me. Quiet during the night and only 10 mins to the subway station. For me the ideal location for my city trip as I only spent the nights there and was gone all day roaming about New York. I would re-visit.

The light switch in the main room did nothing. The shower faucet is... eccentric, needs replacing. But works just fine. Had a good shower.  Had a great night's sleep.  And the location is great. Right between the East River ---- and great views and walking -- and all the convenient restaurants on Broadway.
The place is in a residential area, a bit far out if you want to discover around. A bit pricey for the house which the room is not modern and requires some update.
Quick response. Saved my day.
It is a good location if you want to spend a few days in NYC.

The stay was okay. It could be great, however, people who occupied the other two rooms (whom you are supposed to share kitchen, bathroom and common area with) didn't know about the house rules... They were okay with leaving whole bunch of women hair everywhere or tons of water on the floor... They also liked to occupy the bathroom for 40 minutes just for fun in the mornings. So it felt like the host explained the house rules only to us and tried to find the most disgusting people for the other two rooms.
Very sad.
Comfortable location but needs a little bit more cleaning to get higher rating.
the room was fanatic. Clean. Big enough for my 6”4 body. private deck was very nice. great Light
Bolz is the quickest host to text me back i have ever known. When i was typing my message he had already replied!! Communication was great! I suggest his place to everyone.  ;)

I'd like to give this spot 4 stars as Bloz was so helpful upon check in when the key we were provided did not work in our room door to lock it. Bloz provided a safe spot for us to lock our bags and quickly provided a new key. The upkeep and maintenance of the space is what prevents a 4 or 5 rating. The hallway leading to apartment looks like it could be vacuumed  and smells musty as well as the apartment itself. The Bathroom could use repairs  and to be cleaned. The bedroom was clean  and the shower was warm. We didn't spend a ton of time at the space and only spent 2 nights there, so it provided what I needed, a bed and a shower. It is a good spot for a 1 or 2 night stay.
Das Zimmer ist OK. Beim Bad darf man nicht penibel sein

This was a last minute trip and found this place! It had everything we needed. My sister and I were not planning on using the place other than for sleeping. We stayed here for 2 days and it had everything we needed. It was easy to find. It was difficult to find parking but we were able to park a few streets down. We didn't have any issues. Thanks for everything!

Se encuentra bien ubicado, únicamente hay q tomar taxi o uber en la estación de metro Broadway hasta el lugar. Hay dos habitaciones aparte de esta por lo que tendrán que compartir el baño con los demás cuartos. Lo malo es cuando se bañan porque se tardan, pero el baño siempre estuvo limpio. Tienes opción de preparar algo se comer, ya que cuenta con cocina. Si hace frío es cálida la habitación. Además de qué hay una cobija extra y te ponen toallas para bañarte.
The place is clean and perfect instructions by the host to get into the apartment, it is perfect to spend one night. Unfortunately the location is frightening and a bit dangerous at night.
Good spot for a quick, easy, inexpensive place to stay for the night

After trying a few places, I came back to Bloz's because his space tended to be the most discreet and comfortable for the price. I commute to Astoria a couple days a week for a modest acting gig and I wouldn't go anywhere else for the price at this point. Bloz's place does the trick--and by the trick, I mean it keeps you warm on a winter night for insanely cheap and it's hardly a 5-minute drive from my workplace.
Great place for a great price, as always!
Great place for a quick trip to the city, very hard to find street parking but overall it was a good place to stay at for the night.

Where do I even begin....When we first walked in the room we were hit with a strong smell of urine. Not only did the room not look as clean as pictured but it was also scorching hot. The drawer that is in the room is on it’s last life. Everything about it was unattractive. Let’s move onto the bathroom( that is a whole other story). I was traveling all day so I was so excited to shower! Not only was I turned off by the dirty bath mat and the black mold in the creases of the shower , when I went to turn on the water the shower head was spitting water from every direction except the direct I was in. It was horrible, I had a better chance at showering in the sink. Mind you one of the ladies that was also there would be in the bathroom for 60 minutes, taking tea baths leaving the bathroom an even bigger mess. It is so funny to me that there was two women that go and clean the parts of the apartment that no one uses. My last straw was when they started smoking weed in the house when I had my baby there. I contacted the owner and demanded a refund for the remaining days that I didn’t use because there’s no way I could stay in that environment, this jackass responded and told me he would only give me a refund if someone books for those days, meaning he did not want to give me my money back. I had to call Airbnb and wait 4 days to receive my money back!!! There’s no parking so good luck if you have a car. Also hopefully it doesn’t rain when you are there because the balcony will play you beats all night. I couldn’t hardly sleep because of the metal on the balcony. I had to lay a shirt down so that the water wouldn’t hit it directly so I could catch some sleep. This place is just a ghetto hot mess, I agree with other people who have been here, yes it’s nice if you plan for a cheap sleep and go but it’s not the type of place you should bring a date or even relax because the mattress isn’t even comfortable.  To be honest I wouldn’t stay here again and never in my entire life would I recommend someone with two senses to do so either. I forgot to mention, I had to put my own sheets on the bed because the ones that were there had dust on them!

The flat rent by Bloz has all necessary equipment needed for a short stay in NY and secure. The room is quite spacious with a nightstand, closet and balcony. The towel are given. The kitchen is quite small but equipped with some spoons, knives, glasses, pans, stoves, four ... There isn't a TV in the living room but when we're all the time outside to visit NYC, you don't need it.

The flat is well located, it's really 15 minutes from the nearest metro station (Broadway, line N or W). It's around 20 minutes from Time Square so it's close to Manhattan for a cheaper price. There are Mc Do, Subway and a Market shop at the end of the street, which is quite convenient.
But what marks my stay in this flat was the nice Swiss girls I met there, staying in another room. They were like my friend and me, having a one week holiday and wanting to visit NYC. They gave us some advice, it was really nice. I enjoy my stay there. 

Thank you, Bloz and the people I met there for your kindness.

DO NOT GO HERE. There was no meet and greet with the owner. There was no communication which was very much needed given that there were ants all in the bathroom. (Hidden by Airbnb) tried to enter our room while we slept. The drawers to the nightstand were broken. The wooden floors were sticky. If the ower advertises a balcony, its awful. No view, broken soccer chairs. Unsafe, unwelcome, not clean. DO NOT GO HERE
Comfortable and clean. Good value :)
Great place for the price easy check in

Добираться не очень удобно. Район Квинс. Запахи в квартире неописуемые. Рекомендую снимать только на одну ночь. Выспаться. Если долгое ожидание перелетов. В ванной пахнет горько-сладким так, что забивает кашель. Хуже, чем я ожидала. Зато увидела что-то ещё, кроме Манхеттена и Центрального парка.

Bloz’s places (a number of rooms in the building) may be basic, as advertised, but it’s very convenient and exceptional value for the location. Too marks for the speed with which Bloz and his cousin solved a couple of minor problems. Not fancy, obviously, but clean and well enough equipped. Comfortable bed, clean sheets and towel (maybe bring more if you’re staying a while). 
We’ll remember this spot for another Queens visit.

The apartment is located around 10 blocks away from the W subway. It was difficult to enter because they had given us the wrong codes for the doors, and when we tried to call them, they didn’t answer. The apartment had a strange smell, really strong. The room was ok, just to sleep. The neighborhood is nice, there are restaurants and supermarkets really close.
Great stay for a last minute need!
Close to public transport, bars and restaurants. The rooms are spacious and clean. Bloz responds quickly to any questions.
Comfortable stay!
Place was exactly as pictured and described it was a Comfortable place the sleep.
It is the cheapest option so I would stay here again but I would not recommend if you have limited time in New York as it is too far from every touristic place. Not pleasant to travel that much.

The house was the perfect spot to whom wants to visit NYC in a couple of days. The room, the common areas, and bathroom were perfectly cleaned and my girlfriend thanks a lot for the hairdryer. Another great aspect of our room was the location, just 10 mins by walk from the subway and next to Broadway of Astoria that we discovered to be a wonderful district!  Thank you Bloz we recommend your place!

Very good place to spend a few nights in NY. 
We took the boat from astoria to wall street, and it is a nice way of moving to the south of Manhattan. The subway is 15min away, and from there is very easy to arrive near central park.

Für einen günstigen Aufenthalt in New York ein guter Platz: gut angebunden und zentral gelegen, sehr ruhige Nachbarschaft. Die Wohnung besteht aus drei Zimmern, die alle vermietet werden, das Badezimmer wird gemeinsam genutzt. Die Einrichtung ist simpel und ohne jeden Charme, mehr als einen Schlafplatz findet man hier nicht. Die Kommunikation mit dem Vermieter, den wir nicht zu Gesicht bekamen, funktioniert zuverlässig. Für New Yorker Verhältnisse gutes Preisleistungsverhältnis. Wer mehr als eine rein zweckmäßige Bleibe sucht, sollte sich aber anderweitig umschauen.

Good location and neighborhood, room was ok as showed in pictures, AC working fine, but some odor at the room. The apartment had other guests at the room 2 and the bathroom wasn’t cleaned at all, very dirty bathtube and no soap or toothpaste. Even the Room 2 had guests, I’d expect the host clean the bathroom because he knew we were coming to stay one night. The host doesn’t greet you in person, you get a message about the code and what to do with your trash, what is fine for me, but he sent different codes for me and for the person who was sharing the room with me. Luckily we did check in together but it could’ve been a trouble for us trying to reach the host late at night. 
You have access to the living room and small kitchen, what was good enough with AC working (summer time). 
It’s a good place to stay one or two nights. Good price, good location the only thing that I didn’t like was the bathroom so dirty.
es muy práctico pues solo entras y tienes tu habitación lista.

The apartment is very simple, but is clean, tidy, and straightforward. A quick 7 minute walk from the Broadway station, it's no trouble at all to get back and forth from the main island. The other roommates were equally tidy and respectful of the space, which is a bonus. The little outdoor balcony is also great for relaxing and people watching too! Definitely recommend this space to a low maintenance traveler looking for a weekend escape. Thank you for a wonderful weekend Bloz!
Great experience. It's simple, functional and has everything you need.
Zum Übernachten ist die Unterkunft ok.
Very great room. A lot of comfort and convenience.

I stayed here for 10 days. It was what was in the pictures. The shared bathroom was uncomfortable, especially when I arrived and the shower was clogged from someone’s hair for two days, and the water didn’t drain properly. The bedroom ac also was hardly pushing out any cold hair, especially on 90degree days it was musky in the living space. The value is decent for what you get. It’s a place to rest your head, just to visit various locations in New York City. Also had items stolen from me in the bathroom. So I had to bring everything I needed back into my room and lock the door. It’s what you’d expect from multiple guests sharing a living space.
Good place to stay. You get what you pay for.

L'appartement est bien situé, le quartier est tranquille (attention par contre cet été il a des travaux sur les lignes de métro proches ce qui ralentit l'accès aux stations car remplacé par des navettes/bus). Sinon l'appartement est très bien, la climatisation est un peu vieillot dans la chambre mais c'est correct. Les espaces communs n'étaient pas super propre mais cela est la conséquence de vivre a plusieurs dans l'appartement.
Sinon super séjour, j'y retournerai sûrement pour l'emplacement qui est vraiment sympathique.
Clean, easy to get to from ferry from the city. Relatively safe neighborhood. Would stay here again!

The place was filthy, and smelled dirty. The host was no where in sight. There was garbage on the bathroom floor and the toilet had poop in it. The bathtub looked as thought it hadn't been properly scrubbed in years. There was grime all over the floors and the refrigerator door. The mattress cover had some brown stains on it and the whole place smelled gross. I immediately called airbnb to get a direct refund from them and they gave it to me after providing pictures of the filth in the apartment. If you care about cleanliness at all don't go here. The bathroom felt so gross that my boyfriend refused to use it .

Balcony door didnt lock. host refused to fix it and was very hard to contact. had to leave and stay elsewhere as the door couldnt be locked thus leaving it very unsafe to leave belongings there or sleep. Worst Airbnb we have stayed in.
The room, bathroom, and common areas were all nice and clean. The place is a little far from the subway, but the Astoria ferry is a short walk away and made it much easier to travel.

The apartment was small but cozy. Limited seating in the common area and one bathroom shared between three rooms. Bloz does a very good job of communicating with you if you have any questions & accommodates your arrival and check out time well.
nice place to stay in. quite neighborhood

el apartamento se puede describir como sucio, viejo y estropeado.

apartment is ugly, dirty and broken
It was good.
Das Zimmer war gut, das Bad hatte gewisse Mängel bei der Sauberkeit
Clean and comfortable place to stay, just a bit out of the way from the train station.
Good place to stay in New York on a budget - good connection to the city center by ferry, safe neighborhood even late at night. Lots of bars and restaurants nearby.
Nice place
Bloz est une hôte très attentionné et réactive, le queens est un quartier très sympa. Je recommande !!
Everything was pretty nice, the house was really nice and less than 20 minutes from the subway. The only thing should be changed is the manager's behaviour !!!
excelente comunicación y siempre muy atento, así como respuestas rápidas!

This was a pleasant place to stay. The biggest downside was the nearest subway station was under construction, so the walk was over 20 minutes instead of like 12 minutes, but as soon as that construction is done that will no longer be a problem. The place was as clean as you would expect it to be with multiple guests staying at the same time. The neighborhood is nice and felt safe walking at night. I would definitely stay here again!
great place! thanks for having me in your home so often
It is what it is, somewhat affordable with basic furniture. Quiet neighbourhood and close to manhattan by ferry.
Clean. Quiet. Close to bus/train. This place is perfect.
Enjoyed my stay , had no complaints.

Place is ok if you are looking for a place to just go to sleep .. price is fair, but don’t expect to be super comfortable because you won’t. Terrible pillows and dirty kitchen. Location is safe but far from subways. A very uncomfortable situation happened in the building, more specific in our shared apartment which made me and my mom feel very unsafe and the host just said to “forget about it”

Expect to bring your own pillows and blankets because the ones provided are not sufficient. Also, the residence is not walking distance to the nearest subway station. Be prepared to take an uber or bus to a subway station. Additionally, you will be sharing the bathroom with two other rooms so potentially four or five other people. There were many times where we couldn't get ready because other residents were using it. The walls are thin so you can hear much of what's going on outside of your room especially other guests talking or walking around. The check-in process was easy and flexible.  
Overall, we did not feel the description and photos were an accurate representation and it wasn't worth what we spent.
Correct pour un séjour bref. Proche du métro direct jusqu’à Manhattan
I can not recommend this airbnb in any case.
was great
Not clean, not easily accessible. If you’re looking for something cheap and won’t be there often, I suggest. If you’re looking  for comfort, stay somewhere else.

name: Comfortable room 5 minutes from the beach
summary: Habitacion privada para una sola persona,situada en una localizacion que  es increible, estamos ubicados en una de las mejores zonas para poder conocer la autentica Barcelona caminando.A 5 minutos de la playa para que puedas disfrutar del verano de Barcelona.Nuestra casa tiene 300 metros de superficie con techos muy altos, el edificio es historico de 1800
space: La habitacion es interior pero en Barcelona se agradece por la contaminación acustica, es una habitacion con mucha luz. Para nosotros es muy importante el descanso y por ello puedes disfrutar de un buen colchon y unas buenas almohadas. Cuidamos mucho la limpieza de nuestra casa e intentamos que siempre esté todo muy limpio. En esta casa vivo con mi chico y dos habitaciones que compartimos y nunca hay problema de espacio ni de limpieza. Nos encantaria conocerte y poderte ayudar en todo lo que necesites, nosotros somos de Barcelona y podemos recomendarte un monton de lugares muy buenos y de todos los gustos, nos gusta colaborar en todo lo que necesites en tu estancia y siempre dando total libertad para que te sientas como en tu casa.

Para nosotros es muy importante el descanso y por ello puedes disfrutar de un buen colchon y unas buenas almohadas. Nos encantaria conocerte y poderte ayudar en todo lo que necesites, nosotros somos de Barcelona y podemos recomendarte un monton de lugares muy buenos y de todos los gustos, nos gusta colaborar en todo
neighborhood_overview: Estamos localizados en el corazón de Barcelona, desde esta localizacion podrás descubrir la autentica Barcelona caminando sin ningun problema. Estamos a 2 minutos del Born, a 4 minutos del Gotic y 5 minutos de la playa. Está muy bien cumunicado con trasportes publicos Te sorprenderá la localización de nuestra casa.
transit: Estamos localizados en el centro de barcelona, aqui no hay problemas de trasporte publico pero te recomendamos te pierdas por las calles de Barcelona para poder conocer la ciudad, desde nuestra localizacion podras disfrutar de todo el centro de Barcelona y playas.
access: Garantizamos una estancia agradable y tranquila, donde nos gusta que nuestros huespedes disfruten de la casa en su totalidad y puedan sentirse como en su casa.
interaction: Por supuesto estoy disponible siempre que lo necesites, y podemos estar en contacto 24 horas por cualquier urgencia. No vas a tener ningun problema de comunicacion y me podras localizar y preguntar todo lo que quieras. Nos gusta dar libertad pero estamos disponibles siempre que se necesite
house_rules: - no se permiten fiestas - no se puede traer a gente que no esté registrada en la reserva de airbnb esto supone el cobro de una noche completa - únicamente admitimos un solo huésped, no admitimos reservas para dos  Huéspedes ni para niños. -  Apto para fumadores.

name: Best location downtown + free parking - Esperanza
summary: In the heart of Downtown Montreal, one block of the famous Ste-Catherine street.  2 mins from montreal's best restaurants bars and club. 2 blocks from Metro station Guy-Concordia and PA supermarket. Max of 6. 1 closed lovely bedroom (queen size bed) . 2 sofa-beds in the living room (size double). Beautifull dining place. Free Wifi - Free parking - Free Netflix access on TV. There is a swimpool, a sauna, a gym and a squash area in the building as well as a nice rooftop terrace. You will love it!
space: You will love my place! I have a large room set up with a confortable queen size bed and added a little desk and a nice chair to create a nice little laptop friendly space. The living room has two Ikea Beddinge sofa beds that can unfold into  confortable beds a little large than size double each. I have high speed internet 35 mb/s and  a 55 inches full HD tv with a roku unit so you can access youtube and a Netflix account (logged in) and enjoy movies and shows. Beautiful candles are set on the table to decorate the place and you are very welcome to light them up and enjoy the different smells my wife picked for you.  Fresh towels are in the closet for your relaxing shower hopefully after enjoying our beautiful swimpool upstairs or our gym, squash room and sauna.

Max of 6. 1 closed lovely bedroom (queen size bed) . 2 sofa-beds in the living room (size double). Beautifull dining place. Free Wifi - Free parking - Free Netflix access on TV. There is a swimpool, a sauna, a gym and a squash area in the building as well as a nice rooftop terrace. You will love it! You will love my place!
