The living room has two Ikea Beddinge sofa beds that can unfold into  confortable beds a little large than size double each. I have high speed internet 35 mb/s and  a 55 inches full HD tv with a roku unit so you can access youtube and a Netflix account (logged in) and enjoy movies and shows. Beautiful candles are set on the t
neighborhood_overview: Althought it is very quite around the building it only take a 5min walk (2 blocks) to get to the best Montreal night life attractions including crescent street and the Wiston Churchill Club. It is also one block away from the ste-Catherine street with all the shops and restaurants. You can find all kind of food in a 2 blocks radius including fine steaks at l'atelier argentin or the best Japanese food at Kazu (big line up). We also have the PA market one block away if you rather buy ingredients and cook your own meal as well as a smaller grocery shop adjacent to the building.
transit: We are very central so you can walk to most places and you probably still be faster than most cars. For longer travels you can use the subway, Guy Concordia station is one block away, that would be on the green line. You are also welcome to use your car since I do provide a parking space which take one of the problems away (parking) leaving you to deal with the other: Heavy Traffic
access: - Swimpool - Sauna  -Gym -Rooftop terrace - Squash room
house_rules: The gym swimpool terrace and squash court close at 22h, please respect the building rules, also if you bring food and drinks to the terrace please clean up after yourselves, its just common courtesy since its a common space. I already set the parameter to only accept non smokers but if for some reason you pick up smoking during your stay please do so in the balcony.

reviews.comments:
Karim gave clear and thorough instructions prior to our visit. Though we never needed to meet in person or speak over the phone, he was very friendly and helpful, and eager to make our stay as comfortable as possible. 

Use of the squash court was a bonus.

Tidy and comfortable apartment with all the essentials and good shower pressure. The futon bed was comfortable. The dedicated secure undercover carpark was great. Short walking distance of downtown and the major city attractions. Karim was very responsive and a pleasure to communicate with. Would happily stay in the apartment  again if ever back in Montreal.
The place was very clean and cozy. 5 mins walk from St Catherine St. Very communicative and responsive with me. I will recommend it for sure to other guest visiting Montreal!
The place was very clean and the location was amazing.  The only challenge was the pool was closed for renovations during our stay.

Host was very accommodating for our last minute late night check in. Parking garage was kind of tight, definitely would be a squish for a mid sized car. But aside from that, Appartment was a lot more spacious than expected :) very cute decore and extremely convienent location !
Great location. Walking distance to pretty much everything.

We had a great stay! The place is just as pictured very comfortable & clean. I didn't get a chance to meet Karim but he provided detailed information on how to check in, park and check out. The place is at a very convenient location - close to restaurants, bars, shopping and metro. Would definitely recommend and come back.

The area is great with many restaurants in the immediate area.  Mt. Royal is within walking distance and not a bad hike to the top!  Apartment was clean and comfortable.  Pool was unavailable due to renovations while we were there.
As described, great clean apartment close to attractions.

Karim was an excellent host.  Gave us accurate directions and instructions.  Flat is located perfectly in walking distance (or metro) of all downtown action.  We love to walk everywhere as Montreal is a walkable city but had no issue with Uber and taxis.  Did not take advantage of the pool due to limited time but it is amazing along with the rooftop patio.  Had no issues with loud neighbors and building is relatively quiet.

Karim's apartment is awesome! Fit 5 of us comfortably. Karim offered some great local recommendations and was really helpful and responsive. The location is within walking distance from a lot of cool restaurants and bars. There's a lot of shopping on Sainte Catherine which is right down the street. It's also a cheap taxi ride away from the water front and Mount Royal. Would definitely recommend this place!

The apartment is  almost exactly as described. It's not fancy, but you will have everything you need. The beds are all futons, even in the bedroom. It's well stocked, very clean and comfortable.  Parking situation is wonderful. Location is wonderful. Karim was very responsive and helpful.
Exactly as described and more.  Great communications. The pool and Netflix TV were great. Thank you!
everything was good but was abit noisy in the morning and the parking was pretty tight and sketchy other than that everything was good
L'appartement est sympathique mais le ménage laisse vraiment à désirer .... Draps avec des taches, poussière un peu partout ... Dommage au prix de la nuit on s'attendait à quelque chose de propre.

Karim's place was sizable, but also very basic. It's use is clearly for Airbnb's only, so it felt a bit bare. Lacked small details like a full length mirror and paper towels. We also ran out of toilet paper (we were 2 women, stayed for 5 days, and there were 2 very small rolls when we got there). As for location, it was very close to the metro. The parking spot was clutch. We ended up not using our car at all (walked/took metro). As a side note, if you are sensitive to cigarette smell be aware that the hallways do have a strong odor. The apartment itself had none, but there were a lot of cigarette butts on the patio. Unfortunately we did not get a chance to check out the pool. Overall we were satisfied with our stay.
Everything was perfect. Karim explained the check in process effectively and we enjoyed our stay. There was no hassle and the location was everything we wanted and more.
Tres bien
Merci bcp pour oouvoir nous acceuillir dans l'appartement. Karim a très bien expliquer toutes les demarches à faire, on a eu du plaisir a rester chez Karim:)
Great place and great location

The location is great - you can find all kind restaurants, dry cleans, supermarket and very close to Metro (on the same block).  It is very convenient to find meals (Japanese, Korean, Indian, Chinese, Spanish, Steakhouse, Vietnamese) it is close to University and college so transportation and restaurant are very easy reach.

Just as listed, I wouldn't say dirty but wasn't the cleanest place ever.
The terrace and building amenities where amazing! Enjoyed my stay. 
Worth it for the price. Thanks Karim!

Great location - very near to metro station, which can be used to access most attractions in Montreal. The parking space is a bonus. Karim sent a detailed and easy to follow check-in procedures. He even helped to set up the sofa bed with pillows and blankets prior to our arrival. Thank you!
This was a perfect location for my fist visit to Montreal. Everything was as described and access was super easy.
the place is great but the parking kind of chalenging

Karim's place is at a very vibrant neighbourhood. There are lots of good restaurants nearby. It is of walking distance to the Montreal Museum of Fine Arts as well. He also provides guide books in his place, which turned out to be very helpful. Karim gives detailed instructions, so it is easy to locate the apartment. Overall, it was a good experience.

Karim was very flexible and always quick to respond any inquiry.
The bathroom could have been a little more clean but overall great stay!
Karim provided accurate information to easily check in and out.   The apartment was clean, comfortable and stocked with essentials for our stay.   Centrally located.  we enjoyed our stay.

Quaint apartment. Close to transit and quite accessible. Parking spot is enclosed-  corners are a little tight but easily navigated. Pictures are a good representation of what everything looks like. Karim is great at replying and explaining the check-in process. Had a great night in Montreal !
Karim's place is as advertised. Good communication, great location and thankful for the parking spot!

Karim went out of his way on his weekend to make sure we were happy! He always text back within minutes and was very flexible. We showed up three hours earlier then check in, and Karim made it work so we could park our car in the free parking zone, and drop off our bags. I would highly recommend his condo! Comfortable, clean and great location! Thanks again for a great weekend in Montreal!
Great central location in downtown Montréal. Drove in but didn’t really need to use my car at all. Subway stop is around the corner and restaurants all around!

That’s was awesome, The appartement was very clean, everything was nice, thank you Karim, 
If I’ll come back to Montreal I’ll not hesitate to contact Karim again
Great location downtown near Mont Royal and Ste. Catherine, awesome amenities, great price, and Karim was accurate and responsive!

Karim's place was exactly what we needed-- a quiet haven in the heart of Montreal. The apartment had what was needed for our group of five. Not fancy but definitely serviceable and (again) the location was wonderful! The rooftop access, pool and parking made it even better. A short walk to so many great city spots! We had a wonderful weekend there! Thank you, Karim!

Location is great. It was about a 3 minute walk to St. Catherine, where there are plenty of places to eat and shop. Very comfortable place to stay! Karim was awesome in communicating with us and responded very quickly.
Right by the subway! Good place to stay if you want to see as much of the city as possible
Great location, easy chef
Great location. Very nice apartment. We will definitely come back to it if we visit Montreal again.
Very gracious and helpful host!
Everything was as is  in the photos and description of Karim’s apartment. Stylish and comfortable..the location can’t be beat with parking being a huge plus.
I can't believe there really was a squash court and sauna in this building! How amazing. Karim's place was just as advertised and he was so quick to respond to our messages. Thanks, Karim!
Pretty nice! Good place with excellent location! Since I stayed here during Christmas holiday, one point is that the temperature is pretty low, not warm at all. Overall, it’s pretty great!

My boyfriend and I enjoyed Karim’s place very much. Super close to the green line Guy-Concordia metro station to get around the city. We kept our car parked in Karim’s parking space. The parking is tight, but doable. We did a 3-day unlimited Metro pass that was only $18 CAD, which was perfect in getting us anywhere we needed to be from Karim’s. Karim was very quick to respond and helped us out with a last minute booking after our previous booking got canceled on us. Highly recommend and would definitely stay at his place again!
Bien situé, propre, bonne communication, stationnement interieur*****

This apartment is centrally located with decent indoor parking. However, it is poorly maintained and missing a few amenities in the kitchen. The accumulation of dirt and dust over the year is obvious on furniture and baseboards with stains on walls and doors. The worst is to be charged a cleaning fee and to then be handed a dirty apartment that was not properly cleaned after the previous night's guest. From a stinky towel and dirty bathroom to dirty sinks and filthy countertops and stovetop. I would not stay here again.
The condo located in Downtown Montreal, where is convenient to access everywhere such as Metro, stores, cafe, express food, etc. Check in and Check out procedure is easy.

Great communication with Karim. 8th floor apt centrally located so you can walk everywhere. Metro just a block away.
Indoor parking a plus as was the small pool and sauna. Apt was nice and quiet and clean. Futon mattresses rather hard and anyone with chemical sensitivity would notice the spray air freshener odor
Karim's place is awesome. Great location, ease of checking in and out, very spacious, and access to an indoor pool which was very unexpected. Thanks again!

Arriver simple , réponse rapide 
Appartement très bien situer , complet 
Rien à dire !!!

We were very happy with our stay. The room was exactly or better than advertised, and the amenities in the building were great (though the squash court seems to actually be a racquetball court). The location is fantastic - about a 10 minute walk from nightlife at Crescent street - and included parking is a huge plus. While we did not meet Karim in person, he was very responsive to our messages and the Argentinian steakhouse suggested in the listing was fantastic.

Karim's place is a great! Everything is as described and its a great location close to the subway and st. Catherine street.  Karim is also super quick to respond. The only issue we had was that there wasn't enough toilet paper and we had to go buy more. There also was 4 of us but we only had 2 towels. Overall it was an amazing stay and we would stay here again.
Awesome location, I had a great weekend at Karim’s place!
We stayed in Montreal for the long weekend. Our stay was amazing. Karim was quick with his responses and everything was as described.

Karim is an excellent host and very responsive to messaging. His directions for check-in, etc. were very clear and helpful.

The place has everything you need. However, the on-site parking has a max 5’7” clearance, so don’t count on free parking if you have a truck, suv or minivan. 

The building is easy to find and conveniently located within the city.

We really had a great weekend in Montreal staying in this place. Pool and sauna are extra enjoyable part of our stay, parking is tight but manageable. The unit is nice and clean. Definitely a great place to stay downtown, just a few walks away from restaurants, stores and public transportations.
Highly  recommend
C'est un endroit situé dans un quartier intéressant de Montreal.

Everything was great and absolutely satisfactory. Quick, responsive communication, super clean and nice apartment with lots of amenities and top location in walking distance to anything we needed. Anytime again :)
Perfect !
really good place but becareful with the underground parking

The apartment is in a perfect location. 3 minutes walking from saint catherine with is a really nice street and location. However the apartment is really old, not clean at all and the smell in the entire building is really nasty. I had to ask the owner to come and clean the apartment again because I could not stay there. I sent her picture of the floor and the stains. They came again to clean however the stains and dust were still there. I had to clean them myself. She didn’t want to reimburse me the cleaning fee. 
I would not suggest that apartment to anybody.
Real cool

The place is close to the main strip of bars and restaurants. We enjoyed our stay and the parking was also great. The place's cleanliness could be better, but for the price and the location and the free parking we thought it was fine.
Karim is an excellent host and his place is clean, spacious and is in the perfect location of downtown Montreal! 5 stars all the way!

This apt is located so that you can walk to the old port area or the McGill area. Also very near the metro stop if you want it. Having  indoor parking is a huge plus. Karim is very quick to answer any questions and was very kind to let us check in a little early. If you are looking for a nice space, but no frills and basic this is a great place.
Appartement propre, accès simple et sécurisé (parking souterrain) je recommande!

The apartment is in the heart of downtown Montreal, so certainly an ideal location. The fact that a parking spot is included is big a bonus. The apartment appeared as advertised. However, it was extremely filthy. I was able to inform the host and show him, so hopefully he will address and rectify this with the cleaning company he has hired. The most problematic issue was arriving in 30+ degree weather with no a/c installed as advertised (which was a main criteria in selecting this place). It was quite unbearable. 
While Karim was very prompt and polite in his exchanges leading to our check-in, once this issue had to be addressed I was very unimpressed with how it was handled. After several exchanges trying to address this legitimate concern, which disrupted most of our evening, arrangements were finally made to come and install the a/c that night. In the end it only made a slight difference, given that its an older window unit. If you plan to use the kitchen, be aware that some essentials are missing; including the proper items to wash and dry dishes. Otherwise, the bed and pull out couches are very comfortable for sleeping, and the highlight for us that mostly compensated for the other disappointments was the amazing rooftop patio and pool on the top floor. If this host is able to rectify the few issues addressed, this place has a lot of potential.
This place is perfect for a short trip to Montreal! Communication with Karim was great. The apartment is spacious and we had elevator access to and from our parking so easily. Thanks Karim!

Stayed 1 night for a short trip to Montreal.
Communication with Karim was very prompt. 
Parking inclusion is a great bonus. Check-in instructions were very clear.
Apartment building is on older side but no complaints overall.

Thanks Karim!
Karim was a super communicative, great host.
Location was great. Very affordable. A few cleanliness issues.

Karim’s place is large, clean, with excellent location and good amenities. Although the building is old the apartment is great. The check in and out is convenient and communication with Karim is also very easy.
Good place for the money

Karim's place was nice and cozy. A good deal for the price considering it included parking and the location was close to everything. Only thing was that the AC was not very cold, however we bring a portable fan whenever we rent with Airbnb and that certainly helped. Other than that it was good. Thanks Karim!

We’ve stayed in a number of AirBnB’s. All have exceeded expectations. However this one, not so much. For the most part, it was clean & neat but had dust & grime in places that made you wonder if the rest was clean. There were only 2 pillows on the bed & they had pillow shams to match the bedspread. Normally, I would want to sleep on pretty pillow shams or want my clients to mess them up. I think a pillowcase would be a better choice. The unit is located right in the heart of lots of restaurants & shopping. We had great off street parking. And, the owner was very helpful with getting the TV to work. Turns out the batteries were dead.

Great place to stay, stayed here in July 2018 from the USA, right in downtown walkable to restaurants and etc. Pool wasnt working but that wasnt Karims fault. Parking is easy and free in covered garage. Will definitely stay here again when I come back
Near downtown,can park.

logement bien placé et facile à trouver, procédure d'arrivée claire et facile. attention à l'hauteur max du parking (1m77). superbe piscine a l'intérieur niveau penthouse. les points négatifs : appartement usé et pas propre, lit très mou, air conditionné insuffisant.

Bonne localisation 
Prix correct 
Piscine fermée (travaux) quand nous y étions...
Balcon très sale (mégots de cigarettes partout sur le sol)
Bonne communication avec Karim
Wifi très moyen...
Had a great stay , the place was everything I  expected

This has an excellent location - a block from guy Concordia metro and St Catherine’s. Karin sent detailed check in/out instructions so that went smoothly. The parking spot was extremely convenient to have (and rare in downtown). The room itself is nothing fancy, but the price reflects that and the pictures show exactly what to expect. I would stay at Karim’s again.
Karim's place was very nice, and a great location too. Would definitely recommend!

In trying to be fair, I’ll break it up into two parts:

PRO’s: Off street parking was wonderful at this location. It’s close to numerou (Website hidden by Airbnb) Restaurants and within walking distance to the Metro subway.

CON’s: The floors, walls, and baseboards were extremely dirty and left us with a (Website hidden by Airbnb) unclean feeling. The furnishing were very minimal and the bed was very (Website hidden by Airbnb) uncomfortable. We could not find washcloths or kitchen towels.

Overall, I cannot reccomend this location and we would not stay again until the owner corrected the noted deficiencies.

Karim is a great host. We were allowed to check in a little bit early which was a big help. The Netflix was a nice touch. There was no toaster which was a slight let down. The location is prime and the gym is well equipped.

I would rent this again it was such a smooth experience. The only negative thing was the parking spot in what might be the tightest corners in a parking garage. Managed alright but could not see myself driving a Van down there. You can see scrapes where the cars hit the corners.
Karim’s place is centrally located. Just a short walk to the Bell Centre with lots a restaurants nearby. Free parking is a plus but it really needs a good cleaning.

Alles in Allem war die Unterkunft wie beschrieben und erwartet. Die Lage ist prima, gleich ums Eck gibt es eine Metrostation und man kann kostenlos parken. Die Wohnung ist geräumig und der Gastgeber ist sehr hilfsbereit.
Amazing! Loved the pool and sauna on the roof!

The price and location of this place is really amazing! We were in Montreal for a wedding and about a 10 minute walk to the venue and 5 minutes to the metro stop. I think the place needs a thorough cleaning, there is lots of dust and the place is missing some essential kitchen appliances and utensils (no toaster, only one decent knife). Overall I was happy with the stay and we used the pool and sauna which was lovely. The free parking was a great bonus but very tight for having a large SUV.
Spacious apartment!
The only good thing about the place is the location. It's the filthiest and least well equipped Airbnb unit I've stayed in.

Pro: great location, easy to find, great price, parking is a plus. Secure!
Con: The bathroom was not cleaned. There were hair and dust over the air vent and the walls. Behind the door was super dirty. The base of the toilet was filthy with urine stains. The bathtub was not cleaned, had soap gum etc.
The kitchen area was not cleaned and the oven was dirty, the refrigerator was not cleaned as well.
The bed was cheap and was horrible, the first night my back hurt so much that I slept on the futon in the living room. 
The floor was dirty and the apartment need to be deep cleaned. To top it off the upstairs neighbors partied none stop the time we were there. I know you’re not responsible for the hallway but the smell of curry in the hallway doesn’t help.
I read the previous reviews and I was skeptical because there’s a lot of people that love to complain so I decided to see for myself. Mistake, Mistake, Mistake
Great basic place in a great location! Thanks Karim!
Not clean enough

Karim made it very easy to check in, super informative + helpful. The apartment is super close to the metro. Lots of great Korean food close by. WiFi had a good signal. Parking space was a great convenience.  Unfortunately, the blue chip provided to enter the building didn't work during our whole stay, the apartment was pretty dirty and super outdated. On our last night the hot water wasn't working. On the day of departure it still wasn't working.
good location, good price, would recommend for folks coming in for a quick visit and are price conscious
Très bien situé, on peut marcher jusqu'au centre ville en laissant la voiture à l'abri dans le parking privé et surtout gratuit.
Very perfect place
Great location! Place wasn’t fancy but did the job.

Great location as it’s convenient to downtown and shopping. The parking spot is a plus. Amenities ad expected. The host is quick to respond to any inquiries and provided detailed check-in instructions that made the process very easy.
great spot to chill and feel at home.
Perfect
place was great! very neat and the directions were very clear

ATTENTION!!!! ATTENTION!!!! Do not live in this place. This is the worst place you can imagine. Everything is old and dirty. Obviously the host doesn’t care about this place any more. I booked for 9 days, and tried to alter down my check out date. The host won’t do it because no one would like to book this place. All the listing is old and dirty. The room is dark. The worst thing is the strong smell in the hallway and the bed. It’s definitely a horrible place to stay. And the host is not reasonable at all. I hope guests can read this and choose wisely. I had to book another place and paying for this one as well. HORRIBLE!!! HORRIBLE!!!!

Karim’s place was in a great location and was exactly what we were looking for. The only issue was with the parking on premise. The clearance is 70 inches so if you have a vehicle that is higher than that you will need to find parking elsewhere. Overall, the checkin was easy and the place was very clean!

name: Jolie chambre au coeur du Plateau Mont - Royal
summary: Jolie chambre au coeur du Plateau Mont-Royal , à 5 minutes a pied du metro , proche de bars et restaurants .
description: Jolie chambre au coeur du Plateau Mont-Royal , à 5 minutes a pied du metro , proche de bars et restaurants .

name: DESIGNER RESIDENCE IN THE HEART OF HONG KONG
summary: Panoramic views of Hong Kong City skyline create a captivating backdrop to this boutique residence. Designed with a focus on entertaining and crowned with a superb private rooftop, including a bar and bbq area. The space is so quiet you won't believe that Hollywood Road's cafés, artisan bakeries and gourmet delis are at the doorstep, it's also just a short walk to the bustling and contemporary Soho/ Central district. There is also easy access to Shueng Wan, Central MTR's, local buses and taxi's.
space: - House cleaner 3 times/week for general cleaning/ bed making and tidying.  - 1 Queen Size Bed - 1 Modern Bathroom with large shower and rain shower head.  - Kitchen area is fully equipped with a small oven, fridge, induction cooktop and cooking utensils.  - Washer/ Dryer  - Living area - TV and Sound System - Private Rooftop
description: Panoramic views of Hong Kong City skyline create a captivating backdrop to this boutique residence. Lots of amazing restaurants, bars, coffee shops, and tourist attractions. Centrally located, safe, and near several metro stations. This is the perfect location for your stay in New York City.

Life in our area is as rooted in cultural tradition as is it energized and diverse. In the last decade, restaurants like Red Rooster, Harlem Tavern, and Harlem Shake have reinvented a dining scene traditionally defined by soul food icons like Sylvia’s and Amy Ruth’s. The neighborhood is a national historic district in Manhattan, New York City. It
neighborhood_overview: Life in our area is as rooted in cultural tradition as is it energized and diverse. In the last decade, restaurants like Red Rooster, Harlem Tavern, and Harlem Shake have reinvented a dining scene traditionally defined by soul food icons like Sylvia’s and Amy Ruth’s. The neighborhood is a national historic district in Manhattan, New York City. It consists of 113 contributing residential row-houses built between 1886 and 1896. The buildings are three story brownstone and brick row-houses over raised basements in the Queen Anne, Romanesque, and Neo-Grec styles.  There is a peaceful, residential spirit throughout the neighborhood, evidenced by street pick-up basketball games and block parties. But Harlem is also home to a thriving cultural scene, which brings a constant vibrancy and excitement to the neighborhood. In Harlem, weekend dining and coffee culture are as significant as the nightlife scene. Live jazz brunches at venues like Harlem Tavern and Ginny’s Supper Club attract diners wi

The room accommodates 4 people with the couch (converts to full bed); however, if the booking is for only two people we will charge an extra $50/night if you wish to use the sofa bed.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
I am a medical professionals living and working in Manhattan. I have a two bedroom apartment in uptown Manhattan.

I have been hosting on Airbnb for over five years. I hope to provide a clean and comfortable place to stay for tourists and other travelers that are visiting NYC.



This is a shared apartment and everything except your private bedroom is shared. If you have any questions, feel free to message us :)

I live in uptown Manhattan, just north of Central Park, and a block away from Morningside Park. 

The apartment is very centrally located, I am close to trains (subways), museums, Central Park and various bus routes, which makes living as a tourist very EASY. 

We hope you enjoy your stay in NYC; the best city in the world :)

Highlights:
•Secure and safe building
•Clean, furnished private rooms
•Queen Size Beds (comfortably accommodates 2 people), with option for another bed to sleep an extra 2 people. (4 people total)
•Free unlimited wifi/internet access
•Air-Conditioning/Heating 
•Easy walk to Central Park/Coffee Shops/Museums etc ... 
•Minutes walk to the train/subway/bus stations
•Free Coffee/Tea (Keurig)
•Clean bedding/linen/towels/toiletries provided upon check-in
•Free unlimited Kitchen use

Hablo español también :)

reviews.comments: The landlord is really nice. The room is very clean and the air conditioner is strong, feels so good in summer. And he prepared a guide book for us. Told us the wat to the subway and the delicious restaurant. I would like to stay here second time.
Enjoyed my stay there. Thank you
It was great staying with them! They would help us out when we had questions and the apartment is very nice and good located. We had a lovely time in NCY !! Hoping to come back soon :)

My mom and me had a nice stay at Matt and Rick's place where is so close to an interesting French restaurant. Rick checked us in and offered everything that we needed. The place was close to Columbia University and all major transpositions. It was easy and cheap to take a Lyft or Line to Broadway and the Times Square. The room was very clean and looked exactly like what was shown in pictures. We would love to be their guests when we visit NYC in the near future.

The host's are lovely and kind people. They gave us great advice on how to get around NY and made our stay memorable. Everything is as seen in the pictures. Very clean, organized and secured home. They had everything we needed such as towels, tea, and coffee. I would definitely book with them again next time I'm in NYC.  If you are thinking of booking with them don't hesitate and go for it you won't be disappointed.

Can see why they're super hosts! Met with Rick who was super sweet, we talked for a bit. Check in was swift and we loved the location. Room was clean and felt safe. Great hosts, great place. Five stars for my first air bnb experience! Never going to stay at a hotel again!

Great place, great host! Very clean, and big room with lots of extras. The description is dead-on. The host was very friendly, helpful and went beyond his duties to make me feel at home. The location of the appartment is great. Only a few blocks away from Columbia University and public transport. Would absolutely stay with them again! Thank you for a great experience Rick!
Great apartment. Nice clean everything you need & close to train station like two blocks away. Highly recommend

El apartamento de Rick y Matthew es tal y como aparece en las fotografías. La relación calidad/precio es muy buena y la ubicación excepcional (muy buena conexión con diferentes líneas de metro). Han estado durante toda la estancia muy atentos con nosotros, aconsejándonos sobre la ciudad y atendiendo nuestras peticiones. Recomendable!

Excellent experience: great hosts and facilities, in a lively and secure neighbourhood in Harlem. 
Thanks so much! 
Kato, Karoline, Stefaan
The nicest folks! Will definitely stay here during our next trip to NYC.

Great location, close to the subway, big room.  It was great being able to have a kitchen.  Rick gave us great tips for the subway and how to get around.  We were able to control the temperature for our room.  Lots of hot water, very clean.  Nice queen bed, very comfortable.
Matt and Rick are fantastic hosts. The apartment is superbly located and very beautiful. Strong recommendation.

O quarto é bom. A casa é bem organizada. Matt e Rick são muito gentis, simpáticos e prestativos. A localização é excelente! A cem metros da estação de metrô. A casa e o bairro são silenciosos, o que garante uma boa noite de sono. O banheiro é bem limpo e o chuveiro proporciona um bom banho.
Location was great. Room was very clean. Hosts were responsive and thoughtful. Overall great experience.
Rick and Matt are two very friendly and hospitable guys. They were always showing interest in our day, and we felt very welcome in their apartment.
It's a very nice place, love it
Everything about this place is great especially the hosts. Great people.

This Airbnb is in s Great location the subway is a couple of blocks away. A few fast food reasturants are around the area  it was very convenient for us what MJ described is exactly what we got We felt very safe walking at night it was a great place to stay.
This place its super confortable and the hosts are really nice people! We loved staying whit them! Totally worthy

This space is clean, and roomy! It is in a great location with easy access to the subway. This makes traveling around Manhattan very simple. My friends and I loved staying here while visiting NYC for the weekend.

Excelente lugar, muy buena ubicación, Matt y Rick muy buena onda !!!! LO recomiendo .

We enjoyed our stay with Matt and Rick. It was nice having a queen-sized bed and coffee in the morning. It was about a 5 minute walk to the subway and Matt and Rick offered advice on which trains to take to help navigate the city. Thank you for welcoming us to your home! We enjoyed our stay.

un lugar muy ubicado, el restaurante de abajo es delicioso.un lugar muy recomendado

ESTA PROHIBIDO: Permitir el paso a la residencia de terceras personas ajenas a la misma.  Consumir bebidas alcohólicas, drogas o similares en el interior de la residencia. Permanecer en la residencia en estado ebrio o afectado por drogas o similares. Prohibido fumar en comedor, sala de estar, habitaciones y lavabos. Zona apta para fumadores es la terraza.   Efectuar ruidos o disponer de aparatos musicales, televisores que puedan molestar. Organizar fiestas, reuniones  o similares. Acceder a otra habitación que no sea la propia, o incluso abrir la puerta de las mismas. Acceder a la cocina, o habitación o despacho del personal de servicio Permanecer en pijama o en paños menores, en las zonas comunes. lanzar objetos en w.c. que puedan embozarlo.

neighborhood_overview: Situado en el barrio Eixample Dret. Es un barrio muy tranquilo con buena infraestructura, tiendas, supermercados, restaurantes, centros comerciales, bares y pubs. Estarás a pocos metros andando de la Sagrada Familia, en bus del Parc Guell y del mirador del Turo de la Rovira (donde podras ver un antiguo bunker de la guerra). Estaras cerca de muchos otros puntos de interes como el barrio de Born con sus ruinas del antiguo mercado a las que puedes acceder gratuitamente, las Ramblas, el Port Olimpic... Mi barrio tiene de todo, varios supermercados (algunos abiertos hasta las 23h y 3h de la madrugada), donde puedes encontrar los productos más económicos, tiendas de todo tipo, restaurantes, etc.  Podras pasear por el Paseo San Joan donde puedes encontrar bares y heladerías y restaurantes. Un óptimo paseo para las tardes tranquilas de verano, Mucho más ameno que el bullicio del centro.
notes: Si lo que buscas es una habitación en pleno centro, bien comunicado y con todo a mano en un barrio tranquilo y donde puedes relajarte despues de un dia de turismo o de playa y pudiendo quedarte en casa y cocinar si no te apetece salir a cenar fuera o si quieres preparar unos bocadillos para tu excursión de mañana, este es tu sitio! Si deseais venir a tres o cuatro personas tenemos otra habitación doble disponible.
transit: Excelente comunicación, varias lineas de autobuses incluyendo nocturnos. Dos estaciones de las lineas 4 y 5 del Metro y no muy lejos de la estación de tren en Passeig de Gracia o del aerobus en Plaça Catalunya que comunican con el Aeropuerto en 25 minutos. Si te gusta caminar puedes llegar a la playa en menos de media hora, bajando por el Passeo San Joan, donde también encontrarás el zoo de Barcelona y el parc de la Ciutadella
access: Tiene baño con bañera y lavadora. Cocina a tu entera disposición con nevera, lavavajilla, vitroceramica, horno, micro-onda y todos los ustensilios de cocina. Salón/comedor con sofa, mesa y sillas, TV, wifi y acceso a balcón. Mi casa es un espacio sencillo pero bonito y acogedor, con una energía tranquila y amistosa
interaction: Seria un placer estar a disposición de los huespedes en todo momento que lo necesiten pero en verano suelo no estar pero si precisan de cualquier información o si tienen cualquier duda pueden llamarme al telefono, contactar por whassap, mail, sms o a traves de la app de airbnb
house_rules: No se puede hablar en voz alta ni reirse en alto ni poner música  a partir de las 21.30 horas. El apartamento esta destinado al descanso y es compartido. Cualquier queja o molestia supondría la expulsión inmediata del apartamento. Cada huesped se encarga de lavar su vajilla y ustensilios de cocina.

house_rules: - Smoking is not allowed inside the apartment, only in the balcony when available or at the window-sill. Please leave all electric appliances turned off, make sure water taps are not running and close all doors and windows before check-out. We request that guests leave the dishes and the kitchen clean and empty out the trash, there is always a garbage deposit in the street nearby. The apartment is cleaned prior to each arrival. Please, keep the apartment tidy and clean as reasonably possible during all the time of your occupancy. If you require extra cleaning during your stay, please contact us - we will arrange it. PLEASE TAKE CARE of the decoration items, furniture, towels/linen and other apartment's equipment. Any doubts handling the apartment's appliances and equipment please call. The neighbours appreciate some peace and quiet as do our guest, please keep the noise level to a minimum between 22h and 8h. Use the place as if it were your own. Check out time is before 11h. If request

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: This is one of the best views around and a uniquely creative place to stay-- I wish I could have stayed longer than just a few days!  I could have spent days just on the patio soaking the beauty all in.  I was very impressed!!!
Great place...would defiantly come back!!

Dont hesitate - this is der best property in Porto. The picture in the add is not representative. It's is much much better. The view is magnifying 

Just do it
Charming apartment, with a sumptuous view. Ideally located for a few days in Porto

Very nice flat, well decorated.
Amazing terraza with a breathtaking view.

We had a lovely stay at Casa Olga, the apartment is gorgeous especially the outdoor area with amazing view of the water. Spotlessly clean and check in was quick and easy. The bottle of wine was a sweet touch, the tips on places to go were spot, we especially loved our lunch at Tripeira. 

Definitely recommendable.
As advertised.  Great place, amazing view, even better city!

The apartment is exactly as advertised, and more. The view is fantastic. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and recommend it to anyone for a short stay in Porto. The great wine bar five feet from the front door was an unexpected plus.
O espaço é ótimo e a vista é deslumbrante!!!

Alberto's cliff house is nothing short of stunning. The views and the space are both incredible. He was quick with his responses and the staff were super helpful. We enjoyed spending our evenings out on the front deck with views of the Dom Luis I bridge. Having Sergio's wine bar just outside the front door was the biggest bonus. We loved our stay here. Would highly recommend and we will be back for sure!
Private location with superb view and terrace. Very quiet location
Amazing view. Beautiful yard. Modern design.

The home was poorly described. It is on 4 small levels with very steep stairs. The 1st is a cave-like entry. The 2nd level has a small, inadequately-equipped galley kitchen and dining area. The 3rd level is a loft with bed. The 4th level is an attic with 2 twin beds, accessed via a steep ladder. There is no privacy for sleeping, proving awkward for 2 couples. The bathroom doors are barely 5' in height. 

The host assured me that parking was nearby. In fact, the apartment is located in a pedestrian-only zone, accessed via steep sidewalks. Virtually impossible to find via (Hidden by Airbnb) maps. The host did not provide directions.
Impossible to find. After 3 calls to management company, we parked at a nearby church and a concierge walked us to the place. He was very nice, but had never been in the apartment.

The outdoor terrace is lovely and the location is very good, in the historic center. 

On the last night, we were awakened in the middle of the night and two people, unannounced, came into the apartment! They claimed to be from the management company and were bringing extra glassware. This was very frightening and completely unacceptable. 

It might be OK for a short couple with good knees. Overall, an uncomfortable experience for us.

Very nice place that has been re-engineered in a great way - quite impressive what the architects realized and indeed very stylish how the apartment was fitted. The view is great and the several outside spaces even a treasure mid-November when the weather plays along as it did. Check-in and communications were super smooth all the way. Only detail that skipped our attention up-front, i.e before arrival, is that reaching the second bedroom upstairs requires some minor athletic skills :-) No problem at all for all youngsters and those young at heart, but maybe a bit of a challenge/good to know if the place is to be rented by a more senior  crew.
Amazing spot, cozy house, friendly attendance! Great experience for a few days!

The appartment is located in a fantastic place between the Cathedral da Sé and the river (Ribeira).  Access is through stairs so if you have heavy luggage then be prepared to hike down a few steps.  Since we were at the end of the year we found parking in the street behind the cathedral but this option might not be available in summer.  So if you have a car be prepared to pay for a parking.
The apartment is an open space on 4 levels.  So this means that there is not much privacy.  Also when we arrived (Dec 28) the apartment was very cold especially because the bottom floor is not heated (maybe there could be away to isolate better the bottom floor from the rest of the apt).  We would have appreciated the apartment having been warmed for a few hours before our arrival. Also there is no heater in the two bathrooms so they stay very very cold and if you take a good shower, the mist will take ages to dissipate...  
Since all heaters had to be turned on we found that the electricity was tripping off when we were using the oven.
Finally we had only one key while this place is for four people and you would expect to have at least 2 keys.
In brief, an incredible location BUT this is vastly overpriced for the service offered.
Amazing view and well localized place. Just be aware to access the apartment is through steeply inclined stairs

Alberto’s apartment has an amazing view, beautiful yards and has been renovated in a stylish and masterful way. The architects and craftsmen did an impressive job. 
Check-in was smooth, after request the empty shop dispensers were promptly refilled and the sink drain unclogged. 
The house is on 4 levels. The first, a cave-like entry, has directly been worked out of the mountain's stone and smelled a bit damp. Kitchen, dining area and a bathroom are on the second level; master bedroom, small office space and a bathroom with shower on the third level and in the attic (= fourth level) there are 2 single beds, access via a steep ladder. Reaching these beds upstairs requires some minor athletic skills. 
The entrances of the bathrooms are only about 1,60m in height, the sliding doors can’t be locked. 
There is no privacy for sleeping, as the whole apartment is one room. The attic has a kind of trapdoor which we found unfunctional to use.

The great views and location are top notch as advertised. But be prepared for lots of stairs for access, especially with luggage. 
The alleyway just outside of the front door is a very active public walkway and the noise carries directly into the apartment. 
The first floor entry level is not really usable as it is very musty and somewhat dark and cavelike. 
As Host, Alberto is pretty removed and the local concierge agent is not always responsive. 
All in all we had a good experience but I don’t think we would return.

The place is located really well and communication and check-in, as well as contact during our stay, was all very smooth. Getting to the beds on the top level is up a short flight of really steep stairs, it is nice to be aware of this.
Stunning views. Excellent location. Beautiful apartment. Comfortable and spacious. Can't recommend it enough. Probably the best Airbnb we have stayed at so far.

We loved our stay at this apartment but it wouldn’t be right for everyone. 

Negatives - accessibility is not great if you have a lot of luggage. There are numerous steep stairs to negotiate (inside and out) which would be difficult for the less able. There is a musty damp smell on the ground floor which renders this area unusable, other than for access. Limited sofa seating on the first floor. Access to the toilet and shower room is tricky for tall people - over 5 feet. Remember to duck! The beds on the attic floor would only suit older children able to easily climb the stair access.

Positives - it’s a unique and stylish apartment in the heart of Porto with fantastic outside space and an amazing view of the bridge and port houses across the river. In our opinion this far outweighed the negatives. 

In conclusion we would definitely recommend the apartment to a couple or a family with one or two older kids.
Beautiful apartment. Great location. Amazing view

The apartment rented by The Porto Concierge was a truly uniqe 4 story stone building with 2 seating areas outside of which 1 was a large terass overlooking the Louis I. Truly amazing view and pretty good location in terms of concenience with shops etc within 10 min. No problem for us but mind the location on hill with narrow alley slopes from the dock and steep ladders between floors inside if you have a reduced mobility. We were offered a bottle of port and a bottle of wine which was nice and our liaison was nice and informative.  Would recommend.

The is an absolutely amazing place that is on four floors with generous verandas with the best view in Porto. It is accessed by stairs so be aware if you arrive with heavy luggage. Overall the best that you can find in Porto

Lovly place with a amazing view. Right in the middle of old Town/Ribheira. 
We enjoyed breakfast in the garden and relaxed there in the evening - with all the busy sound from the river, town etc.
The appartement are carefully made in this old environments and with nice design details. 
We recomend it!
The flat has a truly amazing view, is very clean, and well localed. Don’t hesitate if you want to book there :)
House with a very clever design in an amazing location! Highly recommend the place for an authentic experience of porto!
Une excellente vue! On a passé un très beau séjour!
Beautiful accommodation, amazing location, make sure to visit the restaurant across the street for breakfast and tapas!

Casa D. Olga is a place to be at Porto ! 
Excellent located with terrace view to river, bridge and city. Everything is in walking distance incl. riverside pubs and restaurants. Car park at hidden public street just 100m away. Porto Concierge was a well organizid host.
House has a tasteful modern interior with all you need and was very clean.
At least we would come again , sure !
Jan

Great location and absolutely beautiful view of the city that can't be beat! Perfect for our time in Porto. Only negative was the second bedroom - not exactly clear that the location was up a steep ladder from the main bedroom, thus limiting privacy.

This 4 level apartment is a little gem, the owners did a clever job to renovate and create a chic and modern townhouse under hard conditions, cause the house is full of nooks and crannies. Now you find a fancy modern living in old stonewalls, which is extremely charming and special! A little bit steep steps guide from one level to the next, but its safe and good to handle! The last steps to the upper bedroom are more a ladder, so thats the kids-room or for the sportive ones! But all this is owed to the shape of the house and having it unique has its price! ;o))) The real secret of the house though is the "Terrasse"! Its mindblowing! Different levels of old stone-framed gardens, fully outdoor furnished, cause this, folks,  is the real living room of the house! You are directly facing the main attraction of porto, watching it in the different shades of daylight! In fact, we were sitting a full day there till late night,  just enjoying this breathtaking view with some breakfast, a little lunch and finally some good cold cuts with a glass of portwine! And spotting tourists on the bridge, that were obviously a bit jealous, watching us happy ones! If you  want a special and most memorable stay in Porto, this house is first choice!
Muy buena localización y una terraza genial

The flat is exactly as advertised, and more. The view is stunning, the flat is comfortable and the location is excellent. Despite a slight delay at check-in communication with TPC during our stay was very smooth. Access to the bedroom on the top level is via really steep stairs, but that was fine for us! The only downside was the flat being quite cold - electric heaters were off when we arrived and even when turned on the rooms would not stay warm for long. Apart from this, our stay was fabulous! I would definitely recommend it for a short stay in Porto!

The best house that can be in (Website hidden by Airbnb) is beautiful and very quiet.
If it's available, you should not hesitate to stay there.
The person who received us super friendly and patient, everything in our stay was perfect.
We really love this house!!!

Il soggiorno è stato perfetto! La casa è meravigliosa, pulita e tenuta con grande cura, inoltre ha un terrazzo bellissimo con vista sul fiume.
La posizione della casa, nel centro storico, è molto comoda per raggiungere tutta la città e muoversi senza problemi.
Alberto è stato molto ospitale e disponibile e ha cercato di venire incontro a tutte le nostre esigenze.
Beste locatie van Porto als je het mij vraagt. Van ontvangst tot uitschenken, alles was perfect. Zeker een aanrader. Tip, bij de overbuurman kun je geweldig ontbijten en dineren. Dikke 10!

This place is amazing! Better than the pictures. I definitely suggest you book this incredible place! You have to walk up many stairs to access the apartment because of it being on a hill with the best view. The second bedroom is accessed by a staircase ladder, it is mostly closed off from the other room where my parents stayed and was perfect for us!

A typical old stone house beautifully renovated into a chic and modern place, with a stunning view to the river and bridge, makes this the most exquisite place to stay in Porto.  Although it was cold, we could not resist having dinner and breakfast at the terrace and enjoy the view.   Irresistible!   The apartment is accessed by stairs but it wasn't a problem for us - but keep that in mind if you have reduced mobility.     It was a great experience and we want to come back very soon.

1) location is amazing, but tricky to get by car, even with (Hidden by Airbnb) map. It's better to check before arrival. 
2) 1st bedroom is through passage room, it has to be clear mentioned in description
3) 2nd bedroom is attic with very very steep ladder (it's deffenetly not stair, but ladder)
4) we arrived at 18:00 (not 15:00!), it was agreed with host, but appart wasn't ready at all. We made a check-in around 20:30. With 8-monthes baby.
5) clean
6)  in Jan was cold a bit even with heaters
Everything fine, only the marvel bathroom floor is icecold in winter.
The space is spectacular, great views. The loft on the top level is not the most convenient

It’s a beautiful apartment with two amazing gardens. The view there in the garden is wonderful. We took so many fotos . Hot water all the time. Bathroom and bedrooms are Clean and cozy .Great location near to the sao bento train station, the river, the bridge and the cathedral. But need to climb the steps to get there.

name: ROOM SWEET ROOM. only 25 min from the center.
summary: Bonita habiacion sencilla y moderna en tonos pasteles y blancos, con un toque de rojo. Funcional que se adapta a cada una de las situaciones. fresquita en verano y calentita en invierno con mucha luz natural. Nice simple and modern room in pastel and white tones, with a touch of red. Functional that adapts to each one of the situations. cool in summer and warm in winter with lots of natural light.
space: Es una apartamento a una calle de la linea de metro azul (L5), a solo 20 minutos de la Sagrada familia y a 25 min del centro de Barcelona. La linea de bus 19 y 83 pasan por la puerta.  Vivienda muy bien comunicada, con zona comercial y supermercado a 50 metros. It is an apartment one block from the blue metro line (L5), just 20 minutes from the Sagrada Familia and 25 minutes from the center of Barcelona. Bus line 19 and 83 pass through the door. Housing very well connected, with shopping area and supermarket 50 meters.

A cambio te pedimos respetos por los vecinos, no hacer ruido en la escalera y en casa despues de las 22hs. We are very adaptable, we will try to help you in what you need, with information, recommendations, more cleaning products etc ... In return we ask you to respect the neighbors, not make noise on the stairs and at home after 10 pm.
house_rules: - silencio a partir de las 22hs. - check in and check out adaptable to you

host.host_about:
Somos un matrimonio tranquilo y formal, trabajadores que vive con su hija y tenemos un espacio acogedor para hacer tus estancias muy amenas y completas.
Somos muy viajeros, aventureros, amables y abiertos. Nuestro objetivo: dar la vuelta al mundo y disfrutar de todas las culturas diferentes.a
"Si oyes la voz de tu corazon siguela, seguro ella conoce el camino"

We are a quiet and formal marriage, workers who live with their daughter and we have a cozy space to make your stays very pleasant and complete.
We are very travelers, adventurous, kind and open. Our goal: to go around the world and enjoy all different cultures.
"If you hear the voice of your heart follow it, sure she knows the way"

name: GREAT LOCATION, AMAZING OCEANFRONT VIEWS!
summary: Welcome to Kaleialoha " Lei of Love,” From your PRIVATE LANAI you have UNOBSTRUCTED, DIRECT OCEANRONT VIEWS OF NEIGHBOR ISLANDS * GORGOUS SUNSETS * TURTLES * RAINBOWS * DOLPHINS * and last but not least THE WHALES from mid-December to mid-April!!
space: Great location and an amazing OCEANFRONT view for a family holiday or a romantic getaway! Kaleialoha is centrally located in West Maui. Your just a 10 minute drive to Historic Lahaina Town and a 5 minute drive to Kapalua or Ka'anapali where you will find world class golfing. Nearby you will find: shopping, grocery stores, the farmers market, Fish market, fine dining and casual restaurants. North Kaanapali Beach is a mile away and Napili Bay or Kapalua Beach is just a 5 minute drive away! No need to stop by Costco for beach gear, we supply items such as beach towels, two beach chairs, two boogie boards, two snorkeling sets and a cooler!  This OCEANFRONT one bedroom unit is nicely decorated with a KING size bed, dresser, Flatscreen TV, and desk area. The custom built cabinets in the bedroom allows plenty of space for your belongings. The bathroom has been recently remodeled with new flooring and a tiled walk-in shower. Enjoy the views of the ocean while being in the fully functional kitc
description: Welcome to Kaleialoha " Lei of Love,” From your PRIVATE LANAI you have UNOBSTRUCTED, DIRECT OCEANRONT VIEWS OF NEIGHBOR ISLANDS * GORGOUS SUNSETS * TURTLES * RAINBOWS * DOLPHINS * and last but not least THE WHALES from mid-December to mid-April!! Great location and an amazing OCEANFRONT view for a family holiday or a romantic getaway! Kaleialoha is centrally located in West Maui. Your just a 10 minute drive to Historic Lahaina Town and a 5 minute drive to Kapalua or Ka'anapali where you will find world class golfing. Nearby you will find: shopping, grocery stores, the farmers market, Fish market, fine dining and casual restaurants. North Kaanapali Beach is a mile away and Napili Bay or Kapalua Beach is just a 5 minute drive away! No need to stop by Costco for beach gear, we supply items such as beach towels, two beach chairs, two boogie boards, two snorkeling sets and a cooler!  This OCEANFRONT one bedroom unit is nicely decorated with a KING size bed, dresser, Flatscreen TV, and desk
neighborhood_overview: This property is centrally located in West Maui and is close to a grocery store, shopping and many restaurant's. You have to check-out the local Farmer's Market for local produce and organic foods! The local Fish Market is well-known for their Ahi taco's and yummy sandwiches. Several beaches are also in the area!
transit: We always recommend that you have a rental car, but if you choose not too, we have several taxi services and uber on island. We also have a public bus system and there is a bus stop located right by the property.
access: Our guests' are welcome to use whatever is in the unit, unless it's in a locked cabinet or closet.
interaction: Once your booking has been confirmed, we will provide you a written confirmation that will provide the arrival instructions and our contact information should you need assistance.
house_rules: -  Quiet Hours 10 PM - 8 AM - This is a non smoking unit. Please smoke at the designed smoking areas only. - Pets are not permited on property, except service animals. - Lanai and entrance areas are not to be used as a storage. This would include beach gear, bicycles, etc. - No fireworks at any time or on any occasion. VACATION RENTAL TERMS AND CONDITIONS: THE FOLLOWING TERMS & CONDITIONS ARE HEREBY REQUIRED FOR YOUR RESERVATION AGREEMENT. THIS IS A LEGAL DOCUMENT GOVERNED BY THE LAWS OF THE STATE OF HAWAII AND SHOULD BE READ CASREFULLY. Any revisions to this Reservation Agreement, made after confirmation is issued, must be in writing and is subject to MBP approval.  Check-in time is 3:00pm and Check-out time is 11:00am. Early Check-in or Late Check-outs need prior approval and will incur a fee.  AMENITIES & HOUSEKEEPING  MBP and the property Owner provide fully furnished accommodations. All applicable Departure Cleaning Fees do not include housekeeping services during your stay, howev

reviews.comments:
Great panoramic view of sunset. Green sea turtles swim the shores everyday; some were massive! We watched them swim from the Lanai, as well as swam next to them. You can even forage for Opihi and Helmet Sea Urchins off the rocks. Short walk to some of the best eats at Fish Market.

Unit supplied all the essentials and more.  Snorkel gear in the unit was super convenient. AC was super loud and does not cool the bedroom from the living room; but we never needed it anyways. Coffee maker probably has probably never been properly cleaned. First brew tasted awful. Had to do a thorough cleaning and several flushes to get rid of floaties and scum.

Communication was minimal, but sufficed. Everything went perfectly and smooth!

This location had absolutely everything our travel group wanted for a stress-free vacation. From travel books to a cooler and snorkel gear, the owner has thought of everything. Our favorite thing about this location was the ocean view. The beach right outside our place became our favorite place to swim in all of Maui.

My hustband and I stayed for a week during our honeymoon and we absolutely loved this place! The apartment is very nice, big and clean and the view from the balcony is just amazing! The communication with Bree was also very good! She answers quickly and are very helpful. We reccomend this place to everyone and we will definitely come back if we are visiting Maui again. Mahalo!
Everything we needed from snorkels, boogie boards and beach chairs!  Great location and the view was amazing!!!
Nice condo with ocean view. No beach though! Good location within walking distance from restaurants and shopping.

The location of the condo is perfect for us - very close to a couple of supermarkets, great restaurants, beaches, farmers market, coffee shops and shopping. The condo has a great view of the ocean and the 2 islands - Lanai and Molokai. What a way to wake up to, eat breakfast and just hang out before dinner. Bree, our host was fantastic with prompt responses to any questions and any time. The condo was clean, has all the amenities we needed a has a washer and dryer in the unit which was very convenient. The neighbors were fairly quiet. We truly enjoyed our stay. We will stay here again on our next visit.

This condo is perfect for anyone looking for spectacular views, while being right in the center of everything west Maui has to offer! We were able to whale, dolphin, and turtle watch from the balcony! The sunsets were amazing! No need to rent snorkel gear, it’s provided for you. Super clean and comfy condo at a great price. We had everything we needed and more. Will definitely recommend Bree’s place to others!

This is an amazing property with the most amazing ocean views I've ever seen. On top of gorgeous sunsets, there's a chance you'll see sea turtles swimming along the shoreline. I would definitely stay here again.
Amazing view! Some great sunsets and watching the turtles swims by was truely amazing!

The space is absolutely amazing! Better than what my husband and I could have imagined. Spectacular view from the lanai to watch the sunset and see turtles in the clear waters. The area has a very laid back residential vibe with a few beaches, shops, and eats within walking diatance. We were very happy with this place and would highly recommend it. You get exactly what is in the pictures.

Truly incredible balcony and view. We saw at least a dozen turtles right off the shore over the week. Everything you need is provided for the kitchen and beach. Walkable to some food. Bree was a great host. Awesome binder full of local tips.

Bree was the best host I've had! She was clear, friendly and quick to reply. The condo we stayed in was immaculate. Perfect sunset views, turtles sightings, small beach access, fully equipped kitchen, and my favorite part... it was incredibly clean!! Thanks Bree! We'll be back!

Pictures don't do justice to this place! The view was amazing, the beach outside was perfect and extremely convenient. We saw lot of sea turtles from our patio. The location is walking distances from farmers market, food trucks and take out places making it a perfect to explore the island. Bree was super quick with her replies. We will be back for sure!

Great kitchen. Has everything and perfectly organized. To die for view from private lanai, great lawn for sunbathing below  with a nice area  for grilling and outdoor dining and it’s just a few steps down to a small private beach area and nice swimming/snorkel area. 
Close to a farmers market and a number of very special dining experiences. Highly recommend. 
My only complaint would be the bed and pillows. If they were replaced with firmer it would be perfection.

name: Safe place, good price
summary: Near of Jean-Talon metro station (Villeray-Rosemont), a two-bedroom for 4 people during spring time. Quiet place. You welcome.
space: All the apt during your trip. Low cost.

interaction: The owner of the building live close of this apt.

Je suis journaliste à la semi-retraite.
Je travaille aussi en gestion immobilière.
Bienvenue à Montréal; nous avons de nombreux festivals et des lieux touristiques très intéressants.
Logis intéressant 
à louer

reviews.comments: Allain is a great host, he was very accessible and helped us with parking. He is very friendly and his place is super cool! I would totally recommend his place!
Good budget option. Close to the Metro. Alain was responsive and helped with parking.
The host canceled this reservation 129 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

So, you are more than welcome to try our B&b or our delicious BBOWTS* :-) *BBOW Breakfast, Burgers, Omelets, Wraps, Toasts or Sandwiches
space: A private suite with it's own bathroom, with optional double (180cm) kingsize bed or 2 twin beds and an optional articulated bed for a third extra person. We've maintained the historical aspect of the building and some furniture was recovered. Located at the heart of the historical part of Porto, on a refurbished 14th century building, it will be great to start to explore the city from here. At walking distance there are lots of restaurants as well as important sights to visit. neighborhood_overview: How does Porto feel like in the historic center? It's simply magical! Here you feel and live the centuries, the energy of the city is felt on the skin, a healthy energy that grows in the diaphragm and makes you want to stay when the time comes for departure! PORTO WITH SOUL OF PEOPLE! Como é sentir o Porto no centro histórico? É simplesmente mágico! Aqui o tempo vive-se e sente-se, a energia da cidade sente-se na pele, uma energia saudável e que cresce no diafragma e faz-nos querer ficar quando chega a hora de partida! PORTO COM ALMA DE GENTE!
notes: Please notice that there is no lift so it is not affordable for wheelchairs or people with walking difficulties.
transit: - Metro from/to the airport - São Bento Metro St. (300mts) - Bus from/to the Beach - 500Bus Aliados/Matosinhos (50mts) - Train from/to Lisbon/Algarve/Braga/Coimbra/Aveiro/Douro-Regua - São Bento Train St. (300ms)

reviews.comments: Location, location, location!  This a great spot to access the vibrancy of Porto.  This is not a quiet, secluded spot, so some noise and bustle must be anticipated.  The breakfast included is delicious!  The room was comfortable and secure.  The refrigerator to chill wine and stove top to prepare tea was a welcome asset.  Sergio & Carla are generous and helpful and eager to offer advice and suggestions.  When I lost my wallet, they were kind and provided me with the information I needed to contact the authorities.  All was resolved when the restaurant contacted me to inform me they found my wallet.

Our Stay at Sérgi's was wonderful. You are in a beautiful area the photo is exactly what you see look from the windows
It's busy and vibrant with lots of great eateries and bars close by and the fantastic Douro is 2 mins away at the end of the street
The rooms are wonderfully decorated and the welcome is top notch
The addition of the breakfast is a lovely start to your day and it's great to sit outside and watch the world go by  
We will definitely be back again!
Sérgio e Carla são umas belíssimas pessoas. Trato muito familiar e agradável.

name: Executive studio in the heart of Manhattan
summary: Traveling to NY? I invite you to my beautiful and quiet studio in the trendy area of Midtown Manhattan. You have the entire studio for yourself, including a private kitchen and a bathroom, right in the heart of NYC! In walking distance to all shopping areas, restaurants, bars, and entertainment. From Time Square, to Central Park and 5th Avenue shopping, you're minutes away to exploring what NYC has to offer.
space: Spacious and elegant studio with wooden floors, high ceilings, 2 windows, TV with cable, private bathroom and fully stocked kitchen. Cook your meals to save money or do take-out from the hundreds of gourmet restaurants nearby. My studio is steps away from Central Park, St Patrick's, 5th Avenue, and the Rockefeller Center. The studio is quiet, tidy and serene, suitable for business travelers, tourists and couples. You will love the high ceilings that gives the place an airy feeling, the comfy bed, the computer desk to catch up on work, and the huge sofa to relax on. I also have Cable TV for your enjoyment. At your doorstep there are countless restaurants, pubs, rooftop bars, and supermarkets. Very close to the 6, M, and E metro lines that take you everywhere in NYC and the boroughs. The apartment is great for someone interning at the institutions nearby: the United Nations, JP Morgan, BlackRock, Citigroup, Deutche Bank, Accenture, KPMG, etc.

Wall Street entrepreneurs and 9-to-5 weekend warriors call this high-rise neighborhood home. Although Midtown East is all business by day, its residential community makes a strong evening showing at its myriad restaurants and bars. Outside of the bar scene, Midtown East is home to choice boutiques for the shopping-savvy.

summary: Beautifully finished, newly renovated house with pool. The ultimate in indoor/outdoor living. Excellent finishes and a short stroll to the beach.
space: This house is in immaculate condition and styled and set up to the highest standards. With manicured gardens and a solar heated pool and the perfect set up for indoor outdoor entertainment this really is the ultimate beach house. With private parking and the close proximity to local shops and the water there is not much else you could ask of a beach pad.

neighborhood_overview: Maroubra is the older brother to the famous beaches Bondi & Coogee. It is slightly more rugged water wise but has the calmness the two other beaches are missing because of the over crowdedness by tourists. Almost just as close to the city & airport we would choose to spend our days surrounded by the calmness of this suburb any day. With everything you could possibly need within walking distance and many cute cafes and restaurants down by the waterfront you truly feel the surf vibes here. The whole suburb and neighborhood has a super relaxed feel & atmosphere and its very safe at any time of the day or at night.
notes: Please note that the garage you can see on the floor plan will not be accessible to guests. However there is private off street parking for 2 cars.
transit: The best way to get around is either by car or bus. Busses are plentiful and can take you straight to the city or any of the other beaches. The bus stop is less then 3 minutes walk away. We have two off street car parking spots.
access: Guests have access to the entire 3 bedroom house. The Living Room where we would set up the floor mattress for you is completely seperate from the other living areas so it could easily be called a 4th bedroom and has complete privacy. Fresh linen as well as bath towels are provided and all you have to bring is your suitcase. The kitchen is fully equipped with all one could need including a dishwasher and state of the art cooking facilities. And you also have access to an internal laundry with washing machine and a line to hang your cloth out to dry. The house is stacked with all essentials and then some and wifi is also available for your convenience. Parking is available off street for 2 cars.
interaction: We value your privacy and so we leave you to get on with your visit. Mostly you need to do a 'self-check-in'. It's easy and fully documented for you - and we are always just a phone call away.
house_rules: NO Shoes in the House BBQ cleaning fee of 50 applies if found dirty  The property is perfect for families, corporate groups or a group attending a wedding.  We do NOT accept Bucks or Bachelor parties whatsoever. We have a very strict NO PARTY policy and only the guests who are staying at the house, are allowed to be on the premises. We have very close neighbours surrounding the house and therefore want to minimise excessive noise. Your help in keeping noise low, is much appreciated. The property is a great place to base yourself in Sydney however there is a strict NO PARTY policy. Adjoining neighbours will complain to the police, council rangers will come and this could lead to an eviction of the property. This can all happen really quickly - so best use the house as a base to explore Sydney or for your family gathering. Please dont plan or start a party, as this will lead to a quick eviction and loss of bond.  Our property is NO SMOKING inside and is also not pet friendly.  Your coope

space: Exclusive and luxurious bright loft apartment located in an Art Deco style building and tastefully decorated, will make you feel at home.
