reviews.comments: The Host is super sweet and flexible!
Good, clean space in a quiet neighborhood. Marian was very hospitable. Can't go wrong staying here.
Great place, always a park, quiet, cozy. This will be my favorite place to stay in Jamicia Queens. I encourage you to schedule a stay, you will not regret it!!
Great place to stay

Marian is a great host. Communication is excellent; she responded quickly to all of my messages. The place its self is quiet and away from the city. I was in town for the US Open and so the location made sense. Easy to find. Walking distance to Walmart and a handful of restaurants and corner stores. The bus stop is around the corner. You can take the bus to any train. I would suggest having your own transportation, though. 

Marian was kind enough to give me a ride when I wasn't able to catch a cab. The place was clean. Marian leaves you to yourself. You can come and go as you please, completely unbothered. Tons of space. Perfect for a solo traveler and/or couple.
Marian was a wonderful host. The accommodations we're as promised and I was very pleased with everything.

My husband and I were in town due to a funeral and Marian's studio was just enough; it was roomy and was accurate description.  We had a bit of an issue with the hot water after following directions stated on her page but other than that it was a great decision to stay at Marian's.  Also Green Acres Mall is close and there is a CVS close by with other shops within walking distance
Responded quickly, house was exactly as advertised.
The place is quiet. The guest is very nice and pleasant. You’re able to relax with your loved one or alone without having to worry about anything.

Marian’s place was great for a last minute get away. Had no complaints except it smelled like fresh paint and it kind of gave me a headache, but my boyfriend didn’t mind. Everything was clean and it was Perfect for what we needed it for.
Awesome! Place was wonderful and her hospitality was the best!

Our host was very friendly and gave us privacy.  The room was a good deal for the price.  The only bad thing was the paint smell was strong and there was ants.  But other then that it was a nice place for its price.
All was great only problem was getting hot shower to run properly other than that everything was great

This is a very convenient and private spot located in a quiet neighborhood 10 mins from JFK.You definetly get your dollars worth as its spacious the host gives you your full privacy and its located litteraly a 3 min drive away from Green Acres mall .I myself will be back for sure.
Great host, great location, quite neighborhood, and very private. I will definitely recommend and will revisit
Peaceful and comfortable. I would stay there again!!

I booked for two nights and could barely sleep the first night and left the morning after. There’s an unbearable fuel smell coming from the boiler. We got home at 2am after spending Christmas Eve with family and had a terrible asthma attack from the strong smell and was coughing the entire night. The shower of the apartment is a little scary, to the point I had planned to go shower at my family’s apartment, not to mention hot water wouldn’t come out and the cold water coming out was rusty. Marián definitely needs to figure something out to keep renting this place under good sanitary conditions.
Very nice, always willing help , hot water work fine.

Marian's place is awesome!!! Spacious, accommodating, close to all needed for day to day, quick ride into NYC via LIRR that is walking distance, quick drive to outer boroughs or Long Island, huge backyard to step out into for fresh air, sun, moon and stars, cooking area for those who don't eat out with fridge for storing food, private entrance, peace, quiet and privacy to include private  entrance. Parking with no street cleaning rules is +++ Marian truly gives you space yet have no doubt if you need anything, she will accommodate!!! We relocated from out of state hoping to find a home just as in NY yet so hard to find. Thankfully, she allows for long term stays for those of us in transition. We're very happy and highly recommend for short or long term stays!!!

For the price of $50 a night, a lot could not be expected.  

At first sight, it is not picturesque and very gloomy! Next, there was a very strong smell of gasoline and after searching the place, we found multiple gas cans and trays filled with exposed gasoline in the boiler room.  We took it upon ourselves to bring all of it into the backyard and out of the place because Marian had already left to work. We then left the door open for a few hours to air out the place.  While this brought some relief, the fumes were still present and we assume it may be because the gasoline was stored in the basement for some time and their is spillage that has to be cleaned very well. We were very concerned about the health hazards of inhaling the fumes and the likelihood of a house fire.  Gasoline should never be stored in a house or near a house.  This baffled us!

Same night, we discovered that the water function is very poor - the pressure is very poor making it difficult to wash my hair and too much time needed to rinse off.  It was also very difficult to adjust (and maintain) the water temperate to where needed for showering, brushing your teeth and washing dishes.  This created a very frustrating experience.

The bathroom includes a very small and shabby stand up Durastall.  It makes it very difficult to move around in, the drain clogs, there was concern about what was coming up from the drain while still in the shower and we had to use a towel to prevent flooding due to overflowing water.  

The lighting in the place was very poor as some of the ceiling fixtures had light bulbs, most didn't and none of the light bulbs were consistent offering different levels of lighting that made it difficult to read or work on the laptops and, they were all eye sores. 

However, the place was clean and spacious, queen size bed, clean bedding and towels, there was a kitchen table that seats 4, clean fridge, sink is available, toaster, coffee machine, microwave (however it was not cleaned) and an electric skillet that actually worked out well for light cooking.      

It's an experience like crashing in someone's basement with a few basic needs.  For the price of $50 we didn't complain about anything because you get what you pay for however, storing gasoline in a room on the same level of the space being rented is a major issue. We couldn't understand why Marian has not taken this into consideration as I have seen it mentioned in other reviews. It goes without saying that gasoline should not be stored in a home.  If that problem can be fixed, I would recommend Marian's space to someone who is not expecting a lot, just the basics and at no more than $50 per night.

Marian’s place was very nice, a very homely basement apartment feel. Perfect for a single person or couple to stay in. And Marian was so accommodating and helpful, answering all of our questions and anything we needed. Will definitely stay here again! :)

reviews.comments:
Located just five minute's walk from a major bus artery and from there only a 5min ride to the Blue Line (Metro), Paschale and Julien's home is the perfect base-camp for families looking to explore Montreal and return to a quiet neighborhood at night. 

While located within a 20min drive of all major attractions, we parked the van for three solid days and explored the city via public transit and on foot. Within a 7min walk of the home is a Provigo (chain mid-range grocery) two large parks with wading pools, tennis courts, basketball and baseball spaces, and even publicly available piano to play. Near one park is a fantastic breakfast place and a row of shops on Rue Beaubien including artisianal cheese and meat shops. So you needn't travel far to live like a native and entertain the children.

The home itself easily sleeps 7 (we were 5 including 3 children ages 7 to 12) and provides adequate cooking, dining, and sitting space. Clean, bright, and cozy, we felt right at home. 

Situated on the main/basement floors of a 3-storey walk-up, the main floor features three bedrooms and an office we repurposed as a fourth bedroom, using the trundle bed from one of the children's bedrooms. No air-conditioning, but the windows and fans proved more than adequate for the mild weather this week (no highs above 28C).

The bathrooms are nice, especially the newly remodelled basement bath with walk-in shower and attractive vanity. The basement also provides another bedroom and a sitting area with couch and futon facing a large TV; a comfortable space that could easily sleep two.

We are sorry our trip had to end. We would gladly stay here again. So glad we found this spot and hosts!

reviews.comments:
Great place to stay, great location!!!
The apartment was clean,cozy and had everything needed for a comfortable stay.
Jeremy was a very caring and helpful host.
I recommend Gracious Darlinghurst Terrace as a great place to explore Sydney!

The Darlinghurst Terrace is a great and spacious property in a fantastic location. Jeremy was wonderful to communicate with and was able to help with any concerns we had due to being from outer-state. Highly recommend.
Great house with ample amount of space and everything we could have needed. So central and convenient, yet a very quiet and beautiful street. Loved our weekend in Darlinghurst!

The house was in a fantastically convenient location and easily accomodated all 8 of us. House is situated very close to bus lines that go to the city or Bondi Beach, kings cross and all the darlinghurst cafe's and night life is minutes away/

Jeremy attended to any issues we had straight away and was a pleasure to deal with. highly recommend the house and Jeremy as its host.

Incredibly convenient! Lovely house. Clean and inviting. Everything in good working order.

Enjoyed a lovely weekend with my guests from out of town (8 in total) and had a great time. Jeremy has been a pleasure to deal with- prompt responses and made an effort to be helpful and accommodating. Would definitely stay here again.
Parking can be a bit tricky but is possible. This is obviously the pay-off for staying in such a central location.

We loved how big the house is, and how awesome the location is. The house was baby friendly with a baby chair and toys. Thumbs up! However....... There are only 2 toilets for 8 guests. Everyone must try the gelato parlour nearby. Keep a lookout for its door bitch. Haha

Had a wonderful time at Jeremy's house. The kids especially loved the stairs and the loft bedroom.  The views from the balconies a must see. 

Located very close to Sydney cbd. Local buses just a street away, 5 minute dawdle. It is possible to walk into / from the city which we found after the bus left us behind and no taxi would take us because they didn't have a baby seat. 

We were a family group of 7 so we caught a mini bus from the airport which cost us approx $60. Soo much easier than catching then train and walking with 7 + bags. 

Would love to stay again.

The perfect location.  Close to bus and rail stops. Many local resturaunts. Jeremy is very responsive to any issue and responsibly accommodates his guests. He communicates quickly and is any amazing guy. The Gracious Darlinghurst  Terrace accommodates up to 8 people comfortably. All bedrooms are upstairs and the City lights view is worth every step. Thanks Jeremy. We will definite return for our next visit to Sydney.

Jeremy's Darlinghurst house is a beautiful property and was a perfect base for several of our family members (including a couple of small children) who came to visit Sydney for the week. They really loved all the cool decks attached to the bedrooms - the city views are brilliant.

Jeremy himself is a very helpful and welcoming host. I'd highly recommend this place to anyone who wants to do the inner-city experience and not skimp on comfort!

We booked Jeremy's lovely property as an offsite location for a work project. Jeremy was very friendly and professional and also extremely responsive - he replied to all of my messages immediately. This place has a lot of character and is in a great location for anybody visiting Sydney for the first time. Thanks again Jeremy!
Jeremy was prompt in communication, check-in/out was smooth and listing location is top-notch. Would have loved to see a little more care/attention to detail in fit out to truly feel at home.

Would just like to express how much we enjoyed our stay at Gracious Darlinghurst. Great family Accomadation in a fantastic location. We would definitely stay again & would recommend to others. Thank you to our host Jeremy Godwin for all your help with our holiday in Sydney. The Wright Family x

The listing was as expected, well described by host.  Communication with host was effective and in a timely manner.  Clear entry instructions. 
Comfortable house for 7 people. Everyone reported having slept well and being warm enough. There were extra blankets if we needed.  There were towels laid out for all the guests, plenty of room to hang clothes, and 2 showers and toilets.
The house was gorgeous, and perfect for jet-lag recovering guests. Darlinghurst was a great location from which to see Sydney. We loved it all.

Jeremy was a fantastic host. Everything was organised and exactly as planned. Thanks for making everything so easy!

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Jeremy's place in Darlinghurst and would definitely stay again and recommend to friends.
The place is perfect for a big family getaway! Spacious, convenient, equipped, nice and comfy.

We had a great stay in Jeremy's Terrace House.  Arrived early, but the cleaner let us drop our bags and we headed off on foot to explore Sydney.  Darlinghurst location is excellent.  We walked to the Sydney Cricket Ground for a match, walked to the Botanical Gardens and city center.  Great pubs/bars close by as well.  Jeremy stopped by first day to drop off a new kettle.  Pleasant host! Everything was clean and orderly.   Great place to start our visit down under!

We had a fantastic stay in this house. It is in an excellent location in walking distance to major attractions. The immediate area has fantastic cafés and restaurants.

Arranging the stay was easy and Jeremy was a very accommodating host, always easily contactable. We'd definitely stay here again.

Beautiful, enormous town house in a perfect location.  Within easy walking distance of the train station at  Kings Cross, the bars, restaurants and clubs on Oxford Street and even the centre of the city.  Stunning views of the city from the balcony outside the uppermost, Swiss-chalet style bedroom.  We had four adult males staying in the house and we all had plenty of space.  For a group of people, it's also very economical: much cheaper than trying to find a similar hotel suite for the same price.  Perfect for a short or extended stay in Sydney, and surprisingly tranquil for such a central location.  Small tip: if there are two or more of you, it's just as cheap to get a taxi from the airport than taking the train. Jeremy is also very friendly and helpful.
Loved the location as we were able to get in and out of the city so easily. The house was lovely and we had a great time there. Thank you.

Jeremy is great!  Very nice and accommodating.  We didn't have much interaction but when I called or emailed he was right on it.  And helped me deliver a box to his place.   We were out of the apt most of the time so I can't comment much on the place but it had all the basics of what you would need.  Darlinghurst is nice and quiet, great little breakfast spots.

We had a great stay at this Darlinghurst property. The location was very good in terms of walking to the city centre, catching buses or trains and there were very good restaurants and a supermarket nearby. The living area and bedrooms were large and comfortable. The kitchen was well equiped and two bathrooms serve the four bedrooms well. We would rate this property highly for anyone looking to rent four bedrooms near the central city.
Nice spacious house, quiet area that's within walking distance to the hustle and bustle of the city. Nice and clean. Could see myself settling there

I travelled with 7 companions and we thoroughly enjoyed staying at this property.
Location trumps everything - especially in a city like Sydney - and this house is perfectly situated and really good value for money.
Supermarkets, pubs, restaurants, night life, the CBD, opera house and harbour are only a short walk away.
The views from the east facing bedrooms are spectacular, both with good sized private balconies to enjoy.
Jeremy is a delightful and responsive host.  He was always quick to respond to messages and to answer any questions. 
I was worried about parking because this house doesn't have a carport or driveway. But Jeremy has an arrangement with a nearby car wash that charges only $20 a day.  It was convenient and hassle-free.   When comparing other options for a group of 8 or so, this house is excellent value for money.  At around $60 a head per night, you won't find anything in Sydney for that price - let alone a gorgeous house like this!
Jeremy has been super helpful while we lived in this beautiful place in darlinghurst. It is very convenient to the CBD as well. Great experience in Sydney.

This is a great location for easy access to public transport, the city and surrounds. Comfortable beds and ample hanging space compliment the spacious four bedrooms. It was a nice place to rest after a busy day sightseeing.

The Darlinghurst Terrace was a great place to stay with my family. Location was excellent, very close to the city, Oxford st & great dining options.  The rooms were large and kitchen/dining too.  I would stay again
房子与照片相差非常远,比较失望｡

Location of this place is really convenient,quiet to relax and only less than 10 minutes of walking to major markets,shopping mall. Lots of cute restaurants,cafes in narrow streets nearby which make strolling very agreeable. Four big bedrooms make life easier for our group of 7. The place is super clean and well stock of kitchen utensils,plates,cutlery,coffee maker. Jeremy emailed us in advance the instruction to get in the place also. Would definitely recommend this place to everyone .

The house is well situated in a pleasant suburb taking only about 15-20 minutes to walk into Sydney and is also close to major bus routes for exploring further afield, as well as having shops and restaurants nearby. The house is quite spacious, and equipped with all the necessary appliances, including wifi, to make the stay most enjoyable. If the weather had been better during our holiday then we would have made more use of the balconies that provide impressive views of the city. The house was clean and tidy when we arrived and the entry instructions were quite clear. Jeremy was very accommodating by arranging an early check in and  late check out.

Jeremy is an amazing host! He answered our calls as soon as he can and all his instructions regarding the house were very clear. The house is also perfect for families. 8mins walk to nearby shops, food places. Thumbs up!

The house is nice and it is located in good location, especially the view on roof top is really stunning. 

However the furnitures and amenities was not in very good condition. and quite some flys within the house. No air-conditioning, might be a problem for summer time. i feel over-price comparing to the quality of the house.

We very much enjoyed our stay in Darlinghurst.  The house was large, fully equipped and comfortable. The roof terraces were a treat. The location was ideal for access to downtown Sydney either by walking or public transportation. Jeremy made every attempt to accommodate our schedule.  The house was mostly as described but the furnishings were a little tired.
The host was very welcoming. The property was very nice and clean. Enjoyed our stay there.

We had a good time at this place. The location is perfect for a visit to Sydney - all major sights are more or less in walking distance. Jeremy was very helpful and accessible, and he responded immediately in case of concerns or problems. The house is very spacious and easily accommodates a group the size of ours (8 adults), it just could do with some TLC. We had the 'Big Wet' (non-stop rain for four days in a row!) so unfortunately we could not enjoy the decks and balconies.

It was a really nice stay! The location is perfect, and everything you might need is just within walking distance or a short drive. Everything in the house is well signed and it just took us a sec to find the things we needed. Jeremy is a awesome host! Big thanks from my families and me!

We really appreciated how well Jeremy communicated with us before/during/after the stay.  He is more than willing to help with anything you may need.   The property is spacious and offers a washer and dryer which was greatly appreciated.  We liked the neighborhood, especially the breakfast/coffee shop on the corner.  It's within walking distance to many restaurants.  Also, very close to public transit.  Only negative, is there is no air-conditioning... so if you visit in summer, it may be an issue for you.  However, it's so much cheaper than staying in a hotel!

Great house in a great location, easy communication with the host and very helpful. The house is more than big enough for a big family. The balcony's were great with great city views. The amenities were great, wifi, washing machine etc. only downside was no air con which we would have liked.

The house is spacious and in a great location. The two terraces are a lovely way to spend an evening with a bottle of wine. Jeremy is a very responsive host and fixed a couple of very minor things (bulbs out) we asked for straight away and with minimal fuss. There is no air con which means the house gets very hot in the warm weather.

We had a great time staying at Darlinghurst.  Fantastic Victorian style home on a quiet street (for the city at least) near great restaurants and public transportation (Kings Cross train stop).  Jeremy was easy to communicate with by phone and text and resolved any issues quickly.

Jeremy was an extremely helpful host. Communication both before and during our stay was prompt, friendly and of great assistance. The location of the apartment is super and the whole family had a lovely time.
This was our second stay at Jeremy's lovely Darlinghurst property. A very pleasant experience indeed.
Great location and very helpful host!

This was our first time using Airbnb and we was so happy with how easy the whole process was. We had an early flight so were kindly allowed early access which was much appreciated. The house was wonderful, very well equipped, clean and spacious with many outdoor sitting areas and a fantastic view of the city from the top deck. We loved the area with lots of cafes and restaurants very close by and Hyde Park only a 10 - 15 min walk away. Would definitely stay here again
Easy access.  Lovely and clean.
Great location and very responsive host!  Easy walking to all key attractions and home was very comfortable. Definitely enjoyed our stay. Thank you, Jeremy!

This is the second time I've booked Jeremy's place. He is punctual in responding to queries and always so helpful and polite.
The area is perfect and the house clean, spacious and has pretty much everything you need. My family loved staying here. Great coffees at the Rusty Rabbit on the corner too!
Id book again in a heart beat.
Thanks again Jeremy.

Jeremy is one of the most helpful and responsive host you can have. One of our heaters was down and he brought a new one to replace the very evening after we left a message! Apart from the low water pressure on 2nd floor, everything else plus the convenient location makes the trip a notch better than it already is:)

The place is exactly as presented in the pictures. Its clean, well stocked and the location is perfect for getting around all the sites while still enjoying a good nights sleep. 

Jeremy is easy to communicate with and generously accommodating. 

If you stay, try the Rusty Rabbit cafe just a block away.

The house was big and spacious enough to accommodate the 7 of us! Furnitures are a bit old, but the location of the house was quite centralized. It is 10-15mins walk from King's Cross station. Overall, we had a wonderful stay there and Jeremy has been very helpful in answering our enquiries.

My friends I stayed here and we couldn't have been happier with our choice. It's a lovely quiet neighbourhood with great cafes and so close to the city. 
The place itself was tidy and spacious for my 7 large group. Would highly recommend to anyone and would be top of my list to stay again. 
And to top it off the host (Jeremy) was great to communicate with.

We stayed here while visiting Sydney for a family function and found the house large enough and very comfortable for the 7 of us. The kitchen is well equipped and Jeremy was very accommodating of our requests for a cot and high chair for our daughter. He was also very responsive throughout our stay and responded quickly to our questions. The house is located in a lovely neighbourhood, with many food and entertainment options nearby. Only downside is the upstairs room did get rather hot, but fans are provided. Overall it provided for a clean, comfortable stay.
Great house in a great location. Jeremy was very responsive and helpful.

A fantastic property that is within walking distance of the CBD. It is surrounded by cafes, restaurants, and watering holes. I would highly recommend this property to anyone wanting to experience the true Sydney lifestyle.
quite near to city center. house is good for large group.

This was a great location to stay in. We enjoyed the convenience of being able to walk to and from the local bars and restaurants of Dalinghurst.
The four bedroom set up was perfect for our family .
Jeremy was easy to converse with and the house was clean with a great kitchen set up 
Would be happy to rent this place again in the future.
I love this house!!! Bed is comfortable and near more coffee shop

Great location. Only issue we had was due to no air conditioning and no fly-screens there were bugs everywhere as it was hot when we stayed. The downstairs shower is a hassle as water goes all over the bathroom floor after each shower as there is only a shower curtain around it. Other then that the house was clean and in a very nice, quiet neighborhood and Jeremy made organizing the trip and our stay incredibly easy.
Booked this for work colleagues and they loved the place. Jeremy's communication was great and made it really easy.

Jeremy is a friendly and communicative host. Whilst the place is large and in a great location/close proximity to everything you'd need, we did have some severe issues with cleanliness and bugs in the house. We raised this with Jeremy immediately and he took it very seriously, organising for the cleaner to come back first thing the next day which we appreciated. I believe the situation with bugs has now been taken care of.
Jeremy also allowed us a late check-out which was greatly appreciated.
Overall I could recommend this place for a family to stay as the above-mentioned issues have now been resolved.
Great please to stay. Would recommend.

Our stay was quite good. It was fairly close to the city which is what we needed, with cafes etc nearby. There were 4 of us so we could have a bedroom each. Price was very reasonable and it suited our purpose. It was well stocked. Unfortunately the stairs presented problems for some of us who have joint issues.

The house was nothing like the listing. It was filthy dirty and smelled of urine and was over run with cock roaches. It was un hygienic and uninhabitable, we had to seek alternative accomodation and are requesting a full refund......
Jeremy was an excellent host and the house is perfect for a base near the cbd. The bars and restaurants locally are great. The house makes living in the area easy when working out of Sydney.

Great Location and easy access to public transport very clean. Thanks to Jimmy for looking after our cars. Would recommend this home. Jeremy was easy to communicate with and very helpful.  Would definitely recommend this home for a great stay in our beautiful city Sydney.

House is in a great location and Jeremy very easy to deal with and most helpful. Property could do with a bit of an update although very clean but decor looking tired.

Jeremy was a great host overall.  The townhouse was exactly like the photos.  Beautiful and clean space in the perfect area. The views from the balconies onto the city skyline were such a nice touch. Like a secret hiding spot! The neighborhood is safe, scenic, and quiet.  Once you walk a couple blocks there are a bunch of restaurants, bars, cafes, corner stores, and anything you would need. Great nightlife on Victoria Street! 

The main issues was some basic TLC. The bath towels need to be replaced.  Missing some essentials, such as hand towels in bathrooms and hand soap as well.  

There were also no screens on windows + the no AC threw us all off.  Not sure why there were no screens on the windows, especially since we would need them open to let cooler air in.  We were worried about bugs coming in, so made sure all food was kept in the refrigerator.  Maybe this is a Sydney thing?  One of the couches in the living room definitely needs to be replaced.

Besides these doable updates, our stay was perfect.  We really enjoyed the space, had fun sitting around the beautiful dining room table eating breakfast that we comfortably made in the very spacious kitchen, and had a nice sleep every night in the bed.  The Townhouse is affordable, great location, and comfortable.  I hope these updates will be made so future guests can enjoy it even more!
The accommodation is clean and convenient to discover Sydney city. The house is family friendly, we can find all we need inside the house and the neighbourhood.
We had a great time staying at this place. Jereymy is a really good host
The property is a great place to base yourself in central Sydney. There are 4 double beds and 2 bathrooms. Jeremy was a great host and was very easy to communicate with.

Perfect location. 
Great, clean and well equipped house.
Absolutely perfect!

A fabulous property with a fabulous host.

This is a great place in a great part of a great city. Jeremy really is a generous and considerate host who goes out of his way to make available a beautiful and comfortable home.

We really couldn't recommend more highly.
Great house and great location
Best location, perfect for a large group!!!!!!! Clean and Jeremy is a great host! Seriously we travel a lot and moving forward will always use air b n b than uou

Jeremy's place was great.  There is plenty of room for guests as the 4 bedrooms can accommodate many. Three different terraces to sit out and enjoy as well as the back yard.  The real advantage is how close it is to shops and sights.  A short walk to hyde park, oxford street and kings cross. Walk a bit more and you are at the royal botanical gardens and the opera house.  Big kitchen and dining table so everyone can sit and eat together. Washrooms were smaller then expected and a few more stairs then we thought but we would highly recommend staying here if you are in Sydney and want to be near the CBD and some of the tourists sights.

Let's be clear - this is an incredible space. The Airbnb is bigger than it appears in the pictures, and the views far more stunning. The neighborhood is also so charming and underrated - so many excellent cafes and restaurants, and yet still so quiet. You will not find a better Airbnb in Sydney for this value - period. Jeremy was also a delight to facilitate this process - organized, quickly responsive, and willing to go that extra bit to accommodate your needs. Being a frequent Airbnb host myself, I was so impressed. 

I would recommend this property to anyone I know visiting Sydney, and can't wait to hopefully stay here again! Thanks again, Jeremy!
Jeremy was very accommodating and provided friendly prompt communication and assistance. Highly recommended.

Great location, nice space for our group of 8. Full kitchen and four bedrooms each with double beds. Note the upstairs bathroom has only louvred doors (not entirely private when there are a load of people in the place) and the downstairs bathroom has the nicer shower, but is located in the utility room next to the washer and dryer. Jeremy was great in responding quickly to some very minor issues  such as burned-out light bulbs.
We had a great stay in Jeremy's place. It was a great location and exactly as described. Would highly recommend.

What a great location, with a generous sized house.  The kitchen, dining and living rooms are very comfortable sizes, and a bonus for each bedroom to have its own level, two with balconies.

We would happily stay again and definitely recommend it to others.

Jeremy was very easy to communicate with, our booking went very smoothly!

We hope you enjoy your stay also!!!

Great house in great location with a fantastic host. Was on site when we arrived and the internet wasn’t working. Was straight onto sorting, went out bought new modem and fixed problem. Shows how great a host he is.
Jeremy was easy to communicate with and his place was really great!

Gorgeous house... quintessential Sydney terrace! And some amazing properties in the surrounding streets to admire.
Plenty of room for all 7 of us, without feeling cramped at all... although one of the couches needs updating. 
Fantastic location- a short, easy stroll into the CBD & Pitt St. Mall. We were surprised just how close we actually were, the maps are deceiving!
Fantastic cafes at your doorstep. 
NB. The house isn’t ideal for people with any mobility issues (the main bathroom isn’t accommodating & the old knees were a bit tired by the end of the weekend!)
We stayed in early November, which was ideal. But much further into summer & I would have struggled with the lack of cooling in the house... No air-con = open windows = mosquitoes! But if mosquitoes aren’t an issue for you... go for it!

The Gracious Terrace House of Jeremy is a great place to stay, and we’re we really enjoy time being there. Good location, clean house, plenty of rooms for our family with an infant, kid, and group of 6 people. 
Thank you Jeremy for your quick response and definitely stay again when we visit Sydney! All the best Jeremy!

Jeremy was a breeze to deal with during a challenging time for our family. We had a family member in St Vincent's hospital at very short notice and Jeremy's place is a few minute walk away. Restaurants, shops and the city are so close. Parking was wonderful and the location was safe and quiet. We were needy guests due to circumstance and Jeremy was very patience and kind and nothing was a problem. Thank you!

Let's start with the positives - this house was in a great location, close to pubs, restaurants, shops and amenities. And the beds were comfy. Now for the negatives - and there are a few. First, the house needs a thorough clean and paint: the walls are dirty, the carpets are dirty, the kitchen needs a scrub. There's no air-con, and when the heat reaches 39 degrees as it did when we were there, that was an issue. Yes, we knew that when we made the booking, but at least provide decent fans that don't sound like a jet engine taking off. The downstairs shower leaked every time it was used; the upstairs bathroom was ancient and needs replacing, and the bathroom itself had saloon doors - privacy be damned. The sofas in the lounge need replacing: one was worn, the other like sitting on a rock. The dining table and chairs were passable. The four bedrooms felt grimy; only three had doors, the fourth wide open at the top of a staircase - far from ideal. The towels were threadbare. Plus, with 8 of staying, I would expect at least 8 of everything: cutlery, wine glasses, plates, water glasses, mugs - there were not. We arrived an hour early and the house was still dirty from the previous tennants, with towels on the floor, rubbish in the property. When we came back two hours later, it still wasn't ready. The spare keys were not where they should have been. Jeremy showed up the following day with flowers as an apology and spare keys - but we had no vase to put the flowers in. This house COULD be great - it has the space for 8, two lovely balconies, comfy beds, great location. But it was far from great for us, and I'd say, until it's cleaned and refurbed and some of the money the owner is making is ploughed back into the property, you'd be better off booking elsewhere.
Excellent location, lovely spacious rooms. Perfect place for a getaway.
Jeremy’s place was very nice, in a perfect location. It was comfortable for 8 guests and the views from the deck were beautiful. Would defiantly recommend the stay!
A beautiful house in a great location! Furniture was very basic though. Could also use air-conditioning to help with the heat - although there are small fans everywhere.

Hi Jeremy,
Sorry for the late response but we have been busy. Jeremy responded promptly to our request and was helpful with suggestions by email. My wife, myself & my family all enjoyed our stay at this house.. Location could not have been better. We were within walking distance of all we came to do such as go to the theatre, walk in the Botanical Gardens, eat at good restaurants and for some,to visit the shops.We found it is in a great central location. Your accommodation provided for us what we (Website hidden by Airbnb) has a lovely spacious living area, a fully equiped kitchen, good laundry facilities and four (Website hidden by Airbnb) toilets and bathrooms were both more than adequate. We enjoyed the cafe nearby called " The Rusty Rabbit". We would not hesitate to rent your accommodation again. Thank you.

This accommodation is full of character, with great views, especially from the top level. The kitchen was modern with plenty of cooking equipment. We were glad of the large fans in the bedrooms as we were there in summer. 
There is a great cafe nearby. Jeremy answered my queries very quickly. We had a lovely stay!
Jeremy 的热情好客,每次的反馈都非常及时,在我们到来之前还特意在房子放置了鲜花美化环境｡房子周边的配套还算方便,走路2-3分钟就有餐厅,10-15分钟就有超市,公交车站也是5分钟的路程｡家里的配套设施一应俱全,我们8个人居住得非常舒适｡唯一的小缺点就是这里的蚊子有点多,不过房东很及时又很贴心地为我们准备了各种灭蚊用品｡

Jeremy's terrace had a lot of character, in such a great location which was incredibly quiet considering...the views of the city were beautiful! With 4 bedrooms we all had our own space, 3 with balconies and seperate living zone meant that the 5 of us had our own down time...we could walk to most places that we went to Sydney to experience and it was easy to get in touch with Jeremy who let us leave our bags at the house so we didn't have to carry them around with us on our final morning. Would definitely recommend the house and location if visiting Sydney esp if travelling with 4+adults....

This property is in a fantastic location so central to the city. Jeremy is a fantastic host who went out of his way to ensure our stay was hassle free. Exceptional communication replying swiftly to any messages. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and loved that our whole extended family could be together. Would definitely stay at this property again and would recommend it to others needing a central location.

Awesome location, clean and neat. Don't leave the attic room door open in summer though unless you have lots of insect protection. Mosquitoes had a field day until we got up and sprayed. Nothing Jeremy can do about that. 

We have already booked his place again in June.
Good space!

Our stay at this beautiful terrace was a great experience and I would not hesitate to book again. The views were lovely both during the day and the night. The house was large enough for all 8 of us to exist very comfortably and everyone enjoyed all the history and quirks this special house has to offer. 
We had everything we needed and Jeremy was very informative. We took in the neighbourhood on our walks and enjoyed a truly great breakfast at the cafe nearby. It was a special stay and we will remember it fondly.

Jeremy’s place is perfect for groups wanting to stay in central Darlinghurst. I will always check to see if it’s available every time I’m heading to Sydney! Really great location and very comfortable!
A fantastic location right in the heart of Darlinghurst. Very good value for money and would highly recommend any visitor to Sydney to hit up Jeremy for accommodation. 100% would stay here again.

If you have not been to Sydney, do it NOW! And Jeremy's place is a superior place to stay. It is super close to everything. Just a couple of blocks from the train station on tree lined, hilly neighborhood streets. Trains/buses great way to get around town, clean, fast, inexpensive. Jeremy's place is well located, super great historic home with all the modern amenities including kitchen, bath, etc. Neighbors are great. Many nearly coffee shops, cafes and corner groceries! You will love Jeremy's place!
A great place for a group visit to Sydney - well located near cafes and public transport. Highly commend Jeremy’s hospitality.

second time we have stayed here. Excellent location and lovely home. Jeremy allowed us to leave our bags there as our flight was later in the day. Will definitely use again and highly recommended
Nice house near to SYD CBD area. Car is not recommended as the parking fee is expensive. Public transport and MRT can be accessed easily. No concern in getting nice food nearly.
This was the perfect place to stay in the city. Not only were we centrally located but the upper balcony has the most incredible view of downtown for sunset. Stay here!!
A great place to stay that is not too far from Sydney's city centre.
Sensational location with amenities at your doorstep. Jeremy’s property is a great place to stay for a family get together. We will be back.

Amazing! We used Jeremy’s place as our base for a team business trip to Sydney. Jeremy was extremely responsive and did what he could to accomodate us dropping bags off early - breezy as checkin process.

Our second stay with friends such a great location . Nice large ,roomy and well set out Terrace house . Thanks again Jeremy

Highly recommend to all, very spacious!! We had 8 guests and it was very comfortable and close to all attractions.. will be definitely stay again !! Thank you Jeremy !!

Jeremy's Terrace was very home like and relaxing. Our family had a great stay with plenty of room for every one. The home has everything you need for an easy getaway to Sydney.

High recommend Jeremy's Airbnb for groups of friends who'd like to explore Sydney! Thank you for sharing your place with us for our weekend away. Cheers Paul and Karen
Same as description. Nice house and react very quickly.
Enjoyable stay.  Great central location.  Easy to communicate with host.  Awesome wifi.  Would recommend.

Awesome terrace! Easy walk to great cafes, eateries and shops!  Awesome views from the terrace balconies. We had 8 guests in total and never felt crowded!

Beautiful house in an awesome and very central location...Jeremy was easily available to reach when needed ahead of check in
Such a fantastic location! Lovely big kitchen and dining space. The home can house four couples comfortably. It is a very close walk to Oxford street and the CBD.

Highly Recommended. This terrace house was great accommodation for our weekend getaway in Sydney. The house was clean and spacious enough for 5 adults. We used 3 of the 4 double rooms and it was handy to have 2 bathrooms. The back courtyard was great for a lazy afternoon relaxing with wine and nibbles. The neighbours cat, Fudge, came to say hello and went for a wander through the house and out the back  balcony - he seemed to know exactly where he was going :).
It is in a great location for Oxford St which has lots of bars/restaurants/shops and plenty of bus services to the city. There's a wonderful cafe at the end of the block - The Rusty Rabbit. It's in between 2 train stations, it's a bit hilly from Museum tho so best to use Kings Cross (or get the bus) if you have luggage.
Jeremy was very responsive to communication and everything was as described. Would definitely stay here again.

The home was amazing. An awesome space in a great location! Jeremy was extremely helpful and accommodating and communication with him was a breeze. Would highly recommend anyone looking for a great place to stay here. Thanks for having us Jeremy, hope to be back in your great space again!!!

A wonderful space and 5-Star location. Jeremy’s description and photos of the terrace were on point.
Communication was easy and efficient, and Jeremy was accommodating to our requests. 

Would recommend as a great place to stay for a weekend in the heart of the city
Great convenient place in the heart of the action at a reasonable price
Beautiful, well-maintained home in a fantastic location, well-suited to our group of colleagues in town for a conference. Very accurate information provided, Jeremy was very easy to liaise with.
Super impressed with the property. Great location, modern interior and excellent value for money. Cannot wait to book with you again! Thanks Jeremy

Outstanding location, Darlinghurst has a great café, dining and local bar scene and is only walking distance to the city. It's a lovely terrace house so you will get a real Sydney local experience here. I booked the house for some meetings but will definately book again if I have visitors coming to Sydney.

This beautiful home is perfect for larger groups. The living and dining area is spacious and comfortable. We had a group of 6 and really enjoyed the private decks and outdoor area. Wonderful location, so close to everything you would want for a Sydney stay.
Nice place a great location. Jeremy is a top bloke and very helpful. Thanks
Clean, convenient and Jeremy was excellent to deal with. Will stay here again!
Jeremy’s place was great! Check in and all communications were super easy and the place was ideal in terms of location and the space itself. Would definitely recommend to anyone

Jeremy’s place was a great stay in the heart of the city. Lovely terrace apartment, easy check in!
Would stay again!
Nice place in a great location.

This property is exactly what you see, a relaxed, wonderful property in a fantastic location. A little warm during Sydney's heat wave with no aircon, but fans in every room helped get the air flowing. There was plenty of room for the large group of us, all adults, and it was a very comfortable and homey. Beds were comfy, and everything provided as stated, and lovely and clean. Easy check-in/check out process. Would definitely recommend this property to everyone!
The property is in an incredible location in Darlinghurst with the most stunning views of the Sydney skyline. Jeremy is an amazing host who was accommodating, responsive and helpful
Great location, very roomy, lovely Darlinghurst terrace! Would recommend.
Beautiful old terrace house in an amazing location. We loved our stay!

Great place to stay in a nice area. Our stay was completely hassle-free - something you don't always get with some places. Instructions were thorough and no need for a whole lot of communication throughout our stay, though Jeremy was easily contactable if needed. Overall we had an extremely pleasant stay.
Fantastic location4 bedrooms close to shops. Close to Kings cross and not to expensive in taxi if you want to head to circular quay. Great Host

name: Shiny BALCONY:)) room CENTRAL ISTANBUL ŞİŞLİ
summary: from a Londoner...Not in dark streets. BALCONY:)) New room with king size bed for two in a large flat in the central of Istanbul-ŞİŞLİ that so close Beyoğlu,Taksim(2km),Galata, Sultanahmet Grand Bazaar by Subway or Bus.Cevahir, Trump Shopping Malls are just 5min.Buses that cover whole lstanbul,are stopping in front of the home.Kitchen, bathroom and the living-room are open for our guests.There are Restaurants,Burger King,coffee shop, Supermarkets next to home which is infront of Şişli Nuroltower
space: Balcony:) At the heart of Istanbul, during any time of day always Shiny, tidy, clean NEW room in the hub of all transportation systems in ŞİŞLİ-Mecidiyeköy which so close to CEVAHİR Avm-shopping Malls. access: My guests can use the bathroom, the living-room, the kitchen in the common area plus their beautiful room with a king size new bed and a BALCONY:)
interaction: I am a guy from İstanbul who lived in London to study the law. When it comes to London ! yeah It has been missed awfully :)) It would be my pleasure to give you advices to visit during your stay in Istanbul. Pls pay attention to this I already lived in many houses in London facing some hard challenges. That's why I am sure what a home or room should be:)) so You have my word about any informations' accuracy. from now on You are very very welcome...

host.host_about: Londoner I m:)) a lawyer in Istanbul and have been to London and stayed in many places all around the world. That's why I know what kinda feeling being a guest in someone's home. so Let's do it so easy and make it comfortable like your own :))

reviews.comments: Erdinc is an awesome person and he helped us a lot!!! Although he is not stay at home a lot but he tried to help us every time and he provided everything we need. Also the house is in a good location you can go to lots of malls for shopping. Lots of restaurants, transportations and supermarkets around so it's convenient.
Erdinç bey'in evinde bir gece konakladım. Ulaşım kolay, balkonlu oda, fotoğraflarda gördüğünüz gibi. Kesinlikle tavsiye edilir bir ev sahibi.

Erdinc is a wonderfully friendly and incredibly helpful. The room was basic but clean and the bed was comfortable. The balcony lets you look out onto Istanbul life. It is near a big road which makes it a little bit noisy, but the insulation is good, so when everything is closed you barely hear a thing. 

You can walk to Taskin square in a little over 30 minutes or you can just take the Metro which is very close and will drop you off wherever you need to go. 

In other words, great location and great value for money

name: Ático Del Guinardo
summary: Studio with lots of room and natural light, 1 private bathroom and 1 shared bathroom, 1 private room with its own bed and closet. In the main area one sofa with a pullout bed. Equipped with AC, WIFI, TV, Microwave, a Coffee Machine and some complementary pastries. Just a few metro stops away of the amazing Hospital de Sant Pau, amazing panoramic views from Bunkers de Carmel, a hidden jewel, and fairly close to Sagrada Familia. Come enjoy your stay at Barcelona at a friendly family neighborhood.

name: Location + Value in the heart of Lahaina + Free Parking and WiFi + Free Activities
summary: Spinnaker One Bedroom / One Bath condominium - sleeps up to four people!  A-108 is located on the first floor of a two story complex.  Located in the heart of historic Lahaina, just steps from famous Front Street and Lahaina Harbor, this one bedroom / one bathroom condominium is the ideal location to enjoy all that Maui has to offer.   The Spinnaker is a small complex just two blocks from the beach and central to all of Lahaina's shops and restaurants.  From stylish bistros serving sophisticated Hawaiian cuisine, to world-class galleries filled with eclectic art, Lahaina is one of Maui's most delightful destinations.  *  Affordable condominium features a spacious kitchen and has everything you need from full sized stainless steel appliances down to the pots and pans.  *  Dinnerware, glassware and silverware service for six.   *  Counter seating for three. Plus, there is a dining table that will seat two comfortably.   *  Living room area has a sofa sleeper and a 48" flat screen televis

interaction: Please email or call us anytime.
house_rules: Is this Property Pet Friendly?:: No pet of any kind is permitted. Is this a family friendly property?: Yes, children are welcome. This is a family friendly property Does this property have WiFi & Cable?: Yes, this property has streaming WiFi and Cable Can I rent this if I am not 25?: We need the tenant to be 25 or older. The guests of the tenant may be younger. Can I smoke on the property?: There is no smoking of any kind in the unit or on the lanai.  When is Checkin and Checkout?: Checkin is 4PM and Checkout is 11AM

host.host_about: iTrip Vacations - Maui offers many Maui home rentals, all beautifully situated on the sparkling beaches of Kaanapali, Napili, Kapalua, Lahaina, Kihei, Wailea and Maalaea. Our Maui home rentals are beachfront style, offering activities like snorkeling, surfing, whale watching, hiking, and relaxing by the beach or pool. Not far from many of our Maui home rentals is Haleakalā National Park, an amazing destination for beautiful views, complete with a visitor center for educational information. Also near all of our Maui home rentals are a number of great shops and delicious restaurants for refueling after a long day at the beach. All of our Maui home rentals offer you all the comforts of home with the addition of luxurious amenities. Book one of iTrip Vacations' many beautiful Maui home rentals today for the trip of a lifetime!

reviews.comments: Fantastic location. Wonderful accommodations. Great community in this condo complex. Fantastic pool. Clean. Comfortable

Great location,l right near all of the shops and restaurants in Lahaina. Clean, nice touches like beach towels and chairs. Bring extra beach towels if you plan to go to the beach a lot. Definitely recommend the place.

It was a nice quiet place within walking distance to Front Street in Lahaina.  If you choose to begin the day with a light breakfast or decide to stay in for the night, it has a well-equipped kitchen with a stove, dishwasher, microwave, pots and pans.

The location is great, local mixed with some tourists. The area was very quiet at night too. Lots of things for guests to use like beach towels, travel chairs, and a cooler. Onsite parking as well as guest spots that our family used to visit our spot.
Great location and property

name: Stunning studio APT in the heart of NYC
summary: Gorgeous & Large Studio furnished with modern decor. 2 Queen Size Beds + Large Sofa Bed and together sleeps 5 people easily.   Staying in my place will defiantly enhance your NYC Experience. This recently renovated charming Studio is two flight up, located in the center or Manhattan. The neighborhood offers anything you could think of: Nightlife, cafes, Shopping, Restaurants & Museums. steps from the UN and a few minutes walk from Grand Central. My place id also available for monthly rental
space: Space features clean and modern design. Huge windows that bring lots of natural light to this beautiful and very quiet apartment. Super comfy queen size bed to insure good night sleep.  Sofa bed easily reclines into a comfortable bed that can accommodate up to two adults. All that and much more will make your trip unforgettable.

neighborhood_overview: Best location !! Surrounded with lots of amazing restaurants and bars.  Locates just few steps from UN, East river and Grand Central Station.   Very safe to walk around.
transit: Grand Central Station
