Kitchen is stacked with pots and pans, beautifully matched plates, cups, glasses and utensils. High quality linens, pillows and towels. I also provide you with iron and board, hair dryer etc.
interaction: Responsive and available in any case

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
Hello there
My name is Eli.
Love life and concerts addict. Music is my way of life.
Would love to host you

reviews.comments: Perfect place for tourism of NYC or a longer business trip. Apt actually has TWO double beds, so plenty of room. Fantastic bagel shop a block away. Easy walk to midtown sights, Broadway, and to both Grand Central and the East River ferry.

I had the pleasure of staying at Eli's airbnb for five days for a conference in New York. Here are my comments below on the apartment and the host. 

The apartment: The apartment was located at a very convenient location, close to groceries and transit. The first thing I noticed about the apartment was how accurate the pictures were. When booking online airbnbs, there can sometimes be a discrepancy between what is advertised and what apartment you walk into. However, Eli's apartment was absolutely true to the quality of the pictures; simply spacious, clean and beautiful. While I stayed at the apartment for less than a week, the place was also equipped with almost everything I could think of. The apartment had various kitchen utensils, first aid kit, fresh towels, and an iron to iron your clothes. 

The host: Eli was very attentive and communicative both before and during my stay. He contacted me in advance to confirm when my flight would land. When my flight was delayed, he checked in with me to make sure that I was okay. I felt that he was a caring host, and a well-mannered person in general.

While, the location and the place was overall good we did have communication issues. We got there the fist night and we're disappointed to see that the tv was not working. We asked for assistance that fist night as well as the next night and no assistance was given. It did not ruin our trip but it was unfortunate.
Eli was a very attentive host. The apartment is beautiful! There are parking garages for rent walking distance from the apartment. Loved the location made for a fun, stress free stay!
Awesome apartment in an awesome location! So much better than a hotel! Loved it!

Eli's place is exactly as it appears in the ad. The location is really great, super close to grand central, pretty quiet for Manhattan, and comfortable. We have used airbnb a lot, and have come to expect things to run smoothly, and they did. Eli was easy to communicate with, she was prompt and always easy to get a hold of when we needed something. She checked in with us half way through just to be sure things were good. And she was willing to fix anything if asked. Airbnb lists the location of the apartment incorrectly, making check in a little confusing, and for some reason I did not get Eli's messages with specific info on how to get in (although I am sure she sent them, my email is sometimes tricky that way). The tv wasn't working, but we never needed or wanted it. Eli offered to have it fixed while we were at the apartment, but we declined. But you might want to check with her ahead of time if tv is important to your stay. The beds were more like doubles than queen sized beds, but the apartment was airy and the bedding was comfortable.
Overall, is a extremely please with it stay at Eli's place! Would love to stay here again : )
Clean, quiet place in a good neighborhood

Very nice apartment in a great location. Grand Central Station is a 2-minute walk away and Times Square is a 10-minute walk away. Nearby is everything you need and the area is quiet to sleep. Excellent communication with Eli who is always ready to answer any need. I am very pleased with the choice made. I would stay here again.

The apartment was really great, it was clean and had all we needed. 
The location was perfect, we were able to walk to Times Square, 5th Avenue and Grand Central was really near. 
Eli was an amazing host, always looked after us and was always in communication. 
We had a great stay!
Great location - the pizza joint on the corner is really good and Ground Central coffee a couple blocks away is excellent.
Highly recommended - central location, very clean and spacious place and gracious host!

Eli's apartment was great for our girls weekend. The location is very convenient, and there was enough space for 5 of us and all of our belongings. Eli is super quick to respond and easy to work with. The beds are DEFINITELY not queen sized. I’m not even sure they’re standard full sized beds. So if you have taller or bigger people looking to share beds, just be aware. But overall a great space for the cost!
Great place in a great location

Eli's space was perfect for our NYC trip! The location is what sold us and it did not disappoint- it was very close to Grand Central Station/major subway lines! It was also within walking distance to restaurants and coffee shops.
Check-in and communication with Eli was a breeze. We arrived earlier than expected and were able to leave our suitcases in the room while it was being cleaned. The cleaning lady was very kind! Unfortunately, the check-out instructions (take out trash, etc.) were not communicated to us until after we had already left for the airport. 
The space was extremely modern and well decorated. The pictures listed were very accurate. Furniture was not of high quality (didn't bother us). We did have some issues with the curtain rods (not secured so they fell when attempting to open the curtains). The TV did not work but that was expected based on other reviews guests had left. The only major issue we encountered was coming back to the balcony window wide open (which we had not touched). It was having difficulty latching but we eventually got it closed and locked.  

We did not spend much time in the room, therefore it was perfect for us- It was a great place for the price and we would definitely recommend!

In complete love with this place!! Apartment was on the small side but it fit six of us comfortably. Place was nicely furnished and decorated. The balcony area leading to the rooftop was a great addition too. Made me wish I lived here haha

If I ever come back to NY I would def book this spot again!!

Appartement très bien situé près de la gare centrale de Manhattan (8 mn à pied). Point de départ idéal pour faire les excursions à Manhattan. Le check-in s’est bien déroulé malgré notre heure tardive d’arrivée. L’appartement est idéal pour 4 personnes (dans notre cas 2 adultes et 2 ados). La communication avec Eli s’est très bien déroulée, réponse rapide à nos questions. Nous conseillons cet appartement pour la gentillesse d’Eli et aussi pour l’emplacement. Excellent rapport qualité/prix pour New York.
Great location and a safe place. Lots of room in the apt. Housekeeping every day, so if you needed something you got it. Close to lots of restaurants & stores.

Stayed here for a very short Manhattan get away with the kids. Very doable location with grade school aged kids, and ample space for our stay. Got parking at the Quik Park around the corner for cheap online ahead of time, and fell in love with Chelsea Bagel of Tudor City. Super safe area that is close to the sights but quiet and restful. Eli was a great host with lots of communication. Would highly recommend the space and will hopefully be back!

This is a fantastic place for the money. In the heart of Manhatten and a short walk to Grand Central so easy to reach other parts of the city. Some reviews saying the TV was broken, worked fine for us but only had it on for 5 mins. Will have to wait a short while for the hot water to get going, but is a good and hot when it does. We stayed as two, but there is loads of space so a great option for a crew of people looking to stay someplace on the cheap, I'd reckon you'd fit 6 comfortably, 8 uncomfortably. Top notch stuff.
Lovely space, very convenient.
Todo muy bien. Excepto que solo hay escaleras..
Eli’s place was convenient to everything. All of the communication before check in was an ease. He let us leave our bags at the apartment so we didn’t have to lug them around!
Great location. Great value. Basic unit with  two double beds a small eating area generous size bathroom  I felt very  safe as there is a key lock on door and key pad lock on the unit

Eli's apartment was just as described. We had a delay with our flight but he was willing to move things around and made our check-in process seamless. The neighborhood was not very far from Times Square and Rockefeller Center, which I loved. The apartment was just as pictured and smelled amazing. Very small, but I believe this is common for New York. Overall, I loved the place and am excited to return soon to NYC.

The flat is well located, pretty close from the grand central subway station. It is also pretty calm in a “full air bnb building”. Eli has alway been really reactive on emails. Nevertheless, the flat is pretty small for a family of 5 with 3 teenagers. The sofa, specifically was really uncomfortable for a 16 years teenager. Please note there is no duvet for the sofa. We had only 4 chairs, not 5 so no way to have breakfast all together. Nevertheless, I would recommend this flat to any family of 4 people!

This place was wonderful! Great location and very safe. Very clean, looks just like pictures. It was a great getaway for my girlfriends and I. The host was really get at communicating and always answering any questions we had. Would definitely stay here again!

Old building without elevators, but Apts are recently been renovated with very good taste. Spacious enough for my family of 5 and really close to main attractions in NYC. 
Only problem we had was a fake fire alarm that made us go out at the middle of the (really cold) night through sprinklers rain. Turned out to be frozen pipes that broke, but it was frightening. 
Eli was great about handling this accident and even refunded us this night, which was a fair detail for the trouble. 
Totally recommended if you are visiting NYC.
Very beautiful and cozy apartment in an unbeatable location. Eli was always in contact with us, being very kind and attentive.
Good location, really small.

We had a great stay! Not only was there very clean and comfortable accommodations but it was also an excellent location! It’s walking distance from the UN, Grand Central Station and Time Square! It wasn’t as big as I initially thought but it slept 5 very comfortably. Eli was very communicative and made the check in process very smooth. He was also very accommodating by arranging for us to stay an extra day on short notice! We hope to be back in the future and stay at this exact spot! Thank you so much for making my first NY experience the best!

Great location and apartment. 
Was very cosy and clean. Will definitely be back! Thank you Eli!

Merci beaucoup à Eli, même si nous ne l'avons jamais rencontré. Le logement était en tous points conforme au descriptif, ce studio est très bien situé, près de Central Station. Eli était très réactif par mail et ses explications étaient également très claires. Au final, nous avons été enchanté de notre séjour chez lui. Je recommande ce studio.
Great communication, quality price very good, good ubication.
Great location and even better price. Slept 5 comfortably. Quick responses and only downside was the cleanliness. There were a few stains on the bed sheets and comforter, but nothing too bad.

Walking up the two flights of stairs is definitely worth this little jewel. Perfect location, lots of local places to shop and eat, and a petite, clean, modern space. We had 3 people comfortably accommodated.
Perfect location. Awesome apartment with comfortable beds and plenty of kitchen necessities. Coffee close by, yummy pizza, and a secure apartment. Thank you for a perfect home away from home!!
A good place to stay. Photos make the apartment appear larger than it is. Easy walking distance to the centre of town. The beds are hard!
Very clean place! Excellent communication skills. Provided detailed instructions for building necessities and was easy to get into contact with when questions arised.
Clean apartment. Situated in a fun neighborhood that is walkable to major landmarks and NYC neighborhoods.
The apartment was in a great location and was very clean. I would definitely stay here again when traveling to New York!
Great location.
Eli was an amazing host with all the needed amenities. Very quick response time and very accommodating to our needs. Would recommend!

Es war eine tolle Zeit in New York... Wir waren zu viert und waren mit dem Apartment super zufrieden. Die Lage war super und wir konnten Manhatten zu Fuß erkunden. 

Eine absolute Empfehlung von uns. Vor allem für Leute die viel unterwegs sind.

Perfect place to locate yourself for a Bergen visit. My wife and two young children stayed here and found it ideal. Tucked away from the busy tourist marina but easily accessible by public transport. Easy walk down the hill, but will need bus if you have lots of luggage. Would recommend.
Good location and space for a girls weekend on New York! Great space to share with friends and easy to get to most attractions in the city.
Lovely little spot in the heart of Manhattan
Amazing place in the heart of NY
The building has no elevator and from outside the building is not very pleasant looking. The beddings were not really clean, had stains on it. It’s a great location and check-in was easy.
Great place for a fantastic process. The location is key and near many lines of transportation, good food, and places to go out. I would stay here again
외관보단 내관이 좋고, 아담하지만 지내기에 편안합니다. 호스트분이 친절하셔서 좋았습니다!
Good Location despite some very (drunken) neighbours, which Entertainer us in the  night. Good starting point to explore NY with Eli being a very helpful host.

This is a quaint space that easily slept 5 adults. The building was built in 1910, so with that you have the noises that come with a 100+ year old building. But, the interior is updated modernly and feels clean and stylish. The walk to Times Square is 20-30 minutes, so if you're not used to walking to get places, be prepared. The place is on the 3rd floor and there are no elevators, so if you can't climb stairs, this isn't the place for you. The air conditioner is very loud, so bring ear plugs to sleep with if you don't want to hear the noise, but it's also very cold. There are lots of neat little shops and restaurants in the area, so you will definitely have everything you need within a block or two. Overall, we felt very safe and secure, and despite the longer than expected walk to Times Square, the location was great and we'd stay here again.

Eli’s Place was located perfectly. Only a half mile walk to Time Square and a block away from a wonderful market, The Amish Market. The space was exactly like the pictures online. We fit 5 adults comfortably. The pull out sofa will NOT fit 2 adults, but it did come with an air mattress for that 6th person if needed. Eli was so quick to respond and very easy to communicate with. Overall, I would give it a two thumbs up!!

Located close to Midtown Manhattan.
Clean and modern
The property was clean and easily accessible, the host was very quick to respond.However, it was much smaller than expect not appropriate for 6 people for more than one night.

logement bien placé 
par contre difficile de faire de la cuisine et un peu bruyant du à la climatisation

Overall, decent place to sleep. Bright and pretty clean. The towels were old and smelled a little interesting. The couch bed was uncomfortable, so be sure draw straws for who doesn’t get a good night’s rest. The couch bed also had crumbs all over it. The space was a little cramped for 5. Eli was pleasant on arrival, allowed us to check in a bit early. This was very helpful. The following day, however, pleasantries were gone. Eli was grumpy and short in response. She didn’t seem to care about our stay. I don’t need my ass kissed, but general politeness would have been nice. We didn’t die, but I probably wouldn’t recommend.
Great location! Place is exactly like the pictures. Very comfortable even for 5 people. Eli is great at communicating with you and giving tips!

Er I 2 er lejligheden ok. Beliggenheden er god. Men er I flere er den alt for lille, sengene er ok, men sovesofaen kan man ikke sove på. Køkkenudstyr og bestik mangelfuldt eller defekt. Manglende lagner, viskestykker, affaldsspand på badeværelset. Gardinstænger, der falder ned og forhængt, der er hængt op med knappenåle. Lidt nedslidt i køkkenområde og på badeværelset. Værten reagerer ikke, når man SMS og inden vi tog afsted, måtte vi rykke flere gange for at få en reaktion fra ejerne og den præcise adresse. Ville vi komme igen? Til området ja, men ikke til lejligheden,

This was my second visit to NYC, and it was better than expected yet again, for my first time staying in Upper Manhattan area. Eli’s place was very accessible, and convenient .. where do I begin! If you’re planning on taking the subway, Grand Central Station is about an 8 minute walk. Although I did not stop by, there is a café right next to the building. A 99 cent pizza shop within a 5 min walk. There are two 24hr shops located right down the street. So many options nearby to choose from, very convenient! Eli’s place was clean and ready for us when we arrived. Although we arrived hours before our check-in, we were accommodated right away. The housekeeping ladies were so helpful and very kind to us, they offered extra bed sheets and bath towels, if needed. 

I would definitely stay here again.

Great location and easy to find. Close to most locations for visiting NYC. This place is recommended for stay in NYC. Host is very nice and fast response. This location has only one small issue and this is only for mostly older people, This unit is on the 2nd floor and there is no elevator. You will need to carry all your luggage up the stairs. I recommend this place for visiting NYC.

The apartment was awesome!!!! Only things were the curtains kept falling so maybe make the rods stronger and the no elevator thing was a huge bummer especially bc we had heavy luggage. The sofa bed was incredibly uncomfortable, my friends said they woke up super stiff and hurting but the other beds were good! The bathroom was super clean but at check out my friend was using the bathroom, it was around 10:50 and housekeeping was already banging on the door reminding her check out was at 11. She politely said she was just using the bathroom but she said the housekeeper made her feel super rushed. I also pointed out the nails that was coming out of the wall so we were nervous that if we put anything on that particular shelf it was going to come crashing down. But the central air worked AMAZING , it was freezing in the apartment which was good because it was so hot that day. I know this accommodates 6 and we did fit well, however, it would be best for 4 people and maybe a 5th on the air mattress because the sofa bed was soooo uncomfortable. But overall, we loved it !!! So thank you !
It was a good location about a 10 minute walk to Grand Central
Great place, highly recommend, Eli very communicative
Great apartment, great location.
Perfekte Lage, sehr hübsch eingerichtet, sehr freundlicher Host.
I stayed at this apartment for a night during a short business trip. The check-in was very easy, Eli communicated well, and the location has plenty of nearby dining options.

What you see is what you get. The place totally match what you can see on the announce. Only small bad point would be the noise of the ACs next door that might be too much for some. In our case, it was not, we were so tired that it did not prevent is to sleep.
It was a really great place, perfect location and Eli it was a very nice host!

Le logement est conforme aux photos. Mais le matin il n'y a pas souvent de l'eau chaude, le soir c'est ok. 
A côté du logement dehors il y a une ventilation assez bruyante qui tourne 24h sur 24
Great place and great location. Eli is very responsive to communication.

Nice clean property, close to Grand Central Station.  Shower was good, plenty hot water.  Housekeeper very friendly.  Handy to have a code to access the property, thus no worries about losing the key.  Comfortable space to explore New York from.

Great location if you’re looking to be midtown. Fairly modern (updated central air and bathroom) and extremely clean. There are two double beds in the space which are very small to share with another person and the couch is very hard. Would not recommend anyone sleeping on the couch. 

Also the TV console was practically falling off the wall and was hit or miss if it was even working. I would get that fixed so it’s working properly and not at danger of collapsing.

it all depends on the price you get against other options... it is a refurbished hotel suite. area is nearby of many things but nothing really going on near. You have no space to store..... you have views of other ceilings and the general areas smell like cheap detergent. kudos to the Beds and linens as at the end you get a nice sleep. bathroom is on the good side. Eli is really responsive... some drawers could be helpful.
Awesome location. I’d stay here again next time I’m in town.

Eli’s place was good for my friends and I. We stayed 3 nights and the place was clean when we arrived. Eli’s housekeeper Elizabeth is super friendly and helpful with dropping off bags. The beds seem to be full size and not queen. It’s a studio apartment as well. Size is ok
great location
Its a nice place to stay and walk around, theres a lot of food places 2 minutes away, ill definetly stay there again

Vibrant residential area, convenient to transportation.  we didn't spend much time in the apartment but the beds were comfortable, kitchenette though small had comfortable chairs and had enough room for us to sit around the table together.

The location is absolutely PERFECT for travelers who wants to explore the city (like me) or even for business. The studio is exactly as pictured and better. I feel safe, and enjoy the real city experience. I recommend this place 100%. Little  note: Stairs.

Purtroppo la mia esperienza, rispetto a moltre altre, non è stata positiva.
Arrivati all'alloggio prenotato (accesso sia allo stabile che all'appartamento con codice) non ci è stato possibile accedere allo stesso in quanto risultava già occupato. Prima che si riuscisse a rintracciare l'host e questa rintracciasse gli occupanti perchè si trasferissero ad altro appartamento è passata più di un'ora e capite bene che, dopo 9 ore di volo, il trasferimento dall'areoporto, il fuso orario, la stanchezza, avremmo preferito evitare anche questa seccatura. Oltretutto abbiamo avuto a disposizione un appartamento che, da occupato, non poteva considerarsi pulito e senza considerare che i precedenti occupanti, persone sulle quali non abbiamo dubbi sulla loro integrità, erano comunque in possesso del codice per entrare in quello che era il nostro appartamento. Ci aspettavamo anche la presenza fisica dell'host che, per correttezza, avrebbe dovuto darci migliori spiegazioni sull'accaduto, scusandosi, cosa che non è avvenuta.   L'unico successivo contatto è stato quello di raccomandarci di lasciare l'appartamento per il check-out entro le ore 11 perchè a quell'ora sarebbe arrivato l'addetto delle pulizie; peccato che la stessa precisione non l'abbiamo riscontrata per il check-in.
Per quanto riguarda l'appartamento risulta più piccolo rispetto a quanto si intuisca dall'inserzione. I posti letto poi, descritti per 7 persone, sono da leggere come per 4 adulti e tre bambini: passi per i due letti matrimoniali (da una piazza e mezza cadauno), ma il divano letto è più piccolo del letto matuimoniale ed il gonfiabile è.....un gonfiabile. Proprio non ce li vedo due adulti dormire nel divano letto!  Il locale poi, come detto, è piccolo e considerato anche le valigie che non hanno spazio per essere ricoverate, ci si ritrova in una situazione davvero angusta. Anche alla luce di questo il prezzo risulta un pò caro.
Spero di tornare a New York, sicuramente cercherò un altro alloggio
Spacious apartment was perfect for our weekend in city!  Great location away from the craziness but close to many restaurants, pubs and night life!

Eli’s apartment was great, nice big space for all of us, so much bigger than the city hotels. This apartment is in a great, safe neighborhood with lots of dining options. We would definitely stay here again.
Quiet apartment, close to the subway, and clean.  The housekeeper was a delight.

The problem with our stay in this apartment is that the photos of the studio showed a bigger apartment in perspective. Also the beds are not Queen size as told. Is more like an individual size. The elementos of kitchen are pretty basic and you shouldn't trust on them if you want to Cook. It would be quite dificult to stay there for four or more persons.

Location is very good.
A Very Cute place! Great location as well!
Great!
very convenient room at a great location

If you are a small family with young kids or a group of friends, looking for a great place to stay while discovering New York City, look no further! 

We (my wife, our adult son and I) just made the long journey from Australia to stay in NYC for a month and immerse ourselves in all the wonderful things this amazing city has to offer. 
   
We arrived at Eli’s place late at night, after 24+ hours on the way and knowing this, Eli had prepared the place so we could just get right in to bed. The place was immaculately clean, coz and warm, not just within the huge studio but also the public areas are always sparkling, smell good and warm. 

The next day, we were ready to set out and only then realised how perfect the position is. This part of Midtown East has great amenities literally on your doorstep. Great pizza, fresh salad bar, the most delicious bakery (where most days everything’s $2), fresh fruit, veggies and groceries and wonderful espresso coffee literally across the way. Also, a fantastic laundry across the road and my wife loved the hairdresser two short blocks away and the nail bars and beauticians in abundance on Second.

Grand Central Station is an easy 10 minute walk away and Broadway, Times Square, the museums, galleries, shops and restaurants a pleasant 20 minute stroll. Everything is literally a short walk or subway ride away. 

We will be back to NYC and would book Eli’s place again without a moment’s hesitation!

Apartamento sujo, com pelos, cabelos na geladeira e roupa de cama. Chão sujo, local horrível, prédio velho, super antigo. Deixei o apto assim que entrei e ainda não consegui ressarcimento do meu dinheiro. Por favor, não usem esse serviço e multiplique aos seus conhecidos. Arrependimento certo.

Eli’s place is in the best location and was perfect in every way. The Apt was super clean and a quick walk to grand central station with easy access to everything we wanted to visit. He really was the perfect host and we will definitely return!  A+++++

Overall we had a great stay at Eli's place.  The decor is minimal but clean and stylish and the shower is great.   The price is great and I would totally stay here again except the beds were too hard for me to sleep well on.  Others might be fine with it, I had to fold the comforter over and sleep on half of it and then it was fine.  The location is not that interesting but its central to a lot of other destinations.  A very good value overall.

Eli was a great host! She answered very quickly and kindly to al of our questions. The apartment was very clean! It fitted perfeclty for us and we were four. And also, the housekeepers were really nice and sweet! It’s close to subway stations and a lot of restaurants! Perfectly located! We definetly recommend this place!

name: 2447 - AB Park Güell Apartment 1-1 - Elegant 4-Bedroom Apartment near Park Güell with a Balcony
summary: This fantastic and modern   duplex apartment  is situated just next to Park Güell, one of the biggest attractions in Barcelona. The neighbourhood is quieter than staying in the very city centre, while remaining close enough so you can reach all the sights quickly and easily. Here you will also find plenty of great places to eat out, as well as cafés, bars, shops and supermarkets. The area is very well connected to the rest of the city via public transport.This stylish dúplex can comfortably accommodate up to 10 people across 4 bedrooms with 9 single beds and one sofa bed.The apartment comes completely furnished, with a fully equipped kitchen which has all of the utensils and appliances needed to create your favorite dishes, or even to try your hand at some Mediterranean-inspired meals. The cozy living area has direct access to the balcony, and there is also an inner patio with plants. There are also 2 bathrooms (located in the ensuite bedrooms) with a toilet and a shower, allowing for
space: This stylish duplex has 3 bedrooms, and in each bedroom you will find 2 single beds. There is also a sofa bed, allowing the apartment to accommodate up to 7 people comfortably.  The apartment comes completely furnished, with a fully equipped kitchen which has all of the utensils and appliances needed to create your favorite dishes, or even to try your hand at some Mediterranean-inspired meals. The cozy living area has direct access to the balcony, and there is also an inner patio with plants. There are also 2 bathrooms, allowing for maximum comfort and privacy. There are many modern conveniences in this apartment too, such as a TV with international channels, a DVD player, and an iPod dock, perfect for relaxing after a day of sightseeing. An Internet connection is also available making it easy to stay in touch with friends and family back home
description: This fantastic and modern   duplex apartment  is situated just next to Park Güell, one of the biggest attractions in Barcelona. The neighbourhood is quieter than staying in the very city centre, while remaining close enough so you can reach all the sights quickly and easily. The cozy living area has direct access to the balcony, and there is also an inner patio with plants. neighborhood_overview: El Carmel neighbourhood is a residential and non-tourist area based in the upper part of Barcelona city. You will enjoy the tranquillity and security of the neighbourhood and you can also mix with local people.
notes: Licence number: HUTB-002894
transit: Bus V17 and 24 direct to Plaça Cataluña Metro L5 + L1 to Plaça Cataluña It’s possible to park on the street for free as there is no green parking zone.
access: The building has a gym on the ground floor.
house_rules: The check-in will be made at our reception: Gran Via de les Corts Catalanes, 558.  Barcelona’s tourist tax is €2,48 per person and night, for a maximum of 7 nights. It is not included in the price. Anyone under the age of 17 is exempt.  Basic cleaning service every 4 days. Includes: Sweeping of all floor surfaces, cleaning the toilet, shower and sink, and removing the rubbish. Does not include: A change of sheets or towels. If you need a more thorough clean you can hire our cleaning service by contacting our Customer Service.

host.host_about:
Hi everyone!

We are Eva & Jacques and we work in the travel and tourism industry. Our company is AB Apartment Barcelona. What we aim to do is offer each of our guests the best Barcelona experience, from start to finish. So as soon as you begin to book your stay right up until the moment you leave Barcelona, my team and I will be available to help you with any questions you might have, or even just to offer you some friendly advice. 

We have one office open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year, meaning you can contact us anytime you want, day or night. We speak many languages between us, and we’re all tourism professionals. Plus, we know all the best places to go in Barcelona, from sights and attractions to bars and restaurants (including where the locals go) so we can help you make your time in the city the most memorable with our insider tips ;)

By renting your apartment in Barcelona through me, you’ll be in safe hands.

We looking forward to meeting you soon!

name: Bright & Charming loft in the Gothic Quarter
summary: Stunning private loft set within a renovated listed building (1300 A.D.) The property is located in one of the most sought after area of the center of Barcelona close to museums, restaurants, café. The balcony overlooks the Basilica del Pi, in the heart of the Gothic quarter.  It features an open space that is used as dining room and comfortable for two double beds. A separate fully equipped kitchen with brand new appliances and a large bathroom with authentic mosaic tiles. Minimum stay 32 days.
space: The property offers high-speed wi-fi connection, flat screen TV, brand new air conditioning system and dryer and washing machine. Airy & light living spaces with direct access to the balcony overlooking the Basilica del Pi. The loft is located on the second floor and giving full privacy and comfort.
description: Stunning private loft set within a renovated listed building (1300 A.D.) The property is located in one of the most sought after area of the center of Barcelona close to museums, restaurants, café. The balcony overlooks the Basilica del Pi, in the heart of the Gothic quarter.  It features an open space that is used as dining room and comfortable for two double beds. A separate fully equipped kitchen with brand new appliances and a large bathroom with authentic mosaic tiles. Minimum stay 32 days. The property offers high-speed wi-fi connection, flat screen TV, brand new air conditioning system and dryer and washing machine. Airy & light living spaces with direct access to the balcony overlooking the Basilica del Pi. The loft is located on the second floor and giving full privacy and comfort. Guests have access to the communal door at the ground floor and the second- floor door with direct access to the apartment. Barrio Gótico, Spanish for ‘Gothic Quarter,’ is one of the oldest and most
neighborhood_overview: Barrio Gótico, Spanish for ‘Gothic Quarter,’ is one of the oldest and most beautiful districts in Barcelona. It is a labyrinth of small streets full of little bars, restaurants and shops. The neighborhood is part of the Cituat Vella, Catalan for ‘the old city,’ and is situated right in the city center: it stretches from the famous Rambla to Via Laietana. Here, we describe ten of the best things to see and do in this popular part of Barcelona. Here some point of interest nearby the apartment: - Cathedral of Barcelona - Museu d’Història de la Ciutat (MUHBA)  - Plaça del Pi - Vintage shopping at Calle Avinyó - Lunch at Sweet Dreams - Plaça Sant Felip Neri - Plaça Reial - Els Quatre Gats - Plaça de la Generalitat Being just a short walk there are restaurants, tapas bar, shops, supermarket, groceries, pharmacy, and cinemas.
notes: We do not offer short term accommodation. 32 days min stay!!
transit: Due to the super central location getting around is extremely handy. - 1 min walk from the Ramblas - 2 min walk from the Plaça Reial - 5 min from Passeig de Gràcia - 10 min from Picasso Museum - 10 min from Aquarium  - 10 min from the harbor - 15 min from the beach  ...and many more...
access: Guests have access to the communal door at the ground floor and the second- floor door with direct access to the apartment.
house_rules: - No parties - Smoking allowed on balcony only - No noise and loud voice after 11 pm

host.host_about: Friendly and open minded person. I have been living in London for more tha 4 years now and still trying to get the most out of this amazing and timeless city.

name: Appart d'artiste coquet, chaleureux et lumineux
summary: Appartement tout équipé, lumineux, aéré, orné de plantes et de sculptures. Vous serez dans un lieu calme, chaleureux et agréable à vivre (avec 2 balcons) et situé en plein cœur du MileEnd, à deux pas de tout ! Cozy and spacious apartment located in the middle of the Mile End area !
space: Appartement carré (rare à Montréal car ils sont tous sur le long) et donc très éclairé.  Plantes intérieures et œuvres d'art sur les murs rendent cet appartement épuré, zen, invitant et confortable. Planchers du bois original dans le salon double, ce qui lui donne l'aspect rustique tant recherché. La salle de bain est petite mais coquette, propre et agréable. Et qu'on prenne sont café ou un verre sur le balcon d'en avant ou d'en arrière, il ne s'agit que d'une question d'intimité...! Côté coin atelier, accès à un petit bureau et système de son.
description: Appartement tout équipé, lumineux, aéré, orné de plantes et de sculptures. Vous serez dans un lieu calme, chaleureux et agréable à vivre (avec 2 balcons) et situé en plein cœur du MileEnd, à deux pas de tout ! Cozy and spacious apartment located in the middle of the Mile End area ! Appartement carré (rare à Montréal car ils sont tous sur le long) et donc très éclairé.  Plantes intérieures et œuvres d'art sur les murs rendent cet appartement épuré, zen, invitant et confortable. Planchers du bois original dans le salon double, ce qui lui donne l'aspect rustique tant recherché. La salle de bain est petite mais coquette, propre et agréable. Et qu'on prenne sont café ou un verre sur le balcon d'en avant ou d'en arrière, il ne s'agit que d'une question d'intimité...! Côté coin atelier, accès à un petit bureau et système de son. Accès à toutes les pièces, hormis une chambre qui n'est pas sur les photos. La photo de l'atelier/ bureau viendra. C'est mon ami Antoine ou moi même qui se fera un pl
neighborhood_overview: Le Mile End est le quartier le plus prisé de Montréal ! Multi-ethnique et au centre de l'île, c'est le meilleur quartier de la ville, celui des artistes ! Proche du Mont-Royal, peu importe ou vous irez à pied, ce sera sympa, beau, et les parcs pullulent, tout comme les restos, et tout ce qui est bio et à la mode; bars à spectacles (Sala Rosa, Casa del Popolo). À deux pas du théâtre L'Espace Go,.. de tout,.. Des bars sur St-Laurent, du fameux Snack and blues, des restos indiens aux Mauritaniens, juste au coin des fameux Bagels Fairmount, du classique Wylinski, du café Italien Illy, et à une minute des meilleurs empanadas du quartier; fameuse glace du Kem Coba juste au coin. Buanderie à un pas; on laisse pêle-mêle et ça revient tout plié et trié ( mon luxe depuis 12 ans!). Les gens sont sympas, on joue de la musique dans la rue, on y vend nos vieilleries, nos trucs vintages, et il s'agit du sentiment de village des plus agréables de Montréal, c'est un quartier unique en son genre, oui hy
notes: Tout équipé (système de son, wifi, machine à espresso, etc.). Ménage impeccable avant (draps, serviettes, savons) Dans la chambre : 2 garde-robes avec cintres. Deux balcons : l'un sur l'action du Mile End et l'autre qui donne sur l'arrière.
transit: À proximité de tous les transports publics: à 5 min du métro Laurier, et de tous les arrêts d'autobus importants, dont une minute de celui sur St-Laurent ou St-Urbain pour aller au Centre-Ville. Les bixis (vélos mis en service par la ville de Montréal) sont stationnés au bout de ma rue.  Parking devant la maison, mais pas privé. Et à 15 min à pied du Mont-Royal. Vous êtes proche de tout finalement, c'est le centre de l'île !
access: Accès à toutes les pièces, hormis une chambre qui n'est pas sur les photos. La photo de l'atelier/ bureau viendra.
interaction: C'est mon ami Antoine ou moi même qui se fera un plaisir de vous accueillir !

host.host_about: Sculpteure, amoureuse du voyage et de la nature, je suis doctorante en création littéraire et navigue entre Charlevoix et Montréal.

reviews.comments: Beautiful apartment, location could not be better. Great communication and nice hosts. Recommended!

Appartement bien situé et au charme fou ! Propreté et confort assuré ! 
Sarah (et Antoine) ont su rester discrets mais toujours  disponibles durant notre séjour ! 
Je recommande vivement !

Top notch location on a quiet, one-way street with available parking (if you are lucky, be careful of reading the signs carefully). Spent a lot of downtime on one of the two balconies. Easy access to bike paths and all the treasures of Mile End. Clean, comfortable, and good hosts. Would definitely stay again!
Logement très coquet et à environ quinze minutes du métro. Quartier agréable, animé et proche des commerces. Très bon accueil.
We loved staying here! It was easy to reach and communicate with Sarah/Antoine. We felt at home here and would feel lucky to stay here again.

The location is FANTASTIC! It is across the street from Kem Coba, Fairmount Bagel, and very close to many other great restaurants and bars. It's also a nice walk to Mont Royal and a few blocks from parks and the subway. I couldn't have asked for a better location. The apartment itself felt very homey! I would stay here again!

The apartment is really comfortable and cosy and has everything you need. My boyfriend and I felt right at home. There are two little balconies, which is nice. The neighbourhood is cool with a lot of restaurants, shops and cafes but also quite noisy at night. Also the parking situation on the plateau can be a bit frustrating. Apart from that, We would absolutely stay there again!
Beautiful place in a really accessible area. Communication was quick and straightforward!
Great place in the perfect location!
Super cool apartment in a great location! Would definitely stay here again.
Fantastic location! Cute, comfy place.

Sarah's place is in the PERFECT location. I used to live in Montreal and am envious of the great space. We felt comfortable using everything and Antoine made check-in very easy. Quelle expérience formidable!
L'emplacement est idéal, l'appartement est très accueillant et les deux balcons sont super! La communication fut très facile.

We absolutely loved the apartment and it was the perfect home base for a fantastic trip to Montreal. It was very spacious, had beautiful decorations, and was in a perfect location. Would absolutely stay here again.

Superbe appartement très bien situé. Le matin, les bagels Fairmont et le café du coin sont à 2 pas. Le quartier offre des restos merveilleux tout près. La rue est une rue cyclable et les bornes Bixi sont vraiment tout proche. Nous avons adoré!

This apartment is beautiful, large, and in an incredible location. The patio door was new and locked us out on the patio which could have been a disaster but Antoine was amazing and came within 10 minutes to help us out! We were here for a short time but this apartment is definitely suitable for longer stays as well! 

Next time I am in Montreal I will be staying here if it is available!
This place was great ! I'd recommend it to all my friends!
Cadre très sympa et charmant. Nous avons beaucoup apprécié notre première nuit à Montréal.
A wonderful stay in Montreal. The neighbourhood is quiet but in a perfect location with plenty of delicious restaurant around.
This place is really amazing- very interesting decor, very clean, and an amazing location in Montreal

Very nice place in a great location in the plateau with lots of great bars and restaurants around. We arrived on a very cold winter day and the unit was quite chilly despite the small heater. Bring some warm socks and extra blankets!
Great cozy stylish place, nice neighbourhood close to everything you need.  Would definitely stay again!
Great location and great communication. Perfect place to spend a week or two in Montreal
Everything about this stay was great.  Most of all was the style and atmosphere of the apartment, it was unique and charming
Sarah's place might be the most charming in Mile End.  It felt like staying in a french new wave film!  Great location, great host, great place. Look forward to staying there again.

The perfect location. Everything you might want to do, eat or drink. The space is inviting, comfortable and clean! Any questions we had were handled immediately. Would definitely come back and stay here again.
Great stay! Beautifully decorated appartment
Wonderful apartment full of light and style!

This is a lovely little apartment full of books, plants, and interesting art. It is the perfect location in the Mile End neighborhood. The street has a lot of bike traffic but is otherwise pretty quiet.
My friend and I had a great time in Montreal at Sarah and Antoine's place! It's well located! We were closed to great coffee shops and bakeries!

Sarah's place is a great choice for your Montreal stay. It is a quiet, safe and private home, in a great location. The streets around Sarah's house are perfect for wandering, exploring, eating and drinking. We loved the area. The home is green and spacious and has lovely natural light. Antoine managed our reservation and he was very responsive and helpful. He kindly allowed us to check in early as we arrived early from the airport. He went to the effort of having the apartment cleaned earlier than planned and for that we are very grateful. Thank you Sarah and Antoine. I highly recommend this apartment.

The location is amazing. Perfectly central in Mile End. This literally made our trip. Also conveniently located to many areas in the city— easy to take an Uber from there and explore. Apartment is clean! Communication was seamless and super flexible. Great stay.
The place is absolutely charming. Middle of mile-end. A lot of books.
très coquet appartement très bien placé a deux pas des meilleurs bagels de la ville :) merci !!

Sarah's place is in a perfect location for enjoying Montreal. It's within walking distance of countless boutiques, across the street from delicious ice cream, and near so many affordable and delicious restaurants. My wife and I particularly enjoyed shopping for records at Phonopolis, then playing them on the turntable at Sarah's apartment while we relaxed on the balcony.
Sarah's apartment is charming in the wonderful Mile End close to everything!! The balconies really make the stay
This place is great! Will definitely stay again.
Sarah's apartment is beautiful, clean, artistically decorated and well lit. The location is great, too.
Agréable et bien centré dans le mile end
Loved our stay in this quirky apartment. Awesome location in Mile. So responsive and helpful with information and details about the stay. Highly recommend!

Sarah’s apartment is located
in a great area. There are several delicious restaurants located within a 30
second walk (Wilensky’s, Fairmont Bagel, Fabrege, etc.) and several bars.
The street is located a 1 minute walk from St. Laurent and public transit, making it easily accessible.
The apartment is clean, tidy, eclectic.
The apartment is very small. The bedroom is tiny but the terrace is a nice touch,
There is a terrace off the kitchen as well, which offers a private spot to enjoy morning coffee or an evening glass of wine.
The downside is the tiny bathroom, which is functional but very small.
During a heat wave, we recommend that a window a/c unit be available. It was so hot and muggy
in the apartment which made our stay less enjoyable.
Thank you to Sarah and Antoine’s employee/helper for quickly setting up the mattress for the 3rd guest. Thank
you for the bottle of wine as well, that was a very thoughtful gesture.
The location is great, the apartment is clean, tidy and artfully
eclectic, which is something we appreciated.
Thank you:)
Lovely place in a great location!
Sarah’s home was a true Montreal treat! Her home was perfect for a quiet getaway while still being in walking distance to outstanding venues and activities.
Très joli appartement, coquet, lumineux, arty au cœur du Milend, très pratique et parfait pour une découverte de Montréal.

This is an amazing place to stay. Host was super helpful and made check-in easy. 10/10 would def come back. I loved the space but this place kinda scary at nighttime. idk maybe its cursed, bring nightlight as hosts do not provide one.
Sarah’s place was a great location for anyone looking to explore and enjoy the Mile End neighborhood. Antoine was also very responsive and was an ease to communicate with.

This is a really beautiful little gem with an authentic Montreal feeling located in the heart of the Mile End. The apartment was full of plants which added a charming touch. It was easy to communicate with Sarah and I would definitely stay here again if I needed!
great visit

Je suis resté une nuit et c'était bien. 
Le gros plus est l'emplacement de l'appartement, un superbe quartier avec tout à proximité.
Amazing little place!

Wonderful, quirky apartment. This is our favorite kind of Airbnb place, where you feel like you're really living in someone else's place. Cozy and interesting books, music, layout. Wonderful balconies (if only it had been warm enough outside to enjoy them.) Great location, right in the heart of Mile End.
Nous avons adoré l’appartement de Sarah ! Mon copain l’appelle l’oasis parfait pour des âmes créatives. Merci beaucoup de votre hospitalité, nous avons beaucoup aimé la déco et le quartier !
Cozy and convenient place in a great neighborhood

name: Bright, modern room and bath w/ pool, gym, spa
summary: This private bedroom and bathroom in a beautiful Williamsburg condo features a view of the Empire State Building and the Manhattan skyline. Our spacious two bedroom condo is bright, modern and best of all, pet-free! After a busy day exploring the city, return home and enjoy the gym, swimming pool or hot tub. Less than 5 minutes from the subway and a 15 minute ride to Manhattan. Welcome!
space: Our two-bedroom apartment is on the seventh floor (penthouse) of a new condo in Williamsburg. It's very diverse and artistic with plenty of restaurants, bars and coffee shops in the area.  The private guest room receives plenty of natural light and overlooks the Manhattan skyline. It is furnished with a double bed, large closet and air conditioning/heating. The bedroom accommodates 1-2 people and you are always welcome to make use of the entire apartment. You will also have your own private bathroom with a large soaking tub and shower.  The apartment features a full kitchen with marble countertops, stove, oven, microwave, and dishwasher. The bright living room area features a comfortable sofa, dining area, surround sound speakers and record player, and flat screen television. Wifi internet, A/C and heat are included.
description: This private bedroom and bathroom in a beautiful Williamsburg condo features a view of the Empire State Building and the Manhattan skyline. Our spacious two bedroom condo is bright, modern and best of all, pet-free! After a busy day exploring the city, return home and enjoy the gym, swimming pool or hot tub. Less than 5 minutes from the subway and a 15 minute ride to Manhattan. Welcome! Our two-bedroom apartment is on the seventh floor (penthouse) of a new condo in Williamsburg. It's very diverse and artistic with plenty of restaurants, bars and coffee shops in the area.  The private guest room receives plenty of natural light and overlooks the Manhattan skyline. It is furnished with a double bed, large closet and air conditioning/heating. The bedroom accommodates 1-2 people and you are always welcome to make use of the entire apartment. You will also have your own private bathroom with a large soaking tub and shower.  The apartment features a full kitchen with marble countertops, stov
neighborhood_overview: Hip, quirky Williamsburg is home to dozens of restaurants, bars and coffee shops. If you're craving some nature, the building is also right next door to a park.
notes: There is currently exterior work being done to the building. This will not affect your room or the interior of the apartment but please note that during this time guests may not access the roof or the balcony and there is scaffolding around the exterior. Please note that the apartment as well as the common area of the building are not to be used for filming (professional or commercial).
transit: The L train is less than 5 minutes walk from the building. Alternatively, street parking is available in front of the building.
access: Guests may also use the salt-water swimming pool, hot tub and gym in the basement of the building. All facilities are open 24/7 except the swimming pool which is open only when the lifeguard is on duty (M/W 5pm-9pm, S/Su 1:00pm-8:00pm). Washer and dryer facilities are also available in the building if needed. Free street parking is available in front of the building.
interaction: We can be as present or hands-off as you like, just let us know your preference. You'll receive your own set of keys so you can explore freely!  You will be sharing our home with us - please treat it with the same care and respect that you would your own home!
house_rules: The apartment is strictly non-smoking.  Please do not bring guests to the apartment.

host.host_about:
Hello, bonjour and 你好!

My partner Matt and I have lived in Brooklyn for over 10 years. However we spent the last two years traveling around Asia, Australia/NZ, and Europe. Some of our favorite experiences have been climbing Mt. Fuji, driving the Big Lap around Australia and eating Korean street food! We share our travel adventures on our blog, Punch Travel.

We love meeting people from around the world and look forward to connecting with you.

reviews.comments:
Space & Amenities: The photos are fully representative of the spaces offered (bedroom, bathroom, neighborhood, and amenities) in a condominium penthouse. Every area is spacious, sleek, and modern.

Hosts: Grade & Matt are friendly, and incredibly open & willing to help. Gave great restaurant suggestions, and were clearly informed about the area. They are as hands-off as need be, but also provide great company with engaging conversation (they only just recently returned from their expansive Asia trip!) As an additional note: Grace and Matt went out of their way on a Saturday afternoon to arrange a last minute booking for me and my girlfriend for that weekend. Grace rushed to Ikea (struggling with the ever despondent MTA) to prepare their space for us to the best of their efforts.

Location:
1. Plethora of restaurants with cheap, yet delicious food all within a few blocks walking radius. Supermarkets (in case of longer stay) also within a 10 minute walking radius. 
2. 3 block walk to the L train, 3 stops (10 mins) from Manhattan.
3. Quiet, low-key residential neighborhood

Great overall experience in a beautiful area with friendly hosts. Would definitely recommend!
Grace and Matt were terrific hosts and the apartment was even better than advertised. Would recommend without any reservations whatsoever.

Tout s'est très bien passé chez Grace et Mathieu, je recommande vivement leur appartement qui est très bien placé dans Williamsburg, proche du métro. La communication a été parfaite entre nous, notamment avec Mathieu, qui nous a conseillé sur pleins d'endroits à faire à NYC. Je reviendrai sans aucun problème et avec plaisir !

Clean, quiet, neat. Very easy to get to and to navigate around neighborhood. Quick walk to the metro. Our host was helpful, thoughtful and considerate. Had a positive first experience. I would highly recommend this spot!
Schöne, saubere aber für 2 Personen etwa kleine Unterkunft. Sehr gute und sichere Lage. Nähe Subway Station. Alles in allem sehr zu empfehlen

Both my husband and I really liked the host and the place.  Matt and Grace were very helpful.  The communication with her was always prompted.  They have a great hospitality mind.  The location is excellent as well as her place.  It is clean and comfortable.  What you see in the pictures are exactly where you will be staying, clean and stylish.  The private bathroom was an extra.  I would like to stay at her place again.  Thank you very much!

My boyfriend and I stayed here for 3 nights and had a great stay. 

We literally just used the apartment to sleep and shower as we had a busy schedule but it seems like a nice place to stay and work, or just hang out if you have a little more time on your hands.

The flat was really clean, the WiFi worked well and our hosts were very helpful when we kept changing our check in time. I really liked the area too - short walk to lots of bars and restaurants.

We'd definitely stay again next time we visit NYC.

Grace and Matt place made our stay in NYC a great experience. They were available at any time, Matt showed us the whole neighbourhood and few nice restaurants. Their place is great located, only few stops by subway to Manhattan. We highly recommend Grace and Matt place for visit in NYC. They are very helpful and friendly hosts. We are grateful for their assistance and possibility to stay in their home. It was our first experience with Airbnb and turned out a great way to travel for us, especially thanks to Grace and Matt. No hotel will provide you with such important knowledge about the place you are staing in and the locals. 
Thank you very much Grace and Matt!

This place is awesome! Amazing price for what you’ll get. 
Train stations are walking distance, can get to Manhattan in 20 mn. 
Place is super clean quiet and the hosts are very kind.
Provided me very helpful information on how to get around. Not a single complaint 100% recommended

Excellent emplacement, proche du métro pour rejoindre Manhattan en moins de 15 minutes. Grace et Mathieu sont tops. Et la vue sur Manhattan de  (malgré les travaux), de toutes les pièces de l'appartement est fascinante... Rapport Qualité/Prix très bon.

Grace and Matt's place was ideal.  Very clean room with a view, great shower to wash off the city at the end of the day, nice building (staff & amenities), and great location to see NY beyond Manhattan.  Public trans to/ from was easy, but I really liked how close they were to the Williamsburg bridge so I could walk directly.  Grace was kind enough to provide public trans directions from JFK and Matt was nice enough to provide tourist recommendations to my mother and I.  If you are a female traveling alone, I think their place is a great option!  Would stay again!

The photos and description are accurate.  As described, the view was partially obstructed by construction, but, boy, if you are there on a day when the construction equipment is not blocking, what a view!  Grace and Matt were great hosts, offering suggestions on what to see and do and getting to the airport, but also left us to head out quickly on one of our busier days.  The room was private, with private bath immediately across the hall.  We found the room and bath to be clean, and included the necessities.  The hosts have their own bathroom, separate from AirBNB guests.  The building was a short two or three block walk to the subway station for easy access to Manhattan.  Parking (when we first arrived with a car from Massachussetts), was tight, but pretty easy to park and unload before dropping our rental car off.  Great stay, highly recommended.

I was in town for a Hypnotherapy training in NYC and wanted to stay in Brooklyn near a friend's place. This was the perfect location (could walk to the L train easily + lots of great restaurants and a grocery store nearby) and the space was very clean. Grace was there to welcome me and get me set up with keys when I arrived and made me feel comfortable. The bed was comfortable, it was great to have my own bathroom with shower/tub, and she even gave me a shelf in the fridge for my things! I enjoyed using the indoor hot tub and pool in the building as well. Highly recommended!

Excellent space as described. Very clean, organized and comfortable. Great location, close to the L train. Plenty of restaurants and food within walking distance. This was our first time renting a room and it was perfect; great communication with host and privacy. Would definitely recommend and stay in the future.

We had a great time at Grace’s place! The location is really good, close to the L train and lots of nice bars, restaurants and stores close by. We used the pool and sauna a couple of times which was great after a long day walking around exploring NYC. We would totally recommend staying here, our experience was perfect!
Exactly what they say. It was a comfortable and enjoyable stay at their place. They went above snd beyond to accommodate us and give us our space.

Grace hosted my parents for a few days when they are in NYC. It is a lovely apartment next to a nice park. The public transportation is convenient. The room and bathroom are very clean. Very nice and helpful host. Thanks for taking care of my parents during their visit!
Great spot great location

I will admit to be hesitant when it comes to AirBnB in NY - a natural skeptic. Grace and Matt's home was beyond my expectations and not only is the home lovely but so are they. The location is absolutely perfect and easy to get anywhere in Brooklyn and Manhattan. I will definitely be staying with them on any future trips to NY!

The place is exactly as described, very nice, clean and in a good location. The host was knowledgeable about the local area and activities and was available when we needed. The only downfall is the construction on the building which is described in the listing. Even with the construction you still get and incredible view of the city. Although we personally did not use them the amenities were a nice touch to and already great place.

Our stay at Grace and Matt’s place was perfect in every way! Grace and Matt were great hosts- super welcoming and friendly, with great tips for the city. Their apartment is stylish, clean and super comfortable, and the location is great. We would stay again without a doubt, and wouldn’t hesitate to recommend their place!
We enjoyed our stay at Grace and Matt's place!  They both were very friendy and gave us some good tips.The apartment was clean and has a great location. We would definitely recommend it!
Everything exactly as described. A great building and apartment in an ideal location for exploring Brooklyn and so easy to access Manhattan. Grace and Matt are great hosts.

Very clean, great value, great location! Train stop within walking distance but also a lot of places to walk to within the neighborhood. I really loved the private bathroom, everything was super tidy and clean. Apartment is exactly as pictured and located within a secure building. Grace was so kind and easy to talk to, she was available when needed but also gave us space/privacy. Really couldn’t ask for a better host to share an apartment with for a few days!
Grace was an excellent host and provided us with privacy while being very responsive to any questions we had. The space was clean and had everything we needed to enjoy our stay. Thanks Grace!
L'appartement correspond à la description et est idealement placé.  Matthieu a été très disponible surtout pour notre arrivée tardive. Je recommande virement ce logement.

Very good location in Brooklyn about 10 min from subway stop.   It's not a large apt but Grace tries very hard not to be even noticeable when they have guests.   Modern with great exercise facility downstairs.  Lovely view of the City!
Thanks again for a great stay!
don't hesitate to choose this option, it's better than it appears, it's nice, comfortable, clean,  near to metro station, good neighborhood and so on. you wont regret!!!

We had a great stay at Grace's apartement. The skyline view was fantastic. Everything was clean and we really enjoyed being able to use the seperate bathroom. Grace and Matt were helpful and provided us with recommendations for the neighborhood area and information regarding the airport express. It is just a five minute walk to the subway. Check-in was very easy and we could text Grace anytime if we had any questions. We loved it - thank you!

An immaculate room in a great apartment. The private bathroom was an added bonus. An excellent view of the Manhattan skyline. The subway at Graham Avenue is a 5min walk away at most which made getting into Manhattan a breeze. Brunch and late night drinks at Harefield Road just around the corner was well worth it. 5*
We had a wonderful host and comfortable stay.  Thank you.
Great place to stay! Clean and quiet. Hosts are as interactive or quiet as you like. Great view of the Manhattan a midtown skyline.
Very clean airbnb. Grace gave us plenty of space to do our own thing in the apartment.

Had an amazing stay at Grace’s! The location is amazing, my boyfriend and I explored all over New York and Williamsburg was our favourite part. The apartment is super close to a ton of awesome bars, restaurants and the subway. The unit was very clean  and Grace was very accommodating. Note that if you’re bringing a vehicle to park either really early in the morning or in the evening as it was challenging to find parking during the day. Would definitely stay at Grace’s again next time I’m in New York.

This was our first visit to NYC and Grace's place was perfect for us. It was well maintained and even though we had to share the kitchen and living room area, Matt and Grace were great hosts who gave us plenty of room and freedom in the apartment. We did not feel like intruders but like visitors who were welcomed. The place was close to the subway which we easily learned to use with the help of "City Mapper" a subway app in the play store of our android phone. We could travel most any place in Manhatten within 30 minutes which we did daily. Some of the sites traveled to by subway were top of the rock, times square, pier 83 circle line cruises, Museum of Natural Science, and 911 museum. Furthermore, we were able to park in the street near the building and our vehicle was safe. We would recommend Graces and Matt's place to anyone visiting NYC.

Very clean and modern.  Hosts very gracious mostly not there or not visible  Nice bath.   L train not operating on weekend or after 11 p.m. makes for a mile walk to subway station shuttles not a good substitute. Gym very nice pool and spa nice but not always open.  Bed a bit small for 2 people.  Hosts bedroom on other side of wall from guest room.

Thank you for the great hospitality, Grace! It was definitely a pleasure to stay at your place. The apartment is close to the L subway station, making it handy to go to Manhattan and around Brooklyn. The room was comfortable enough for us, it is also fully accommodated with AC & heater. The bathroom was a good size too.
Great place! We enjoyed staying at Grace’s a lot. It was easy to communicate with her. The place is clean and has everything you need. She is very welcoming. Would recommend it for sure.

Grace and Matt are a really helpful host! Their apartment is truly bright and clean with a nice Manhattan view. The guest has their own bathroom outside of the room. The space of the room isn't big, but it's neat and homy.  Highly recommended for people who are visiting NYC!

name: Mi Casa su Casa!
summary: Make your self @ Home! It's an old building but inside the Apt is very clean, bright and comfy NYC STYLE! It's a one Bedroom apt with a nice comfortable queen bed, an eat in kitchen with all the necessary, living room with a big smart TV, Netflix and Wifi and a spotless bathroom.  Just steps away from the 168th train station (A, C and 1)  My place's good for couples or solo adventures and business travelers.  Lots of restaurants, McDonald's, Starbucks and more!!!
description: Make your self @ Home! It's an old building but inside the Apt is very clean, bright and comfy NYC STYLE! It's a one Bedroom apt with a nice comfortable queen bed, an eat in kitchen with all the necessary, living room with a big smart TV, Netflix and Wifi and a spotless bathroom.  Just steps away from the 168th train station (A, C and 1)  My place's good for couples or solo adventures and business travelers.  Lots of restaurants, McDonald's, Starbucks and more!!!

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: The place is very nice and clean.  Just hard to find a parking on the street. I will stay in his place again.

Very clean and pleasant place to stay. Very close to the entrance to the subway. Many small stores and restaurants close by.   I will plan to use this apartment again when I go back to New York!!  The communication from the owner was also great!
Paul  was awesome. He was friendly, helpful, and very accommodating. His place was clean, quiet, comfortable, and perfectly located. Will definitely stay in his place again!
Paul was wonderful. He was so easy to work with and was willing to go the extra mile and helped me with all my questions.
It was quite far from JFK airport. The bed was comfortable. The shower was not so good. It was small but comfortable. Check in and check out was easy

Large one bedroom apartment full of old-world charm. Clean, sunny and full of conveniences, such as a hair dryer, full tv service, and friendly touches such as Perrier water, cookies, crackers and tourist guide books.

We loved the neighborhood full of colorful characters. Don't forget this is uptown. The real New York is here!

Starbucks, Chipotle, great pizza and a Thai restaurant are only a few meters away. If you prefer to go for the neighborhood's latin flavors, there is plenty of choice in that area too.

Subway station is very conveniently located at the corner!

Don't miss your chance to visit the Cloisters museum and the park surrounding it, only two subway stations away.

Thank you Paul for allowing us to visit New York without having to go bankrupt in paying for a hotel!
It was very nice at Pauls. Very clean and comfortable. A great host. Will definitly stay again when I'm in NY.
A great place to stay! Close to the A line so you can shoot downtown. Paul was friendly, efficient and clean.

Paul was wonderful. He responded to every message super quickly so that any question or concern was resolved immediately. He left us yummy bath stuff and perfume samples that came in very handy! Only a block from the metro, so very convenient.
Good location easy accessibility. Quiet easy to communicate with Paul

We experienced our first Airbnb at Paul’s place and were not disappointed!   The apartment is in an excellent location with handy access to several subway lines.  It was extremely clean with ample space for two.  We were pleasantly surprised to find a beautiful Christmas tree in the living room and the whole apartment had a nice holiday fragrance - nice touches!   We would definately stay here again!
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Highly recommend staying here. Super clean, spacious, and a great location.
Paul was a great host and the location was perfect for us, and there was a subway stop on the same block which made it very convenient for moving around in the city.

We arrived early and Paul had made arrangements with a neighbor to let us in.  There were fresh flowers, new bath towels, bottles of sparkling water in the fridge and plenty of space.  The place is right around the corner from the Metro stop and down the street from our daughter's apartment.  Perfect location for our trip!  Thanks for sharing your home, Paul!

Tipico appartamento newyorkese in una zona molto tranquilla e sicura.
La SubWay è a 50 metri ed è una caratteristica importantissima.
In 20 minuti puoi arrivare in centro.
L’appartamento è carino e ben tenuto, volendo si può fare colazione  direttamente in cucina.
Bisogna prendere un po’ di confidenza con le tendine arrotolate.
Lo consiglio
Stayed at the apartment for 4 days/3 nights. Paul was friendly and accesible, the apartment has a great location, it's steps away from a train station, and the place was spotless.
Pauls place was lovely, clean and spacious. The property was close to McDonalds, supermarkets, restaurants, public transport and only a 20 train ride to Time Square. Paul was a great host :)

Great location  with the subway steps away and plenty of food option around. The bed was super comfy! I was a little surprised to find the TV in the bed room instead of the living room, but no big deal. I would totally stay here again.
Super convenient location! Amenities were superb.
much better than an image provided, room is big&clean. location is awesome.
Paul is a great host, very good at communication. You would love his place smells extremely good and it’s very clean.  Looking forward for another stay thanks Paul.
Location was great and the place was clean and cozy. We would definitely recommend!
Great place! Check-in/out process was easy and the house was clean and comfy!
Excellent apartment, clean and close to public transport. Paul was very responsive to our messages.

L'appartement de Paul est très bien situé ! A côté des métros A et C (le A est un express, du coup pour aller à Times Square, cela prend 10 à 15 min).
Le quartier est très calme, pas de bruit, très reposant.
Supermarché sur l'avenue à côté, starbuck, mc do pour ceux qui aiment dans cette même avenue, un thaï dans la rue. En revanche,  il y a un italien (Famous Famiglia) que je vous invite à éviter : trop cher pour pas grand chose ! 
L'appartement en lui même est parfait, propre, calme !!! Confortable !! Réparateur ! c'est juste un plaisir de rentrer et de pouvoir se reposer et dormir sans se poser une seule question.
Nous n'avons pas eu la chance de croiser Paul, mais il est très réactif et de bon conseil, nous n'avons eu aucun problème durant le séjour mais je reste persuadée qu'il aurait été là en cas de pépin !
Merci encore Paul !
Paul was a great host for our stay, even when I had some issues on my own Paul was there to help any way he can. Great host and amazing apartment!

summary: Private room with double bed close to Plaça Espanya.
