name: Chic & Sleek Mid-Century Styled Apt
summary: Find yourself resting in a beautiful, large, and renovated mid-century designed apartment in hip, trendy, and historic Crown Heights, Brooklyn. The apartment is four blocks (15 minute walk) from the Brooklyn Botanical Gardens and the Brooklyn Museum, Prospect Zoo, and Prospect Park. It's two blocks from Franklin Avenue which hosts a strip of bars, restaurants, coffeehouses (and Starbucks), as well as pop-up boutiques, and thrift stores.
space: The best part about this place is how at home you'll feel, as well as how conveniently located it is. My hope is for your stay to be as accommodating as possible, as if you were in your own home. The location is PRIME in terms of transportation, food and drinks, tourist attractions, activities, and nightlife.
description: Find yourself resting in a beautiful, large, and renovated mid-century designed apartment in hip, trendy, and historic Crown Heights, Brooklyn. The apartment is four blocks (15 minute walk) from the Brooklyn Botanical Gardens and the Brooklyn Museum, Prospect Zoo, and Prospect Park. It's two blocks from Franklin Avenue which hosts a strip of bars, restaurants, coffeehouses (and Starbucks), as well as pop-up boutiques, and thrift stores. The best part about this place is how at home you'll feel, as well as how conveniently located it is. My hope is for your stay to be as accommodating as possible, as if you were in your own home. The location is PRIME in terms of transportation, food and drinks, tourist attractions, activities, and nightlife. You'll have access to the entire one-bedroom apartment which includes a full kitchen, full bathroom, dining and living room space, and a large bathroom. So please make yourself at home. In the bedroom, there is a dresser with three large drawers em
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is four blocks (or a 15 minute walk) from the Brooklyn Botanical Gardens, the Brooklyn Museum, Prospect Zoo, Prospect Park, as well as Grand Army Plaza. It’s also two blocks from Franklin Avenue which hosts an über popular strip of bars, wine shops, restaurants, juice/smoothie bars, coffeehouses (and a Starbucks), as well as pop-up boutiques, and thrift stores.  Similar to Franklin Avenue, Nostrand Avenue is home to plenty of restaurants, bagel shops, Dunkin Donuts, juice bars, grocery stores, laundromats, banks, variety stores, bodegas, liquor stores, smoke shops, as well as happy hour bars. So you should find everything you could possibly need just steps or a short walk away.
transit: The 2 (local) train and 5 (express) train is two blocks away on President Street. Take a right out of the apartment building and walk down Crown Street to the corner of Nostrand Avenue. Make a left and walk two blocks up to President Street. The station entrance is on the corner.  The 3 (local) train and 4 (express) train is four blocks away on Eastern Parkway and Nostrand Avenue. Follow the directions above for the 2 & 5, but just continue past President Street until you reach Eastern Pkwy. The station will be in the median divider sidewalk. As far as parking...there is free street parking on Crown Street and other side streets. And paid hourly parking pretty much everywhere else. Please pay attention to the parking signs though as they can be tricky to understand for people new to New York City. Alternate side parking regualtions for street cleaning apply pretty much everywhere. So pay close attention to what time you will need to move your car on certain mornings.
access: You'll have access to the entire one-bedroom apartment which includes a full kitchen, full bathroom, dining and living room space, and a large bathroom. So please make yourself at home. In the bedroom, there is a dresser with three large drawers emptied out for your use. The drawers in the nightstands are also empty as most of the closets are fully occupied. Fresh towels and linen will be provided. And please feel free to help yourself to anything in the kitchen or fridge.
interaction: As I am often abroad when I make my space available, I will have a co-host to handle all your needs. Contact her directly if you have any questions or requests.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: While I appreciated Nina's place being available on short notice, I would not recommend it for those that are concerned about non-intimidating neighborhoods or their absolute safety.  Both nights we were greeted by 8-10 guys hanging our around the entrance of the building, some smoking marijuana, making comments to us as we entered.  I will say once inside the apartment we felt much safer and the accommodations made were commensurate with the price charged.

Nina was a nice host. We stayed for 5 days in New York. Ninas apartment is located in Brooklyn not far away from the next subway station. The apartment was clean, with enough space and a good equipment.
Great host and great place!
Nina's place was very comfortable and nice inside. We had very easy communication!

Nina's place is great-- cozy with plenty of space, super easy access to multiple trains, and there's great food and cool things to do right in the area as well. The apartment itself feels very homey, and has all the amenities you need. There were a couple snafus with keys and whatnot, but Nina and her co-host were both super responsive and friendly and made us feel very comfortable. I certainly recommend!

Nina doesn’t communicate. AirBnB had dates available and the place was actually unavailable. This has happened before and I am completely understanding to this and will just book another place but the host tells me that the place was not available. I made numerous attempts to contact Nina but nothing. I received the check in instructions and it wasn’t until I sent my 6th message saying I was outside freezing and trying to locate keys that someone responded. I ended up having to book last minute another place but lost $250 tickets to a broadway show I was planning to see for months trying to figure out where I was going to stay. The really irritating part was that all someone had to do wax let me know the pace wasn’t available and I would have made another reservation, but the time to do that is not when I am supposed to arrive. Communication. Is. Key. Also, I didn’t stay here so I don’t know the state of the interior but the check-in process was the worst part of the New York trip.

name: Charming Private Room in the heart of East Village
summary: Have a magical NYC experience in this enchanting hidden gem, nestled right in the heart of East Village! Only steps away from restaurants, shops, and the historic Lower East Side, such as Union Square, Soho (great shopping), NOHO, Brooklyn Bridge, Chinatown, Little Italy, unique parks and so much more..
space: The apartment is multi level! Your cozy sanctuary is located on the lower floor of the space and gives both a private and togetherness vibe, as you are welcome to enjoy all of the common spaces! Those include the kitchen, two bathrooms, the living room, and even our diamond in the rough backyard!
description: Have a magical NYC experience in this enchanting hidden gem, nestled right in the heart of East Village! Only steps away from restaurants, shops, and the historic Lower East Side, such as Union Square, Soho (great shopping), NOHO, Brooklyn Bridge, Chinatown, Little Italy, unique parks and so much more.. The apartment is multi level! Your cozy sanctuary is located on the lower floor of the space and gives both a private and togetherness vibe, as you are welcome to enjoy all of the common spaces! Those include the kitchen, two bathrooms, the living room, and even our diamond in the rough backyard! The garden is welcome to enjoy but just no parties in consideration for our neighbors. You are welcome to use all the appliances in the kitchen, living room and 24/hour access to washer and dryer for clothes. Love hostessing and making people feel welcome! Always available for recommendations with restaurants, fun, where to explore, etc! The neighborhood is my favorite in the city and steps awa
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is my favorite in the city and steps away from anything your heart desires!
transit: We are located closest to the M, F, Z and J train. Walking distance to the N, Q,R,W,4,5, 6, AND L
access: The garden is welcome to enjoy but just no parties in consideration for our neighbors. You are welcome to use all the appliances in the kitchen, living room and 24/hour access to washer and dryer for clothes.
interaction: Love hostessing and making people feel welcome! Always available for recommendations with restaurants, fun, where to explore, etc!
house_rules: - smoking is allowed in the backyard - Check in time is flexible

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
"Life is either a daring adventure, or nothing at all." 

Hello everyone! 
My name is Sahar and I love traveling, music, food, and good vibes! Looking for other fun travelers to enjoy my beautiful apartment located in the heart of the East Village.
Enjoy my garden oasis while experiencing  wonderful NYC right outside the door.
We are located walking distance to Union Square, SOHO (great shopping), Brooklyn Bridge, Little Italy, Lower East Side, Chinatown, beautiful parks, bars, restaurants, artsy clubs and many more.  Happy to help with suggestions and information about restaurants, transportation, sight seeing and many hidden gems. 
Look forward to hosting you on your next adventure!

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 6 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

I had such an amazing stay with Talia! Getting to the place and check-in was easy, apartment is on the first floor with beautiful backyard that lights up at night, it has very cool tiki bar there too so it's nice to hang out there. Room and bathroom were clean and cozy. Less than a block away there are plenty of shops, restaurants and bars - always fun atmosphere! I absolutely loved having Talia around - she is very friendly, accomodating and fun! I felt like I was staying with best friend :) definitely staying with her again when I'm back in NY. Thank you, Talia ;)

Super great hosts in the best location in NYC! 
Than you very much for your great friendly hospitality!

All the best,

Luigi
Great and fun location. Safe, quiet, clean  and private.
Great location for us.
Nice place..great location...

I really enjoyed my stay at this location! Talia was a wonderful hostess, very friendly / helpful and the place was exactly the way it was described in the profile. Plenty of things to do in the area as far as food / drinks / clubs / shops goes, and there are subway stations within walking distance. I will definitely stay at Talia's place again when I'm in NY and you should to if you are traveling here! Thanks!

Loved the spaciousness and comfort of the place. You have your own (comfy) bedroom and bathroom. The kitchen is essentially yours and the living room with its great couch and cable TV provide a nice place to relax after your day. I stayed here to break up my commute to NYC for some late nights and the place provided me a private and relaxed residence for three nights. I did meet Talia and she was super friendly and gracious. Little touches like toiletries, apples, and a/c really made me feel welcome. Thanks for making me your guest for 3 nights!

Talia's home is a safe haven. The space is nicely designed, the yard is a revelation, the fairy lights and greenery make it look magical. The room and the separate washroom were spotless and welcoming, and Talia was kind enough to provide all kinds of toiletries, even a separate loofah! 

I had access to the fridge and the coffee machine, and Talia spared no effort to make me feel like I was an old friend visiting. She is an amazing person, the kind you rarely meet, but become dear friends with, before you leave. Don't think twice, this is your best bet in East Village!
My partner and I had a great stay on short notice with Sahar and Talia. Beautiful home with great hospitality -- would definitely recommend!
The nicest hosts ever, friendly, kind, thoughtful.

The room I stayed in at Talia's place was large and comfortable and in a fantastic location in the East Village. Talia is very friendly and accommodating and the room offered is a great value for the price and location!

Huge room, really comfortable bed, Bathroom was great, very gracious and helpful host with anything I needed. Extremely Clean, outdoor space. All around amazing experience. Would definitely stay here again.

Our stay at Sahar and Talia's place was great. It was exactly what I was expecting, as they have great reviews, but maybe even a bit better. Most importantly: the bedroom was spacious and clean, the bed was really comfortable, we slept great. bathroom/shower was also good and clean. Sahar was so sweet and extremely responsive at all times. also accommodated us last minute. great stay, would recommend.

Sahar was very easy to communicate. She waited for me to check in and made sure I could operate the doors before she left for party. And even when she's at the party, she replied to my text messages very promptly. I slept very well that night.

The place was spacious, exactly as described, and semiprivate.
Sahar was so helpful and flexible in regards to check in and out times. 
The location is really fantastic - incredibly close to a great bar scene, Chinatown and more.
Highly recommended place to stay for NYC visits on a budget :)
Accommodating and friendly, the spot was great. Quick walk to a subway station that can get you almost anywhere in the city. Recommended.

I would recommend this place! Sahara and talia are great hosts and really easy to keep in touch with and very flexible to accommodating to your needs! Really close to cool restaurants and awesome spots. Love the east village & loved the space ❤️
I loved the place, which was clean and well located, the apartment had all I needed, and the multilingual Talia was a great host.

If you’re looking for a clean, comfortable, affordable and convenient spot in the LES, then this is the spot for you.  Talia was a wonderful hostess- friendly, knowledgeable, and helpful- without being overbearing.  The neighborhood is great, (the corner store makes a KILLER egg sandwich if you don’t feel like cooking), and there’s an awesome boutique wine / liquor store right around the corner.  The linens, towels and entire place was clean, comfortable and just as advertised.  The expresso maker was a great touch, and the whole experience was wonderful.  I’ll be back for sure

A lovely ,perfect & quiet stay in a vibrant Neighbourhood. Sahar & Talia were great hosts. Apt was clean & tidy. It was fully loaded with all amenities. You literally have the whole apt to yourself. It was as mentioned on bnb. A few minutes walk to F 2nd Ave subway. Highly recommended & would definetly stay again.
Great location and very quiet and stylish space!
Had a great stay!
I had a great stay at Sahar and Talias place. Perfect location, spacious and clean. Highly recommendable!
Great place, great hosts, and wonderful hospitality.  I highly recommend the corner deli for their breakfast sandwiches.  Very friendly, affordable and delicious.
I felt like a friend to these two;  they were gracious and personable.  A good room and easy access.

Love this place. Very very quiet and a private bathroom. Perfect if you need to be up and out early in the morning. East third is fascinating — upright citizens brigade. Wild thing theatre. Hell’s angels Club House. Lots of bars and restaurants with affordable happy hours. Walking distance from tenement museum. New museum. Whitney museum. High line. Chelsea market. Public theatre. And so much more. Hope to return and stay longer.

Excellent hosts that made our overnight stay in the village a great experience. Very fast communication, and clean and private bedroom and bathroom. I will be looking to stay again next time I travel up from Philadelphia.
Thanks again!

La pase muy bien en la casa de Sahar y Talia. Fueron muy amables y respetaron mi espacio. Al llegar tuvieron todo tipo de detalles para conmigo, un baño y habitación muy completos. Tenía acceso a toda la cocina, heladera completa, living y jardín, además de un bonito baño privado, con una ducha increíble. Son muy respetuosas y atendieron todas mis necesidades. Las recomiendo. Un beso grande para las dos y ojalá nos volvamos a ver!!!

Sahar and Talia were very nice, gracious hosts.  They gave me lots of local tips and were very easy to get along with.
This is a great spot in East Village. It’s a private room and bathroom, with a nice backyard. It’s quite the gem in the heart of the city.
I highly recommend staying here!
Great location ! Everything that you need is at walking distance. Great hospitality. Sahar and Talia both are very respectful and generous. Will definitely stay on our next visit NYC.
This was my first time using Airbnb, and I couldn't have asked for a better experience. Fantastic accommodations with a pair of fantastically accommodating hosts.

Sahar and Talia are amazing hosts. They made me feel welcome before I even stepped into their place, and although I only stopped for one weekend I left feeling like I'd stayed with old friends. The area is vibrant with tons to do, and the flat was clean and homely. Thanks again
Nice people, nice vibe, cool place in the LES

Sahar and Talia were amazingly friendly and helpful to me. They made the check in/check out process simple, gave thoughtful tips for where to eat, and opened up their home to me. They’re fantastic hosts and I wouldn’t hesitate to stay with them again.
Quiet and comfortable,  easy stay for 2 nights.  Easily reachable hosts.  Nice and big  backyard esp in new york city.  Walkable distance to several good places to eat.  Overal great experiance.
Great location and reasonably priced.
Sahar was super nice and friendly. Great air bnb.
Sahar was extremely helpful and welcoming when I arrived. I would totally spend the night there again. Thank you Sahar.

Sahar and Talia are great, kind hosts. Very warm and relaxed and made me feel at home. Location in the East Village was just right for my needs - not too busy, but not sleepy either. Great value, would stay again!
Wonderful NYC spot because location, location, location!  Also, not a walk up which is fantastic being NYC plus has an amazing giant backyard.  Sahar was so sweet and responsive.  A great value.
Great location , clean (old like much of NYC), safe and very friendly hosts. Garden is a pleasant surprise. Sahar is a star.  Would recommend.

If you're looking for a convenient location with cool/funky decor, a backyard, and a magical garden, this is the airbnb for you! Sahar went above and beyond to ensure my stay was comfortable and I had everything I needed. She was open and friendly, offered me full access to anything in her fridge, and made me feel like family. I would highly recommend this place and would definitely stay here again on my next visit to NYC.
It was very easy to check in and there was great communication. It was clean, comfortable and private
Appartement in local area

Sahar was extremely kind, and very eager to make my stay comfortable. The apartment is not luxurious (it was a bit old, not in perfect shape) but it was clean and very functional, and in a great location. I'd recommend it if you're looking for a place to sleep comfortably in NYC.

The hosts are lovely and so kind.  I arrived early after a redeye from the West coast and they worked with me regarding the check in time.
The bed was incredibly comfortable and the apartment is like a little Oasis in Manhattan.  Their backyard garden is incredible. I didn't one that was even a thing in NYC.
Love these hosts and would gladly stay there again.

A few positives. Sahar was warm and welcoming and a clear communicator. Talia nonlonger lives there. Sahar’s Mother met me to help me get situated. The location is central East Village. Near lots of shops and cool restaurants. Bedroom was very simple but spacious. 

Downsides:  Bedroom is in basement underneath living area. Noise travelled Dow stairs while my host entertained guests until 1:00am. The smell is smoke wafted downstairs as well. I would not recommend this place if noise and smoking concern you. Otherwise it’s a decent deal for NYC.

Sahar's place is in the bustling East Village. A great place to explore, and the room itself provides a peaceful and cool retreat. Sahara herself is a very welcoming host, instantly making me feel at home. Would stay again!

Perfect place in East Village!
I had my own room with my own bathroom on my own floor.
Perfectly clean.
Sahar and her mom Ivonne (she was staying there in that time) were perfect hosts. So friendly and interesting. 
I guess the private bar in the garden is unique in whole downtown area.
Always again!

If you're looking for a great place in an awesome place in East Village...this is it. Sahar offers great touch, an outstanding smile, a room and a bathroom that's QUIET but the second you step out you're in the heart of East Village in New York. It's the best of both worlds; you get an Airbnb that's quiet but outside you get all of New York. The best is that Sahar is a great, friendly, communicative host, and it was funny that every time I'd leave I'd get side tracked with great twenty minute conversations with Sahar and other people that are around. It feels like home and it's personal, out of all my Airbnb stays, this had the most personal touch, and I think the value is absolutely amazing what you get out of it.

I would(and probably will!) stay here again.
Sahar is an amazing hostess.  Perfect place to stay.  Beautiful backyard, a real rarity in NYC, and warm people!

Great hospitality ! Sahar and Tania are too gentle, reactive and flexible.
Good localisation in south east manhatten with lot lot of excellent bars around
Wonderful experience!  Will definitely book again!

I had a wonderful time! Sahar is personable and made sure I had everything I needed. The room and space is cozy, and the bed is comfortable. Also, the neighborhood is also one of the best in the city. I couldn't ask for more.

I have to say this was one of my best Airbnb experiences yet. Sahar was so hospitable and friendly and went out of her way to make sure I had everything I needed. The apartment was clean. My bed was extremely comfortable. The location was great. It really felt like my home away from home. I would not hesitate to stay there again. I highly recommend it.
Great host, location and amount of space.

Great time at Sahar’s place!  She has a very trusting and genuine way about her. The location was perfect, Sahar’s communication was great! From check in stuff to just fun back and forth (logistics, local recs, etc). So friendly and accommodating! Very cool and unique back patio area to mix it up and get some air and also check the weather for the day. Good times!

Sahar's place is immaculately clean and easy to find. I love the little back yard and hope to come back in the summer.  I'd gladly go back and would like to offer my resume if you're ever looking for a live in landscaper/maintenance guy. 
Much love.
Sahar is very friendly and helpful. If you want to stay in a shared space; I can really recommend her place!
Great value for staying in NYC. Sahar was very hospitable, the bed was comfy and the room was cozy. We enjoyed our stay very much.
Great Host, Ideal location. Could not recommend any more!!
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: cozy place near central

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

name: Small, modern and cozy apartment
Newly and cozy apartment!
summary: Welcome to the paradise of cuisine: Hong Kong! Our apartment is located in the central shopping area, Mong kok. Newly decorated apartment with elevator! Guard is on duty for 24 hours.  High quality but affordable apartment!
space: Our apartment is also in perfect location if you are looking for traveling, entertainment, food and shopping places in just short walking distance. It’s also very convenient to elsewhere by the metro station just downstairs! You can  walk to Mong kok station in 10 seconds! Langham Palace is just 10 seconds’ walk away. 10 minutes by subway to Tsim Sha Tsui and Kowloon park. We have 1.5 meters bed, facilities like air conditioners, wifi, TV, refrigerator, water kettle, and useful bathroom amenities like shampoo, shower bath,  laundry detergent. But no towel, sorry. Please bring it yourself for the care of your own health. Here will be perfect choice on your stay in Hong Kong!

Most convenient to many popular places like: #Shopping malls, restaurants, convenience stores, coffee shops, studios, parks, stadiums, amusement parks, etc  #5-7 minutes’ walk to nine Long Huaren academy grass football field, Broadway Theater. #5 minutes’ walk to Yau Ma Tei. 5 minutes’ subway to Tsim Sha Tsui Shopping Center. #15 to 20 minutes by subway to Hong Kong Ocean Park, causeway bay, wan chai, about, about 13 km . #20 minutes by taxi or 40 minutes by public transportation to Hong Kong Disneyland,about 18 km.

host.host_about:
Dear guests,

Being a traveler for past few years, I was a fans of home-stay style. Very glad to share with you my properties in Hong Kong!

I am doing short term rental online and offline. Sometimes, the calendar is not very accurate because of too many sources for bookings. Just tell me what you want, we will  have many options for you!

My teams are doing great for check-in arrangement. No worry if you don't know well about Hong Kong!

Thanks

Hi,大家好我是Visnon. 

我们喜欢旅行,爱住当地的老房子,逛当地的市场,喜欢色彩浓郁的国度,探索奇葩的民风! 

我们改造了一些老房子,并加入了有趣的想法｡ 
在分享前我们都会试住几天,确保一切安好,并在细节上做更人性化的调整｡ 

因为是老房子,它有温度又有些局限,希望能体谅它｡Visnon坚持选用五星酒店出身的专业管理团队来打理房间,使用星级酒店的床品,希望我的每个客人都能感受到放心和舒适｡ 

快来香港找我们玩吧! 
Visnon会在能力范围内Do my best for you! 
愿大家都有一个美好的假期回忆~ 

*请大家在预定的时候告诉我入住人数,大概的入住和退房时间,是来旅游还是本地居民,会不会有朋友来玩,是否带宝宝哦!

reviews.comments: We stayed at Vinson's place (2 people) for one and a half months. The place is clean and freshly renovated. The kitchen works well and the bathroom was nice too. The place is a smaller than it looks on the photos and the washing machine doesn't work which was a little bit of a hassle. There is storage space under the bed and a small table. The room has a small entrance room before you enter where you can put your shoes and which you share with two other apartments. (The photos shown are a mix of all three rooms which are similar). There was a cleaning service included every week if we asked for it. Vinson was friendly and the communication worked mostly well. The location is great, directly above Mong Kok Station.

The best part about the apartment is it’s location. It’s beside the MTR and there are many shopping, markets and food outlets around.
I’m still not used to how small HK apartments can be. 
The mini kitchen is convenient for hot drinks and heating quick meals. Not for any serious cooking else you’re room will smell.
Air conditioning is abit noisy.
Отличный вариант,расположение идеальное для шопинга
Great location.

Stay for 2.5 months.

Merits: Overall clean. Location good. Equipped with kitchen. Compensation made for a not working washing machine and wrong interior pictures.

Demerits: The bed is 1.2m only, not enough for 2 people. (wrong imformation provided and no compensation nor apology) . Communication very bad and seemed to be hiding from my complaints.  Frequent interruption of power supply for WIFI . No hangers for clothes. Not adequate partition for shower and toilet will be partially wet.
很棒的房间,距离旺角地铁站E1出口10米左右｡房间很安静,设计也很棒,设施一应俱全｡房间里还有电源转换头,插座数量和位置也很方便｡在这里度过了7天时间,非常舒适,也很有品质｡
地理位置太棒了,半夜一点下面路上还有很多行人,交通不能再方便了,下次还会选择你们的!
The apartment was small but well equipped. The location is right at the heart of Mongkok directly opp Langham Place. Will recommend the place to couples going to HK to shop!
Good place, nice location.
即在闹市区,但是不会觉得吵,因为在20层｡房间虽然小,但是一应俱全,很满意!

name: 2 Bedroom Beachfront with Parking
summary: Would you like to rent a 2 BR unit at North Steyne Manly on the Beach. The ocean is right outside your bedroom window.   Let the sounds of the ocean lull you to sleep. The balcony overlooks the pacific.
space: This apartment is on the top floor across the street from the Pacific ocean.  Views of North Steyne and Shelly beach are available.  A single parking space comes with the rental.   There are floating floors in the living areas.  The kitchen and the bathrooms are tile floors.
description: Would you like to rent a 2 BR unit at North Steyne Manly on the Beach. The ocean is right outside your bedroom window.   Let the sounds of the ocean lull you to sleep. The balcony overlooks the pacific. This apartment is on the top floor across the street from the Pacific ocean.  Views of North Steyne and Shelly beach are available.  A single parking space comes with the rental.   There are floating floors in the living areas.  The kitchen and the bathrooms are tile floors.   They will have access to the entire apartment, as well as the common areas, which feature another washer and dryer.   Cruisy beach neighborhood.  There are restaurants right next door and a surf shop.  Downtown Manly is a kilometer walk.   Also Sydney CBD can be accesed via the Manly Ferry. There are buses and also a ferry service.   I do not own a vehicle of any type and use public transit to get to work in the city daily.  Hi All this is greatest apartment that I have ever been rented.  I love this spot. The wee

notes: Hi All this is greatest apartment that I have ever been rented.  I love this spot. The weekly price applies for the entire stay duration of up to 14 days.
transit: There are buses and also a ferry service.   I do not own a vehicle of any type and use public transit to get to work in the city daily.

house_rules: Respect the neighbors Don't trash the place leave a place how you found it. No smoking inside, smoking on the balcony is fine.

host.host_about:
Ward
Manly
Ocean enthusiast
IT Weasel
Traveler

reviews.comments: Ward was really helpful from the beginning. Location is what you are getting here. The view to the ocean is amazing and it's central to everything in manly.
The location and view are amazing! Couldn't be better. Ward was very helpful and accommodating. We had a great stay in Manly!Ward was quick to respond and made us feel very welcome in his unit.
Great position and view of Manly beach from the balcony. Ward is a great guy too. Really enjoyed our stay thanks.

A fantastic location - you could not be closer to the beach and bustle of beautiful Manly. Ward was a very helpful host, answering queries promptly and kindly leaving us a fridge full of food - very helpful when travelling with small children after a long flight. The flat could do with a little TLC, but the location and the view more than make up for this. A place to kick off your shoes, grab a beer and head straight out to the surf. Fantastic cafes and restaurants nearby too. Would stay here again.

name: BEAUTIFUL Kihei Get-a-way, warm & relaxing
summary: Beautifully updated 1 bdrm condo in a very desirable area, less then 1/2 block to walk to the beach
space: Fully furnished 1 bdrm condo with many amenities.
description: Beautifully updated 1 bdrm condo in a very desirable area, less then 1/2 block to walk to the beach Fully furnished 1 bdrm condo with many amenities. Full access to amazing pool, jacuzzi and pavilion with bbq & full kitchen I am not on-site but have an on-site mgr to help you with anything you may need during your stay.  You will be given her name & contact information prior to your arrival My condo is within walking distance to the beach, grocery store, several shops & restaurants, as well as medical clinics.  The Catholic Church is right across the street If you want to independently get around to visit places on the island, I recommend renting a car!  However, there is a Maui bus line that can be used Please NOTE that ALL taxes are included.  There is a washer & dryer available right outside my condo for nominal fee!  You will have a key to access

house_rules: Guest requested to do their own dishes (dishwasher) and daily maintain unit Can have gatherings at pool pavilion (see rules posted on reserving area)

host.host_about:
Aloha!
Im Sandi, my husband & I are the owners of this condo!  I am retired after 33 yrs of working in Supply Chain Management !  I have been married 48 yrs.  We have three adult sons, two daughter-in-laws and four BEAUTIFUL grandchildren!  I love to travel in my RV, spend lots of time with my family and LOVE being a Grandma!
This condo is our home away from home and I LOVE spending time there and sharing it with others when I'm not!  I take great pride in keeping it nice, comfy and affordable!  (my posted rates INCLUDE Maui's 14.41% tax rate!)
When I come to Kihei I absolutely LOVE spending time outdoors snorkeling, hiking and just enjoying ALL the beauty of the island.  I chose KGE(Kihei Garden Estates) based on it's location and how easy it is to access all the sights of Maui!  We have a very relaxed and non-commercial complex for our guests enjoyment.  I am very proud of my "home away from home" and LOVE sharing it with my guests!!!  Life is a vapor of smoke!  Enjoy every moment with your loved ones while you can!!

reviews.comments: What a find! Cute, nicely-laid-out one-bedroom apartment with everything you need, including a dishwasher, and TVs in both the living room and the bedroom. Ultra clean. Nice big shower. Quiet street, but walking distance to a nice shopping area (housing the excellent Maui Pie Company) and a block from the beach. Highly recommend.

Highly recommend this place if you plan to stay on Maui. The area is very quiet, yet scenic and close to everything. The beach is literally a 20 second walk from the place. Other stores are located near by, very short distance. There are events going on around the area as well at times, so everything is a walking distance from the condo. The condo itself was very comforting and the host provided many things that you need.
There is a beach to watch the sunset right next to it
This condo was much better than the pictures made it look! Very close to the beach and the pool and hot tub were great!
Very clean and updated.  Great location, and just steps away from a beautiful beach.
The place is lovely and cozy, and very spacious. The descriptions are just as described and my family had a wonderful time here.
Wonderful place, close to the beach, quiet and relaxing vacation, hope to be back soon!

We loved staying at Sandi's condo. We appreciated the location, next door to a nice grocery store and a short residential black away from a shallow and sheltered beach. While the condo itself is older, the kitchen, floors, and bathroom have both been updated. The kitchen is fully equipped. The lanai area is semi-private, but the neighbors are very close. It's a non-smoking association, but they do provide a smoking area (it's in the parking lot or you can go off property). The nice thing about that is that you don't have smoke coming into your space. That's especially nice because we had the doors and windows open the whole time we were there. The grounds are groomed and immaculate. I wish that I could tell you about the pool and hot tub, but with the beach so close we never had an occasion to make use of them. Kihei itself has some fun shopping (great quilt shop, Coconut's, craft fair) and plenty of grocery stores to choose from. Sandi also provided beach chairs, a couple of boogie boards, and two beach towels. Since we were there for ten days it was nice to have a second set of bath towels. The washer and dryer were just outside the condo and reasonably priced. We would definitely stay at Sandi's condo again.
Great area, great value, great host. Highly recommended.

Sandi's place is right across the street from the beach, super close to lots of grocery stores and restaurants, and has plenty of parking. Conveniently located to plenty of sights in Maui. All the amenities make staying there very comfortable. Plenty of towels and extras like beach chairs and a cooler. The value is excellent. The bathroom and shower are super clean and our stay was all the better thanks to being at this Airbnb location. Thank you Sandi and Brenda!

Awesome host! Sandi made sure we had everything we needed. Great communication. The place was simple with no frills but very clean and functional. The proximity to the beach was priceless. The grocery store and restaurants were all walking distance.

My three friends and I stayed in Sandi’s place for 10 days and it was amazing! The condo had a bed and a pull out couch and easily accommodated the four of us. Less than a minute walk to the beach and to the grocery store! Very central location and even without a car we found it easy to navigate the island. Very clean and Sandi was quick to reply if we had any issues or questions. Would 100% recommend! Thanks Sandi!

As advertised, Sandi's place is in a great location to explore the island from.  Very clean and check-in was effortless.   The entire complex is well maintained and beautifully landscaped with a nice pool and hot tub area.  I was impressed with the community grill and eating area as well with everything provided to have a group meal grilled on the spot while you and your group enjoy the pool area.

Easy to walk to the beach less than a block away and also walking distance to all kinds of shopping and eating options as well.

We took full advantage of the beach chairs and umbrella that Sandi had available.  Well stocked with bath towels, beach towels and additional linens.

It was so nice to come home from a day of exploring to a clean, central location that was safe and well-stocked with anything we might need.

Thank you Sandi!

I'm a big believer in sharing reviews, so I hope that this will be helpful.  Sandi was very helpful before I booked, answering questions about how her place would be for my disabled son.  (It was great for him.) The place itself was AWESOME -- very high-end kitchen and bathroom finishes. The complex was well-kept, quiet, and we met some incredible people nightly at the pool. The reason I gave it a four instead of a five was because nothing is perfect.  In this case, there were 2 TVs and a DVD player, but only 12 basic channels and 2 old Meryl Street movies in a cabinet.  Bring your own DVDs, or a ROKU, and you'll be set!  Second, a yard or so from the back patio was a 6 foot high Bougainvillea that separated the unit from a somewhat noisy street.  Combined with the patio above and the overhang in front, the unit was a bit dark and didn't have any view at all.  At this price point I found you get either a small ocean view with a crappy interior, or a nice interior without a view, but not both.  So just decide what is most important to you personally.

Thank you Sandi for a wonderful stay in an apartment that was super clean, comfortable and relaxing.  The pool was great and gardens beautiful.  The location was close to everything we needed including shops, restaurants and the local supermarket with the beach a very short walk.   We didn't have a car but the city bus stop was 2 minutes walk away providing us easy access from Wailea to Maalaea Harbour and everything in between.  We really thank Brenda as well for quick responses to the couple of questions we had (we now know what a water sensor alarm is).  Thanks again.
This place was a great place to stay. It was super close to the beach and everything you can hope to do was well within driving distance! We loved it there!

Sandi's place is really great! It's nicely upgraded, super clean. Easy access and closely located to beautiful beach. Everything was as described, very functional and over the top on most everything. Access to shopping, restaurants, and rentals and beach are all in walking distance. I especially liked that her condo is on lower level, no stairs or excessive walking to get to it. I hope I can return to her place. Highly recommend
Loved this place! My husband loved how we could walk to the beach every night for the sunset, and then end our night at the jacuzzi. Excellent!

Would definitely recommend to anyone staying in Maui. Great location close to beach access and pool. Little extras like beach toys and boards for kids. Quiet private patio to relax on with hose to rinse off after a beach visit. Perfect for families or quiet couple get away.
Very nice, clean condo with all the amenities you could need. Great location in  Kihei close to beach, grocery store and many restaurants. I would definitely recommend it!
Awesome stop in Kihei. Fully equipped condo, perfectly clean and situated one minute from the beach, grocery store and a great coffee shop. Thanks Sandi!

Sandi’s place is amazing. It is close to the beach, literally less than a minute walk and a lovely beach is right there for you to enjoy. The place is very clean, has everything you need and we had a blast. We had a great time and would love to go back, just no Hurricane Lane this time. Wishing all the people in Maui a speedy recovery after Lane.
A nice, comfortable place. Enjoyed barbequed dinner at the community bbq's by the pool. Very close to beach and good location for watching sunsets.
Great place to stay!

A really great apartment, super close to the beach, perfect for watching the sun set. Whilst we were there tropical storm Olivia hit but Sandi kept in contact with what to do and to check in we were ok.
The apartment was lovely and clean and a great space to be in after a day of adventures.

Sandi’s condo is in a perfect location with many restaurants and stores near by. There is a beach within walking distance where you can watch the beautiful sunset. The condo is spacious, making it perfect for 4 people. The tenant was great, super easy to communicate with! I would certainly recommend this condo to anyone who is looking to stay on the island of Maui.
Very nice place, better then the pictures, well located. Beach gear appreciated.

Sandi’s place is perfect for a quiet getaway. Easy walk to the beach, a great park with open space and picnic pavilion just a mile down the road. Well appointed and great for a two week stay away from the crazy tourist resorts. We would love to come back and you will too

Sandi's condo is a great place to stay.  The complex is smaller and away from the more crowded Kam beaches.  Perfect beach within just a few steps from the condo - super easy access.  Condo is convenient to pool as well.  Grocery store and Azeka shopping center are just a 3 minute walk and post office is right around the corner.  Sandi provides beach chairs, shade umbrella and plenty of pool/showering towels.  Sandi was also VERY quick to respond to inquiries - all in all, a GREAT experience and highly recommended

This condo was the perfect place for a week in Hawaii for our young family. We were close to everything. The outdoor kitchen in the pool area was clean and beautiful and the pictures here just don’t do the space justice. Thank you Sandi and Brenda!

name: Crows Nest Family Apartment - 10 mins to CBD
summary: Occupying a prized north-eastern corner setting and dominated by sweeping views that stretch from St Leonards to the harbour and the distant eastern suburbs, this immaculate designer residence is unrivalled in taste or distinction. Awash with natural light, this is low maintenance luxury living at its finest. Good for business travelers, family with kids, and couples weekend break. Deck on roof can be used for fireworks viewing.
space: A premier home for the astute investor. Expansive open plan entertaining with an enclosed balcony Deluxe kitchen boasts marble benches and gas appliances Generous master complete with walk-in robe and an ensuite Study nook, wide polished floors, European laundry, intercom Ducted air conditioning, secure parking and common lounge Absolute peace and privacy, great tenants, chic bathrooms  Two king size bed and one large size crib, also a floor mattress for two extra adults in the lounge room A stroll to transport and cafes, just minutes to the city centre
description: Occupying a prized north-eastern corner setting and dominated by sweeping views that stretch from St Leonards to the harbour and the distant eastern suburbs, this immaculate designer residence is unrivalled in taste or distinction. Awash with natural light, this is low maintenance luxury living at its finest. Good for business travelers, family with kids, and couples weekend break. Deck on roof can be used for fireworks viewing. A premier home for the astute investor. Expansive open plan entertaining with an enclosed balcony Deluxe kitchen boasts marble benches and gas appliances Generous master complete with walk-in robe and an ensuite Study nook, wide polished floors, European laundry, intercom Ducted air conditioning, secure parking and common lounge Absolute peace and privacy, great tenants, chic bathrooms  Two king size bed and one large size crib, also a floor mattress for two extra adults in the lounge room A stroll to transport and cafes, just minutes to the city centre FREE pa
neighborhood_overview: Just metres from Crows Nest's vibrant cafes, restaurants and shops, public transport options to the city and Chatswood abound.
notes: Just remember to relax, enjoy and have fun! :)
transit: - Buses from front door - Basement parking - 10 minutes drive from Sydney City
access: FREE parking and WiFi included. Common rooftop area to see the bridge and fireworks.
interaction: We love to eat! There are so many nice food eateries in Sydney. We love to share our experience with you. If you need recommendation on food, entertainment, attractions, nightlife, activities etc. Just ask, we will be here to support you to ensure you have an unforgettable stay.
house_rules: Welcome to our warm and comfortable apartment. We want you to feel like home, so please make yourself comfortable and settle in. - No smoking anywhere in the unit, we love the smell of Sydney's fresh air; - The house is always spotless as we are a very proud home owner. I love to socialise but privacy is also respected and assured. Happy to give you directions & ideas about touring, eating out and places to see in Sydney. - No pets, we love pets but unfortunately it's a building requirement; - Loss of keys will incur a charge of $300, sorry it's building charge; - Do not touch the fire sprinkler, it'll cause the units above and below as well as units around to sprinkle. After that, it'll alarm the fire brigade. The cost of the fire brigade visit is a minimum of AUD2200 and the repair of the entire unit's water damage, it'll be one very expensive bill; - You agree that, although unlikely, we may need to access the apartment from time to time during your stay, e.g., to attend to repairs

host.host_about:
Hi, we are Rachael & William. We have been living in this lovely city of Sydney for more than half of our lives. 

We like trying out different cuisines, we love travelling and we also enjoy having a quite relaxing time at home. 

I have had many great experiences travelling and I am hoping that our guests staying in our places will experience the same excitement and magic in Sydney.

We'd love to meet you from the other side of the world and we'd love to talk with you about interesting things we had in this city. We look forward to hosting you soon!

reviews.comments: Great place , very modern, clean , easy to communicate with the hosts , definitely worth a stay

We found this apartment to be really wonderful to stay in! The view is amazing (although not the water view shown in the photo, which must have been taken from the south side of the building). But wonderful all the same. The apartment faces north You can see a little bit of ocean in the distance ,beyond Manly I guess.  We looked forward to coming home to the apartment every day. So comfortable. It helps to pull the curtains a bit going out for the day so it doesn’t get too hot. There is a great cafe with friendly staff, and good coffee and food in the courtyard below.  It’s called Springtime. There is a bus-stop to shoot into town in about 7 minutes almost directly across the road. Lots of restaurants nearby including a very colourful Mexican one. 
The directions  to get in if   you are driving, need to be clearer. And it helps to know that it is on level 11  and that the attachment on the key needs to be held near a small box to make the lift go to your level. 
All in all a magnificent and thoroughly enjoyable stay, and really comfortable beds.

Great apartment I’m a great location. Was just a bit disappointed at the lack of utensils in the kitchen and also we clearly stated that we needed a 3rd mattress however although being told there was one there it wasn’t anywhere to be found. Our 4th guest had to sleep on a cot mattress for 2 nights.
I truly recommend this place.
Perfect apartment in a great location and is equipped with cot, change table, high chair and toys for small children.
Good location,bus stop in front of building, 5 mins walk to wolli .

Wonderful space. Very clean and comfy. Great for kids. Quiet but with amenities and restaurants all very close. Could have used a few more plates and cups, but that’s being picky. We’d absolutely stay here again and recommend it to families.

We enjoyed staying in Crows Nest - it's close to the main hub of the suburb and a quick walk to trains to get into the city.  Also, the memory foam mattresses were really comfortable - everyone was saying they slept really well!
It’s a beautiful apartment for families with kids. We truly enjoyed our stay and highly recommend this place. The communication was great and we had everything we needed. Thanks Will and Rãchël
The apartment is great, very spacious, comfortable and in a great location for tourism or business.
Great location and a lovely apartment with fantastic views. Recommend staying here
Very spacious apartment with a huge TV in the living room and v comfortable beds :)
Fantastic location. Close to bus and trains. Nice french pastiserie nearby.
nice place for family with young kids
Great and convenient spot to Crows Nest, North Sydney and the Mater Hospital. Clean apartment and comfortable beds.
整体来说还不错 位置稍微有点偏
Had a great stay!
Convenient location
There are some things you will be pleased with here but the cleanliness, clutter, kitchen facilities, bedding, crockery and plates will not be what you will enjoy, I'm sorry.

Great location and lovely 2 bedroom apartment.

Limited storage for guests, and kitchen essentials was limited.

Would stay again!!
Excellent, will definitely stay again when I am back.

Would be an ideal one or two night stop over. Lovely beds/sofa and toys for kids. Very little space if you wish to unpack any clothes (even if just one person) not much kitchen ware if you want to prepare meals. So I wouldn't recommend for longer stays although our family of 5 managed for a week.
Will and Rachel were amazing. So helpful when we lost our car keys. We didn’t have kids but this is the best place for kids under 6.

Well located but terribly run.
The keys were given to me 4h late.
The entire place was very dirty.
Not even vacuumed.
No Space for hanging or even shelf’s for personal staff ,all full of hosts things like if they were living there.
Floor in the living area full of plastic toys,which were always in the way.
Kitchen sticky, the walls and all.
Pantry full of half started smelly ingredients.
Under the sofas and the rest of furniture dust,dirt,lost items including old passport,combs etc.
Dryer in the laundry with dirt from weeks and weeks.
Balcon-more of the same -dirt and storage for the host .
I have pictures to show.
Never will I look at this place again and I would not recommend it to anyone who doesn’t like filth.

Hi,
I’m very much aligned with Bojena feedbacks (last guest in jan)! Her comments are Not “unfair” Will and Rachel ...sorry! I confirm, This place is not well run. Maybe the location and the appartement itself are great. But cleanliness please!!!! And There is no excuse of early checkin this time....What is it then ? 
Anyway, as hosts you have the responsibility of providing a clean and tidy place . And your place is not! 
I had to clean the place for 2 hours to make it acceptable. I had to do a laundry of my sheets on arrival. The sheets were not even the right size to cover the mattress. We decide not to use the kitchen appliances as they were dirty and had to do take away and restaurant every time! The fridge was so dirty I refused to put food in it. I had to vacuum the floor....and on the top of that they didn’t had any hair dryer (the host asked me to buy one and ask for refund. Yes sure, I’m on holidays and I have to take care of the equipment of your appartement Will...).
I have past experiences with Rb’nb that have been fantastic! This experience is such a disappointment in regards.... I’ll make sure to look better at the guests comments in the future.
I do not recommend this appartement.
Alice
Great location. A comfortable stay. Would recommend without hesitation
great location with lots of good restaurant around. close to shopping and to the city. some issues with the cleanliness but nothing major. will stay there again in the future
挺不错的,推荐哦

name: Spacious 3 BDR APT Brooklyn Sleeps 12!
summary: This spacious, clean, and completely furnished 3-bedroom apartment located in Flatbush, Brooklyn and is only minutes away from the 2 and 5 express subway trains, making access to Manhattan and surrounding Brooklyn a breeze! Close to Barclay's Center, King's Theatre, Brooklyn Museum, and Williamsburg. Perfect for small groups or families with a full kitchen and your own private outdoor rooftop patio!
space: Please check our reviews to learn more about our spacious apartment only 30 minutes away from Midtown, Manhattan!  Our fully furnished 3-bedroom apartment is on the second level of a two-story home. Each bedroom is equipped with a queen size mattress and a queen size blow up mattresses are available for additional guests. The full-size kitchen is stocked with all of your cooking and dining needs. The private outdoor rooftop patio is a divine escape in the spring and summer months! There is one  bathroom with bathtub and shower. NOTE: To check the pricing of your intended stay at my apartment, you can enter the dates you are interested in along with the number of guests and click "book it," the next screen will show you the final price before you process payment and confirm. Check out time is normally 11 am, but the timing is flexible. Please inform me if you have specific needs. Check-in time is typically 3 PM, but again the timing is flexible. Please message me to discuss and I'd be h
description: This spacious, clean, and completely furnished 3-bedroom apartment located in Flatbush, Brooklyn and is only minutes away from the 2 and 5 express subway trains, making access to Manhattan and surrounding Brooklyn a breeze! Close to Barclay's Center, King's Theatre, Brooklyn Museum, and Williamsburg. Perfect for small groups or families with a full kitchen and your own private outdoor rooftop patio! Please check our reviews to learn more about our spacious apartment only 30 minutes away from Midtown, Manhattan!  Our fully furnished 3-bedroom apartment is on the second level of a two-story home. Each bedroom is equipped with a queen size mattress and a queen size blow up mattresses are available for additional guests. The full-size kitchen is stocked with all of your cooking and dining needs. The private outdoor rooftop patio is a divine escape in the spring and summer months! There is one  bathroom with bathtub and shower. NOTE: To check the pricing of your intended stay at my apartmen
neighborhood_overview: Flatbush is a multi-cultural neighborhood in the heart of Brooklyn. What makes this area unique is the original architecture and the influence of a vastly diverse array of ethnicities who call this middle-class family neighborhood their home.  To the non-New Yorker exploring Brooklyn may seem like navigating a foreign country, but I encourage everyone to explore with an open mind as there is much more than meets the eye! The area is very safe both day and night and has a  neighborhood feel. Our street is lined with small restaurants and bodega's offering the best in no-frills culturally diverse cuisine. I would dare say that this area of Flatbush is a diamond in the rough to those who truly want a real and amazing Brooklyn experience!  You will find shopping markets for basic essentials right down the block along with a laundry mat only a few blocks away. The area is also very quiet aside from the sound of vehicles, which is almost unavoidable anywhere you travel in the five boroughs.
notes: •	ENJOY your stray with us! •	#HASHTAG#_ABSOLUTELY_NO_PARTYING! •	#Hashtag#_SERIOUSLY!!_NO_PARTYING! •	There is a security camera at the building entrance for our safety •	NO smoking •	We expect our guests to respect night time with quiet hours starting at 11 PM until 7 AM; •	Respect neighbors and our lovely neighborhood!
transit: Average 6-minute walk to the 2/5 trains and 2 minutes to the bus. Average of 30 mins to Manhattan and only a 12-minute train ride to Barclays Center, Prospect Park and Brooklyn Museum where it is easy to connect to other trains. 10-minute walk to Kings Theatre. Touristy Williamsburg is nearby where there is plenty to see and do!
access: The whole apartment! + private entrance
interaction: I am available anytime by phone or text to help you with any questions!

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: Sherry's place was comfortable and spacious. It's great for families and groups of people who are on a budget. The beds are comfortable and queen sized. The fridge was stocked with water bottles and some breakfast items on our arrival. The place is also on walking distance to the subway station. Even though the place doesn't offer parking, street parking was still available right outside the door of the apartment on selected times. Moreover, even though Sherry wasn't there to greet us, Dawn, the co-host, was a phone call away and ready to show us around the apartment and answer any queries or issues we had with the apartment and was generally cooperative and polite.

Hote trés disponible et qui répond rapidement aux questions posées. cependant pour se rendre en centre ville en metro il faut compter 50min, et en été il y fait très chaud et les climatiseurs sont extrêmement bruillant.
The apartment was clean. The neighborhood felt safe and Sherry was there to help with whatever we needed. Buses were at the door and only a 6 min walk to the subway station.

No cumplió con las expectativas del apartamento en si. Faltan muchos detalles en especial cocina y baño, utencilios de cocina como ollas y cafetra mas garnde ya que eramos 8 personas. La comunicacion buena y ella trató de suplir las falencias.

A great affordable place to stay in good location off the beaten path. A true Brooklyn experience - minus the gentrification: You'll find old guys squabbling amongst themselves outside the corner bodega, families and churches on every corner, and too many good Caribbean restaurants nearby. Close to the 2/5 trains with a grocery store only 10 min away by walking. Laundromat only 5 min away. Kitchen has all the essentials to cook while there. Sherry was also a very attentative host and went above and beyond to accommodate me.

Sherry was very nice, flexible and responsive! The apartment was just as it is described. We were 4 people and it was plenty of room for us.
The subway is pretty close to the place witch is great. The neighbourhood is not so friendly though and Friday night was super loud. But it was only that one night :)
Good fit for three people

Sherry was great and very friendly, very helpful. We liked
the close access to the subway, a grocery and restaurants. There is a big
balcony. The neighbors were friendly and helpful. Sherry provided a clean space
with an abundance of amenities that made our Brooklyn stay comfortable and
enjoyable. The hosts were available and accommodating without being intrusive. It
is very convenient that only takes 30 mins to my party that hold in lower
Manhattan. Look forward to booking again in the future.

Our stay at Sherry's place was perfect: her apartment is very comfortable (and the 3 beds are great) and close to the subway station (7min by walk). There is a laundromat at 3 min by walk as well, what is so convenient.
Amazing place, with amazing host and location.
Excellent communication, not luxuary but comfortable and clean, nice beds, walking distance from the metro

This apartment was so great. We always felt comfortable walking in the neighborhood. The subway station is just  6 minutes walk, if you want  to go
into Manhattan, the 5 trains are the express trains only take 25 minutes to Wall Street and World Trade Center,  it was so convenience. Sherry was always available for any questions and answered them very quickly. The place was very cozy and clean. We had great stay. I  would definitely choose here again. 
Highly recommend  if you want to stay in Brooklyn.
Sherry is very friendly and helpful. Always available to answer questions and had a very comfortable and lovely home!!
Extended our stay here easily. The gas station with Dunkin Donuts next door was great to have nearby.
We received what we saw in the publication. Sherry was always ready to answer our questions.
Great place to stay for 3! Very clean. Easy to find. She also quickly responded. She's also a sweet Host. She checked in on us during our stay.

Sherry is a sweetheart. I could not have asked for a better person during this time. Moving from the financial district of Manhattan to this part of Brooklyn could have been a disaster; however, Sherry diligently averted a crisis when I was literally moving lost the original apartment the day prior (totally different scenario) and Sherry drove over a half hour just to check everything was okay in her apartment for me to move into at moments notice. She stayed with me during me move, making sure I was going to be okay.  She stayed in contact with me for the next few days for support and assistance. Over the next few weeks we would text or call each other to catch up. 

Sherry and I never met prior to this situation; however, she and I have now become friends and I intend to stay in close contact with her. 

She is a wonderful person who is caring and definitely goes above and beyond. She truly cares for people and has a heart larger than herself. 

I ended up staying in her apartment for a month and I am sad I had to relocate to a permanent apartment. My new permanent place is perfect for me and my family; however, Sherry and her hospitality have left an imprint on my heart. For this we are truly grateful. 

Thank you Sherry. You truly are an angel.

Die Lage der Wohnung ist super, es gibt in 5 Gehminuten zwei U-Bahn Stationen. Die Fahrt bis Manhattan dauert ungefähr eine halbe Stunde (bis zum World trade Center).
Kleine Lebensmittel Geschäfte gibt es in der Nähe. 
Der Kontakt zu Sherry war immer schnell und sie konnte sogar mit einer Unterstellmöglichkeit für unser Gepäck am letzen Tag helfen.
In der Küche gibt es nur eine Holztür nach draußen, kein Fenster.
Da es bei uns in New York sehr kalt war, musste die Tür immer zu sein, so dass wir im Lampenlicht frühstücken mussten. Zu viert war der Platz in der Küche ausreichend.
Die Heizung funktioniert super.
Das Bad ist klein aber ausreichend, die Dusche funktioniert gut.

Great location and apartment. Right across the street from a coffee shop which was great for the mornings. Tons of delis and places to eat in the area. Also within walking distance to subways that take you to wherever you need in New York!
I was worried that it would be cramped for the 6 of us but it was the perfect space.
Overall they were great hosts and the apartment was perfect
Response time was wonderful. Host was helpful and informative. Parking is terrible. Place was spacious only wished it had one more bathroom

The apartment was perfect for the 6 of us, the beds were very comfortable. The back bedroom was much quieter than the 2 front rooms. It was a nice added touch to see ear plugs available in those 2 bedrooms. Very thoughtful! We felt very safe and comfortable the entire time.

Large 3 bedroom flat in Brooklyn with fair value. Location is safe but a little far to Manhattan. 2 of the bedrooms are facing major street that can be noisy at night. Great host with quick response and willing to work with guests to resolve issues.

Sherry was the ultimate host. My family and I were in town for my daughter’s graduation and Sherry was wonderful. The apartment was quiet and just right for a party of 4 adults. The neighborhood was safe and convenient to public transportation. We were able to go to Chinatown, Coney Island and many other places with no difficulty.  I would definitely stay in Sherry’s place again I when I come to Brooklyn again.
This place had what we needed to come home shower and sleep after long days off sight seeing. The owner is very good at replying when needed, which we appreciated.

Nice place in Brooklyn. Enough space for five people. The bedrooms were very clean. The street was a little bit loud, also during the night. Because of the warm/hot weather in july we had to turn on the fan which caused additional noise. sherry is a very nice and helpfull host, so we enjoyed our stay in New York.

I addressed my concerns with Sherry about the apt. I stayed in the 3br apt with my 2 nieces. It was spacious and I think you would lke it. But, it could be more comfortable for the next guests. 
 More attention to cleaning in between the guests, the sofa just needs to be replaced and that odor from the kitchen. It was around the fridge area. She changed the shower curtain and lining so you are ok there.  Drainage in the shower, she can correct that also. Was not with me but for the next guest,  hopefully. The smell from the ac units, I thinks it needs to be cleaned or filters cleaned. I never used one but it should still require maintenance. Unfortunately,  the tv service is horrible. If you want to relax and watch the tube, well good luck. That svc I Hated. Luckily,  I didn't care for that on my trip but it would have been nice when I came in at night.
 So, for the next guest your stay should be on point for comfort. 
 We are paying for comfort and we should get it. Feedback matters and when they correct what's wrong, it keeps you going back as a guest.

Nous sommes venus chez Sherry à cinq personnes, l’appartement est suffisamment grands pour que ce soit confortable. Les locataires précédents avaient toutefois volé la TV et abîmé le mobilier. Ceci n’a pas eu d’impact sur nous. Sherry nous a permis de déposer nos bagages dans Soho, ce qui était très pratique. À notre arrivée à l’appartement, il y avait des bouteilles d’eau fraîche au frigo et Un grand nombre de serviettes de toilette, ce qui était très agréable. Le quartier n’est pas très animé du côté de Beverly rd mais plus vivant vers Newkirk. Il y a bcp de bruit.
Sherry est particulièrement gentille et helpful. Le jamaican jerk center nous a fourni de délicieux take away. On peut facilement remonter dans Brooklyn en bus.
Sherry is a great host and easily contactable and provides all the information you need. Thank you for being a great host. Cheers, Paul

We had a lovely stay at Sherry's apartement; Location is very convenient. The flat is spacious and well-equiped. The neighbourhood is safe and friendly. The system for entering and leaving the apartement is very convinient (no key). Sherry is a great host.

If you're looking for a quick location to sleep and shower before exploring the city, you'd find that in this Airbnb.  The neighborhood is definitely not suited for walking alone at night, but it is within walking distance to the train. The location is deep in Flatbush, so it can be a distance away (40min to an hour) to other parts of NYC depending on where you want to explore.  Sherry is highly responsive and will help with any concerns or requests you may have during your stay.

Sherry's place is mostly as described.  It's fairly close to the Subway, which will take you to other locations in Brooklyn or into Manhattan.  This is a good spot if you have a larger group and are budget conscious.  I'd say it is best for group of 6 or fewer.  For more than 6, you will need an air mattress, which is fine but makes the space very tight.

When we stayed (late August 2018), two of the four burners on the stove, and the oven, were not working.  We worked around it, but you should be prepared.  Also, the television is tricky to figure out.  Sherry offered help, but by then we had figured it out.  It's a Roku TV but you can't actually watch Roku on it.  You have to watch TV through an app on the TV, and there are limited channels.  

Two of the bedrooms face the street and can be very loud.  We had the A/C running and a noise machine as well, and I still woke up from the street noise.

Finally, this is probably not the best place if you have small children.  The sofa is broken and propped up on blocks, so if your kids are rowdy you might find yourself reconstructing the sofa...  I doubt you would have any reason to know about this if it's a group of adults staying.
Stayed for a week and had a wonderful time!

The area felt safe and secure enough. The Subway station wasn't too far away. The place was clean, and good for what it was. The beds were comfortable with A/C in each room. Kitchen only had one burner working, no oven; so cooking was kinda out of the question. The "patio" from the kitchen could have be more inviting with lights and seating. All in all, it was a place to sleep; didn't spend a lot of time in there, cause New York.

Sherry was a lovely host, very attentive.  The area is not the greatest but that didn't take away from the overall comfort of our stay. The place was clean and the beds were very comfortable for sleeping. 2 of the bedrooms face the street so expect to hear some traffic noise but nothing too extreme, was able to sleep fine. Parking can be tricky but we were able to secure a spot right in front of the property. But be aware of the parking restrictions, on the day we were checking out I look out the window to find our car was the only one parked on that side of the street. Had to drive around for a bit to find another parking but not too far.  Not sure if was for street cleaning or trash collection but providing some information of any parking restrictions to your future guest might be helpful.

Sherrys place is great for 3 couples, as we were. Very easy check in and sherry was great to communicate with. The neighborhood is really cool with some nice local spots to visit! About a half hour to Manhattan and really close to several cool neighborhoods in Brooklyn. I would absolutely stay again!  Thanks again Sherry!

This is a comfortable and spacious flat. The beds are very comfortable and the sofa in the living room is a good place to relax after a long day of sightseeing. 
The flat is situated in a relaxed neighbourhood. Flatbush is not that interesting in itself for sightseeing, but it feels safe and you have everything you need in a walking distance. The subway is within a walking distance, though it takes some to

The place looked as described. Check-in was easy. If you're renting a car, note that street parking can be difficult especially at night and all car have to be moved from 7am-10am. So if you plan to sleep in, dont forget to move the car or prepare for a parking ticket. It is really easy to get to Manhattan as you can take the main street (Flatbush Ave) all the way into lower Manhattan in about 20 mins. If you plan on cooking, be sure to ask if the stove and oven are working as the check in email I received didn't say they will be out if order during my stay. The building is older so some parts of the floor is uneven. It rained really hard one night and created a small leak in the skylight. I sent Sherry a message with a photo and she called me within minutes. So, she is definitely quick to respond if you need anything.

Nous avons passé une semaine chez Sherry. L'appartement est conforme à la description. Sherry est très sympathique et s'est montré très disponible. Elle répond rapidement aux messages et est orienté solutions pour aider ses hôtes.
Sherry's place was a comfortable spot in Ditmas area. Beds were comfortable and we had a very nice time. Great value!

Our group of 12 very much enjoyed our stay at Sherry's Brooklyn apartment. We were in town for a weekend event at Kings Theatre and loved how close the apartment was to the theatre - so close we could walk! 
Sherry was very responsive and the place was in wonderful shape when we arrived. She was very flexible and let us check in early on Friday morning, and was available throughout our stay to answer questions. 
We fit everyone comfortably in the space, and only really had a small issue with the oven when we first turned it on - noticing that a piece of the insulating tubing was loose and it smelled like gas for a moment. 
Overall, this place was well worth what we paid and Sherry's hospitality was unparalleled. All twelve of us would definitely recommend this place!

Sherry has a beautiful 3 bedroom apartment. The apartment is very spacious and has a large screen TV. I stayed for 12 days and I really enjoyed my stay. There are bars and lots of places to eat and shop in the area. The subway is also nearby. Sherry was a wonderful host. She is always available if you need assistance and at the same time giving you total privacy. I would strongly recommend Sherry’s place. It’s a great place to spend a vacation.

Sherry’s AirBnB is huiselijk, ziet er uit als op de foto’s en ligt op 6 minuten loopafstand van de metro naar Manhattan. Het is een mooie, qua keuken goed geoutilleerde uitvalbasis voor een groep van 6, bijvoorbeeld 3 stellen. Met meer personen wordt het wat krap, want er is bijvoorbeeld maar 1 badkamer met de wc daarin. De 3 queensize bedden zijn comfortabel. (De eventuele rest slaapt op de bank of op luchtbedden.) Sherry is attent en reageert snel. De communicatie en het inchecken verliepen plezierig. Dank je, Sherry!

Sherry s place is truly a home away from home. My son and I felt very comfortable. The place is super clean and Sherry was very responsive to our queries.  Sherry is a fantastic host she super friendly and extremely approachable and accommodating. I highly recommend Sherry s place. I will certainly come back.
Thank you so much  Sherry and all the best!
Doris and JP

name: Island Sands #111 - 2BR Beautiful Oceanfront Condo
summary: The Island Sands is at the tail end of a 5-mile white sand beach (Sugar Beach) and centrally located to all of the Valley Isle’s activities, shops, and restaurants. You are within walking distance to the Maui Ocean Center, “The Hawaiian Aquarium” that features only animals that are found in Hawaiian waters. It’s one of the only aquariums in the world that grow coral in captivity.
space: The property is also located walking distance to Maalaea Harbor, where all the tour boats are docked, and you can take your pick of snorkeling, diving, or sunset cocktail cruises. The property has an oceanfront swimming pool, and a great area for BBQing as you gaze out over the Pacific Ocean, or you can cook in the condo's fully equipped kitchen and eat on the private lanai. The master bedroom has a queen king bed, and the seond bedroom has a queen bed. Amenities include air-conditioning in the living room, cable TV, in-room safe,Free WiFi, washer/dryer, and everything you need to make your stay very comfortable. This condo is professionally managed by an on-island vacation rental company. All responses will come from them. Hawaii State Tax ID#: Awaiting permit from state

neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in the Eixample district next to Gran Via, one of the arteries of the city. Walking you can reach many of the most visited destinations in the city: -PLAZA ESPAÑA: with his metro stop, Las Arenas Shopping Center (former bullring) and access to the Fira de Barcelona with its constant events. -MONTJUICH: The Magic Mountain hosts a wide range of leisure and culture. The Fira de Barcelona, the fountains, the botanical garden, the Olympic Stadium, Pueblo Español, the Castle ... And also the MNAC (Museu Nacional d'Art de Catalunya), Caixaforum, Ethnological Museum, Joan Miró Foundation, .... -AVENIDA PARALELO: Union between PLaza Spain and the statue of Cristobal Colón, and has a wide choice of restaurants, theaters, discos and all kinds of venues. -CITY CENTER: in a 10-15 minute walk you will be in the center of the city, La Rambla, Raval, PLaza Catalunya, Gothic quarter, the Cathedral, the Teatre del Liceu ....
notes: The apartment has 4 rooms. So it is very likely that you are not alone. :-) To share is to live!
transit: Fantastic location 5 minutes walk from Montjuich mountain and Plaza España and its metro stop with which you can move around the city and 10 minutes from the Ramblas, Plaza Catalunya, Raval and all downtown Barcelona.
access: The common areas are the bathroom, the kitchen and the living room. All of them are spacious, cozy and equipped.
interaction: im completly available for you :-)

Somos gente tranquila y cordial, nos encanta salir con los amigos pero también pasar unas noches en casa.

name: 2458 - AB Park Güell Apartment 4-3 - Wonderful 3-Bedroom Apartment near Park Güell with a Balcony
summary: This is a fantastic, modern apartment, located right next to Gaudí´s famous Park Güell, one of Barcelona´s biggest attractions. The area is known to be quieter than the very city centre, while remaining close to the main sights by via public transport. Surrounding the apartment you´ll find bars, cafés and restaurants, as well as supermarkets for your convenience.This stylish apartment has single beds distributed throughout its three bedrooms. There is also a sofa bed, allowing the apartment to accommodate up to 8 people in total comfortably. There are plenty of utensils and appliances in the fully equipped kitchen, so you´ll have everything you need to make your favorite recipes, or even to try out some Mediterranean-inspired dishes. The cozy living area has direct access to the balcony where you can enjoy your meals ´al fresco´.There are two bathrooms in the apartment, allowing for maximum privacy.You’ll also find an iPod dock, a satellite TV and a DVD player in this premium apartment
