Includes: Sweeping of all floor surfaces, cleaning the toilet, shower and sink, and removing the rubbish. Does not include: A change of sheets or towels. If you need a more thorough clean you can hire our cleaning service by contacting our Customer Service.

host.host_about:
Hi everyone!

We are Eva & Jacques and we work in the travel and tourism industry. Our company is AB Apartment Barcelona. What we aim to do is offer each of our guests the best Barcelona experience, from start to finish. So as soon as you begin to book your stay right up until the moment you leave Barcelona, my team and I will be available to help you with any questions you might have, or even just to offer you some friendly advice. 

We have one office open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year, meaning you can contact us anytime you want, day or night. We speak many languages between us, and we’re all tourism professionals. Plus, we know all the best places to go in Barcelona, from sights and attractions to bars and restaurants (including where the locals go) so we can help you make your time in the city the most memorable with our insider tips ;)

By renting your apartment in Barcelona through me, you’ll be in safe hands.

We looking forward to meeting you soon!

reviews.comments: Le logement de Fernando est parfaitement situé. Il est proche du centre (700m) mais Porto étant très vallonnée, il peut être difficile pour certaines personnes de s'y rendre à pied. Pas d'inquiétude la station de métro est à 50m. Elle dessert la seule ligne nord sud qui permet de se rendre directement dans le centre. Fernando propose un petit déjeuner juste parfait. Ça permet d'être caler une bonne partie de la journée.

name: Kaneohe Haven
summary: Welcome to paradise!  Our house is nestled in the heart of Kaneohe with magnificent views of the ocean and Ko'olau Mountains.  Our duplex-style accommodation is assured to provide the comfort and convenience that you are searching for.
space: Our quiet and newly remodeled duplex is a home away from home.  Views of the ocean and mountains allow for a relaxing and soothing environment.  Fully furnished, the top section of our two bedroom duplex sleeps anywhere from one to six individuals.  Located in central Kaneohe, Windward Mall is a mere five minute drive away with vast arrays of supermarkets and restaurants nearby.  A short fifteen minutes drive will place you at world renowned Kailua and Lanikai beaches.

interaction: Although I do not reside on the property, I am openly available to all guests' needs.
house_rules: - Quiet after 10pm - No footwear in the house - 2 car maximum

reviews.comments: Neal is the best ever!!  My family and I had last minute stay-cation plans and were scrambling for a place...  Neal totally stepped up and was so very accommodating!  The place was clean, quiet and fulfilled everything we needed.  We would definitely book with Neal again!
Place was clean, newly renovated, and had everything we needed in a 2 bedroom place. Especially liked having a full kitchen. Neighborhood was a little older, but quiet. Would definitely stay again.

The place is great, very clean and has lots of small extras included like parking which in Oahu is a if deal. The only thing my wife and I did not like was that it was a bit too far from the beach. That was totally our fault as we did not look at the map correctly.

We enjoyed this place. It appears to be recently remodeled, and it's light and airy (many windows) spacious, and clean. A breeze from the nearby bay keeps the place cool. There's a large TV in the living room and a smaller one in one of the bedrooms.  The bedrooms are a good size and there's plenty of closet space and lots of hangers.  We didn't use the washer and dryer, but they are there outside for guests to use. The steamer for taking wrinkles out of clothing came in handy for us and we were happy to see a hair dryer there.  There's a complete set of dishes and cooking utensils, and even a first aid kit.  Neal has put some thought into making his guests feel welcome, and the little amenities he provided like candy, sun block, and toothpaste were greatly appreciated.

We spent two weeks out in Hawai‘i and Neal’s place was perfect. First off the location is away from tourists so that is a huge bonus and what we wanted. There is plenty of room for parking which is a nice benefit too. The place is very clean and relaxing. The washer and dryer was a great to have since we did stay for two weeks. Neal checked in every couple of days to make sure we were doing good. He even went out of his way to gets us fans since we came when there was a heat wave happening. I would recommend this place to anyone and would totally stay with Neal again!
Neal was a great host and the place was clean, comfortable, and in a great location. We would definitely stay here again!
Awesome place to stay, and in such drivable distances to places we wanted to visit! Host, Neal is very helpful and kind. Great stay!!

There aren't enough great things I could say about our stay here.  I'll start with the location.  I am from Oahu and did not want to be in the hustle and bustle of downtown.  Kaneohe is a great spot for Koolau Mountain views while being within a short driving distance from town and the north shore.  The neighborhood is very close to the mall and other shopping/restaurant venues.  When you walk out of the duplex, you can see the mountains and water!  Neal was great to work with.  He was always in touch and even provided a couple updates for things to do (i.e. one day the waves on the north shore were high and he recommended we visit).  He went as far as buying a new pack n' play for us when he noticed it wasn't in perfect condition.  I really appreciated that.  The home is newly renovated and came with many perks I haven't seen in other rentals.  The fridge had water and local juice and chocolate covered macadamia nuts were sitting next to the coffee maker.  The beds were extremely comfortable and we had everything we needed to thoroughly enjoy our stay.  My expectatations were surpassed.  Would definitely recommend this rental to anyone looking to stay on Oahu.

The communication with Neal was amazing. He gave us some traffic tips because president Trump was on Oahu. The accommodation was very clean and the kitchen was fully equiped. I was very happy about the little things wich Neal provided for us (some coffee, snacks, popcorn, small collection of bath stuff, some drinks) :) the neighboorhood was really quiet. I felt very rural there. We had some roosters around the street. You can hear the chickens crowing. Over all ... these accommodation was a nice home for us and I would highly recommand Neal as Host.
Neal's place was great and he was a very attentive host! The house was lovely, comfortable, and styled beautifully. Loved being by the water, hearing the birds, and feeling the Kane'ohe breeze.

If you like chickens being your random alarm clock then stay here. This home and host is excellent only down side is right next to a chicken coup. 
Ease of access into the home and very comfortable beds.

My friends and I decided to stay at this beautiful home over the thanksgiving weekend to have our own friendsgiving. The place was nicely decorated and very homely. We had a total of eight girls who stayed and we were all able to sleep and move around comfortably. The kitchen had a good supply of dishes and utensils to cook our thanksgiving dinner and we were all grateful to have a kitchen as college students, let alone a cute and well-stocked one. The owner of the home was so generous by providing personal hygiene items in the bathroom like shampoo, conditioner, toothpaste, and a few other goodies. The location was ideal because it wasn’t very far from a bus stop or the closest beach. The only downside was that it was near a chicken coop which could get loud, but our campus, BYUH, has chickens roaming around all the time so we weren’t too bothered. I accidentally left my laptop at the house before we all checked out and the owner was kind enough to take time out of his day to meet me at a grocery store a couple days later and return it to me with no fee of any sort. This inconvenience for him really showed me how much of a kind and considerate guy he was and I’m so glad that my friends and I got to experience our first thanksgiving away from home in such a nice guy’s house. If you’re considering staying here, I highly recommend it because of how flexible and considerate the owner is in making your stay the best it could possibly be. He even gave my friends and I a student discount because he understood how difficult it can be to save money as a college student. Again, highly recommend!!
The place and location were amazing wish it was available longer. Was honestly so perfect can’t complain

Kaneohe Haven was a comfortable 2nd floor residence that was conveniently close to shopping and beaches on the windward side of the island of Oahu.  It was an easy drive for us to the North Shore for the Surfing/Pipeline events we wanted to see.  The owner was very attentive in providing us we special treats and communicated constantly with us.  It was an enjoyable trip and we recommend Kaneohe Haven for a family visiting Oahu.

This is a nicely renovated place. Plenty of room nice neighbors. Just 1 caution is the roosters. If you are sensitive to sound it might be difficult for you as they crow all thru the night. But it's a cute roomy place. Great host.

The house was very clean and more than enough room for all of us for 2 wks.  Loved being able to cook and not have to eat out all the time. Stores are within walking distance if you like to walk. Neighbors are very friendly. Felt very safe. Roosters and dogs in the neighborhood but it never bothered us. Loved being able to open the windows and hear the ocean, rain and smell it all. We can't wait to come back!
This place is great with two bedrooms and parking and everything needed for a home away from home vacation! Highly recommended

Neal’s place is beautiful! It is very nice and clean. He is very friendly and professional. He was quick to response when we needed help and recommended cool things to do as well. I highly recommend his place to anyone traveling to Oahu!

Neal was an accommodating and gracious host. First, he called a few days before our trip to see if there was anything we needed before we got there. When we got to the island we asked him if he had a rice cooker, but he said that he did not. Later he responded that he just bought one and left it on the front door step. My party and I were pleasantly surprised that a host would go out of his way to do that. The day of arrival, entering the Airbnb was easy with the instructions he gave us. The kitchen already had some basic groceries that were ours to use. The place was clean and bright with some toiletries awaiting us. Throughout the trip he would check in and see if we needed anything. I highly recommend this place for those on vacation! You have the comfort of a home environment while on vacation.

ｶｲﾙｱやﾎﾉﾙﾙ方面､ﾉｰｽやｶﾌｸなど､どこへ行くにもとても便利な場所でした｡近くに大きなｳｨﾝﾄﾞﾜｰﾄﾞﾓｰﾙやｽｰﾊﾟｰもあるので出かけたついでにちょっと立ち寄って買い物や食事ができるのもよかったです｡家は清潔でｼｬﾝﾌﾟｰ等のｱﾒﾆﾃｨも置いてあり､洗濯機も自由に使えたので毎日快適に過ごすことができました｡まわりは庶民的な雰囲気で､地元の人が犬を散歩させていたり朝はﾆﾜﾄﾘが鳴いたりとﾛｰｶﾙ感たっぷりです｡
Nealさんは親切な方で､わからないことや困ったことがあって彼に連絡するとすぐに返事が返ってきてその後もいろいろと気遣ってくれました｡ｹﾞｽﾄがよりよく過ごせるよう常に気にかけ､希望に沿うよう一生懸命取り組んでくれるとてもよいﾎｽﾄだと思います｡

Let me begin with the fact that our very first Air BnB experience was an absolute nightmare. So our expectations on approaching Neal's place were very very low.

All expectations to which we originally thought were going to be horrible wound up being absolutely perfect. The difference between Neal's place and the our 1st experience was literally night and day.

The consideration he put into letting us borrow his place was uncanny. I mean not only did he leave drinks in the fridge, little local Hawaiian snacks on the side, a super clean and cozy place, suntan lotion for the Hawaii sun, he also was considerate enough to leave Aloe Vera for the sun burn. (You know your doing Hawaii wrong if you don't get sun burned) 

Long story short, all we can say is thank you Neal for reinvigorating our faith in Air BnB and thank you for taking such great care of our family on this magnificent trip.

This place is AMAZING.  As we entered, Neal had complimentary  hawaiian juice, hawaiian products and much, much more.  The place was very clean.  Had ample parking.  Being upstairs made it very comfortable with the natural air flowing throughout. The neighborhood was quiet, thru our stay.  Neal answered any questions thoroughly and very professional.  I would recommend my family friends and relatives to experience the love and aloha of Mr. Neals residence in Kaneohe.  The shops and stores were conveniently, down the road. Thanks again, my trip here was far above and beyond of my expectations.

It was our first time in Hawaii and Neal’s place was best option for us! 
He offered us amenities and even beach items for kids. It’s about 20 minutes for Waikiki beach and 1 hour for North Shore beaches by a car. Big mall and supermarkets are close by. 
A good sized kitchen with all tools you need to cook, so easy to eat at home. 

One of our favorite was the morning view from a entrance door which you can see beautiful sunrise. 

We would love to come back in the future!
The place is nice and quiet. Neal is a great host and is quick to respond to request. Make sure to drive slowly when getting to the house. The neighbors are a little sensitive about it.

Neal is great!

Upon arrival Neal made sure to send me a text message to ensure if I had any questions about check in and included any information needed to make my check in as smooth as possible. The attention to detail and little touches Neal included were excellent. We knew if we had any questions or needed anything Neal would be there to assist in any way.

Comfortable and modern accomodation for families or small groups wanting to stay out of the hustle and bustle of Waikiki. Easy drive to Kualoa Ranch and other hikes and activities. Good wifi and Neal is always in touch

Exceptionally positive experience from the moment of booking till the check out! Neal was an awesome host! Prompt communication and attention to detail, the property (second floor of the house with a separate entrance) was exceptionally clean and styled tastefully. The welcoming snacks and other little touches of every possible daily and beach necessities were very much appreciated. The location was secluded and in close driving distance (10-20 mins) to everything. Mahalo Neal!

Neal is amazing host. Kind, welcome, and friendly.
I couldn’t figure out how to open the door, but he responded quickly and welcomed to help us.
Also, his place was beautiful, clean, and neighbors are friendly. 
We are really thankful to Neal. 
I highly recommended his place.

Thank you Neal for your great hospitality
The place was very clean and the bed in the master room very comfortable!

Beautiful, clean, and spacious place conveniently located on the windward side of Oahu near our favorite beaches. Neal made it so easy for us to check in with a lock box and immediately enjoy paradise. The little touches like coffee, snacks, and beach gearade it all the more sweeter. Thank you!
Wonderful host. Cute accommodation. Perfect place to stay in K Bay.

Clean, well decorated space, plenty of amenities. As other reviewers have stated, roosters can be noisy in the morning so if that may bother you, make sure to bring ear plugs. Neal was very responsive and helpful. Had a great stay!
Perfect!!

If your anything like me you read the reviews and look for consistency. 5 stars here too. Cleanliness, hospitality, and accuracy of what was expected was top class. Neighborhood was very friendly, they even put the trash out for us when we forgot. Communication was immediate. He definitely deserves his super host award. I have a wife and two kids, we felt safe in the area when we were there and felt safe leaving our things there while we were out and about. I don’t have any negative comments to drop. I would absolutely stay here again.

This is a great place if you wish to get away from the hustle and bustle that is Honolulu/Waikiki and the North Shore. This home is located near a bay, so no beaches are walking distance away. However beaches, hiking trails and other activities in nature are only short drives away. There is a local botanical garden, but I suppose the whole island is a botanical wonderland. The home is overlooking the bay and is located in a generally quiet neighborhood (ocassional barking dogs and crowing rosters) . Great for a getaway for friends or families. Neal is a top notch host...always available and gives off that Aloha spirit.

This home was wonderful! First off, Neal is a great host. He called & messaged before our arrival to see if we needed anything, as well as checking if everything was alright during the stay. The home was thoughtfully filled with toiletries, snacks, juice, water, beach gear, etc. Sometimes photos can be deceiving, but I promise you, this home is as beautiful as the photos show. Nice, clean, & spacious - we comfortably were able to have 6 people. The neighborhood is quiet & neighbors are friendly, lots of stores & places to eat close by. I would definitely stay here again!

Neal’s place was very clean and inviting when I checked in. He has provided almost all amenities you could ask for (especially when you’re heading to the beach) and even provided brochures and snacks upon arrival. It did take a while for me to locate the place as I arrived after dark but shouldn’t be a problem if you arrive in daylight. Only downside was the crowing of the neighbouring roosters in the early hours as I’m a light sleeper. Would be back during my future visit to Oahu!
Wow! Everythings was perfect!
Close to shopping  centers

As other posts have mentioned, Neal is a great host. We stayed at his place for 3 weeks and had zero complaints. He checked-in with us regularly to see if we had any issues. 

He keeps his home clean, and included many small touches (macadamias nuts, hygiene items, extra towels, swimming floaties for the kids, beach mats, etc.).

Nice place great host!
Close of everything!
Would go back at any time !

What a perfect location to base yourself to explore the island. Neal was an awesome host who’s communication was spot on and he was very willing to assist with any needs that we had including replacing a broken fan the next morning. The kids loved how close we were to the mall and shops and enjoyed staying on the bunk beds! Great experience and we will be back!!!
Neal’s place was great because it was right in the middle and it allowed you to get around easily. Everything was available to use for cooking and going to the beach. We had a great time!
Neal is super nice and quick to respond. The location is about 20 minutes from the Kualoa Ranch.
Good spot.

Neal is very kind and helpful. But his place.. if you haven’t problem with cocroaches is wonderful too. I know that I am in Hawaii and some can be here. But these were big and very often so we finished our stay at Neal earlier. Neal had no problem with this and refunded us our money.

Neal was great at communicating with us even before we arrived in Hawaii. Neal provided everything we needed and checked in on us regularly which was very nice. Shops and restaurants were close by and the location was away from the hustle and bustle which was nice! The only that surprised us was the area the house was in which made us feel a little uneasy but no one bothered us and it was a pretty quiet street. Overall, the house was very clean and looked exactly like the pictures. Thanks Neal, you were a great host!
Great location. Beautiful. Relaxing.

Overall, we enjoyed this little space. It was the perfect size for our family of 3. We loved that it was in a very centrally located town. Quick to get to other parts of the island.  We also appreciated being in the upper part of the duplex. Once a family with much younger kids came to stay in the lower level the sound definitely travelled a lot. But for a large group traveling together it would be perfect to rent both spaces in this house. 

Neal was attentive to messages both before our trip and while we were there. We didn’t need to ask for any assistance but I’m confident he would have replied quickly. 

Neal provides several very nice amenities. A couple of our favorites were the cooler and stand fans. 

This house is very much in an established neighborhood. The neighborhood wasn’t really our favorite, as we like a bit more space and privacy. As anywhere on the island you’ll hear roosters all night long. The neighbor also has a dog that was kept out all the time. You can see the ocean and mountains, but you are looking over the crowded neighborhood to do so.
We loved Neals home. It had everything we needed and was very clean.

Neal’s place was awesome! The place was just as expected and looked like the pictures. Parking was easy, right in front of the house and check-in was also very easy with a lockbox at the door. Neal was very good at communicating with me and was quick to respond anytime I had a question or concern. Location is a quick 15-20 minute drive to Kailua and a 30 min drive to Honolulu/Waikiki. Would stay again! Mahalo!
The location is great but the house may not be clean when you show up. I do not recommend this place if you have little kids.

If you are looking to experience the island like the residents, this is the place, nestled in a neighborhood, you feel almost as if you too are a resident. Neal is amazing, any issues or questions, he was quick to reply.

We had a very good experience here. Being from Texas, we are used to our air conditioning so it was a small surprise when we realized that there wasn't AC in this apartment. We quickly learned that with the ocean breeze we didn't need the AC. There are fans provided in each room and it gets quite comfortable in the evenings. The location was perfect with local activities just a short drive away (hiking, beach). Neal communicated with us every step of the way and was very responsive to our questions. Perfect space for our family of 3.
Neal’s place is amazing! It is so cute & makes you feel right at home. Neal was a great host that was willing to help with whatever we needed. Would definitely stay again!
Quaint little place in a quiet neighbourhood - easy to access routes to all parts of the island. Easy 15 minutes to Kailua beach.

Neal is a great host. 

Neighborhood has a great residential feel, but is close quarters with others.
As advertised. Would stay here again on a return trip!

Good communication by our host!
Rental was ready for us early and was well suited for children - we used the pack & play for our baby and our toddler loved the bunk bed. Beach towels, beach mat and cooler were provided which were great for our visit to nearby Lanikai.
Windows (Hawaiian A/C) and fans kept us cool however note that keeping windows open and the sheer curtains allowed sound of chickens and light in.
Neal provided a clean and quiet place right in Kaneohe.  We loved it.

We traveled from NorCal to Oahu for a 1 week family holiday vacation (4 adults + 1 child - 5 yr old). The beds are very comfortable. It was hard to sleep the first night with no AC + the humidity, but we got used to it and slept great the rest of the trip. My dad loves to cook - the kitchen is small and had some missing items. When we asked Neal for pots/pans w/ lids, he brought over a new set within an hour to 2, so that was really nice! Always quick responses from Neal from booking until the last day. Would not recommend for small children as the floor is not clean and there are stairs, but it's a great value for somewhere to sleep/shower and cook small meals.

Neal's place was a great place for our family.  We had about 40 hours on Oahu and the location allowed us to explore the east coast and Honolulu.  This location is less than 30 minutes to most places in Honolulu.
Great place to stay. Neal took good care of us!

A fantastic little place. Very bright and spacious. We loved the access to beach toys and a travel crib. Owners were prompt with responses and allowed us an early check-in. Would highly recommend accommodation.

Just as advertised (and even cuter in person!). Neal provided beach towels (which we stupidly didn't think about), as well as some sunscreen (we added to the pile at the end of our trip to pay it forward). The neighborhood is very cute, and we saw the sunrise a few mornings from a little beach park about 45 seconds away (highly recommend--very serene little area). Will 100% stay here again if we come back to the area. It was in a perfect location to go south to Waikiki for most of our dinner reservations and for various hikes, and then we spend an entire day up in the North Shore area, so it was pretty centrally located to whatever we wanted to do. Also, it was great to have parking and a lockbox (since we had four people and two different cars--we could just keep the key in the lockbox for whoever was getting back to the house at various times).

Highly recommend!
Cute little space with a beautiful sunrise view!
We had a great time in a beautiful place.

Staying in Neal's place felt like we were living where locals do, and was a nice base from which to explore more of Oahu. The towels and sunscreen were a nice touch and Neal was responsive with questions and requests. It's not the most well-stocked or cleanest Airbnb we've stayed in and the bunk bed was quite creaky, but other than that, we enjoyed our stay here.
Convenient location, spacious, host very responsive!

name: Big 3 Bedroom Garden Level Apartment Near Subway
summary: Spacious garden level loft apartment, built in 2017. Monthly payment for long stays. 3 bedrooms + 1 large living room + 1 bathroom. Everything new. Lots of windows, tall ceilings. Fully furnished. Fast WiFi. Very comfortable. Fully equipped modern kitchen with pots and pans. Towels and linens provided. On the express subway to Manhattan, 30 min to Midtown. Near Fordham, Bronx hospitals. Quiet and safe historic neighborhood, supermarkets nearby, friendly street, low traffic. Free private parking.
space: Everything is new from 2017. Nice neighborhood, close to subway. Long stays welcome, monthly payment.
description: Spacious garden level loft apartment, built in 2017. Monthly payment for long stays. 3 bedrooms + 1 large living room + 1 bathroom. Everything new. Lots of windows, tall ceilings. Fully furnished. Fast WiFi. Very comfortable. Fully equipped modern kitchen with pots and pans. Towels and linens provided. On the express subway to Manhattan, 30 min to Midtown. Near Fordham, Bronx hospitals. Quiet and safe historic neighborhood, supermarkets nearby, friendly street, low traffic. Free private parking. Everything is new from 2017. Nice neighborhood, close to subway. Long stays welcome, monthly payment. Private apartment, it will be all yours. The subway is close walking distance (line D at 170 St)
transit: The subway is close walking distance (line D at 170 St)
access: Private apartment, it will be all yours.
house_rules: - No candles, no incense. Please do not move the furniture. Before checkout: - please wash your dishes - please empty the fridge and the closets completely (leave nothing at all) - take out all trash - take out any bags, papers, personal items: leave the apartment exactly as you found it. We will keep $100 from your security deposit if you leave any trash, dirty dishes, or any food in the fridge or closets.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I'm a musician, often traveling for work. We will be glad to welcome you upon your arrival.

reviews.comments: Great hospitality and quick response! Stylish place and great location! I recommend it!!
Everything matched the description in listing. Sasha was prompt to respond to questions. Great place to stay!

name: Charming Townhouse duplex in Chelsea
summary: Beautiful sunny Townhouse duplex in the most beautiful and convenient block of West Chelsea. 3 bedrooms and 2,5 bathrooms. Ideal for a family or 3 adults. Quiet and romantic feel with greenery views from all sides.
space: Our duplex is a 3 bedrooms/ 2,5bathrooms located on the 2nd and 3rd floor of a townhouse. Our space has an European feel with its french vintage furnitures and molding details throughout. It also has a sereine and romantique atmosphere thanks to the greenery views from its 10 large windows.  All rooms are located on the upper level except for master bedroom (and its bathroom) so maximum privacy for exhausted parents or a couple . Both levels are linked by a circular staircase with doors on each level for safety.  There are independent entrance doors on each level. Baby's bedroom with crib, large kid bedroom with twin size bed + ensuite bathroom, also an extra toilet and sink room near the kitchen + laundry/dryer unit, all on the upper level. The lower level also offers a grand terrace an double separated closet near the master bedroom and bathroom.
description: Beautiful sunny Townhouse duplex in the most beautiful and convenient block of West Chelsea. 3 bedrooms and 2,5 bathrooms. Ideal for a family or 3 adults. Quiet and romantic feel with greenery views from all sides. Our duplex is a 3 bedrooms/ 2,5bathrooms located on the 2nd and 3rd floor of a townhouse. Our space has an European feel with its french vintage furnitures and molding details throughout. It also has a sereine and romantique atmosphere thanks to the greenery views from its 10 large windows.  All rooms are located on the upper level except for master bedroom (and its bathroom) so maximum privacy for exhausted parents or a couple . Both levels are linked by a circular staircase with doors on each level for safety.  There are independent entrance doors on each level. Baby's bedroom with crib, large kid bedroom with twin size bed + ensuite bathroom, also an extra toilet and sink room near the kitchen + laundry/dryer unit, all on the upper level. The lower level also offers a gra
neighborhood_overview: Our block is conveniently located near the high line, art galleries, Hudson River park, and Chelsea pier to name just a few, so a tremendous amount of nice activities is offered right at your steps. Our neighborhood is also filled with nice little restaurants for every taste all around. Few blocks away you'll find the great Chelsea market, the organically stylish Foragers mini market and few other places for your groceries.
notes: We ask our guests to be as courteous as possible with our neighbors and to not be too noisy during their stay. It is a quiet townhouse and we all try to respect and cherish this as it is such a rare opportunity to unwise and relax in such a fast pace, noisy and exciting place that is New York City.
transit: The nearest public transportations are: - A, C, E and 1, 2, 5 trains - M23, M11 buses Also many taxis and city bike stations available all around
access: Guests access is limited to our duplex.
interaction: Unfortunately you will not have interaction with me as I'm traveling in Europe when hosting my place on Airbnb. Though, you will interact with my trusted housekeeper that will make everything possible to make your stay pleasant. You may see my husband too if he's not traveling.
house_rules: - no loud noise after 9pm - check in and check out can be flexible if noticed enough time ahead - no smoking in the entire apartment/building AND terrace

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
I'm from Paris. It's been years I live in NY with my husband and sons. I'm a creative director in Fashion & Beauty and I'm traveling a lot to Paris for my work and family.
I love to travel and my passions are music, movies, art, museums, and vintage furnitures.

reviews.comments:
Eli's home is beautiful and comfortable. She was very responsive and caring. We visited over the Holidays.  Everything worked well, wifi, TV, stove, heat etc. and was easy to adapt to.  We loved the neighborhood and the street is quiet and tree lined.  The living room was simply and beautifully decorated for the Holidays which we really appreciated.

Just two smallish complaints:
*Morning coffee: (we were 3 and definitely need that one cup on cold winter mornings).  There was only a Nespresso machine (yay!) but no capsules.  We checked in afternoon of Dec. 24th so no way to even buy capsules till the 26th.  We made due by buying coffee for a few days at a dinner and saving it in the frig to reheat.  Also, I drank my coffee out of a child's plastic mug since there were only dainty teacups in the house, and very few at that.  
*Shampoo etc: There was sufficient gel soap in the master bath (no bar soap) but only baby shampoos etc in the second bedroom.  The person sleeping there felt bad using up what little was left so we just shared back and forth every day.  A little inconvenient.  For such an elegant place one expects the small amenities to be standard in each bath.
Bottom line it's a great location and a stylish, comfortable home.  Just remember that the owner is French and the accommodations are in a European style.

name: Cozy & Nice Bedroom in an Apt/NYC.
summary: Organized apartment and very warm. In my apartment you will feel at home with TV, wireless internet  a large double bed. Full kitchen available for use and bathroom with tub. Provide clean towels. The Bed is versatile for a couple or singles.the room is private .
space: Because I have a very good take care  the cleaner, the welcome and good vibe.
description: Organized apartment and very warm. In my apartment you will feel at home with TV, wireless internet  a large double bed. Full kitchen available for use and bathroom with tub. Provide clean towels. The Bed is versatile for a couple or singles.the room is private . Because I have a very good take care  the cleaner, the welcome and good vibe. Room,kitchen ,bathroom . Close to Museums,Central Park and East River walker,station subway,Grand Central. Bus M15 and subway 6( green line).
neighborhood_overview: Close to Museums,Central Park and East River walker,station subway,Grand Central.
transit: Bus M15 and subway 6( green line).
access: Room,kitchen ,bathroom .

reviews.comments: I really enjoyed staying at Cesar's. I was given a warm and friendly welcome and the apartment is cozy, comfortable and really well maintained. The neighborhood is lively and practical with lots of great Mexican/Puerto Rican & ethnic restaurants nearby. Great access for Museum mile, also.

Superb experience--Cesar is very friendly and helpful. The room is very nice and has a big screen TV. The apartment well-organized and spotless. Excellent communication and flexibility. Highly, highly recommend. A+ experience!
It was good staying. Thank you Caesar!

The location is a less than 15 minutes on the Subway from Grand Central and is excellent to be just outside the busy areas of Manhattan. Cesar was an excellent host, and made my trip very comfortable.

Cesar's apartment is well located, only a 10 minute walk to the subway. The apartment is simple but very clean and comfortable.
I felt very comfortable in the apartment.
Cesar is a good host! I would highly recommend anyone staying in your apartment.

Cesar´s apartment is a beautiful place to stay and is a few minutes’ walk from Central Park. You would feel at home, the room is very comfortable, the bathroom is perfect and I loved the kitchen. And Cesar is a great host, he helped me a lot, he´s a nice person to talk and share with. The neighbourhood is super safe.
Great place for the value. Very comfortable and Cesar was always very helpful and friendly. Close to a metro station. Recommended!

I stayed here one week in June with my friend. Super nice. Easy to get there, very friendly guy!
The room is fine, nothing fancy but very much what you need. 
Clean and cozy. The kitchen works fine too.. room in the fridge for your food, clean towels. 
Less than 10 minutes to metro, some good restaurants around. 
Definitely a keeper

My dad and I had a great time staying at Cesar's place. It is very close to subway stations (both the Q train and 6 train) and is in a safe neighborhood. Our host was very respectful and maintained a clean living environment at all times. Definitely a recommended homestay for those traveling to NYC.

Cesar was very nice and welcoming. 
The apartment is close to both subway stations, Q and 6. 
The room is small and very noisy...
We were 2 girls and didn't feel like this neighborhood is the right place for us to hang in alone at night (but maybe it's just our feeling)
To the button line, it was nice, loud and a bit over priced.
Great place, not very spacious and a little noisy, but overall very nice. Cesar is a great host who respects your privacy.

Staying at Cesar's place is so awesome! He's very flexible and easy to talk to. My friend stayed with us at the last minute and it was okay for him. Plus, I had to leave my bags during my last day because I need to go to the airport and I might take it later this evening and its totally fine with him to leave it there! Don't think twice! Book Cesar's place!!! You'll never regret it!! You'll have fun!!!

This apartment is located in an excellent position for the museum mile and access to public transport is very good.     The accommodation is well lived in, very well equipped, warm & comfortable with local supermarket for self caterers.  We would certainly recommend for the price band.
Not in the best of locations. Wouldn't go out too late at night.
Good
He is a very helpful guy and very kind. I like him

Le logement était conforme aux photos, propre, proche du métro Q et 6, très pratique et rapide pour se rendre en centre ville. Le quartier est vivant, et il y a une épicerie ouverte 24h/24 juste en bas de l'appartement. Cesar nous a parfaitement accueillies, nous a fait sentir comme à la maison, nous donnant même un savon et serviettes de toilettes. La chambre est équipée de clim, ce qui est bien pratique. Elle n'est pas immense mais il y a 2 lits, on a quand même assez d'espace et on s'y sent bien. On a même une petite place dans le frigo si nécessaire et libre accès à la cuisine. Merci Cesar pour votre accueil chaleureux !
Veramente bello e pulito host molto simpatico
Great stay, as expected!

Cesar is a very friendly and nice guy. Check in was easy. The room was clean and climated. 
Thanks for the good stay.
wonderful place and host.

Cesar was extremely welcoming and easy to talk to. He responded quickly to all of our messages. The apartment was super clean and the room tidy although small. Our flight got cancelled and so we missed a day of our stay. Cesar was so kind as to give us our money back for the missed night even if he didn't have to. I would reccomend him highly. Thank you Cesar!

Apartamento pequeño pero acogedor. Cesar fue muy amable y atento con nosotros y pese a que vivía allí, tuvimos mucha privacidad. El barrio está bien  comunicado aunque entiendo que pueda asustar a algunos por la noche.
Really nice host. It is easy to find him to get any help.

Cesar was a great host! Very friendly and easy-going person, quick to response, easy to communicate. The place was super clean and Cesar kept the standards which I really appreciated. The check-in and check-out was easy, and he even let us check-out whenever we needed which was really good. Would definitely recommend!!!
Cesar是一位非常热情好客的房主,我们在住宿期间非常舒服｡

Tal cual como se lee en la descripción, Cesar es muy amable, siempre dispuesto a ayudar y a mejor tu estancia, fue muy comprensivo con la hora de llegada. La zona da un poco de desconfianza al principio pero todo estuvo bien, nunca me sentí insegura. Dos metros a dos cuadras, los cuales te llevarán rápido a los puntos más turísticos. En general excelente experiencia
perfect

Cesar a été un hôte plein d'attention et très réactif. L'appartement est bien placé à 10 minutes de Time Square. 2 lignes de métro à proximité, la Q et la 6. Je retiens la gentillesse de Cesar, la propreté des lieux, la proximité de l'appart avec le centre.
Nice area to stay, very helpful host.
Cesar人非常友善,公寓比较小但是很很温馨｡房子隔音效果不是很好,(比较适合朋友一起住)但是地理位置不错, 走路七八分钟就能到地铁｡周围还是挺安全的 在我们住的期间没有碰到任何奇怪的事情,Cesar给的生活用品也非常充足｡

Nice room, everything is very clean! Cesar made us feel at home! We didn't have any trouble with the area, the apartment is near the metro and also has a 24/7 market nearby. I recommend it to anyone that wants to visit Manhattan for a few days. Thank you Cesar!
Cozy, clean, centric and reliable hospitality.
nice flat, easy to access to subway. cesar is nice and accomodating.

name: Spacious family-friendly designer flat in Kowloon
summary: This spacious apartment is located in a quiet area of Kowloon. Very well connected by two MTR lines travelling through Hong Kong is very easy and convenient – less than 30min to Central on HK island and the new territories or Sai Kung Beaches. It is an ideal place for a family stay and if you like to retreat after a busy day of sightseeing. You will have the best of both sides with an easy access for exploring the more rural areas as well as the popular and cultural sights of Hong Kong.
space: Our apartment is arranged on two floors. Downstairs you will find the kitchen with an open plan dining and living room and access to a balcony with a small bbq (but perfect for easy and fun dinners) and some plants (our attempt of growing some vegetables). The living room includes a sofa (which can be transformed into a double bed), a play area for children with toys and the latest and best-rated air filter system today. From the kitchen, you have also access to the washroom which has a washing machine and heated drying rack.  Upstairs we offer a large master bedroom (double bed and a baby cot and changing table if needed) with access to an ensuite bathroom. Next to it is a children’s bedroom with a single bed (60x120cm). There is also a separate bathroom available.
description: This spacious apartment is located in a quiet area of Kowloon. Very well connected by two MTR lines travelling through Hong Kong is very easy and convenient – less than 30min to Central on HK island and the new territories or Sai Kung Beaches. It is an ideal place for a family stay and if you like to retreat after a busy day of sightseeing. You will have the best of both sides with an easy access for exploring the more rural areas as well as the popular and cultural sights of Hong Kong. Our apartment is arranged on two floors. Downstairs you will find the kitchen with an open plan dining and living room and access to a balcony with a small bbq (but perfect for easy and fun dinners) and some plants (our attempt of growing some vegetables). The living room includes a sofa (which can be transformed into a double bed), a play area for children with toys and the latest and best-rated air filter system today. From the kitchen, you have also access to the washroom which has a washing machine
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is part of a secured residential area providing also some green outdoor space and a play area including slides and swings for the children.  A shopping mall housing a cinema, ice ring, a well-stocked grocery store as well as numerous higstreet shops and a variety of restaurants is 5min away.
notes: Throughout your stay you will be able to use our 3xdehumidifiers (wash room and bedrooms) and 2xair purifying systems by Philips (one in the living room and one in the master bedroom) and a water filter system in the kitchen to allow you to drink water directly from the tab! We have also installed two safety gates for children, one at the top at the stairs and one at the bottom.
transit: The MTR station, taxi stand and bus terminal are located adjacent to the shopping mall.
interaction: We make our flat available when we are on holiday visiting our families in Europe. However, you can contact us through Airbnb and our very good friend Christine will help you with anything you need.
house_rules: - We have a no shoe policy in the appartment.

host.host_about:
We are a family of four including two young children who have a creative professional background and love to explore new places and cultures.
We hope our guests will enjoy our designer flat and thank them for looking after it!

name: ☆ Mile-End 3BR Only 10-minutes from Downtown
summary: Perfect for both long and short-term stays in one of the most historic and charming neighbourhood's in the city, Montreal's Mile-End is a hub for culture, art and easy living. My apartment is conveniently located just steps from vibrant St-Laurent & St-Viateur, but is on a quiet street so you can rest comfortably. Pop into a vintage shop, grab an espresso at Cafe Olimpico, have a sandwich at Wilensky's and don't forget to stop by world-famous Saint-Viateur Bagel; Experience the real Montreal!
space: Perfect for both short and long-term stay. Located in a fully residential building, this apartment has a kitchen stocked with all necessary appliances and ample dining space. 3 closed bedrooms are furnished with queen-sized beds and a quality queen-sized air mattress can be set up in the living room. Extra linens will be available to accommodate bigger groups/families or for an added layer during the night.
description: Perfect for both long and short-term stays in one of the most historic and charming neighbourhood's in the city, Montreal's Mile-End is a hub for culture, art and easy living. My apartment is conveniently located just steps from vibrant St-Laurent & St-Viateur, but is on a quiet street so you can rest comfortably. Pop into a vintage shop, grab an espresso at Cafe Olimpico, have a sandwich at Wilensky's and don't forget to stop by world-famous Saint-Viateur Bagel; Experience the real Montreal! Perfect for both short and long-term stay. Located in a fully residential building, this apartment has a kitchen stocked with all necessary appliances and ample dining space. 3 closed bedrooms are furnished with queen-sized beds and a quality queen-sized air mattress can be set up in the living room. Extra linens will be available to accommodate bigger groups/families or for an added layer during the night. Guests have access to the entire apartment, including washer and dryer. As little or as muc
neighborhood_overview: This neighbourhood is always vibing. The Mile-End is located around the north end of notorious Saint-Laurent Street is one of the most interesting places in town, with parks, cafés, restaurants, vintage shops, art ateliers and all things that nurture and cultivate a creative crowd.
transit: The Mile-End is one of the most accessible neighbourhoods in the city for public transport and only about 10 minutes from downtown. With several bus stops just steps from our front door. By Subway? Rosemont and Laurier stations are both under a 15-minute walk away.  A bixi bike station is just steps from the front door. Rent a bike and go exploring !    Coming in by car? The apartment is located right off the intersection between Saint-Viateur Street and Saint-Laurent blvd, so it is extremely easy to get to. There is both free and paid parking in the area, just keep an eye out for residents-only spots. Need a lift? There is a huge community of Uber & taxi drivers in the area that can pick you up within minutes. Almost everything is within walking distance including hip neighbouring areas like Le Plateau, Outremont, Mile-Ex, Little Italy and downtown Montreal.
access: Guests have access to the entire apartment, including washer and dryer.
interaction: As little or as much as needed. I am here to ensure you have a 5-star experience.
house_rules: --NO SMOKING - Smell is very difficult to remove and a minimum of 100$ will be automatically charged if traces of smoking is found in apartment.  --NO SHOES - shoes off inside, please.  --NO mailing packages  --NO excessive guests beyond what was agreed upon (50$/per extra guest per night will be charged) --NO partying of any kind inside or on the property. There are streets nearby packed with restaurants and bars for this. Noise levels MUST BE MINIMAL after 11 pm! There is a noise level city ordinance and we do not want any complaints. Violation of the noise/party rule may result in the police being called, termination of your reservation and the security deposit being retained. We must respect the peace of the community --PENALTIES for the following will be held against the security deposit and a claim will be filed with Airbnb: Missing items, damages (furniture, appliances, fixtures, walls, floors, windows, etc. will be charged according to severity/value), Late checkout past 12 pm

reviews.comments: We have the next last day and appreciate the understanding when our circumstances changed. Anthony was a great host and the location and apartment was excellent.

Very clean recently refurbished apartment on the ground floor of a 3 story block. Everything as listed and it was obvious this was a new house as some of the utensils were still in their wrappers. Combination code on the front door for access. 

Location great for little Italy (best bagels and ice cream shops nearby). Parking on street for residents only or at parking meters during the day (9-9) but the street was very quiet with lots of spaces. 

Apt has 3 double beds and a small bathroom with good powerful shower in the bath. Washer and dryer. Anthony also put an inflatable double airmatress that can fit in the livingroom. 

One Aircon unit in the kitchen/living room area. 

Yes it has wifi. We had plenty of room for three teenagers and two parents.
Very beautiful and cozy home. The location is great (close to a lot of restaurants and shops). Overall had an amazing stay

The perfect place to stay! Very nice and quiet neighbourhood with lots of restaurants and shops nearby. If you're looking to explore the downtown core of Montreal it was only a short (and cheap) car ride away!
Great location, quiet street and cozy.

I was travelling with my husband, twins and toddler and we spent 9 nights at Anthony's Mile End apartment. Checkin was very smooth, with the excitement of getting the kids packed and on and off the plane I'd forgotten to contact Anthony about checkin. But, upon landing I saw he'd already messaged me all the information my family would need to get into our rental. The location was easy to get to and we were able to settle right in. At the time we stayed, small touches like dish detergent, hand soap, laundry detergent, paper towels and strong wifi went a long way and were appreciated. There are tons of places to eat in the area and we utilized nearby public transit daily. This place worked well for my family and made our trip possible with lots of happy memories.
Very clean and comfortable, had everything we needed and the location was great. Would definitely stay here again
Awesome location near many food options and only a few minutes away by car from all the other areas. Clean and renovated apartment.
Our stay at Anthony's was great.
L'appartement est tres propre et spacieux, la literie est très confortable. Situé dans le Mile end a deux pas de toute les commodités. Je recommande!

This space was just PERFECT for our group. The apartment was on a quiet street with loads of parking spaces (pay). The space was very clean/updated, well furnished, with all of the fittings we needed for our short stay. There is even a washer/dryer, which came in very handy. The neighbourhood was just where we wanted to be. Completely walkable and full of lovely shops and cafes. Beds were comfy and clean with tonnes of pillows :) Check-in and communication with Anthony was easy. I have nothing bad to say here... lovely place. We will be back.
Everything was exactly as described, and the place is super clean. Street parking is easy to find and the location is fantastic. Highly recommend!
L’appartement est super bien situé en plein Mile end, très bien équipé et calme. Anthony a été très accommodant !
We had a really nice stay at this place, the neighborhood is charming and you can walk to the many restaurant, bars, cafés and everything you would possibly need.
Perfect place to stay

Great place and great location. Close to shops and great restaurants but not on a main street which allowed for peaceful nights. Anthony was a great host and quickly answered all my questions and provided lots of suggestions for things to do in the area. Definitely worth checking this place out when visiting the area.
Great spot, as advertised - ground level in the best neighborhood. Ideal for seniors of people with mobility issues.

When we arrived, we had an issue with some of the radiators not working. As it was the first cold day of the year, the bedrooms were a little chilly. We messaged Anthony and he got back to us right away. He brought over some space heaters for the rooms and had an electrician come and fix the issue first thing in the morning! Anthony is a very responsive host and will go the extra mile to make sure your stay is as pleasant as possible. He even brought us some fresh Montreal bagels to apologize for the inconvenience!

Staying at Anthony's apartment in Montreal was a pleasure. It was spacious, had ample parking, and felt very safe. As a host Anthony was perfect, with nearly immediate responses to questions and concerns. The accommodations were exactly as described in his post, and all 7 of us were comfortable with the arrangements. It was also an incredibly convenient location, with easy access to a variety of different things to do (restaurants, museums, old Montreal, bars, and nightclubs). I would definitely recommend staying here to anyone who asked, and would gladly stay again myself. 5 stars!

Glad to say that my first airbnb experience was a great one.  Will do it again another time.  Anthony was a great host who replies very quicklu and well.
We recommend this apartment to all interested.  You will not be disappointed.
Anthony was a helpful host who always responded quickly to questions we had.
Très belle endroit dans un cartier tranquille
Tout était parfait! Emplacement, propreté, surtout le calme, on entendait rien!
Had a great time! Very convenient location, and nice home.

Anthony was a great host! He allowed us to check in a couple hours earlier and walked us through the parking situation. He was very pleasant and responsive. The place itself was very cool and well kept. We did have some hot water issues, but since we only stayed for one night, Anthony didn't have the chance to fix them in the time we were there, and he did assure us he would do so before his next guest arrived. Overall, fantastic place to stay!
Nous n'avons pas eu de chance, pas d'eau chaude, pas de lave vaisselle et draps pas propres

Anthony is a great communicator and we were able to check in easily and get anything addressed quickly. The house is in a great location, an older house but remodeled retaining elements of both. Was clean for the most part. We were a group of 7 and fit comfortably but keep in mind one of the walls between two bedrooms are French doors so there is a bit less privacy due to that, so you’ll have to be comfortable with that. Very convenient to St. Viateur bagels :) so a great place to see Montreal and really convenient place to park a car if you bring one.

Bonjour
Logement très agréable avec 3 grandes chambres confortables à deux pas du boulevard saint Laurent. Le propriétaire est très réactif à vos demandes, n’hesitez pas ;) tout le confort sur place, un séjour parfait pour nous !
Anthony was so responsive and helpful and nice! Place was as described and in a great location!

Great little
Place in Montreal:) so cute and stylish my friends and I loved staying here for spring break

Mile End a phenomenal neighbourhood. Jeans Jeans Jeans is 1 block away and what a great experience of buying jeans. Overall vibe of Mile End is great and accommodations fit perfect for our trip and our family (including picky/cool teens).
The place was in the most conveienent spot I've stayed in Montreal. The unit was huge! Great space for the 6 of us who stayed over!
The place has some potential.

The space was a little smaller than expected epically a space that advertises it can accommodate eight. 
.
 Since the bedrooms were so close to the common area / kitchen and or bathroom we all had to agree upon a time to sleep and wake so as not to disturb one another.  If eight guests sleep here they would probably be sleeping in the living room which is very close to the kitchen and bathroom and will surly wake anyone sleeping in it.
.
 There was a T.V. but it didn’t have any channels so it seemed a little redundant to have. 
.
All in all the space accommodated our needs that being to sleep, shower and eat but had we wanted to spend any time in the space, much more than we did we I would be on top of one another.  
.
 On a positive not the bed I slept in was VERY comfortable and did not move when shifted in my sleep so my partner was not disturbed. 
.
 Cafe's were very close by with great coffee.
.
Parking over the weekend was not a issue. Review parking for weekday stays.
. 
Check in was seamless.
Merci beaucoup ! Très beau logement, bien situé.
Great location. Not my favorite airbnb but it was fine, and check in/check out was very easy.
Great location, very clean and had all the amenities that our family needed. Anthony was very responsive to messages. Highly recommend this place.
Great location but a bit run down.

Wow! What a great stay... first of all this rental is in a perfect neighborhood- you have Mile End at your fingertips and the rest of the Plateau is not far. I loved just exploring the side streets. This place was a great value and definitely worth staying a bit farther from downtown. I would stay here again.

Our stay at Anthony’s place was comfortable and convenient for our family vacation (4 adults, 1 teen).  Beds were clean and comfortable.  The walls are a bit thin.  

We ate breakfast in the unit quite a bit and found that all the necessary supplies were present for cooking. The dishwasher was not in service.

The unit is a good value and has all necessary items for a nice stay.  Anthony was good about getting back to us. Recommend overall.

Exactly as listed. Beautiful space in a great neighbourhood, one block away from St Laurent’s amazing bars and restaurants. We slept 5 adults and two kids comfortably and really enjoyed the space. Anthony was a great host, the place was clean and his communication was fantastic. Highly recommend.
Anthony's apartment was very clean.  The location is perfect, close to shops, restaurants, bars, and a short drive into Old Montreal.
Easily the best host I've had. Responses were immediate, and Anthony was kind and accommodating. Loved the apartment -- exactly what we were looking for. 100% would recommend
Fantastic place in an amazing location. I would absolutely stay there again.

Staying at Anthony’s place was absolutely perfect-clean, cozy and had everything you need. The location is ideal if you don’t desire to be in the center of everything, but still close enough (walking distance to tons of amazing restaurants and shops). Additionally, Anthony was very accommodating to allow me to check in a little earlier. When I return to Montreal, I know where I am staying and where I would recommend others to stay!

Bonjour nous avons séjourner trois nuits nous étions 4 adultes avec trois enfants. le logement étaient trop petit. beaucoup d'électroménager ne fonctionnaient pas lave vaisselle, hôte et sèche linge. peu de vaisselle pour faire à manger. je ne le recommande pas pour les familles. l'hôte nous n'a pas accueillie et a laissé aucune information sur Montréal ou le logement
Anthony is a very welcoming host and his place is in a great location in Mile End. Thanks!

Really nice apartment, perfect location, and perfect to rent for a friends trip ! 
We did not met but Anthony was easily reachable and the instructions were clear to find and enter the apartment ! 
Very nice stay in Montréal !
Close to St. Laurent, a boulevard with numerous bars and restaurants. The Mile End section of the city was great, and only a 7 minute drive into Old Town Montreal.

Anthonys apartment is a great place to stay during your visit to Montreal. There are many places to eat nearby. The neighborhood felt safe and looked clean. Check in was very easy. Anthony was also very helpful with finding good places to eat, and he responded to our messages very quickly. We loved that the house was stocked with coffee for us to make every morning! We would definitely recommend this place!

Antony was very attentive to any issues we had and tried to remedy them as best he could.  He was very prompt in answering our messages and queries,  The living areas and kitchen were very clean and spacious, we liked the large table and the sofa was very comfortable.  The beds are comfortable and the sheets were clean.  We were disappointed by the condition of the outdoor terrace and the bathroom.  The apartment, being on the ground floor, was quite dark and the window looks out on a blank wall.  There is no terrestrial (Canadian) tv.
Great location, clean place. Would go back. Host was very helpful.
A beautiful place, close to everything, on weekends there is free parking which helps a lot and host was very nice and was always there when i needed anything during my stay!
Easy check in. Very nice location. Everything was as expected. No surprises!  Thanks. Would stay again.
Super fds
We had an enjoyable stay at Anthony's place.  Mile End is a fascinating neighbourhood.  We appreciated the proximity to Bixi Bikes as well as all the great shops and restaurants.

Great location, large and comfortable place for 5 people and very easy check in, parking and communication with our host! Amazing restaurants and stores nearby. Great neighborhood! Overall very satisfying experience!!

We had a great night's stay at this location! Check in was super easy and the beds were nice and comfortable. As another reviewer may have noted, parking is right across the street and free on weekends however I'm guessing paid on weekdays. Would definitely book again!
Great place, excellent location, easy check-in and out, Anthony is very communicative and obliging.

Our stay was amazing and that was because we had such beautiful accommodations as our home base. The place was charming, clean, the beds so comfortable, and close to all the amenities. For those with vehicles, parking was easy and free on the weekends. Anthony was quick to answer any questions, and provide tips to make our stay more hospitable. I would love to stay at this location again.
Anthony was a great host, but the pictures don’t give an honest idea of the condo. It is pretty small and a litter older than we anticipated. But all in all a fun experience.
Super bien!
Anthony’s place was just as expected and in a great location. Easy to communicate with and nice, Anthony was a great host.
Nice place. A bit smaller than I thought it would be. But everything else is wonderful. 10/10.
Perfect location , close to everything fun about Montréal. Parking was easy and the beds comfortable. Some renos would make it more attractive. Surprisingly quiet , not a busy street.
This was my 2nd visit here, location is great, Anthony is great and communication is clear and easy. Will be returning
C'est très confortable! On a manqué de rien.
Very nice place in a great location. Definitely considering rebooking for my next trip.

summary: Metro, epicerie,resto,bar etc....
description: Metro, epicerie,resto,bar etc....

reviews.comments: Ahmed was very friendly and accommodating. His home is very nice and not too far from downtown Montreal. About 25 mins with a short walk and then the metro is right there. Worked out perfectly.
Very clean room. Ahmed was hospitable and nice. Overall a great experience.
Super hôte, très accueillant et disponible, si vous voulez passer un moment à Montréal je vous conseil son toit.

name: New1Rm, JordansatsionAustinStationKowloonStation
summary: Newly renovated in July 2017. My apartment is located in front of the Austin MTR station or go across the bridge to Element, just ten min walk to Kowloon station (Go straight to the airport). Delicious restaurants and 24hours grocery store downstair. There is a lift in my building, so don't worry if you have luggage!
space: A living room with 3-seat sofa bed, wifi connection, 40" flat screen TV with HK channels,fridge, hairdryer...I'm sure you will love it!  GREAT LOCATION!

Delicious restaurants and 24hours grocery store downstair. There is a lift in my building, so don't worry if you have luggage! A living room with 3-seat sofa bed, wifi connection, 40" flat screen TV with HK channels,fridge, hairdryer...I'm sure you will love it!  GREAT LOCATION! - A bedroom with double bed 140*200cm - A living room with 3seat(URL HIDDEN)sofabed140*200cm - Free 1000Mbps wifi connection - Fresh & clean towels, shampoo and shower gel - A private Bathroom and toilet - Hairdryer - 40"flat screen TV - Fridge and freezer - Open kitchen: mini oven, kettle, cups, dishes... - Air conditionner Hope you will enjoy all this! If i am in town, it will be a pleasure to welcome you myself.  If i'm on a trip, you can self check in.  In case there is any problem, i have an Airbnb buddy who can help.
notes: The apartment, including all bedding and towels, will be thoroughly cleaned before your arrival. If you'd like to have the apartment clean during your stay, please let me know and i can arrange if for an extra cost of HK $200. 1- Please take your shoes off- especially on rainy days- you will help is keep our apartment special and clean for yourself and other guests. 2-Do not smoke in the apartment. 3-Hot water : To turn on the hot water, flip the switch outside the bathroom door, The water will take a few mins to heat up. Please turn off the hot water switch when hot water is not in use . 4-Air Con: Help us to save electricity and conserve the environment when you leave the flat. 5- The wifi password should be on the wall or table. 6- Rubbish: Rubbish removal is your responsibility. Please empty your rubbish in the bin in the stairwell. 7- Cleaning: Please keep out flat tidy. We will not come in to clean during your stay, but we can provide if you want to.   <>
