host.host_about:
Hello everybody!

My name is Dzd.  l'm new to here, but i will try my best to give u a wonderful stay. Every time when i travel, i always appreciate a clean, cosy and safe place to stay, thats why i want to give you the same experience when you're away from home.

Welcome to HK and enjoy my place :)

reviews.comments:
It is recommendable. I'd like to thank him that he tried to provide proper answers about my inquiries. I appreciated it.

The building itself was rather old, but the room was clean & neat. There are two air-conditioner having you stay cool. You can enjoy warm/hot showers as well. I didn't use kitchen this time. 

There are three door locks to get into the room. 1) a building's gate 2) Middle door lock outside of your room 3) the room. Their password consist of all numbers. After you're familiar with it, it would be no problem. Please just have it in mind. 

It is close to the Austin station. But if you want to go Central or its near stations, you need to transfer once. You could get Jordan or Tsim Sha Tsui station by walk, but it would be relatively long way. Please check. 

In conclusion, I enjoyed staying this room. Thanks for your reading.
房东和邻居非常热情,楼下全是吃的,还有美食街,房子设备齐全,位置非常好,去哪都很方便,下次来香港一定还会住!
交通非常便利,距离jordan､austin､九龙站很近,楼下有便利店､洗衣店､吃早餐､吃夜宵的地方,住的也很舒服
This room is really nice, 3 mins to MRT

The house is great and the location is near to  metro｡Although it is not spacious but enough for 2-3 people and the price is reasonable. There are many restaurant besides the house and you always can taste local food in that place. Besides, the owner is nice and patient to us, always gave more useful details for us.

Dzd is probably one of the most accommodating hosts I've stayed with! As it was our first time in hongkong, he sat down with us in his home and showed us restaurants, attractions, shopping areas on the map and subway line. As expected of HK real estate, his home is very small but clean and cozy. Its well air conditioned for the humid weather & really close to all amenities; restaurants, subway stations, shopping, street markets etc. The wall outlet converters we brought with us didn't work, and as soon as we asked, he managed to get us 4 of them. He also got us extra blankets and padding to make the sofa bed more comfortable. As we arrived in HK in typhoon season, he constantly messaged us to check up if we're okay- if we're trapped in the heavy rain, which is honestly so sweet of him! If we were to come back to HK again, we would definitely stay with Dzd!
房间干净整洁,房东人很好!热情周到｡条件也很完善｡位置不错,方便我去办事｡只是首次找还是费了些周折｡总之,一次很好的体验｡

Great location, easy access from the airport. Good for getting around Kowloon side of hk. Heaps of food and shopping close by. 

Small apartment but average for hk standards. We stayed with a young baby and it was JUST enough room. If you have a baby I'd recommend you bring an extra window shade as it was very bright in the room with the blind pulled down.

One of the best AirBnB's that I have stayed at! Place looked like it had just been renovated and was very clean with hotel quality towels and linens.  Dzd was very responsive and seemed to go out of his way to make sure I had anything I needed for the place or my itinerary.  Would definitely stay here again!

Dzd is very accommodating, a great host that answers all inquiries and would even help you when you're lost in streets. A very cozy place to stay in for its affordable price:) we really enjoyed staying in Dzd's place will def come back
good place to stay. Dmz very helpful.

Dzd was the perfect host from the moment we booked until check out. He went above and beyond to make sure we knew our way around HK and even met us/offered to show us around numerous times. Nothing was too much trouble. His flat is in a great location and was spotless. Thanks again Dzd for an amazing stay in Hong Kong.
everything is perfect. The location great and downstairs has so many food choice. The room is super clean and enough for 3ppl.
这是一次愉快的住宿体验,Dzd非常热情周到,耐心的回答我们的各类问题!房间也很棒 安全､干净､整洁,很适合旅行住宿｡地理位置是步行也可到尖沙咀 海港城,很方便｡楼下的餐厅选择种类很多,营业到很晚,正餐宵夜都可以满足需要｡总之,下次的香港行他家是首选!

Awesome host. Was very helpful. Place is very nice and very good location. Maybe a 15 min-20 min walk to places like K11 mall in TST. A 24 hour 7-11 is on the corner and the place is quiet safe. Very clean

The location of the flat is superb, really easy to get to from the airport. Near kaoloon and austin stations.
The flat is small as described but with the location and cost that is fair enough. Dzd was very attentive as a host with good tips. We really enjoyed our stay!

홍콩을 관광하기에 최적의 장소와 
위치 시설을 모두 겸비하였습니다.
호스트의 설명이없었더라면 집 주변에 유명한 로컬 식당들을 놓칠 뻔 하였는데, 직접 집밖으로 함께 나와 이곳 저곳 설명해주셨습니다. 홍콩은 초행길이라 걱정이었는데, 친절한 호스트를 만나 여행에 두려움은 잊게되었습니다.

우리는 그의 세심한 배려가 너무 감사했고, 홍콩을 다시 방문한다면 Mr. Dzd의 숙소를 재방문 하고 싶습니다.

고마웠습니다 Mr.Dzd! 또 뵈요
Outstanding host, very helpful and great tips!

Dickson is a very accommodating host. Never hesitated to offer tips on things to do as well has helpful advice on how to get around the town. His place is very clean and he provides you with anything you would need to stay on your trip. The place looks recently remodeled.

Dzd’s apartment is really amazing! He is a great host, fast in replies and is always available when you need some advice in where to visit in HK or if you need replenishment of household items during the stay. The apartment is very clean and facilities are very new and of good quality! The place is also very convenient, its walking distance to 3 different MTR stations and even if you take cab to town areas, its very affordable! There is also 24 hours convenient stores and restaurants just below the block which make our lives as night owls so much more convenient. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone who wish to visit hong kong! :) Big thumbs up! Thank you!

Thanks for sharing your lovely place with us.  It was a little small (this is HK after all) but very cozy for the three of us.  It was meticulously clean and is very convenient to get around HK.   Austin station is just a few minutes walk and so is Mong Kok and all the eateries nearby.  We definitely would rent from here again when we come back.

Dickson was a wonderful host. He communicated clearly before, during, and after our stay. Since I was arriving late Dickson indicated he would meet us at the bus stop. Walking back with us, he also showed us how to access the unit along with an intro of the flat. The unit is small but this is not uncommon in Hong Kong. Very clean and modern. Plus there was a hot plate with utensils and a small bar fridge as well. We wished that there was a closet but there were hooks on the wall with hangers which was sufficient. I would definitely stay here again. The location is fantastic and our host was superb!

I really enjoyed my stay at Dzd's apartment. it was a great way to experience the real Hong Kong. Dzd was a considerate and efficient host. The apartment was comfortable and clean. Bed was cozy. Bathroom had plenty of hot water. I had the best dim sum that I have ever had across the street at DimDimSum restaurant. I only wish I had found this apartment earlier. A great value for Hong Kong.
周遭生活機能非常方便,距離地鐵站也很近,相當推薦大家來玩!

If Location is what you are looking for, this compact apartment (by HK standards, normal size) is the best place to be. Located in the central part of the city, it is walking distance to the Kowloon station (airport express) and two other metro stations. Being central, a variety of supermarkets, eating joints are in the vicinity; the night market and Nathan road are just a few minutes away. The apartment is quite modern, good for two people (three becomes a crowd, unless it is a small child). It consists of a living room with a sofa cum bed, a bedroom and a bath-cum-toilet, all compact. The access is through electronic key, so there were no issues of handing over keys at time of check-in/out. The wifi in this place is quite good. The presence of kettle, hot plate, OTG, fridge, along with the necessary utensils gives flexibility. The apartment has only one window in the bedroom (other than bathroom); with other tall buildings in the vicinity, there is no great view of the outside - just the street and the next building. 
The host was great in terms of responsiveness, be it any problem in the apartment (hardly any), tips on where to eat, visit, etc. 
Had a great time visiting HK and this apartment added to it. Overall, for two persons, recommended.
Good place for couple, and solo travelers. Very convenient and easy access to the MTR. The place is clean.

Brilliant location, conveniently located close to the city centre of Hong Kong, Dzd’s apartment was located right next to Austin MTR Station and Kowloon MTR Station, making it easily accessible and a breeze to get around, at the same time not overwhelmingly busy, unlike Mong Kok or Tsim Sha Tsui which can get too crowded at times. There is also a high-end shopping mall named Elements, located just round the corner where there is a wide range of different shops, restaurants and a supermarket selling an extensive range of both local and international produce. In addition, there are also plenty of different restaurants, supermarkets and convenience stores located just downstairs. 

The apartment was spotlessly clean, neat & tidy, very comfortable bedding, huge TV in the living room and the apartment was also of a very good size for Hong Kong. Plus points for the heartwarming extra touches such as instant noodles, packaged drinks and snacks that the host left for us. Dzd was also really helpful throughout our stay, communicating with us, catering to our every need and helping us with transportation around the city. All in all, we had a great time in Hong Kong and we look forward to coming back again.
Nice host.  Place is as described. Newly renovated and clean.
The apparent was great and the location is the best! Walking distance to all the great places to visit in Hong Kong.

Great location to stay at. 
Amenities complete with basic toiletries.
Easy to get to the airport and from the airport.
Great place if you’re looking for something that is: close to public transport, clean and modern whilst at a reasonable price.

Dzd's place was tidy and although smaller than expected, it was enough for our short stay (only needed to shower and sleep). He also checked in on us to make sure everything was going well and if any issues. Communication and response time was superb!

We were 3 and we spent 4 nights at Dzd’s cosy appartement. The appartement is about 5 minutes’ walk from the subway station and very clean. Ddz was very nice and helpful, he gave us suggestions about where to visit and where to do shoppings. With his help, we spent 4 wonderful days in Hongkong. We recommend him and his appartement with no hesitation.

My stay at Dzd' s place was impeccable! Located walking distance from the MTR and the Airport Express, walking distance from Temple Street, and with restaurants and convenient stores nearby, the location is perfect for travellers to explore. The place itself was extremely clean, and with all the necessary amenities (high speed internet a nice plus!). Good use of space, and the bathroom is a comfortable size. Highlight of my stay was the host Dzd, who was a great communicator thay was always keeping an open dialogue, and always happy to answer questions and provide recommendations. His responses were very prompt. Would definitely stay again!

The place is really strategic, closely to temple street and what we really like is cheap shopping along jordan street. Cheap clothes with good quality :D :D
Restaurants, 7eleven, station, bus stop is near by. So mongkok, tsim tsa shui, causeway bay can be reach less than one hour.
But the room so freezy for us whos coming from tropic island. Bcoz no heater on the room, but other facilities that write in the list are working good. We like this place. Thank you dickson for your hospitality. :)
Over all, we reccomend this place. Worth for the money.
Dzd非常热情,住处离地铁和尖沙咀都不远,楼下就有糖水店和茶餐厅,离庙街也很近,玩了好几天都很好,房东给了很多建议,都很实用,非常感谢~
很不错的体验,靠近地铁站太方便了

This flat was amazingly clean, worth the price. Altho it was a bit small, but I think its common in HK since they dont have big lands there. The landlord also very very intuitive, and friendly. I arrived at hongkong in the last flight and late night. Its chinese new year and i got lost. But i called him and he was very quick response and guide me to the apartment. He checked me in many times when i was in hongkong and gave me tips about hongkong local foods n market.
房子干净整洁,东西一应俱全,交通也非常方便附近餐厅超市都有距离街市也很近,房主人也特别好!推荐!

Dickson is a very good host. He communicated well throughout and provided comprehensive instructions. The place is decent but from western standards it is pretty small, suitable more for 1 person. 2 people is a bit of a squeeze but given that it is HK it’s relative and comparable.

We enjoyed a pleasant stay at this cozy unit. It is extremely clean and close to MTR station and there are nice restaurants downstairs. Dzd is very friendly and helpful. He always replied promptly and often checked us to see if everything was going well. Thank you Dzd so much for hospitality and I would recommend this place to my friends who will visit HK!

Convenient location between two main train stations! The apartment itself is quite small but that's the standard in HongKong - It was comfortable and cozy for two of us. Dzd was an amazing host. He responded to our questions very quickly and provided us items that ran out in the room so efficiently when asked.
Location very convenient and room was neat and tidy

Staying here put my trust back in AirBnB - after a long flight, it was really nice for Dickson to come and meet me at the airport bus stop and walk me and my luggage directly to the accommodation. We dropped off my bags and then he walked me halfway to the ferry terminal to the mainland, which is where I was going next. You wouldn't get that level of service with most hotels.
Although there's quite a lot of construction going on in this bit of Kowloon, and it's a busy area, the place is modern and the apartment is scrupulously clean. I really liked the modern keypad entry system with digits that flash on and off, so futuristic compared with my bunch of keys back home.
The apartment is small but for a solo traveller it's ideal. There's aircon in the bedroom and also in the living room/kitchen, and a fridge too. The bathroom is small but the space is used effectively. The whole place is covered in clean monochrome grey tiles, including the walls. There's some nice touches like jasmine tea and some snacks.
As I did say, it's a busy area so you can hear traffic noise (especially the beeping of the pedestrian crossing) but I slept soundly with earplugs. You can also hear pigeons but they're on the outside so that's not a problem!
The one thing that I will remember was the fire alert (on my first day). I had left the apartment and came back a few hours later to find the area sealed off with police tape and firemen with water hoses everywhere. Not sure where it was, but thankfully we were back inside an hour or so later and everything was fine!

Descriptions written in the listing are all accurate and genuine. Dzd is a thoughtful host, he's been following up with our whereabouts and have given us useful tips during our stay in Hong Kong. Highly recommended!
Dzd was a great host and he response quickly. The place was clean and the bed was comfortable.  There was a good dim sum place just downstairs.  It was a nice stay.

Dzd is a very nice host, he was very prompt with communication and his informations for check in were very clear.His house is closed to the subway and everything is so close by.We had  a  great HK experience. Thx very much~
Location was perfect! Quick responds from Dickson too. Highly recommend.
The location is very convenience. Also the unit is very clean and fully renovated.. Dickson also responded very quickly for those questions that we had.
房子的位置很方便,距离地铁站和油麻地很近,周围生活场所便利,房间温馨舒适,强烈推荐｡
房主很细心地介绍了交通路线,有问必答超nice,房间的居住感也挺好,⸜(* ॑꒳ ॑* )⸝必须好评

Great place and location. Everything we needed and more. Communication was excellent. Thank you also for info about  bag drop at Jordan Station. We were able to book and get our boarding passes at the station and get our luggage booked back to Auckland airport.  Hong Kong is an amazing place. Loved the restaurants near the apartment and close to all the amenities.
来香港好多次｡最满意的一次住宿,环境干净整洁｡老板人好,沟通快捷,家里所有家具均可以使用｡包括冰箱 微波炉 电视空调 热水器｡各种用具使用方便,还准备贴心棉签和咖啡 ｡房间密码锁很安全,个人建议如果能在房间内加个二次安全锁就完美了｡楼下就是吃的 走2分钟就到地铁口｡走10分钟到尖沙咀 ｡祝老板生意兴隆

I recommend this house !
The host is awesome and the room is wonderful.
It is a good place when you visit Hong Kong and locates perfectly location of Hong Kong.
It is convenient to go everywhere !
地理位置便利,房间干净整洁,很适合旅游居住

We booked two units in the floor. This one bedroom unit has quite a spacious living room, a toilet and bath and a bedroom that nicely fits a queen-sized bed. All amenities are readily available so it is very convenient. The Austin MTR station is within 5 minutes walk away and the Jordan station is about 10 minutes away. We were a family consisting of a couple, an infant and an elderly who just underwent hip replacement surgery and the location allows us easy access to places we wanted to visit. On the ground floor of the same building are lots of eateries and a few convenience stores nearby or across the street. The host was very helpful and concerned of our well-being and our stay. He was very responsive to questions and provided a lot of guide and help. Overall we had a very comfortable and pleasant stay at both units from the same host.
房东热心,少走很多弯路,房间很干净,楼下很多小吃店,尤其是点点心,美味实惠｡位置绝佳,尖沙咀10分钟路程方便快捷,屋内设施一应俱全,床略短,有点小挤,电视很清楚,看了几天世界杯非常爽,期待下次旅港!
位置很好,离地铁站都很近,房间也符合描述,和照片上完全一样,房东人很热情,有问题都能解决,会推荐给其他人入住

地理位置特别便利｡到柯士甸,九龙车站两条线步行,去尖沙咀,中环都不需要换车｡到圆方走路5分钟｡房东人非常的好,很亲切,他知道很多香港旅游的信息,很耐心热心的帮我们解答,有时候我们想不到的注意事项都会提醒到,交通,购物,怎么省钱的办法｡很感动｡房间很新很干净,电视超级大!看着爽｡让我吃惊的是连床品都很舒适,毛巾也很柔软｡性价比非常高的房间｡唯一的遗憾可能是房间面积不是很大,如果两个太高的人(180+)睡一张床可能觉得窄｡
Great place to stay at as transportation is convenient. Host responded questions quickly and provided recommendations. I would recommend Dzd’s place if anyone ask.
地点非常方便,距离中港和海港城非常近,步行就能逛街｡强烈推荐｡

The host was helpful person:)..... Room is very clean and comfortable to stay. But I chose wrong time because now this building is interior repairing, very noisy in day time since morning......:(

But I really like this room. And I wanna come back to stay again next time. I hope the interior repair is finished.
房東超級熱心,從一下飛機到離開香港~都一直保持聯絡而且給我們很多建議｡非常推薦!
위치는 굉장히 좋습니다. 하지만 냉장고 소음이 너무심해 밤에 잠을 잘 수 없을 도여서 어쩔수없이 냉장고 전원코드를 뽑아야합니다. 그리고 소파베드는 딱딱해서 잠을 청하기 불편합니다. 3인보다는 2인이 이용하기에 적당합니다.

Dickson was very nice and helpful person... the place as expected and close to MTR Austin. Walking distance to Kowloon station... where we could check in our bags and heading to airport few hours after the bags... that's awesome... Dickson told us about this... so thank you so much...

Dzd人很好!非常的热情好客,我有幸见到了Dzd,他是一个很有礼貌并且很帅的男生｡因为我带着2个小孩来香港旅游,Dad推荐了很多适合亲子的景点介绍我们去玩儿真是太棒了!回复信息也很迅速,在他身上我们感受到了优质､热情!看到了做为房东认真负责的态度!领略了他风趣优雅的谈吐｡房间的地理位置很便利 !离机场不远 也不堵车,巴士和地铁全都能达到,适合游客居住 ｡荃湾线的佐敦和西铁线的柯士甸都能快速步行到达非常便利｡周边配套设施有超市､药店､甜品店 ,各式餐厅,特别便利一应俱全!房间内装饰简约时尚!能想到的设备设施房间都有 !周到贴心!房间卫生很干净一尘不染 ,公寓大楼很安全!三道密码锁!(公寓大门､楼层､房间)带孩子来玩很放心.再次感谢Dzd给我们提供当地生活建议!他家的公寓非常适合旅游居住!我们有机会再来香港会首选!
房間乾淨整潔,而且比起一般香港的飯店大,離廟街很近晚上吃宵夜方便,地點很好,如果有三個人的建議可以住這裡!
房东是很好的人~很热情的告诉我们路线 房源位置也很好外面就有地铁站和巴士站 交通非常方便 房间虽然小但是很干净整洁 一家人住也没有问题的~
位置真的非常便利,去哪都很方便,房间很干净,性价比不错

숙소 너무 깨끗했습니다!
호스트 친절하셨구요!
밥을 해먹을 수 있는 도구는 다 있었고, 샴푸 린스와 바디샴프 다 구비되어 있었습니다. 칫솔치약은 가져가셔야 합니다.
와이파이 잘 되구요!

공항에서 택시로 약25분 걸리고 택시비는 250원 정도 나왔습니다.
택시 내려서 바로 알려준 비밀번호로 들어가서 편리했습니다.

깨끗하고 저렴하게 실속있게 지내기 좋은 곳입니다!
It was a very small space

위치, 청결, 가격 다 매우 만족함. 사진을 봤을 땐 세명이 숙박해도 크게 문제 없어 보이나, 실제론 두명이 사용하기에 적당해 보임. 
호스트가 세심한 배려가 매우 돋보임(돼지코 등 기타 생활용품). 다시 방문할 용의가 있음.
房东非常热情,及时回复消息,提供了实用的信息｡房子虽然很小,但地理位置不错,比较干净｡楼下有超市,门口的饭店比庙街性价比高,而且味道不错｡客厅的空调会时不时的有排水的声音,所以晚上睡眠会受影响｡
第四次到香港啦 这是一个非常干净的房间 适合带小朋友的一家三口居住 交通便利 房东很热情 还给我们出行建议 在香港期间非常感谢Dzd对我们的帮助
Amazing location!
The place is very centre, easy to reach the destinations. The dimsum restaurant which opposite the apartment is really great.
this place was small but useful. it was clean and cozy. Austin, Jordan, Kowloon station was close! very good! and Tsim Sha Tsut is close. it was best hostel for us.

Dickson was an amazing host. It’s the little things that people appreciate when staying at an Airbnb and Dickson knew how to be there for his guests. He always responded quickly, was sensitive to our flight time when leaving and accommodated what we needed, and the location was excellent! Thanks for an amazing stay Dickson, would highly recommend to our friends and family.

This is a really lovely apartment which is cozy and clean. I had a good time with my friends here. In the meanwhile, it is convenient for travelers to take buses or subways. The location is so wonderful~ Finally, thanks for this nice place.
Dzd was really nice and very helpful. The place was nice and comfortable with everything you need during your stay. It’s close to Australia Diary Company(10 mins walk) and we like it.
Très bon séjour, Dzd est un hôte attentif et prévenant. Le logement est fonctionnel et idéalement placé pour découvrir Hong Kong.

Quick response !
Convenient location, different types of asian cuisine right at your door steps.
Worth the money !
location easily accessible to MTR.. great host very responsive..
是个位置很好的地段,推荐
Great location. Easy access to MTR, bus and China Ferry terminal
Clean, Location is near to MTR station , fast response from dzd , wifi is fast

This apartment is really conveniently located next to major transit lines (bus, subway, and bullet train), as well as upstairs from a grocery store and all-night food places. The host was great, and gave very clear directions for getting to the space and getting in. The space itself was very clean, and included a variety of tourist information for us to use. Made for a great home base; thank you so much!
Dzd详细的告知了大厦的位置,让我们很顺利的就找到了地方｡大厦楼下有各种美食,最爱点点心｡出行也很方便,步行五分钟即是Austin站,跨年的时候从海港城走回来大概也就二十分钟吧｡下次到香港的时候,还可以选择这里｡

It was just right size for 2 people at the location in front of Austin station.
And It was very good for us because there are ferries for Macau soon.
Dzd! Thank you so much.
环境一流,楼下有许多餐饮各种选择,而且购买生活用品非常方便｡房间和卫浴都非常干净｡总体来说非常不错的体验｡

Квартира имеет отличное расположение, метро в шаговой доступности. В непосредственной близости много кафе и магазин 7/11. Недалеко имеется рынок и несколько торговых центров. 
Сама квартира очень чистая, имеются все необходимые принадлежности, приятным бонусом от хозяина была бутилированная вода и конфетки)))  Быстрый wi fi, а главное работал он без перебоя.
Соотношение цена/качество идеальное!
Хозяин квартиры очень оперативно отвечал на все вопросы и всегда готов был помочь.
Очень удобно, что замок в квартире электронный. Ни мы не были привязаны к одному ключу и ни к встрече с хозяином квартиры. 
Лично для себя решила, при следующей поездке в Гонк Конг по возможности  опять остановлюсь в квартире Dzd.
很棒的地方!房東也很有耐心,給了很多建議!
Good location. Near to MTR. Fast response to enquiries and Dzd have provide some suggestions to get around hong kong prior to our trip! Great host indeed!
謝謝 Dzd 提供離地鐵站近,房內設施完善的房間,又熱心回答疑難問題,再次感謝,有機會再造訪

在寸土寸金的香港,DZD的屋子首先地理位置好,交通方便｡楼下有点点心茶餐厅等,佐敦道上各种饮食十分方便｡进屋密码,监控,感觉很安全｡一个主卧可睡两人,客厅沙发床可睡一人｡独立的卫生间,有浴帘,干湿分离｡还有电磁炉,热水壶,烤箱,小冰箱等,自己煮食也很方便｡个人觉得大小非常适合两三个人小住｡主人打扫得十分干净整洁,主人还准备了雨伞,洗漱用品等,体贴周到｡唯一觉得缺憾的是床的长度比内地的标准床短了点,估计一米八的大个子要弯着腿,或者斜着睡觉了｡
A nice place to stay and incredible location as there are so many MTR stations nearby

reviews.comments: The apartment is a real treasure!Very close to Times Square.You can find a lot of restaurants nearby,as it is located in a foodie heaven, "Hell's kitchen".And a host is amazing and very easygoing,couldn't find a better roommate for my stay.
My friend loved your caring attitude and location of your home. Thank you so much for your kind hospitality!

Muy buena host, siempre dispuesta a ayudar con tu panorama. El departamento es muy central, con varios locales de comidas y demás al rededor. Un barrio muy seguro para recorrer tranquilamente. Excelente experiencia

This was my first Airbnb stay, and it could not have gone any better!

1. Location
The place is located in a central area (Hell's Kitchen), yet it will not be as chaotic and noisy than if you stayed at a hotel in Times Square. It's just two blocks away from the theater district and Times Square. Plenty of food options (just a block away from Gotham Market). And if you need to get anywhere, the subway stop is two blocks away too. The neighborhood is safe, even if you come back late at night/early in the morning. I never felt unsafe.

2. Apartment
The apartment is a modern, minimalistic look, so it is not one of those historical NY apartments. It is much sleeker than even hotels I've stayed, even the lobby. You are granted one key access, both for the building and the apartment. The photos are 100% accurate on what you will expect.

3. Bedroom 
The bedroom is pretty small, because the bed is large. But you get a walk-in closet to put your luggage and clothes! There is plenty of sunlight seeping in as well. 

4. Host
The host is excellent! She responds very quickly and is able to accommodate you with almost everything. She even serves breakfast!

Whether you're traveling alone (like me) or with a family, you will not be disappointed in staying here.

The house was well decorated, in a good location.
Brandy is very nice.
It's recommended if you look for a room and not the whole apartment to yourself.

Our stay here was wonderful! Such a great location and only a 10 min easy walk to time square and about the same to most plays and restaurants. We had an air problem the first night and she went above and beyond making sure it was corrected so we were comfortable.  Very sweet and look forward to her coming our way one day to Nashville.

Brandy was a great host and made us feel so welcome. She was very good at communicating with us, and let us drop off our bags before and after check in which was so convenient. The apartment is very clean, and Brandy made us feel so welcome! The rooftop patio is a must, ate dinner and breakfast up there and the view is unbeatable. 
Overall, an amazing stay in NYC!
Host is responsive and location is decent
Overall We had a very good day! Feliz was a very good host! Bed was very comfortable! Had expected apartment overall to be slightly cleaner!
The place was amazing! It's ideally located on the upper West side. Very clean, quiet. Feliz was an great host! Will def book again!

The pictures are 100% accurate - the room was really modern, minimalistic and clean. Communication was great, Feliz replied really really quickly. Lots of really good restaurants nearby, especially Ollie’s Sichuan :)
We had a great time staying at Feliz's place it was very clean and very accurate. She was such a kind host and we would definitely stay with her again.
The host canceled this reservation 83 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 33 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

PROs
*The place is very convenient as it is in Midtown area (Especially for first timers in the city)
*There are lots of good places to eat in the area as well
*Feliz was friendly and willing to chat and help you with whatever questions you have about the city
*She was willing to share her coffee too! :) 
CONs
*In her ad, she mentions that she takes pride in having a spotless living environment, however that was not the case when we were there. We unfortunately had to ask her about replacing garbage bags and cleaning stains on the kitchen counter among others.
*In the ad as well, it is mentioned that the place has a large living room area, but what you actually see on the photo is the actual area. It's not large and just enough for a couple of people
*I gave her a heads up that we were going to be four people staying and asked if that was okay and if she had extra mattresses. In one of her messages, she specifically mentioned that she had 1 queen bed and 2 "high quality" floor mattresses. The queen bed was perfect when we got there, but we had no "high quality" mattresses. One of us had to sleep in two comforters put together on the floor for about 9 nights. The other slept in a foldable mattress, clearly not the "high quality" type. But it did its job.

Overall we think it's still worth it staying in her place. We just think she probably needs to either change her ad about certain things or make necessary changes with the "mattresses" she has. And also we think it would help if she will buys a new trashcan in the bathroom as it is broken. :)
Enjoyed our stay. Location was very convenient to man of Manhattan's attraction. Would recommend!!

Appartement très propre correspondant aux photos dans un quartier proche de tout. On s’y sent en sécurité. Et c’est super calme (sauf quand un livreur se trompe de sonnettes à 3h du matin  mais ca ce n’est pas de sa faute )! La literie est très agréable. Nous n’avons pas eu la chance de rencontrer Feliz mais elle a répondu à toutes nos interrogations par message très rapidement. Je recommande chaudement ce logement
Great time staying with Feliz. Flexible and Welcoming. The place is clean and quiet. The place is located near everything.
Nothing personal I am certain that Feliz is a great individual, when it comes to business however, most definitely needs work.
Nice place in a great location near lots of places to eat and close to public transportation

The location was perfect (right at the centre of Manhattan!!). It’s very close to one of the main metro stations and very convenient move around. The flat is stylish and the room is spacious. Feliz is easy-going and it was comfortable to stay with her.
I think this is one of the best places in this app to book. Host was one of a kind, helpful, clean and everything! Don't miss it. I'd definitely stay again.
Feliz is a great host, she helped me out a lot during my trip, and her place was so modern, clean and convenient.

Feliz was very sweet, her place is super clean and the bed and linens were exceptionally comfortable as was the bathroom.  It's  very quiet on the street as well which is great when youre ready to hit the sack and sleep well.  She gave great tips on local restaurants that were superb. Definitely recommend staying there!

Feliz is very nice. The mattress was comfortable and our room was fine. There are many nice restaurants and businesses near the apartment. Walking to Times Square was very easy. An Uber back or forth ran about $9.

Was in town for an event and her location to Javits was a breeze of a walk (About 10-15 min walk) Didn't have to take the subway and the great part is the restaurants surrounding her apartment. 
The pictures are pretty accurate of her place and the security for her apartment  complex is secure and safe. I really appreciate how Feliz allowed me to check in early and was accommodating with my schedule.  The only tidbit we had was the Internet service not working (which sucked since we couldn't get much signal with our phones as we're surrounded by brick) and some used dishes in the sink. 
We didn't mind the dishes since we had no use for the kitchen, and it could be in part that we checked in at an earlier time than intended. So in the end I'm not bothered by it at all. 
Overall her place is clean and is friendly walking distance to restaurants. I will definitely book another stay here if I come with a friend or two.
Thanks Feliz for being a really nice host! The appartments location is perfect

My girlfriend and I enjoyed staying with Feliz. She lives in a prime location (about 10-20 minute walk from every tourist attraction). She was also a welcoming host, and her space was comfortable to stay in.
The bed was so incredibly comfortable. It was a little hot but we didn’t really bother doing anything about it lol. I’ll miss that bed.

Nothing to say about the flat itself, which is nice a well located. Unfortunately this wasn’t our best stay in NYC.. even though Feliz is a genuinely nice person, she makes you feel like a guest in her own place, while we paid a consistent amount of money for renting out the room. This happens when the host is living in the flat she is renting. Also, she complained about our going in and out with luggages, though we were on a business trip and no options - we had to carry our work in an out for meetings in the city. The flat was sufficiently clean, a part from the bathroom that after two days of several people taking a shower was quite dirty. And it remained dirty until we left. Last but not least, there were way too many rules to follow (don’t use the main entrance, don’t talk to people, don’t use the kitchen, etc.). We felt like in a Boot Camp! So, if you want a relaxing time and you wanna feel good at home, don’t book this place.

Unfortunately we missed fresh towels, bed sheets and toiletpaper when we first arrived. Sadly there was no small-talk communication at all or any NY tips from the hosts side. Bedroom was big enough, quiet area and the bed was comfortable. The apartment location is good though, it just takes 10 minutes to walk to the Time Square.

Feliz is a great host. She is lovely and super helpful. Would recommend without a doubt and definitely wish to stay there again next time I'm in NYC. 
Location is perfect. Within walking distance to many locations as well as shops, subway stations, and really nice restaurants and bars.
The apartment is beautiful and very clean. Can't say enough how good the bed is, I slept so well!
Also the shower is incredible. Instent hot water and really good water pressure. 
Overall a fantastic stay, and I would recommend the anyone looking for a place in NYC.

Overall, great value for money. The place is in a luxurious residential building - quiet, close to everything in Manhattan. In reality, the room is cozier than it looks on the pictures. The bed is, indeed, legendary! Feliz is very nice - she definitely has a sense of privacy, but she is also ready to help with whatever she could. I highly recommend!

A great location if you plan to spend your time in lower-Manhattan.  Within walking distance of Broadway/Times Square.  As a single female I felt very comfortable being in the neighborhood and walking around by myself at night.

my boyfriend and I spent 9 nights at Feliz ... and I must say that we were pleasantly satisfied.

feliz welcomed us personally, the room was very cozy and well arranged, we found several clean towels for us and a walk-in closet at our disposal.

feliz is a very discreet host, has always done everything to not invade our privacy and leave as much as possible the common spaces (such as the bathroom)

The location is perfect just 10 minutes walk from time square and the area is full of shops and restaurants of all kinds, even the subway is very close.

Feliz is discreet and very helpful

we can not help but highly recommend this accommodation

Feliz ist eine nette Gastgeberin und hat uns gut empfangen. Das Schlafzimmer war sehr sauber und das Bett bequem. Es konnte je nachdem knapp werden für 2 Personen auf dem Bett, es hat jedoch noch eine Matratze vor Ort, die Notfalls auf dem Boden platziert werden kann. Wir haben uns in der Wohnung und Nachbarschaft wohl gefühlt. Der nahe gelegene Supermarkt mit Kaffee-Ecke ist ideal und die Nachbarschaft ist sehr sicher. Wir haben uns nie unwohl oder unsicher gefühlt. Die Wohnung an sich war sehr modern und schön, leider war das Badezimmer jedoch stark verschmutzt. Sowohl die Dusche, als auch die Toilette waren sehr dreckig und für jemanden, der es sehr gerne sauber hat, nicht ideal. Die Toilette war unter dem Deckel voll von Kot und in der Dusche waren viele schwarze Stellen ersichtlich. Die restliche Wohnung war sauber. Leider hat uns Feliz erst 24 Stunden vor unserer Anreise mitgeteilt, dass sie gezügelt hat und die Wohnung neu an einem anderen Ort liegt. Das ist viel zu spät, so konnten wir in kürze auch keine Alternative mehr suchen. Die neue Wohnung war zwar im selben viertel, jedoch immerhin 15 Minuten zu Fuss vom gebuchten Standort entfernt. Die Wohnung ist sicher für Einzelpersonen oder Paare geeignet und man hat nur 10 Minuten Fussweg zu einer grösseren U-Bahn-Station und 10 Minuten Fussweg zum Central Park. Wem also Sauberkeit nicht so wichtig ist und wer gerne zu Fuss die Stadt kennenlernen möchte, der ist sicher bei diesem Apartment richtig.
Super Lage in Central Park Nähe, schnelle Kommunikation und Entgegenkommen bei späterem Check-in.

El apartamento es recomendable. Amplio, soleado, con lo esencial para pasar unos días. La ubicación es muy buena, cuesta abajo se llega en 10min andando a lo que empieza a ser el centro histórico de Oporto. neighborhood_overview: The building is located in the city centre, in Eixample area,  which is the heart of Barcelona.   The area is perfect for daily activities but has also nightlife.  You can walk to main Gaudi's buildings . There are really important and typical spanish restaurants nearby such as ' La Flauta' and l'Escriba.
transit: The  flat is 5 min walk from Plaça Catalunya , 5 min walk from Rambla Catalunya and Passeig de Gracia and near Gotic neighbourhood.  There is a direct bus in front of the house that will drive you to Barceloneta Beach which will only take about 20 min  . The bus from the  airport   also stops in front of the house and the ride is no more than 30 min.  Therefore you will be able to walk to all the main tourist attractions as well as enjoy the Barcelona real lifestyle.
access: You will have access to the kitchen and the living room as well as the main gallery.
interaction: We are two sisters  from Barcelona who are  willing to accommodate you in our master bedroom . We will try our best to  help you enjoy your stay in Barcelona by giving you all the information we have about the area and the best places to visit.

name: Cozy And Quiet Getaway (Queen Size Bed)
summary: Perfect for travelling privately to NYC or working at Amazon or SIUH. Very Accessible to 24 Hr Transportation (S53 Bus and Staten Island Railroad (SIRR) Nearby).  Reach Manhattan in 30 Mins via Express Bus. Fast WIFI. Includes Access To Kitchen, Dining Room, Living Room, and Shared Bathroom. Tons of amenities nearby. Grocieries, Restaruants, Laundry, & Cafe'! Get a whopping discount when you book a month (min. 28 days)!
space: A peaceful space for people to come and affordably visit NYC. Perfect for travelling business people as well. Fast Internet and lots of room.
description: Perfect for travelling privately to NYC or working at Amazon or SIUH. Very Accessible to 24 Hr Transportation (S53 Bus and Staten Island Railroad (SIRR) Nearby).  Reach Manhattan in 30 Mins via Express Bus. Fast WIFI. Includes Access To Kitchen, Dining Room, Living Room, and Shared Bathroom. Tons of amenities nearby. Grocieries, Restaruants, Laundry, & Cafe'! Get a whopping discount when you book a month (min. 28 days)! A peaceful space for people to come and affordably visit NYC. Perfect for travelling business people as well. Fast Internet and lots of room. Your private room. Share full bath. Share full kitchen. Share huge living room  . Yoga room.  Car parking. Fridge one shelf. Shared all appliances. Pots and cutlery. We  Check around airbnb space every day. Clean common area once a week. Call or text anytime. Busy Neighborhood at the intersection of culture and comfort. Local Restaurants serve up local flavors. Stores Nearby for groceries. Gym Nearby. Fantastic NYC Chinese Food Ne
neighborhood_overview: Busy Neighborhood at the intersection of culture and comfort. Local Restaurants serve up local flavors. Stores Nearby for groceries. Gym Nearby. Fantastic NYC Chinese Food Nearby (Golden Star). Dominoes and NY Pizza Nearby
notes: No Smoking, No Pets. No littering around the house. Throw  your room trash in proper cans outside the house. Turn off lights and AC when not around. Keep furniture in the space provided. Big storage closet available in the room.
transit: Plenty of Street Parking. Also Close to MTA Bus (S53 Line) and Staten Island Railroad (SIRR).
access: Your private room. Share full bath. Share full kitchen. Share huge living room  . Yoga room.  Car parking. Fridge one shelf. Shared all appliances. Pots and cutlery.
interaction: We  Check around airbnb space every day. Clean common area once a week. Call or text anytime.
house_rules: - Quiet Hours Begin at 10 PM Every Night - Keep The House Clean - No Smoking on the Property - Treat House As Your Own - No Loud Noises - No Going On The Balcony must clean dishes and sink and oven within 30 minutes of cooking. no guests allowed without hosts permission. must pay for the guest first. no elaborated cooking. no trying out new dishes.  throw out your own kitchen cooking trash. make a bag and throw out in the cans. maintain the cleaning of the house.  keep fridge clean. any food left more that one week un attended can be thrown out. bring your own toilet paper and towel paper.  host can ask to see the room once in a while to see the cleanliness. take off muddy and wet shoes at the door and carry them to the room

host.host_location: Staten Island, New York, United States
host.host_about: Hi there! My name is Simran! I love hosting and getting to know interesting people and making sure they are have a great stay! We are passionate about giving people an affordable place to stay and visit NYC, as well as work at Staten Island University Hospital, or go to Wagner College.

reviews.comments: A clean place
Reaches in house.
It is a spacious clean room in a safe neighborhood. The host is very nice. I am very satisfied that I stayed here for a couple of weeks and will book it again for my next trip.

It is a very affordable place for anyone, especially if you are a medical student doing your rotation nearby Staten Island University Hospital. Rita has been very flexible and communicates very regularly with you to make sure the place stays clean. She is very kind and will try her best to make sure you are well taken care of. She is also very easy to reach especially if any problems come up and also offers laundry service for those who are a bit pressed for time. Thank you very much for letting me stay at your place!
You are going yo be happy with the stay and value for your dollar
Wonderful hospitality and very quick with responses. Nice to feel at home. Thank you and I can’t recommend this enough, loved it!

Rita & simranjeet are great hosts, their place is very nice, clean and close to many shops and grocery stores. Their instructions for check in were very organized and they maintained a dedicated communication throughout my stay to make sure that I was having a good time. Place is exactly what is advertised. I would definitely revisit them!
great stay! professional, clean, fast communication.
always a great stay!
Good location quiet,peaceful place and close to public transportation.
Very quiet place,good location , near to the train station and public transportation.

Very clean and comfortable. This is a 3-bedroom apt. with full kitchen, comfy living room, and one bath to share. Barely saw the other 2 guests. Hosts are very available and responsive without being intrusive. Off-street parking in driveway for all 3 guests: very convenient.

Rita and family are a great host. I lived here for a duration of ten weeks and throughout this time period I had no problem. The place is located at a convenient location and New York City can be easily accessed via the express buses. The house is always clean! Rita has taken a lot of effort in adding intructions, which are very very useful. I would highly recommend this place for anyone who is looking for a short or a long stay
Great Place, I enjoyed my stay.
Nice and quite place!
Great host and great place to stay in nyc not for much!
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Good location.. good value
The best! Such a home like environment and kind hosts thank you so much
Nice room and house
Great Host! Suggest to everyone who is looking for affordable NYC living.

name: Studio w/rooftop in Sheung Wan HK (Man Mo temple)
summary: Beautifully renovated studio with private rooftop in the heart of Sheung Wan. (Tai Ping Shan).
space: Please kindly note: *The apartment is located on the 4th floor of a walk-up building. Be aware that no lift is provided. This is common in HK buildings. *The flat is 22 square meters, not huge but very well-equipped and smartly-designed. It is perfect for single travelers or couples. Plus, bonus is you also get a great private rooftop, where you can sit down comfortably and enjoy the view while sipping a glass of wine :)
description: Beautifully renovated studio with private rooftop in the heart of Sheung Wan. (Tai Ping Shan). Please kindly note: *The apartment is located on the 4th floor of a walk-up building. Be aware that no lift is provided. This is common in HK buildings. *The flat is 22 square meters, not huge but very well-equipped and smartly-designed. It is perfect for single travelers or couples. Plus, bonus is you also get a great private rooftop, where you can sit down comfortably and enjoy the view while sipping a glass of wine :) Fridge - you can storage your own food there.  Espresso coffee machine - Nespresso capsules are ready for you :) Wardrobe and hangers will be provided for you. We are available on text message to answer any questions our guests might have. Trendy Convenient Quiet The flat is located in the coolest (I dare say that) neighborhood in Hong Kong, where a lot of galleries, boutique shops, trendy cafes and restaurants are. It's very close to the city center (walking distance and onl
neighborhood_overview: Trendy Convenient Quiet The flat is located in the coolest (I dare say that) neighborhood in Hong Kong, where a lot of galleries, boutique shops, trendy cafes and restaurants are. It's very close to the city center (walking distance and only one train stop from Central station) but surprisingly quiet, especially at night, when the only thing you could hear from down the street is people walking/talking!
transit: Super easy to get around. 1min walk to Hollywood Road 3min walk to the nearest bus station  5min walk to the nearest tram station - Western Market station in Sheung Wan 10min walk to the nearest MTR - Sheung Wan station 10-15min walk (very nice walk along Hollywood Road) to Central (including soho and LKF).
access: Fridge - you can storage your own food there.  Espresso coffee machine - Nespresso capsules are ready for you :) Wardrobe and hangers will be provided for you.
interaction: We are available on text message to answer any questions our guests might have.

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: The apartment is impeccably tasteful and chic. Even though it’s relatively small and located in an older building, the space is utilized with superb efficiency and sports a huge window that brings in lots of sunlight. The neighborhood is quiet yet close to MTR and tourist attractions. The hosts are friendly and accessible. I wish this was my home!

This is a stylish modernised smart space, good WiFi and it  reaches terrace so you can video call upstairs under the starry night! Hot fab stunning shower. Lots of cupboard space. It rained when I was there but on good day Convenient Walking downhill sheung wan station 10-12 minutes, central station 15-17 minutes. 10 min escalators and 7 min walk straight line into Staunton.  note there are stairs in this part of town. Lots of nice restaurants.  Host kindly left detergent and drying rack for washing. They are very kind and do their best to help you in.

Adorable little flat in a superb location.
Tons of cool bars and restaurants around, very trendy street but also quiet. Terrasse is super cute and although apartment is very tiny (I guess normal size by HK standards!) its very well organized and functional. Might be tricky if you have a lot of luggage as there are quite a few stairs to get up there, but definitely worth it. Thanks to Natalia for being super responsive and letting us check out late. Had a great stay, I hope we can come back soon!

This was the perfect airbnb for our stay in Hong Kong. The space is modern, sparkling clean, and beautifully designed. The building is very centrally located in Sheung Wan but on a quiet street with minimal traffic so you can get a good night’s rest but still walk a few minutes to great cafes, restaurants, and bars. Looks just like the photos and what’s described—it’s small but very well designed. Efficient use of space with a comfortable bed and all modern amenities. Would highly recommend for those interested in minimal design and clean spaces.

Natalia and Paul's stylish apt is located in one of the quaintest neighborhoods in HK. We visited in winter and were able to actually open up the big windows during early mornings and at night to enjoy the fresh air- rare and unlike most of HK, the street below is serene and without much traffic. The interior is clean, modern, and well-appointed. The Nespresso machine is an excellent touch! Natalia and Paul were communicative, and the check-in/out process couldn't be easier.

This place is a true gem of Hong Kong and a wonderfully well-done Airbnb. It is extremely stylish and nice inside, and the space is comfortable and cozy. The apartment is furnished with a hip, modern, clean style.

Out the window is a nice view of the towers of Hong Kong, and upstairs is a great open patio where you can enjoy the surroundings. 

We had no idea when we booked the place that the apartment was located on a very cool street in a unique neighborhood. There are lots of little shops, and our personal favorite: a good beer store just around the corner!

We just can't find enough wonderful things to say about this place. This Airbnb is an amazing find in Hong Kong, and any traveler would surely enjoy it during their stay.

This beautifully and tastefully furnished apartment unit is located in a great location with many stylish bars, cafes, galleries, quaint little shops, and (genuine) old-school HK eateries. Short walk away from Sheung Wan station, it's the perfect base from which to explore HK. Apartment has everything you need, plus some more - the balcony space is an awesome bonus (and we are sad that due to our schedule we couldn't utilise it more). Can't recommend this place enough.

Great stay at Natalia and Paul’s appartment. Great location, nice terrace and stylish and very smart designed studio. Communication with the host went really well and we had a wonderful time. Thank you!
Great location!

Amazing location! Truly one of the best, coolest streets in Hong Kong! Super close to bars and restaurants yet located on a quiet street filled with hip cafes and art galleries. The space itself is very clean and has everything you need for your stay!  Would stay again.

Perfect base for exploring HK, a short walk from almost everything central on Hong Kong Island. Really nicely designed space which, while small is perfectly enough for 2 people traveling light, with everything you would need.

Loved the upstairs roof space, which adds an extra dimension, loved little touches like the nespresso and candles. The bathroom is very small, so just don't expect to fit 2 people in at a time. Highly recommend and likely to re-book. Thanks!
A super location and a wonderful apartment and a lovely rooftop. The communication is perfect and they were very helpful and nice. Would love to stay here again!

The host is responsive and friendly, the listing location is amazing - close to a lot of unique bars, cafes and shops. The space itself is cute, cosy, functional and well designed, would definitely recommend for a short stay!

Stylish, well decorated apartment in the most hip & lively district of HK island. Fast and easy communication.

We were unfortunately unable to take advantage of the brilliant rooftop terrace due to unforeseen weather circumstances...

Warmly recommended!

The location the little, yet lovely flat, is perfect! In an area where everything of interest is close but quiet enough to find peace at night. The rooftop is quite nice for the apéro and the flat is decorated with taste. Very clean and tidy, we found your apartment very confortable. We had a nice stay at your place! We loved the neighborhood, the communication was easy! Cheers!
This flat is a really chic place. There are lots art galleries and fashion shops around it. Very safe and very comfortable to stay there.
在香港这个寸土是金的城市,能找到这个性价比这么好的名宿｡真的很难得｡位置又是在我很喜欢的太平山街,边上有很多特色的店｡家具简约舒服,让我感觉就像在自己家一样｡下次还想再来
I had a wonderful time, the apartment is located in my favorite part of town! Wonderful find. Great fit out and very clean and new feeling. Thanks so much for being so kind with my requests!

The flat is stylish and well decorated. It's quiet area at night. The private rooftop is great for drinks and chill. 
The host is responsive and friendly. 
Highly recommended if you don't mind to walk stairs.

A modern haven away from the hustle and bustle of Hong Kong, Natalia and Paul's space is chic, clean and has everything you need for a stay in HK. The  surrounding art galleries and cafes make this apartment very special. The rooftop is also a fabulous bonus and with the cooler weather this time of year, it was nice to enjoy a bowl of pasta and glass of wine and soak up HK's atmosphere. The hosts were wonderful and very helpful and responsive which made the stay even better. Highly recommend a stay here!

Located perfectly within a stone throw from Soho, amongst art galleries, amazing shopping & excellent restaurants.
Quite, but close to the action
Amazing location and the perfect HK base for a couple. Small but beautifully decorated and cleverly designed. Natalie was quick to respond to all our queries and we really enjoyed our stay!

Lovely studio apartment with a wonderful roof deck in a quiet location with many boutiques, tea rooms, cafes all near Byron Park and only a ten minute walk to Soho’s Peel Street & Staunton Street or ten minute walk to Sheung Wan metro. In all, the perfect place to stay if you like a quiet neighborhood in a central but off the beaten track area of Shanghai.

Yes, Natalia and Paul’s place is tiny, but this was expected. The rooftop space was great and we had some nice times there. Communication was superb. I’d definitely recommend to visitors who want to stay in hip Sheung Wan.

Due to unforeseen circumstances we needed to make other arrangements but Natalia was quick with communications and provided a refund quickly.  I would definitely consider using the accommodation again.

The location is good, there's a lot to see around, tho you need to walk up 4 floors to the room. The host repplied fast enough, tho the light in the bathroom was broken for 3 days for us, just dont really think the place is worth this price cos the roof top area is seldomly used by use and the studio is kinda small.

Thank you Natalia. Smooth conversation before my trip, easy key handover and explanations about the Apartment. The Apartment is neat and clean. However it is indeed small (just as noted in their description), probably not the best to stay if you are above 1.90m tall. And dont underestimate the 4 floor walk-up in this small staircase. Especially if its very hot outside, this makes you sweat even more. 

Overall Id recommend it for a shorter stay, as the Location is really convenient and Natalia is a nice host.
Small but stylish and clean apartment in a lovely, calm neighbourhood. I had a very nice stay and Natalia was very kind in checking in on me once in a while.

such a lovely place in Hong Kong's Sheung Wan . 

cant wait to go back

Natalia and Paul’s studio is a lovely place to stay. It stylish, super clean and in a superb location at the heart of Tai Ping Shan. Communication was very easy, Natalia was kind and helpful. I’d definitely recommend it.

great place! you get what you pay for.  fantastic comfort and cool location.  nice rooftop.  building is old /no elevators but this unit is finely remodeled with great attention to detail.  clean sheets and pillows.  will stay there again
Excellent apartment in a great location which is handy for transport and local amenities. The apartment is small, but is very clean and comfortable. Also has a great roof terrace!
The place is nice and quiet, but also conveniently close to restaurants and shops.

Natalia and Paul’s place was perfect for our stay in HK.
It was very nicely decorated and had everything we needed. The bed was extremely comfortable and the roof terrace was great to sit and have a drink at night.
The apartment is very well located close to many bars, cafes and restaurants and only a short walk from Central.

Our stay was amazing. The apartment is just as described, very stylish, clean, tidy, and very well located - 5 min walk from the buzz of Soho bars, 10 min from Central, in a quiet street. AC, coffee machine, all kitchen supplies, fridge, comfy bed, clean bathroom, clean towels.

Sure there’s a lot of stairs, but you’ve been warned. Just don’t forget things when you leave the apt (like me) and you won’t sweat going up and down 2-3x.

Communication with the hosts was easy, Natalia was very helpful. I stayed for 10 days and she sent a cleaning lady half way through to change the sheets, towels and clean up. Thanks for that. 

All in all, a great place to stay! I’ll come back.
Really cool apt in Sheung Wan and great for a quick biz trip. On the high side of Sheung Wan which is where you want to be. A small apt but stylish and v comfy

Natalia is a very good host. Her apartment is located in a strategic position, very close to the city center and the nightlife, but in a very quiet street. We found it very clean and ordinare and the design is very elegant. I would definitely recommend it to anybody!

A stylish space in a super cool area of Hong Kong, in a traditional walk up building. Great things to see and do, right on the door step and only a short walk to transport links for exploring further out. Highly recommend this spot x

We stayed in this place for 2 weeks and loved it. Easy check in and out with the help of sweet Joanne who also helped us carry our luggage up/down the 4 floors. We used the rooftop terrace a lot in the evenings for drinks and snacks. It’s like the living room since the space in the apartment is quite limited. Walking distance to “everything”. We can really recommend this place if you travel alone or as a couple.
Would love to come back. Thanks Natalia & Paul!
Amazing location and incredible place! Love it and will def stay there again!
房屋装修的很干净整洁,厨具应有尽有(可惜我只住了一天,没有用厨具)｡只是需要爬楼梯,介意或者有大件行李的需要再考虑一下了｡ 其他的一切都好｡

Great spot in Sheung Wan! Central to many neighborhood amenities and easy to access transit. Made for a very easy jumping off point to explore Hong Kong.

Rooftop patio was pleasant but we didn’t use it quite as much as we expected because it was located on the floor above the apartment rather than connected to it.
Great location and great hospitality. Thank you very much for the prompt reply!

Really cute & stylish studio in a fab part of town. Highly recommended for a short Hong Kong visit. 
Also, follow their suggestion of getting a cab with your luggage...    :)

Natalia and Paul’s place is great - well designed and nicely furnished studio right in the middle of super cool Soho, with bars, restaurants, cafes and galleries downstairs and a short walk to the middle of the city.
Great location and super comfy! will definitely stay again.

An amazing location to stay in HK. Very convenient to travel around and plenty of excellent local cafes/restaurants to explore. It is a perfect place for art and food lovers. Unfortunately this trendy little oasis is also a property developers' hotspot. Currently due to all the construction work nearby, it is very noisy and dusty during the day. As long as you stay out most of the time, this nuisance would not affect you.

Overall good place. Great location with lots of nice restaurants, shops, art galleries.

Space is small for the price even by Hong Kong standards... if you plan to use the roof, maybe that’s worth it, but I did not use much since it rained.

Lots of construction noise during the day but fine at night, located on small street.
位置非常便利,去哪里都很方便,附近美食也很多

It’s very rare to find such well-designed and comfy tiny house in HK. You will see Natalia & Paul’s effort on it:) I love it a lot!!! Although it’s a bit far away from mtr station, but it’s located at Tai Ping Shan St. where you’ll find many cool shops and coffee shops nearby. 
However, I believe there’s room of improvement with the roof top, it will be perfect if the cleanliness could be maintained.
The hosts are very friendly and easy to communicate, I hope you guys enjoy the stay there!!

어떻게 수퍼호스트가 됐는지 모르겠음.  
당일 아침까지 확인 메일도 안오고,  체크인 약속시간도 안지켜서 길에서  두시간 기다림. 본사 전회해서야 겨우 연락됨
(어쨌거나 들어갔으니 되지않았냐?) 에어비앤비 직원 반응도 어이없었음. (자주 있는 일??)
---> 다시 가고싶지 않음

name: Waikiki Ocean View! Great Location! Free Parking
summary: 1BR apartment minutes walk to  the beach. Free Parking, Stall 10 in basement, careful it’s for compacts and has a 5’9” clearance . Free WiFi! Full kitchen/new bed/new TV. 5min walk to Ala Moana mall (shopping and restaurants) / Ala Moana Beach Park (beach) / Hilton Hawaiian Village (beach). Apartment is perfect for a beach or business trip; unbeatable price and location.   Building has coin operated laundry in the basement. Convenience store less than 2 minutes walking distance.
space: The unit is a one bedroom apartment and the sofa in the living room folds out into a full sized bed.  The unit can comfortably sleep 3 people: two on the queen sized bed in the bedroom and one on the full sized sofa bed.  The sofa bed is full size (slightly smaller than queen) so it can actually sleep two people, but I want to make sure guests know it is a full sized sofa fold out, not a queen size.
description: 1BR apartment minutes walk to  the beach. Free Parking, Stall 10 in basement, careful it’s for compacts and has a 5’9” clearance . Free WiFi! Full kitchen/new bed/new TV. 5min walk to Ala Moana mall (shopping and restaurants) / Ala Moana Beach Park (beach) / Hilton Hawaiian Village (beach). Apartment is perfect for a beach or business trip; unbeatable price and location.   Building has coin operated laundry in the basement. Convenience store less than 2 minutes walking distance. The unit is a one bedroom apartment and the sofa in the living room folds out into a full sized bed.  The unit can comfortably sleep 3 people: two on the queen sized bed in the bedroom and one on the full sized sofa bed.  The sofa bed is full size (slightly smaller than queen) so it can actually sleep two people, but I want to make sure guests know it is a full sized sofa fold out, not a queen size. You will have access to the laundry area (coin washer and dryer in the basement) and one parking stall in the bas
notes: Please note that the building was built in 1971.  Although it has been well maintained, the elevator runs smoothly, the location is amazing, and the view is great, it is still an older building so please do not expect a brand new building or a hotel like atmosphere.  Please also note that this building has jalousie windows, not sliding windows.  If you are not accustomed to jalousie windows, please research "jalousie windows" prior to making your reservation.   Please note that this not a hotel- there is no daily cleaning, linen changing, or 24/7 front desk.
access: You will have access to the laundry area (coin washer and dryer in the basement) and one parking stall in the basement.  Please note the entrance to the parking garage is 5'9" so large vehicles will not be able to enter the parking.
interaction: Maxine Shea is the local property manager/co host  that will be available to help throughout your stay.  Please email or text him prior to your visit to let her know your flight status. Her phone is (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) and her email is (Email hidden by Airbnb)
house_rules: The building is mainly residential and of course vacationers given the location, so the house rules of the building state that noise must be kept down to reasonable levels in respect of other residents during 10 pm to 8 am daily no excessive noise .   There is a no barbecue on patios or property house rule also (this has been prohibited for fire safety reasons ) .

host.host_about: I love to travel, meet new people, go to the beach, and have a good time!

reviews.comments: Had a wonderful stay at Branden's home! The location was perfect (close to nightlife and restaurants), the view from both lanais were gorgeous, and the parking spot was very convenient to have for our car rental. Loved being able to watch the sunset over the marina. He provided us beach towels and everything we needed. Will definitely stay again in the future!

The place was a little older than I expected. If you wanna stay near Ala moana shopping center with a rental car, the place is nice! However, the parking garage is tiny and different to get in/out. Be safe please!
Great view, 5 minute walk from the beach.

Brandon's condo is in a great location that is walking distance to many shops, restaurants, and the harbor in Waikiki. It also took only 25 mins to drive to the airport. Aaron, the property manager, was very responsive and accommodating. Prior to arrival, I suggest reading or asking for specific instructions from Aaron or Brandon to access room keys and locate the designated parking space. The living room was clean and quite spacious with a TV, couch, ceiling fan and balcony overlooking the skyscrapers and bay. There is an A/C in the bedroom and it made sleeping much more comfortable in mid-August's temperature. I was also glad there were plenty of water bottles in the refrigerator and bath/shower amenities that were provided for us. Overall, we enjoyed our 4 night stay at Brandon's condo as it is very close to many places we visited. I would highly recommend this condo to others and wouldn't mind staying in another one of Brandon's beautiful condos.
Great location and Brandon was a great host.

Nice place 
The beach and shopping malls are nearby.

Our stay here was so rewarding. The location is super convenient, the place is cool, spacious, and homey. So much so we decided to extend a night and enjoy the view of the incredible sunset from the balconey one more time. Brandon was more than gracious and accommodating, willing to work with our timelines (check in/check out). Definitely coming back here, hopefully a lot.

My husband and I spent our 4th Wedding Anniversary in Hawaii and stayed at Brandon's place. The room was spacious, clean with free drinks and beach towels. It's a perfect location, surrounded by scenic views from the balcony and it is right in the middle of everything in Waikiki. You can walk 10 to 15 mins to the Mall/Shops and just 5 about mins towards the beach. Aaron, the host was so friendly and helpful and Brandon replied immediately after booking and gave clear instructions. We will definitely come back in the future.  Mahalo!

The photos are what you will get! The balcony with the view is so nice for morning coffee and sunset views.  It's walking distance to the beach, shopping and food.  Open the slider and windows and you will feel the trade winds at night.  The free parking space was a plus as most places charge upwards of $20 a day for parking.  - Terry the Traveler
Logement très bien situé, proche de la plage, du centre commercial, des restaurants et tres bien desservi par le bus.

We absolutely loved the location and airiness of the apartment. However, the street and surrounding AC noise was quite bad and cost us many hours of sleep. The apartment could do with some loving touches such as pictures on the walls or a couch table to make guests feel more at home. On our arrival, we only found one set of towels for two persons and no glasses at all for water or wine. These issues were fixed quickly by the host though. The view was great but due to the noise we hardly ever used the balcony.
Other, newer and higher, hotels were built up around it, but very nice and well maintained. Really enjoyed our stay, would love to come back, and I would recommend it to others ☮️

Brandon is a great host. His communication and service was excellent. Our arrival flight was early and so he accommodated us to check in early with no hesitations. The condo is very charming and made my girlfriend and i feel right at home. The views are spectacular from both balconies; we were able to enjoy the sunrise and sunset every day. Location, location, location! Great location. Mahalo Brandon

Brandon's place was great, exactly as described and in a superb location! Walking distance to everything and the view from the balcony is a memorable one for sure! Maxine was there to assist promptly with any questions, offered helpful tips and made our stay there such a pleasure! This place had everything we needed for the 3 weeks we were there. They even had drinks for us when we arrived! Their service is great!! I'd highly recommend this place. A little noisy yes because you are close to the street, but the view and being able to see the fireworks on Fridays (and sometimes during the week), was unbeatable. Definitely a great place to stay! Will highly recommend it! Thanks for a great time Maxine!!

Clean and modern condo, within walking distance of the beach and Ala Moana Center. Amazing balcony view! The only negative is that the parking is cramped but considering everything else it's well worth it.

This unit was perfect for my wife and I who wanted to be close to Waikiki, but wanted to have a home away from home when the day ended.  Comfy bed and super clean place.  A nice couch to relax on at the end of the day and a fridge and kitchen to help us plan snacks for our road trips really was great.  This is not the most modern building, but for the value who cares?  We had a small car that worked well with the parking spot available, and everything in the unit made me feel like I was in my own apartment off the beach instead of some cold crappy hotel room with no kitchen.  The kitchen came with all the plates and utensils, some coffee, spices, heck even a small bag of rice and some drinks in the fridge.  If you want a great experience for a good price this is it.  If you want the spend twice as much, pay for parking, and have no kitchen, stay at the hotels along the beach.  I'd come back to this unit any time.

Let me first state....this location is perfect!  We were there for a full month.  You can walk to beach with ease every day and night.  Shops, dining, transit...all in easy walking distance.  The only problem is the street noise in front, and other apartment and grounds keeping noise in back (bedroom).  We used ear plugs...you will need them if windows and lanai doors are open.  We got used to the earplugs and the noise.  There is a parking space which is a plus...but do be sure to secure an economy (Website hidden by Airbnb) is a very, very small garage with a small space.  Take care with parking.  The unit is old...but the location more than makes up for any shortcomings.  There is fireworks to enjoy every Friday nite at 7:45 (times may change as you head to longer days).  We watched from several locations...best viewing is across the street at the Hilton Hawaiian village man made pond area....wonderful.   

As for the unit specific challenges...we reported to property managers that we immediately replaced the shower curtain liner due to a good deal of mold.  This is a highly humid (Website hidden by Airbnb) mold is to be expected.  But it should have been handled prior to our check in.  They offered to take care of it, but since we needed showers upon arrival, we immediately replaced.   The hot water faucet in tub needs repair as it leaked water with a steady stream shooting onto the floor.  PM was ready to have repaired but We fixed by wrapping a washcloth around it to capture/divert water.  It would probably take a plumber, and we did not want to be inconvenienced with the (Website hidden by Airbnb) we kept our remedy in place and informed PM to fix upon our departure.  
All in all...we loved our stay.  The place gets a great cross breeze ( trade winds) and is close to everything.  But, do expand your visit to the whole island....the beauty is everywhere.
Great location, love the balcony - great to watch the Friday night fireworks!  Comfortable.

My stay here was amazing. Great scenery, located near great shops and restaurants, and have a nice view of the beach. Maxine is a great host, she is easy to get in contact with whenever you have concerns and need any help. Overall one of the best Airbnb's I have stayed in. I would definitely recommend staying here for anyone wanting to visit Hawaii.

Location was great and patio had a great view but the sliding doors wouldn't close and it was quite noisy day and night. 
Overall it's clean and has all the extras (household items such as dishes, iron, extra linens etc) but the bathroom is tiny and the floors throughout are super creaky. Parking is also very tiny and cramped, and pulling in and out is a nuisance.
Great location, Excellent hosts, and outstanding value!

Maxine’s place was absolutely amazing, it’s was a great size , the main bed was super comfortable and surprisingly the sofa bed was confortable as well waking up to that ocean and having coffee in the balcony was a major plus and I think the price was perfect for what you get.
Nice neat place. Perfect for us!

We received great and fast communication before arriving in Hawaii, we had a an easy check in and was a bonus we could leave it bags downstairs until our room was ready. We received a text two hours prior to check in time to let us know our room was ready! The space was clean and had beautiful views, we walked to shops and bused from about 1.5km down the road along to pearl harbour. We had mostly all we needed in the kitchen for full cooking and felt right at home for our three days. As stated there was slight traffic noise and the elevator stoped working for a couple hours on our last day. We really enjoyed our stay.

Good location on the fringe of Waikiki, very nice view from the balcony, toiletries provided were more than adequate; Noise level very high, interrupted sleep every night despite earplugs due to traffic, sirens and people screaming; overall good value for money if you can block out noise easily.
Great location. We found the place quite at night, no street noise in the bedroom at night. So nice to have a car park waiting for you in the busy city.

Отличная квартира! Больше, чем ожидада. Есть также диван, где легко могут расположиться двое. В квартире есть все: пляжные полотенца, пляжная сумка, даже плавательные маски (теперь три - оставили свою), коврики, шампуни, фен. Прекрасное расположение - 20 минут прогулки до самого веселья. На пляж Вайкики не ходили, но он рядом, если нужно. Парковка, конечно, узкая, но она есть! и бесплатна. Машина нужна маленькая для удобства парковки, но у нас такая и была. Балкон прекрасно подходит для завтраков или ужинов с частичным видом на море и противоположные небоскребы с внешними лифтами. Если снова поедем, то обязательно в эту квартиру. Спасибо за все!
Really great place, nice view, two balconies, big, clean, free parking, cable tv, WiFi- highly recommend

You get what you pay for. I was going for a cheaper place and I definitely payed for it. This is located about 1/2-1mile from the beach, and does NOT have a fireworks view. 
I read the details and messed up when I was offered a rental car upgrade to a Jeep (my bad). This did not fit in the lower parking. I called Maxine and she was very prompt but definitely annoyed with me, asking if I read the rules. She was able to get me a new spot on the upper level at $15/day.
Upon walking in the unit, it looked clean from afar. Once I was inside, I noticed sticky residue on the table, and dirt everywhere. The kitchen was not clean, the fridge was disgusting, I had to clean the handle just to open it (we bought groceries before checking in). The bathroom is what really got me. I understand its a humid island but the mold in the bathroom is not acceptable. I lived on a very humid island for the past 3 years, and never had mold like this. A little bleach-water mixture will take care of that real quick. Additionally, there was hair folded into the clean towels. The light switches were filthy as well.
The bedroom wasn't too bad. The a/c unit is extremely loud, which was the only reason I could not hear the noise from the street all night. 
Over all, I would not recommend this place to anyone. Stay closer to the beach area, in a cleaner place.
Excellent location and an amazing view. Brandon’s place is central to all Waikiki hotspots. Would definitely stay there again in the future!
great
Good location easy access but the bathroom was too small
Great location and value. Be prepared for a tight parking spot and only an AC in the bedroom. I recommend this place. I loved sitting out in the balcony and the Friday night fireworks were great.
If you are looking for place to sleep and good location, this is the place..

This place was a great bang for your buck! You’re really close to the beach, restaurants in Waikiki and have great views from the 10th floor of the building. The place was very clean when we arrived. The kitchen was well stocked with the essentials needed. We did have an issue with parking please be sure to get a compact car because it’s in a lower garage which clearance is only 5’9’’ — which I saw when booking but didn’t realize how small that was. Originally we planned on a small car but splurged on a Jeep.  So when we pulled up in our Jeep we didn’t fit. Fortunately there was a place available on the upper deck where we could pay another 15$ a night opposed to not having any parking at all. But don’t let this be you! They have fans in the living room and bedroom which help keep the place very cool. However the only AC is a window unit in the bedroom. Which definitely worked well for the bedroom not so much for the living room. We were there in August it wasn’t terrible in the living room with the ceiling fan going but just to add that last piece so there are no surprises! Overall we had a great stay here and would stay here again! You can save a ton of money and still be very close to a ton of amenities!

Maxine was so quick in responding to any questions you may have and very helpful. The place was wonderful and easy access to restaurants, malls, stores, and etc. At night, a little noisy coming from the vehicles in the road.

Ensure  the louvers  have been fixed because when we were there anyone could gain access to the apartment from the outside since they were broken.  We could not leave our valuables in the apartment and our concerns were not addressed.

The flat is exactly as it’s shown and a short walk from beaches and shops. There is parking but you must hire a small car. Hosts are fabulous and will help you in any way they can. We would certainly visit again.
Great location, need to update the elevator. It wasn’t working 2 or 3 time and we walked to 10 floor

Todo estuvo excelente. El deptartamento es muy cómodo, fuimos dos adultos. La ubicación es genial y, al tener estacionamiento, mucho mejor. Tuvimos todo lo necesario para pasar 10 días como en casa. Gracias!
