reviews.comments: Very nice neat and clean place very relaxing and antique setup ,great area very nice building thank you so much Svetlana :))
great

Svetlanas place is great for 1-4 people and close to coney island for solething tomorrow during the day. Ubers and can are plentiful. The only downside is how brifgt the apartment is in the mornings (after a late night) but truly a great place for a weekend trip. Thanks Svetlana!
Host great welcoming spirit made checking in and out a breeze.

The apartment is stylish and homey.  It is a short walk to the subway.  There is a wonderful Halal market  very close by.  We did not get a chance to meet Svetlana but she made good arrangements for us to get in the apartment and she was very responsive to questions about the apartment
Все отлично!
Place was located in a very convenient place everything you need is within a 5 block radius I'd decently recommend

never met svetlana, but she told me where to find keys and so I did. Location is great, 5 minutes to subway and 5 minutes to bagel place (best breakfast). I found apt to be in Brooklyn size. 
bed is too small 2 ppl, sofa is little uncomfortable. 
internet works good. water/heater, etc is good. 
apt has a smell of old apt. lock is a little tricky 
overall, location is good, but I think next time I will look for something else

Svetlana's place is perfect for south Brooklyn. Trnasportation, shopping/
Great place to stAY
Very accommodating hosts, communicative and the apartment is in a great location.

The place was a haven for me in Brooklyn. On a quiet street with a beautiful view of the city from the top floor.  Elevator was a blessing.  Nice family apartment building and quiet too.  Close to everything I needed and everyone I met in the building was nice too.  The lack of a television was a little disappointing, but it did say in add that there wasn't one so that's on me.  The wifi service was great though.  Overall, a nice place and a good value right in the heart of nice, safe neighborhood.  Yuri was a thoughtful and nice host.

Yuriy's place is clean, comfortable and nicely decorated apt on the 15 th floor. A lot of great books to read)). It is perfect for family. Close to public transportation incl subway station (10 min). Host is very responsive and friendly. Perfect place and area around. Recommend. Доброжелательные хозяева. Рекомендую.
Thank you for being a great host! I appreciate It!
I recommend this place if your looking for a quiet relaxed trip. Pictures describe it all.
Comfortable stay, all amenities were as described. Host was very prompt and responsive.
Best Host and nice place!!!
Highly recommended!

Our host was very kind , dropped off fresh towels and a Brita filter shortly after arriving and let us know he was available for anything we needed during our stay. Really cozy feel , spacious with plenty of room and air conditioning !
Highly recommended!
Very understanding, quick responses, great host!
Great location. Old apartment. Good for the money.
Great hosts, very helpful and quick to respond. We had plenty of space for the 3 of us, and the pictures describe the place very well. Would definitely recommend staying here.
Yura responded very quickly to any queries we had, and kindly allowed us a later check out time, and the apt was clean. The air conditioners were especially welcome!
This is a good deal in a lovely environment: on walking distance from the beach.

Average place in an older building. Really only 1 bed and some futon couches we strung together. Recommend it for individuals or couples looking for a bargain place to stay and don’t mind dated fixtures and building. We were Good with it.
Good place to stay

Love the place 
Felt like home 
So wonderfully intelligent and creative.

A really special find
Good spot in Brooklyn
We had a greate time there. I recommend this place.

Nice place, great value for money. Close to subway (4 mins walk), lots of grocceries & services. Manhattan is just 45 minutes by train (not a busy line at all). 
Yura is a good host, his place worth every dollar spent.
Good family friendly place.  Location was exactly what we needed.

Imagine an invitation to stay in a friend’s artsy space in a fascinating Russian neighbourhood. The building is an older one, but the apartment is roomy, comfortable, quirky, and filled with original paintings. The subway and shops are a few minutes walk away. We couldn’t have imagined a warmer welcome from Yura, who stayed up late to rescue us after a four hour delay, pointed out all his favourite restaurants, and made us comfortable in his home. We had a great time there.
Mi familia estuvo muy cómoda y gran lugar
Good location in bk and relatively safe feeling location. Night Parking was difficult at times but such is to be expected in bk.  Easy check in and out, good communication.
We liked this place. Definitely will choose this place again next time.

The first thing that strikes you as you enter Yura's apartment is how culturally diverse it is with a lot of art, books and decorations. His one bedroom apartment was spacious, clean and close to Coney Island Hospital as well as many good restaurants. All of these were within walking distance. The neighborhood was safe. 
As a host, Yura was wonderful. He provided an easy check-in, was always available to answer any questions we had and was very accommodating with our check-in and check-out timings. Overall, it was a great experience with no negative experience. I would definitely recommend staying at Yura's apartment.

Prefect location, it has access to all major transportation. The apartment was perfect and had style. Another  bonus is you are in walking distance to many different food establishments and shopping areas.

name: Modern, elegant 2 BDR Condo, Excellent Location!
summary: Elegant, modern Condo located in one of the most popular neighbourhoods in Montreal, Plateau Mont Royal. Close to restaurants, shops and 5 minutes walk to the subway station. The condo is fully equipped with all the amenities you'll need to enjoy a stay in Montreal.  The condo has 2 closed bedrooms, and an open concept living room / dining room.  Secure building with elevator and cameras. The unit has plenty of light. Perfect for a family, a couple, or for business travelers.
description: Elegant, modern Condo located in one of the most popular neighbourhoods in Montreal, Plateau Mont Royal. Close to restaurants, shops and 5 minutes walk to the subway station. The condo is fully equipped with all the amenities you'll need to enjoy a stay in Montreal.  The condo has 2 closed bedrooms, and an open concept living room / dining room.  Secure building with elevator and cameras. The unit has plenty of light. Perfect for a family, a couple, or for business travelers.

reviews.comments: Excellent location, close to metro, restaurants and markets. the host is a very nice person. You will love this place!! very comfortable, clean and elegant.

This is the perfect spot in terms of location, amenities and having a great time in Montreal. My family came and loved Montreal in part because this place was a wonderful place to relax between doing all the touristy things. It's right next to the rosemont metro and a walk away from everything. The condo was spacious, clean and Francis even met with me a day before since my family was arriving earlier the next day to handover the keys. I would definitely recommend this place and absolutely have my family stay here if they visit again :)

Great place. Did I say place, I meant 'palace'! It's a sweet two bedroom condo in a very accessible part of Montreal, very clean and comfortable. Francis really came through for myself and my friends by taking us in last minute when our other AirBNB host fell through. Not only did Francis come through for us, but he was a great host and answered all our questions promptly. Would highly recommend!
Amazing host, great communication, amazing location and super clean, very modern. 5 stars all the way!
The apartment was as described. It was clean and located in the Plateau area in walking distance to many restaurants, bars and shops. The owner was always very supportive and available.

The apartment is bright, very clean, spacious, fully equipped, and well located.  The hosts were always reachable, friendly, and helpful.  I highly recommend booking this apartment and hope to do so again myself in the future.

The apartment was fantastic!  Some places (fairmount bagels) were within a short 10 minute walk.  Other places we had to drive around.  But with the free parking on the street during the weekend, getting around was hassle-free.  Close to grocery store and metro stations (5 min walk).

AJ and his brother Chris were great hosts, easy communication, and the place was just as described, very modern clean and comfortable and with every detail thought of.  Amazing location near the mile end and Plateau. we really enjoyed our stay-  a pleasure all around!

AJ was a great host! Replies were prompt, and the amazing place was as described. We booked the place almost last minute, and the attention to detail of our group was put into consideration for the accommodation. Highly recommended.

The place was exactly as advertised and met all our expectations. The location was very convenient with lots of stores and restaurants within short walking distance. Christopher was very responsive and available throughout our stay to help with local tips and anything we needed.
The property was as advertised, clean, close to Metro and grocery store. AJ and his family most helpful and responsive. I will stay here again when in Montreal.
Great apartment and great hosts!  I booked the place for my parents who thoroughly enjoyed the stay.

This apartment was perfect for our family of four - two adults and two teenagers. The air conditioning kept us cool on hot summer days, the balcony was lovely for coffee in the mornings, and the space was immaculate. The kitchen is, amazingly well stocked with just the things we needed to make basic meals, good coffee, and possibly a cake or two! The location ended up being perfect for our 25 minute walks to Jean Talon and 15 minute walks to Mont Royal. It is not in the center of activities in the Plateau so it was quiet and the balcony faced tree tops from the second story. The closest bakery or café is a 5 - 10 minute walk.
The condo is a bright and airy  space in a great location. My family of 4 stayed and had everything we needed. We’ll stay again! Thanks AJ

The condo exceeded our expectations.  It was well designed, nicely furnished, and fully equipped for our 6-day stay.  We had 2 guests over for dinner to join the 3 of us staying there, and it was well suited to the event.  Lots of utensils and small appliances to meet our every need--toaster, toaster oven, microwave, coffee maker, etc.   Modern appliances and large washer and dryer.  AJ and his brother were very responsive to our questions and needs. We felt right at home.

AJ apartment is really good. Location is in one of the best spots of Montreal, close to groceries, restaurants and transportation. The apartment was very clean and comfortable exactly how is in the photos. Communication was perfect as well! I'm sure I will come back! 1000% recommended!
Thank you so much AJ.

name: The Sunset Stowaway—A Peaceful Napili Ridge Studio
summary: Drink locally grown coffee on the outdoor lanai before heading out with the beach equipment provided. Alternatively, just lounge by the shared pool. The remodeled studio also features a Smart TV,  well-stocked kitchen, and works by local artists.
space: Peaceful studio located at The Napili Ridge, in the highly sought-after west side of Maui.  Equipped with a Westin Heavenly Brand KING bed, full kitchen and loads of ALOHA.  Complete with all the essentials of island living and cooking (All utensils, microwave, full fridge, DW, french press, coffee grinder, toaster, blender, fresh linens, beach towels, cooler, beach chairs, hair dryer, Smart TV, free WiFi and tropical fans and AC to keep you nice and cool.   Brand new stainless steel appliances. This is a QUIET off the beaten path residence- not a resort- with both long term residents and vacationers utilizing the property-please respect the quiet.  This space is optimal for those who want to get out and enjoy the Maui outdoors with all its magic it has to offer at a GREAT price.  Please note: We are located on the bottom floor but there are a few stairs to get to us from the parking space.
description: Drink locally grown coffee on the outdoor lanai before heading out with the beach equipment provided. Alternatively, just lounge by the shared pool. The remodeled studio also features a Smart TV,  well-stocked kitchen, and works by local artists.
neighborhood_overview: The location is in the much-desired West Side, right in the heart of the action. It's only a block from Napili Bay, and a walk or short drive to many great restaurants and beaches, plus a grocery store. There's also a bi-weekly farmers' market.
notes: We are committed to being as sustainable and eco-friendly as we can possibly be and we appreciate our guests to be as well.  Recycle, reduce, and conserve while you visit Maui. We have Hi-5 recycling available on property. Electricity costs at least double up to triple that on the mainland. Please turn off lights TV AC and fans when not using.  Do not walk on the reef. Ever. Just because you have reed shoes doesn’t mean you should use them.  Do not litter-Take your trash with you and dispose of it properly while visiting our parks and beaches.  Support local business. Rent a "Bio-Beetle" or hybrid vehicle to get around. Volunteer if you have time.  There are always beach clean ups happening or preform your own mini version.  Leave the sand at the beach! Sounds simple right?-Please shake your towels, beach chairs and rinse your feet out at the beach. And finally a common sense disclaimer....Since we are in a residential community there may be construction happening. While we live in a v
transit: Best to rent a car to see all Maui has to offer.  We do have a free reserved parking spot just for you.  There is a local bus that can be easily accessed, with a stop just at the bottom of our road. Uber, Lyft, and cabs available; times and rates vary. Bike rentals available.
access: The entire studio space is yours!   Full kitchen and bath (shower only, no tub).  A nice outdoor lanai to enjoy your morning cup of locally grown coffee.  A FREE and RESERVED parking space. The property itself is equipped with a pool, BBQ, and coin-op laundry for our guests to use.  ( property rules and hours of operation do apply).
interaction: Available by text, email, and phone.  We live very close if you should need but have lock box entry so that you may check in on your own accord.   Check in is 3pm (or anytime after, until 10pm), Check out is 10am.

host.host_about: Hi! I'm Linsay. We would love to have you as our guests!

reviews.comments:
Easy parking, small cozy and neighborhood friendly place.  Full kitchen appliances and cooking utensils.  Linsay was a great host and I would totally recommend this location.  
Definitely check out the SeaHouse restaurant and beach access only 2mins away.

We had a great stay at Linsay's Sunset Stowaway in Napili. And the name says it all, we saw an amazing sunset just outside our door our first night there. It was nice to have the beach chairs/umbrella/towels available to use. We went snorkeling at Honolua Bay - maybe a 10 minute drive away - and it was amazing. The kitchen was well stocked, nice to cook our dinner rather then eating out all the time. It was easy to find, the location of the unit was very convenient to the parking spot. Thanks for hosting us.

We have no complaints. Found the place OK with the directions given. Space was nice & furnished well, depicted accurately in the photos. Big plus on having beach equipment (beach mats, chairs, umbrellas, etc)...we definitely put them to use. Thanks Linsay for being a great host!

We had a wonderful time at Linsay's place. Very nicely decorated and very comfortable. Comfy king size bed with plenty of linens and pillows. The place is as described. At the time of our booking, we were able to use the beach chairs, umbrella, beach towels and cooler. All were in great condition and added to our stay. Plenty of room in the kitchen and bathroom as well. The location is great because it is less than a 10 minute walk to the beach and give or take a few minutes to walk to restaurants. Also easy driving distances to all the west Maui highlights. The pool and grill are steps away and seemed nice, but we did not use either one. Linsay is great to work with.  She was always polite, courteous and super fast with her communication. Would recommend and stay here again!

Linsay was an amazing host, very easy to communicate with and very friendly and helpful. The apartment is very close to Kapalua beach, one of if not the most stunning beaches on Maui for snorkelling. The apartment was recently renovated and has everything you could possibly need. It was very clean and just as shown in the pictures. I highly recommend this place!
Great place to stay in west maui!
ｶﾊﾟﾙｱで開催されたｴｸｽﾃﾗﾜｰﾙﾄﾞﾁｬﾝﾋﾟｮﾝｼｯﾌﾟに参加するため宿泊しました｡会場となるﾘｯﾂｶｰﾙﾄﾝから近くMTB､徒歩共にｱｸｾｽ可能です｡駐車場も部屋から近くMTBの運搬､部屋での整備において何の問題もありませんでした｡設備も充実しており快適に過ごせました｡

We loved our time in Maui and having a great place to wake up to in the morning and come home to at night was icing on the cake! Not a single detail was missed! Definitely a five star location and amazing host. Communication was prompt and clear and the place had everything we needed and more. Even greater than expected. Highly recommend!

This is a lovely apartment. Linsay is a fabulous host, who pays attention to the little details that make a BIG difference. I could detail them out, but it would be better for you to experience them for yourself!
Napili is lovely with great beaches and restaurants plus easy access by car to incredible scenery and shopping.
Highly recommended!

We enjoyed our stay at this beautiful place! It’s very quiet community and close to several restaurants with good reviews, and a short drive to Lahaina town. The owner was thorough in providing all the information needed. Definitely recommend!

We really liked the Linsay's space -- it was exactly as we expected. We didn't come to Maui for a beach experience, but the beach was a five-minute walk from the apartment and I guess it's pretty important for some of the visitors. 
The communication was great, Linsay even texted me on the day of the check-in letting us know that the apartment was ready a bit earlier which was great since we arrived early in a morning.

We completely fell in love with Maui and were lucky enough to stay at Linsey’s home. It was perfect for the two of us and had everything we needed. The area was beautiful and so close to everything we wanted to see and do. Thank you Linsey! We will definitely be back and recommend this place to any of our friends and family headed that way! 

Jason and Tiffany

Great place, especially for the value. The place is clean and has everything a couple would need during a stay in Maui. It is just short of a mile walk to Kapalua Beach which has some nice water for snorkeling. It is about a 15 minute drive to downtown to shop,eat and drink.

Our recent 6 night stay at Linsay's condo, Sunset Stowaway, was nothing less than perfect!  The unit itself was beautifully decorated in modern, yet warm, decor with excellent bed linens and ample beach and bathroom towels. The home and amenities are exactly as described in the listing. We stayed at another airbnb while on the island and let's just say Sunset Stowaway was a far better choice. Lindsay went above and beyond in comparison to what the other host/unit provided. By that I mean the unit had it all and the photos really don't do it justice. A huge king bed with a GREAT mattress, fully stocked kitchen, plenty of dishes, stone countertops, comfortable beach chairs, umbrellas, a GOOD hard sided cooler, plenty of hangars, toiletries,  books, comfortable patio chairs, ceiling fan, and two floor fans for keeping the unit cool, the list goes on and on.  It really was like a true home away from home in regard to the style of homes we prefer to book at- Clean, fresh, bright, modern etc. 
We didn't get a chance to use the pool but liked that it was always very quiet there and looked very clean also. The unit was only a small flight of stairs away from the designated parking stall which was also a plus when we had groceries to bring in. Thanks again for hosting us!

Linsay is outstanding host. Her place have everything you need. She responds every message very fast. Direction are very easy. Her place is modern and sparkling clean. 
She even decorated the whole place for us and got us Xmas tree . 
I definitely recommend her place and she gets 10 stars from me. 
Thank you so much for being so great Linsay. Sylwia and Daniel.
Lovely
Very nice place, in a nice area, that is just a short walk to the beach, with plenty to do! Would highly recommend staying here!
Perfect place and perfect location! Thanks so much Linsay!

Linsay’s place was awesome! Perfect studio in a great location. They did a great job decorating it and it felt like home. The studio is really close to several beaches and a few cute towns. Recommend for anyone wanting to stay in west Māui! We will be back soon!

Our stay at Linsay's place was brief but sweet! The space was decent size with enough room for a couple, the bed was very comfortable, the complex itself was lush and private.  Parking was easy and the location itself is walking distance to several beaches! Finally, Linsay even alerted us that the unit was ready earlier than check-in time which allowed us to make our day more convenient and efficient. Thank you Linsay!

Miss this place already! If you're looking for somewhere comfortable, clean, and has everything you need for a great break this is it. Linsay has thought of everything, beach chairs, cooler, all kitchen utensils, plenty of towels, etc, and when we asked if there was an iron, she popped one into us within the day. 
The place is also walking distance to the best beaches and restaurants. Napili bay and kapalua bay are ridiculously gorgeous, and Merrimans for sunset and dinner are an amazing treat. We will be back!

This rental isn't for everyone. If your mental picture of a Hawaiian vacation requires an ocean view balcony, maid service, and onsite restaurant, you are missing the point of rental websites like this. If your vacation involves bringing kids of the "need to run around screaming" variety, look elsewhere-- I don't recall seeing anyone under 25 in this entire real-locals condo complex. If you need loud, you won't find it. The only noise we heard came during the afternoon of Superbowl Sunday, where screams of joy and anguish were sporadically emitted from the screen doors and slatted windows we passed on our walk to the beach. A couple notes about the above: The screen doors are the heavy duty black grid kind, that you leave shut with the main door open. Then you open the door to the lanai (patio), and create a fresh air flow with the fan. This is how you cool down a place without an air conditioner. We were never uncomfortable in the 80s (temperature; not decade). The other thing I wanted to point out is that I said "walk to the beach". It's entirely possible to hit sand in 10 minutes from the door, but you can be more leisurely, enjoy a definitely-not-spiked drink you made using supplies from the nearby grocery store that is pretty expensive until you compare making food at the condo to eating out every meal. And then you remember you're on an island. It's a really quick drive to the public parking, but no guarantee that you'll get a spot. We drove a few times when our feet were super tired from other walking excursions, but there was one time when we had to drive home and walk because there wasn't parking. Of course, when we walked through the lot, there were three spaces. You know how it goes. Staying in this condo and walking to the beach provides the most realistic fantasy of what living on Maui could look like for you and your main squeeze. The place has all the kitchen stuff we needed, a cooler to take to the beach, a Smart TV that we watched YouTube on at night (I actually didn't check if there was cable TV or not) but the Wi-Fi worked well and there was enough room at the kitchen bar to set up my laptop to do some work (which I almost did before saying "F that, I'm on vacation"). The stand up shower had good water pressure and got hot water fast, which is really all I ever want, though it also happens to be one of the more creative remodels I've seen. If you've ever looked at Pinterest for remodel ideas, I don't think you're alone-- this place feels new, very comfortable and full of good vibes. The bed was comfortable. If I had to come up with a downside, it's that at night it could be a little bright from the lights outside the other buildings since we slept...

Exactly as described.  The room has everything you might need for your vacation.  Just bring yourself and enjoy!  Thank you Linsay for your accurate description, and extra touches.  We had an amazing time!  
Note:  1/4 mile from Napili Bay.  Walking distance to food and beaches :)

Highly recommend! Walking distance to Napili and Kapalua Bay. Beach towels, cooler and chair provided. Exactly as advertised. Beautifully decorated and a nice neighborhood! Would love to stay here again!
Cute and comfortable home. Close to the beach. Host offered nice local spots to eat at, beach chairs\mat\towels. Easy to get in and out . Thanks again !

Love this place, great amenities for our stay including everything for cooking, coffee, beach chairs, cooler, snorkel gear, great tv, comfortable king bed, etc.  We felt like this was our home.  Nearby to the beach, walking distance to The Gazebo (great breakfast place) and overall a wonderfully quite home base.  The decor was modern and the attention to detail was fantastic.  Do yourselves a favor and stay there and on your last day there be daring and do the drive along the north point to get to airport. Mahalo

Un alojamiento excelente. Está muy cerca de la playa. Forma parte de una urbanización muy tranquila con piscina común. Está todo muy limpio y con todo lo necesario para cocinar. La llegada es fácil y tienes un directorio de locales cercanos. 
Sin duda de lo mejor del viaje. Si volviera a Maui sería a allí.

Linsay's condo was an amazing place to stay for our honeymoon! It was clean, updated, and in a beautiful location out of the busyness of town. Linsay was great about responding quickly and helping us with anything we needed. We will definitely stay here again!
Linsay’s place was great! Not a single detail was forgotten. Thanks for making our trip extra special!

This was our first time in Maui and we could not have been happier with our stay! Linsay was very promote with communication and answered several questions before we booked. This is a phenomenal residential condo located within walking distance of some of the best beaches in Maui and away from the busy tourist feel! We enjoyed walking to The Coffee Shop each morning and grabbing an acia bowl from A'a Roots :) Condo description was very accurate and plenty of space for two. We will be back!
Great place to stay! Clean, unique, and close to restaurants, shops, and a number of beaches. Definitely recommended!

This place is very clean, well kept, and will make you feel right at home. It is literally a 10 minute walk to the beach and within 15 minute drive to lots of local restaurants. 
The host provides everything you need to enjoy yourselves at the beach (two beach chairs, plenty of towels, a cooler, and plenty of tote bags). The host also does an amazing job walking you through the entire check in process and provides very prompt responses. 
Two things I'd like to point out, there is no air conditioning. If you're not used to 70-80 degree humid nights I would be wary of booking. However, there is a very adequate ceiling fan and two oscillating floor fans. Also, during the time of our stay, the screen door was unable to lock so we couldn't sleep with the glass door open for some air. 
Overall, I would highly recommend simply due to how helpful and cordial the host was. If you can see past the lack of air conditioning, this is the best you'll find for the price in Maui.
linsays place was exactly as pictured. It was cute, quaint and the styling was on point. I would definitely stay here again if I'm ever in maui.

Fantastic stay at Linsay’s place in Napili. Check-in was seamless and assigned parking was a treat. Quick 5-10 min walk to Napili Bay Beach (beautiful sunsets) or a bit further to Kapalua Beach (great snorkelling & turtle watching!). It was nice to be a bit tucked away and we enjoyed the quiet on the lanai every evening. The place is stocked with everything you might need - from kitchen basics to a beach umbrella. The decor is beautiful - coastal chic and a home away from home. Everyone in the complex was friendly. We would stay again in a heartbeat.

We highly recommend this place to anyone wanting to visit Maui!

This place is awesome, it exceeded our expectations! The flat looks much better in reality than on pictures. We stayed there 3 nights and we wish we could have stayed longer. The interior is styled in a way that makes you feel like at home. Quiet location, pool (we didn't use it though), soft bed, very nice styling. The place it is very clean. There is a good and well priced restaurant Kitchen 5315 (without alcohol at the moment) 1000 feet away. Beach is a little bit further but within walking distance. The free parking spot at the place was very convenient. Lindsay was very helpful in both finding the right place to eat and also with the checkout. All in  all - we highly recommend this place!
The value for this place was awesome and Linsay was such a great host! We enjoyed being so close to Napili Bay and loved that this place was quiet.

This was one of the best Airbnb’s I’ve stayed at, primarily due to the host who was great in every way - communication, responsive, provided everything anyone could possibly need and more! Her place is slightly off the beaten path but very close to a shopping center and awesome beach with the best sunrise and sunset. This place even has A/C which is much needed on the islands. It’s perfect for 1 or 2 people. Everything was spotless and clean. Had a great sleep as well. I would definitely stay here again in a heartbeat!

Thoroughly enjoyed our stay.  Really appreciated the air conditioning, beach chairs, umbrella and cooler.  Much more than expected.  Amazing studio with all available amenities and personable touch.  Perfect stay for the perfect vacation.  Totally much more than expected.  I rate this unit better than completely satisfied.

Linsay was a great host! I totally recommended her lovely home. Everything was clean and neat, on top of that the place is close to a number of beaches and restaurants.

She was always quick to response to any questions I may have and she also provided any accommodation that we needed.

Thank you for everything and we will definitely stay at her place again if we ever come back to Maui :)

5/5!
Great apartment in a nice location!
Great place to stay. Comfortable amount of space and great location close to a lot of the great beaches in the area.

This is the place to stay! It is the perfect location if you’re looking for a relaxing place on Maui! Linsay was quick with responses and the place was stylish and clean. My husband and I will be back!
Our 2 nights at Linsay's place were great.  Comfy bed, well equipped kitchen, beach gear, and a quiet location.  Kapalua beach was a 15 min walk away.  Thanks again for the hospitality!

Linsay’s place is in a great location to explore the West Maui beaches. It was such a cozy space to come back to after hours at the beach. The bed is incredibly comfy and just an overall great experience.

We could tell how much effort and love Linsay has put into this place. There were small touches here and there (snorkeling, extra towels, air conditioning, etc.) that made us feel welcome and comfortable in our time at Napili. Linsay was prompt and helpful with communication.  The home was clean and the bed was comfy (lots of pillows). 

The beaches were just a few minutes walk away. Note: Kapalua Beach was a gorgeous place to snorkel (A vast array of fish and reefs)! There's definitely a ton more positive things to say about Linsay's place but I'd be writing a novel. In short, if we ever returned to Maui, Linsay's place will be number one on our list of places to stay at!
Outstanding!
Linsay's place is amazing. It literally has everything you need! Very cozy, clean and stylish place. :)

Linsay ist ein toller Gastgeber. Alles war genauso wie beschrieben! Sie ist sehr hilfsbereit und in ihrer Unterkunft fühlt man sich sofort sehr wohl. Wir können ihre Unterkunft nur weiterempfehlen und würden sie bei unserem nächsten Aufenthalt wieder buchen! 
Das Bett ist sehr bequem, was für die Erholung sehr wichtig war. ;)

Linsay's condo is amazing and super close to everywhere we wanted to go. Her restaurant suggestions were awesome - we loved the bowls at a'a roots and went back for more! She is super prompt in her responses and answered all questions that I had.
Beautiful, comfortable and great location! Everything you need, Linsay has thought of! Beach chairs, towels, snorkel gear all included! Great decor that makes you love it even more!

Linsay’s place was the most perfect place for us to stay during the Maui portion of our Hawaiian vacation. It was absolutely perfect for two people. It was so clean and stylis,  I was so happy with the place the second I walked into the door. Linsay also included many extras that were much appreciated like beach towels and snorkeling gear! On top of how amazing the place was Linsay was also a fantastic host she was so kind and helpful with everything. She always responded quickly, which is much appreciated. 
Thank you again Linsay - we adored this place and hope to be back one day!

Linsay’s apartment was recently renovated, very nicely done, and impeccably clean. The location was very convenient to restaurants and stores and a short drive to the Kapalua resort area. Perfect for my golf weekend. Thanks Linsay!

This place was so convenient and so perfect for our quick trip to Maui! It was right next to a lot of amenities. The ocean is just a walk away. It’s adorable inside and Linsay leaves everything you’ll need inside the apartment to secure a welcome stay!
What a wonderful place to stay! Centrally located and just minutes away from some of the most amazing beaches! Thank you Linsay!

Book this place as you will not regret it! Linsay was quick to give me a reply once I got the spot. Easy directions helped me get there and the place was exactly as described. I think some of the nicer touches (local places to go to, activities pamphlets, a full kitchen) that really helped add to my trip and be able to have an amazing time.  Don’t be afraid to go this place because this is a great place in a great location. Do it!
Linsay was very responsive and made her home very inviting! There was everything you would need and more at the condo in a great location! Over all loved our experience and can’t wait to go back!

My wife and I are accomplished airbnb'ers; it's our favorite way to travel around the world. So it says something when we say this was the best we've ever stayed in! Linsay had everything in the condo you could need for the perfect Maui getaway: beach chairs and umbrella, loads of towels, snorkels, and a well stocked kitchen. It was modern and clean and made our stay so relaxing. If we come back to Maui in the future, this place is the top of our list to stay again.
Super cute, comfortable spot tucked away in a quiet neighborhood...Linsay's place was everything we wanted during our stay in Maui and we wished we could have stayed longer! Thank you, Linsay!

Linsay’s place is a perfect combination of functionality and style! With an unbeatable location and a comfortable, romantic atmosphere, your vacation in paradise is sure to be an unforgettable one with this little oasis serving as your home base!!
You will love the location! It’s very close to the best beaches.

Linsay’s place was beautiful just as the pictures show and stylish. She provided us with everything we need, from cooking to going to the beach. We loved our stay, everything was as described. Even had recommendations for local spots to eat.

Great and clean Apartment in a quiet neighborhood. Enjoyed our stay very much. You have all you need. Large bed, nice linens, AC,  balcony and even a small pool to cool off in. Nice beach and excellent restaurants in walking distance. Great value for the money! Thanks for all, Linsay. We had a lovely stay!

Linsay and Ians home is just as described. Its in a great location and has everything you need. I would recommend whether you are looking to stick around the area or driving around. There are a lot of great food shops and tourist spots close by. Be mindful of the parking if you have a large vehicle as the spots are very tight.

Choose if you want to feel nature-friendly Maui!
Location, parking space, facilities are all perfect!
Thanks to them, it was a great trip to Maui:-)
Lovely place! Would definitely recommend.

After reading the reviews, I was already looking forward to staying at Lindsay’s condo. My experience exceeded what I’d even imagined. The location is unreal, the space is perfect, but her personal touches make it an incredible experience. I can’t thank Linsay enough!

Linsay's place exceeded expectations. She was quick to reply and the check-in/check-out process was easy. The neighborhood is quiet and set away from the crazy foot and car traffic of Lahaina Town. I will be back!

Linsay is courteous, quick to respond and a fantastic host. The place is quaint. Perfect for two people. It’s location is truly unbeatable - less than a mile from beautiful kapalua bay. Stay here! You won’t regret it.

We absolutely loved our stay at Linsay’s place. It looks so much more amazing in real life! The place was clean, spacious, stylish, and the bed was very comfortable. It is in a lovely neighbourhood walking distance to the gazebo restaurant (which was great for breakfast) and beautiful beaches on the north-west side of Maui. The space is really well thought out, we had everything we needed and more. Thank you again Linsay!

Beautiful space, fantastic location, and an excellent host.  The kitchen was well stocked and there were great beach accessories we were able to use (towels, chairs, cooler, bags, etc). The location is so close to great beaches and snorkelling. Linsay was a wonderful host and very available for any questions we had. We had an unexpected glitch and she was so quick to help out. I would highly recommend Linsay and Ian's place to anyone visiting west Maui.

Aloha! If you are waffling about whether or not to book this AirBnB because you have never used the service or because you don’t know if it’s the right spot for you, don’t walk, run to the computer and book it! First, let’s talk about the amenities, they have stocked the house with everything you need, i.e. towels, chairs, cooler, ice packs, snorkel equipment, toiletries, welcome water, and a folder full of local information.  Next, let’s talk about the location, you can WALK to the beach and several popular restaurants, including Gazebo and Seawatch.  Finally, let’s talk about the owners, they were basically available 24/7 to help with anything, answer a text message or provide a helping hand.  Take stock in this review and BOOK!

We loved our stay at Linsay's. Great location - 5 min walk to beaches; very clean; had all amenities including cooler and beach accessories which we stored in the trunk and used every day! Central location to visit all the highlights of the island!

What a perfect location and wonderfully equipped condo for a stay in Maui! Close to everywhere I wanted to go, but still tucked away from the resorts. Excellent beaches nearby, convenient to the grocery store and local coffee shop, and a super comfy bed! Don’t hesitate to book this place!!
Clean space that is perfect for a couple! So many nice small touches such as having extra tooth brushes and mustard in the fridge. We felt like we were at home! We highly recommend her studio.

What a beautiful place! Linsay had everything available to us that we needed and the home was so cute and relaxing!  We would definitely stay here again!  
VERY quiet neighbors, so if you're a little louder, you may want to look elsewhere. I loved the peacefulness of it!
Close enough to everything, but far enough away at the same time.  We really enjoyed the nearby Napili Beach.

Linsay's apartment was perfect! It was fully stocked with everything we needed for a comfortable stay; all cookware, beach chairs, umbrella, cooler etc. It was clean, comfortable, and stylish. 

The apartment  is located in a beautiful area with a beach and hiking trails close by. BBQing by the pool and snorkeling in Kapalua Bay was awesome! Would love to stay here again one day.

This place is wonderful! It’s on a quiet neighborhood road, just a few minutes walk from the “beaten path.” This is perfect because you have quick access to the main road for day trips, but it’s far enough away to be a calm, peaceful refuge for quiet time. The house is decorated straight out of an Anthropologie magazine, and is SO adorable. Plus there are a bunch of fun quirks and thoughtful surprises all around the studio. Did I mention one of the walls is just a huge window? Stay here, guys. You will love it. :)

name: Private room (bright and clean) Manhattan NYC
summary: Private Room designed to replicate an industrial style with exposed brick, hard wood floors and metal suspended storage space. The room contains full size memory foam mattress (6" very comfortable, value $600), desk, dresser and clothes hangers. Upon arrival every guest will be provided with new linen bed sheets, mattress pad, pillows and towels. The room will have been cleaned and disinfected prior to the arrival day.
space: Fully furnished room in a private brownstone. Building full renovated, everything new left only the 1900 original bricks. The bedroom has plenty of shelves and storage space, dresser vinyl and metal suspended from the floor, industrial kitchen well equipped, free 100 mbps internet.
description: Private Room designed to replicate an industrial style with exposed brick, hard wood floors and metal suspended storage space. The room contains full size memory foam mattress (6" very comfortable, value $600), desk, dresser and clothes hangers. Upon arrival every guest will be provided with new linen bed sheets, mattress pad, pillows and towels. The room will have been cleaned and disinfected prior to the arrival day. Fully furnished room in a private brownstone. Building full renovated, everything new left only the 1900 original bricks. The bedroom has plenty of shelves and storage space, dresser vinyl and metal suspended from the floor, industrial kitchen well equipped, free 100 mbps internet. Full bathroom to share with one roommate, kitchen and eating area to share with three roommates. Full assistance from me in my brownstone. The building is conveniently located within historic neighborhood of East Harlem. There is plenty to do and see. There is food from many different cultures
neighborhood_overview: The building is conveniently located within historic neighborhood of East Harlem. There is plenty to do and see. There is food from many different cultures that can be enjoyed. The population is very diverse and changing everyday due to its up and coming status with new businesses and buildings.
transit: The building is located to 4, 5, and 6 subway (two blocks far). Metro north train station is two minutes away from the building. Central Park is 13 blocks away. The trains and buses make it easy to reach the Upper West Side and the Lower East Side. Taxi stand located on East 125 street and Park avenue. M60 bus to JFK airport is located 5 minutes away from the home.
access: Full bathroom to share with one roommate, kitchen and eating area to share with three roommates.
interaction: Full assistance from me in my brownstone.
house_rules: -For extra guests you must ask to the owner. 50 $ for lost key. Keep clean and tidy common space.

reviews.comments: Nice clean place in good part of Harlem. Had some difficulty with other guests courtesy towards my property.

I stayed in this room for 3 months. It is exactly as pictured and described. The surrounding area is a little noisy, which, I guess, is not unusual in NY. After a couple days I got used to it and felt comfortable. The location is pretty neat, e.g. close to all amenities and close to subway, central park, etc. and I felt rather safe. The apartment is shared with 2-3 roommates, which was no problem at all. Anna was a great host and available for all requests and problems before and during my stay. I would recommend this place and come again.

name: Large 1-bdrm, Heart of Bay Ridge Brooklyn
summary: In the heart of Bay Ridge, Brooklyn a charming one bedroom in an Elevator Pre-War building near the most popular restaurants, lounges, shopping and express transportation to New York City steps away.  Laundry facilities both on the premises and steps away from the property.
space: Entire space
description: In the heart of Bay Ridge, Brooklyn a charming one bedroom in an Elevator Pre-War building near the most popular restaurants, lounges, shopping and express transportation to New York City steps away.  Laundry facilities both on the premises and steps away from the property. Entire space I'm available to be reached via phone for guests throughout their stay Close to 3rd Avenue near countless restaurants, cafes, lounges, shopping and more R Train, X28, NYC Ferry are all in short walking distance.
neighborhood_overview: Close to 3rd Avenue near countless restaurants, cafes, lounges, shopping and more
transit: R Train, X28, NYC Ferry are all in short walking distance.
interaction: I'm available to be reached via phone for guests throughout their stay

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
Kind, clean, ridiculously organized lol I'm a world traveler, a cat lover, a new wife :)
A fashion expert, a giver and an entrepreneur :)

reviews.comments: Eyeful and special thanks, highly recommended. I think you can not find better, if you like friendly, tradational and great place like your parent dreams home. She managed and contacted as the best.
Great place in a good location. It did get a little hot at night with summer. Otherwise we had a good stay and recommend it!

Great apartment, it was easy to reach Mona, she responded to every text message I sent her, very helpful. The apartment is beautiful and clean and close to everything, train station is pretty close by, and she guided me in every possible ways. Very happy with my stay!
I stayed in Mona house with my cousins and we love it. She was really friendly and welcoming! The best place to stay.

Mona is so helpful and responsive. She are so helpful that she even find me a parking space. Anyway this is great value for Brooklyn and Friday night street party just great and it is only 1/2 block away from Mona's apartment. For me this is the true spirit of Airbnb.

Жили у Моны в августе 2017. Сразу скажу - понравилось. Расположение шикарное. Бей Ридж отличный район. Рядом множество автобусных останок, две станции метро. Уехать можно в любую точку Нью Йорка. В нескольких кварталах есть набережная и паром. На пароме мы добирались до Манхеттена. Квартирка скромненькая, но чистая. Очень приятная хозяйка Мона. До сих пор помню вкус этих чизкейков, которыми Мона нас угостила. Спасибо ей. Мы были приятно удивлены. Вобщем рекомендую!
Wonderful spacious apartment and a great host who went above and beyond to help our needs. The Apple TV was the icing on the cake to provide constant entertainment.

Mona's flat is beautiful, cozy, spacious. The area is calm, transport is convenient. To Manhattan can be reached by bus, subway, ferry. The house is ancient, nice, the neighbors are friendly. Mona is very responsive mistress, always fast answered our questions and assisted. Thank her very much!
Great place for the price! Excellent and helpful hostess.
Amazing place in a beautiful neighborhood and Mona is amazing. Also the transportation to manhattan is super easy. Fell in love with the place
mona ist sehr nett und hilfsbereit und hat viele tipps für einen tollen aufenthalt in nyc bayridge. unbedingt mit der nyc ferry nach manhattan oder brooklyn fahren!!!

The apt. was in a nice Bay Ridge neighborhood. Located a short walk to a variety of restaurants and stores.
I mainly rented it because it was only a (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) minute walk to my daughter’s house.  The neighborhood was safe, and I felt comfortable to walking home from my daughters at 10 at night.
I enjoyed that it had three separate rooms, four if I count the bathroom.  I could relax in the living room and watch tv or read.  The bed room was roomy, and the beds were to my liking.  
Mona, was cheerful and always ready to help or answer my questions.  She took an interest in me and would check up, via (Hidden by Airbnb) , on me every so often to see how things were going.  
I would rent the apartment on another visit.
Everything is as mentioned.

Mona is a wonderful hostess. She was very attentive and very good at communicating with me. The apartment was very clean and very accommodating for my elderly parents. Will recommend this place to friends and family.
That was great:)

This apartment was cozy, clean and comfortable. The subway was a very close walk.  There were markets and nice restaurants nearby.  I really enjoyed my stay here.  Mona was great with any questions I had.  Highly recommend staying here.
The location is great, very closed to subway and many cheap grocery stores nearby. Mona's house is very spacious and stylish. Highly recommend!

One word for Mona’s apartment is AMAZING!!!!. Me and my wife really loved the place as it feels like home. My wife is an interior designer and she loved the way Mona decorated her apartment. It was clean, all amenities were there which we were looking for. We really had a great time living here. Mona was really great with communication and answered all the questions within minutes. Only problem I had was parking on street it was really hard to find parking if you missed the time I got two parking fines but it was my mistake I wasn’t sure about the parking rules in NY. Thanks Mona for having us.
Amazing apartment, I loved every minute! Super clean and spacious, and a 3 minute walk to the train.
Mona's apartment is wonderful. I would definitely come back in the future!

Mona was super helpful about the apartment & what amenities were in the local area. She was very approachable & always replied pretty quickly. The apartment was gorgeous & comfortable; the perfect home from home.

I am so glad I picked this place!! It is literally what the pictures show.  My sister and I both stayed here and it was nice, comfortable and relaxing to stay at.  There was so many places to check out around each corner, we also enjoyed the jazz music from the bar almost across the street.  Mona is super nice and quick to respond.  I would highly recommend this place you will not be sorry.

We had an excellent stay in Mona's appartment ! The flat is quite large, in a quiet building and neighbourhood where you can find everything you need (restaurants, bars,  supermarket, minimarket, subway very close). We were three and  we had enough space. There is a kitchen with everything and a cosy living room. Good wi-fi. I cannot tell about the Apple TV because we never used it.
Bay Ridge is 30 mn away from the Financial District by subway, about one hour from Midtown, but you can also take the speed ferry to Manhattan, don't hesitate, it's a great way to move ! You are also a few stops from Williamsburg and Coney Island.
Mona was the greatest host, very helpful and nice. She helped us to book a cheap taxi from the airport and warmly welcomed us.
We definitely recommand this flat ; a little bit far from the city but excellent value for money. 
See you Mona !

It was just an amazing find. Wifi was is best. It is a place we really liked, a large apartment with nice furniture, a cozy district. Nearby there are shops and cafes. The line of the metro was 3 minutes and it was great. From the airport by metro 1.5 hours. We were completely satisfied with this. Purely and a lot of carpets, which we particularly pleased. Comfortable furniture and everything you need for living.
Это была просто потрясающая находка. Wi-Fi был лучшим. Это место нам очень понравилось, большая квартира с красивой мебелью, уютный район. Рядом находятся магазины и кафе. Линия метро была 3 минуты, и это было здорово. Из аэропорта на метро 1,5 часа. Мы были полностью удовлетворены этим. Чисто и много ковров, которые нам особенно нравятся. Удобная мебель и все, что вам нужно для жизни.

Mona was an excellent host. She arranged transport from the airport upon arrival and even brought us to the airport when we departed. The flat was spacious in an old pre-war building but excellent value for money.  A bit far form the city but metro, express bus were very close and even the ferry to Manhattan and Downtown Brooklyn only a few minutes walk. We enjoyed our stay.

What a wonderful surprise! This is a Parisian hideaway in the heart of Brooklyn within walking distance of EVERYTHING (grocery stores, amazing restaurants, a Post Office, laundromat, and the delicious bakeries). The place is perfect for 1-2 people. It has everything I needed to cook and enjoy a glass a wine after a demanding day in the city. 

The decor is beautiful, inviting, and very Parisian. Gorgeous artwork, comfortable sofas, and 2-beds. I look forward to coming "home" every evening. 

The best part was Munnie the host. She greeted me when I first arrived and helped me get my bags into the place. Her attention to detail and countless recommendations made my stay peaceful. I will definitely be back.

Mona is a great host and very accommodating! Our flight landed early in the morning and she was  able to adjust her schedule to meet us in person when we first arrived. She responds very quickly to messages and answered all questions we asked, which there was a lot! She also gave us a great suggestion on how to get from the airport to her place, by using a car service, which was even cheaper than an Uber. The location is in a great spot in Brooklyn, it is only a block away from a subway stop and has multiple grocery stores and restaurants nearby. The apartment is organized and clean and has all the necessary equipment, and if there's something missing, she won't hesitate to go out of her way to get a new one for her guests! Overall, the location was definitely worth it for us and Mona was a excellent host and we greatly enjoyed meeting her and staying at her location!
Good value, comfortable and convenient location.

We loved staying at Mona’s apartment. It was in a lovely safe road and close to shops, restaurants, transport and parks. We took the bus x27 into midtown Manhattan. Another day we took the ferry to the financial district and Brooklyn bridge, and another day the R subway into Manhattan. All methods of travel were brilliant and the flat is so close to them all. 

We also stayed in Bay Ridge on some days and had some great breakfasts in local cafes and a fab meal at Tanoreen - an amazing middle Eastern restaurant round the corner. 

Mona was a great host and so very kind and friendly. 
We found the apartment to be spacious, comfortable and full of character. Couldn’t have chosen better. The photos show the Parisien character of the place and it has a quirky shabby-chic feel to it. We absolutely loved our stay there. 

Thanks Mona!!! We’ll be back!! X

Mona was very accommodating. Gave us great tips for our stay even took us to the city on her way to work. Lovely stylish apartment. Clean and very homely. Would definitely use agin if visiting new york/Boston. Very easy to communicate. Ferry to manhattan is only 10 mins walk away.

한쿡인입짱에서 휴긔남귀겟숨니돠
외쿡인딀이 워나게 캐끗하거 뭐 졓다해서 예약햇는뒈
뎡말 졍신젹으러 뮐칠뻔햌쑵니댜
첫ㅋ재뤄, 위취 허벌나게 멉니돠 노롼색 알 롸인 타면 맨화탄까지 한쉬간덩도 걸린다 봐야대여. 왔따갘다하는데 진다빠져부르여
두루째뤄, 흡.. 조희는 4박5읠 이쒓는데 슈건 듀장쥬더라긔옇ㅎㅎ 쉐톽기더 옴눈데 읔째라는근지ㅜㅜ 수권들거와서 댜행이쥐 클나뽄햇숩니댜
셋쮀, 드르브요 드릅숩니다 일단 아빠뜨가 급나 오뤠대서 블레도 많거  냄시도 음층 납니더
더 환쟝해부릴것은 박킈블레드리 집에 있어서 듸질쁜 햌씁니다
4박동안 자믈 지대러 멋 자고 새볔에 계석 깨거 참말러 힘들읏으여
쥔이 집 관뤼를 거진 안한다거바더 댈듯여

주ㅐ가 여행더 마니다니거 그럴땨마댜 에어비앤비 이영하는데 이뤈 후긔남귀는거 츠음입니돠
증믈로 비추힙니다 외쿡인드른 졓다거해서 제가 제 후긔 다보이게쓰믄 한쿡인 역할까바 요래 적는데, 져눈 여런 딥 쳠 바여 :)

The flat is spacious and conveniently located very close to the metro station. Munnie is a very friendly host  and always willing to help with any practical issues and giving lots of tips for what to do and where to go in the area.
Wonderful host! The apartment is conveniently located next to all public transportation and parking wasn’t terrible. The apartment is pleasant and had everything I needed. Thank you Mona:)

name: Market Place 1T
summary: Apartamento intimo e acolhedor no centro histórico da cidade invicta. Perto de comercio, restaurantes e bares. A cerca de 200 metros da Ribeira e 300 metros da Estação de São Bento. Situado junto ao Palácio da Bolsa e ao Mercado Ferreira Borges. Check-in das 22h00 às 24h00 tem um custo de 10€ Check-in após as 24h00 até as 02h00 tem um custo de 15€
description: Apartamento intimo e acolhedor no centro histórico da cidade invicta. Perto de comercio, restaurantes e bares. A cerca de 200 metros da Ribeira e 300 metros da Estação de São Bento. Situado junto ao Palácio da Bolsa e ao Mercado Ferreira Borges. Check-in das 22h00 às 24h00 tem um custo de 10€ Check-in após as 24h00 até as 02h00 tem um custo de 15€

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: Appartement tres tres bien placé, tres propre. Seul point negatif: Un peu bruyant ( rue  calme, mais on entend dans le pallier/voisin). Je recommande

Posto molto carino e in una posizione perfetta. L unica pecca é lo scarso isolamento acustico per cui si sentono tutti i movimenti dei vicini.
In ogni caso lo consigliamo!
non merci
Habitación céntrica y bien decorada. Buena ducha.
Melhor impossível. Tudo estava perfeito. Localização fenomenal
Perfect location in beautiful Porto. The service is awesome. Highly recommended!
Cumple la relación precio/ubicación. Hubiera sido perfecto si no diera a patio interior y tuviera algo del luz natural y no se oyera tanto el caminar de los vecinos por las escaleras.

L'appartement est vraiment sympa, belle decoration, tres propre et avec une gentil attention pour l'accueil. On y dort vraiment bien. L'appartement est situé au 1er etage d'un immeuble de 3 niveaux me semble- t il, il est donc possible d'entendre le passage des voisins le soir mais rien de bien grave.
Sinon géographiquement l'appart est tres bien situé. Il y a tout a proximité.
La communication avec Alessandra fut bonne.
Je recommande!
Óptimo para ficar no Porto!!

name: House close to station & direct to opera house....
summary: Traditional house sits on over 1000m2.   walking distance to station & shopping mall. 5 mins drive to M5 & M7 &  Costco every 15 mins Direct train to Sydney airport & CBD 30 to 40 mins to China town, Darling habour, Opera house, Habour bridge  Easy drive to Blue mountain, Wollongong & Canberra & Mel Top quality mattress with clean bedding TV&HIFI systems available  house as home, you can open any cabinet & drawer big +++for family or group of close 10+9 friends May Early checkin & late checkout
space: Safety and quite with big front and back yard in very convenient location. About 5 minis short walk to the station and bus stop. There is train direct to city every 15 minis. Direct train to airport, CBD, China town, opera house, harbour bridge, darling harbour  Perfect starting point for driving to Canberra, blue mountain, Wollongong and Melbourne... There’s major supermarket open until 12:00am only 2 mins away. extra big bed rooms and common areas , comfortable and warmth feeling for big family and group. extra spare blankets and quilts available for special needs
description: Traditional house sits on over (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) m2.   walking distance to station & shopping mall. 5 mins drive to M5 & M7 &  Costco every 15 mins Direct train to Sydney airport & CBD 30 to 40 mins to China town, Darling habour, Opera house, Habour bridge  Easy drive to Blue mountain, Wollongong & Canberra & Mel Top quality mattress with clean bedding TV&HIFI systems available  house as home, you can open any cabinet & drawer big +++for family or group of close 10+9 friends May Early checkin & late checkout Safety and quite with big front and back yard in very convenient location. There’s major supermarket open until 12:00am only 2 mins away. extra big bed rooms and common areas , comfortable and
neighborhood_overview: The neighbor on Right hand side are European old couples. The neighbor on left hand side is Asian family
notes: You can feel free to enjoy the movie and music and some toys for the kids provided. Free high speed Mobil WiFi, you can carry it everywhere before you checkout but please don’t use it to download movie. If you coming from overseas and decide driving around, gps with Australia map can be provided to you.
transit: You can park in the carport or on the street. All free of charge. If you are coming from overseas, gps with updated Australian map and Mobil internet maybe available for you at the period when you stay. If you coming by train from airport, I’ll try my best to send you the updated time table and information for train. If you are going to use the public transport, suggest you purchase NSW opal card. No matter how much you travel with an Opal card you never pay more than your Daily, Weekly or Sunday Travel Caps. for adult daily cap is $15.40, weekly cap is $61.60, sunday cap $2.60. You can use opal card for train, bus and ferry.
access: Close the door and gate, in the fully fenced house, you can cook or have a good sleep, feel free and make yourself as in home. for your comfortable, instruction to pick up and return the keys will be sent to you before your check in and check out. Password given to pickup the keys. flexible check in and check out time can be discuss.
interaction: You can interact with me anytime by text, email or (Hidden by Airbnb) & phone. I do not intend to deliver you the luxury and hotel feeling but what I do is try to give you warm and home feeling and sharing joy and happiness are all my efforts.
house_rules: Can cooking as in your home. But you need a good clean after cooking. If you cook something with very strong smell, you are only allowed using the cooking facilities outside the house ( there are 2 sets of cooking facilities for the property, indoor and outdoor)

host.host_about:
Living in Sydney
Can speak Chinese, English and Japanese

reviews.comments: Awesome

This is a big house and the host is very accomodating. He let us check-in early and also later helped me open the door, when the door key was with my friends.  But I guess the title of ad is a little-bit misleading. It sounded as if it is close to opera house but it is quite far from the city. The main reason we booked this house was our misunderstanding of its location.

The house is very comfortable and very close to the station. The house was clean and as he described. George is a great host and very accommodating. His communication was awesome and very welcoming for the duration of our trip. We are sure to return.

Thanks George!
Wonderful place. Perfect for a stay for large group of people and a nice homely fee. Highly recommend!
Great big space for a large family booking. George was quick to reply and very forthcoming with information on the house.

Great home for a short stay ... close to everything, has all amenities that most people would need on a break. George was great and prompt in communicating with us. The home has basic facilities but offers great value for money. Highly recommend for a short  stay for large groups.

Good house near to public transport...
Requires some decluttering
George is a nice guy, friendly and quick response. The house is spacious and there is a backyard with organic herbs. Nice place to relax and enjoy the life. Thank you.
非常舒适干净的房子,适合全家居住,设施很全,房主很热情,有机会还会再来
George was very communicative and helpful. The property is very spacious and looks just like the photos. Thanks for having us! :)
也住到很舒服的｡

I found George’s house to be impeccably clean and orderly. George made an effort to make sure the house was aired and cool. When we arrived George had turned on misting fans/normal fans in each bedroom and had turned on air conditioning in the main area. There was also nice music playing in one of the living areas. The linen was clean and fresh and plenty of towels were provided. There was an ashtray and bench seat in the backyard provided for smokers as well as a pleasant outdoor alfresco area. George had coke, water, beer and noodles stocked in the cupboards and fridge with a piggy bank system where you left money for what you had taken. We were very pleased with this and brought some coke as we hadn’t packed any drinks with us for our travels. Another thing I was impressed with was the quality hand washes/body washes and shampoo and conditioner that George had generously provided. This property is great for families with children as there was a cot provide in one of the rooms if you should have need of it. We were all very pleased with this property and will be staying here again if we need to stay in the area again. Thanks George for making sure we had an enjoyable and pleasant place to stay in.

George is a great host, all the questions i had for him he answered quickly and precisely.

Great stay for the price i paid!

Very happy with our stay. Quick responses from host, very helpful information before we arrived.
This was a great experience. Definitely will book again next time we are travelling to this area.

George is a great host. His place is value for money! We were travelling as a group into Australia from overseas and were quite delighted that he kept track of our travels even including a snapshot of the current train timetable. The host always responds to questions within time and clarified things where there was a need to. He even went the extra mile to pick up our luggage at the train station. The house adequately fit eleven women with more space to spare. We enjoyed the place and are certain others will too! His place became our home away from home for the seven days we spent there! Thank you George!

The house is as advertised and good value for money. An aging house with eclectic furnishings, it totally suits a budget-minded family needing to accommodate a range of ages and interests . The dinning and living rooms are a big plus. The location was quiet and yet handy to shops and train station. George gives lots of tips that are very helpful. We have already recommended this house to our friends who travel to the Campbelltown  area periodically.
Good place to stay and booking. Very neat and tidy.

Georges place can accommodate a big family with everything you need,it was exactly what we needed.The location to the train is EASY 5 mins walk.We did alot of exploring while we were in Sydney both by train and car.The blue mountains drive and woolongong was far easier and faster than i expected by car. (First time driving in Sydney) Loved our stay thankyou George

George was very accommodating to our large group of 13 , had fans running to chill the rooms before we arrived and had more than enough room for everybody, he responds fast when you need to ask questions.
Great place, close to train station
It was amazing time staying at your home

Don't be deceived by the Photos this is a lovely roomy home with plenty of space. Clean and Comfortably accommodating many in a sort of eclectic charm. Central to public transport and easy access to the motor ways, while being tucked away in a quiet location. Loved our stay, thanks George
Great stay at George´s house with all my friend !  Thanks very much

The house is very clean, big space, and I enjoyed stay there. 
It is highly recommended!

I can only say George is a 5 stars host that I ever met before! A traveler like me, I traveled very often in a year, Airbnb always the best option for me to book for my stay. I traveled 8 countries last year and this year I had been 4 countries up to date! So far non of the host provided such a great service like George. He wrote me daily train schedule, remind me of the road block, changes of the train schedule and even he planned for my itinerary on the daily basic. 

There was this night when we faced a small issue at home! I text him to ask for help! Without asking much, George appeared in the home and help us solve our problems. 

When we running out of idea of places to go. Again he visited us at 10pm plus to discuss with us of his friend (travel agent) day tour packages for us! 

George always very thoughtful towards our stay! He even offered to send our luggages to the train station when we left the place! 

All 13 of us rated his place 5 stars not only for our stay but also because of his warm hospitality! I will definitely recommend all my friends to choose him! Great location, comfortable house,  thoughtful host with very affordable rental!

This was our favorite of all the places we stayed on our two week visit to New Zealand and Australia.  George was a great communicator, before our stay, during and after.  His house is such fun.  There was plenty of sleeping arrangements for 10 people; in fact, we did not use all of the beds.  We all loved the furnishings, which are eclectic, interesting and fun.  I highly recommend this airbnb.
mattresses are stuffed hope he gets new ones and cleans the place up a bit

The house spacious and clean. There’s free breakfast as well! The owner is very friendly, responsive and approachable. :)

However the heater from the air-con was not as strong.

George's place was great! It was clean and spacious enough to accommodate a big family like ours. Its location is in a quiet neigbourhood and is close to the train station (less than 5 min drive) if you wanted to go to the city using public transportation. 

George was also great in sending instructions and in communicating with me from the moment I booked his place all the way up until we left.

I would not mind booking his place again if ever I get the chance to go on holidays with a big group again.
Great for a big group!
最好的房东 很细心的给了很多信息 非常感谢 住过那么多Airbnb George 是我碰到的最好房东 没有之一
George是超赞房东!热情好客,体贴周到｡对我们造成的一些问题十分宽容,真诚感谢,强烈推荐!!
A convenient place, not much space but an interesting house with so many gadgets.  Always a prompt reply.  Thank you George.
房子有个大庭院供孩子们玩耍,房东给了我们很多建议和帮助,让我们的行程方便了很多｡
Highly recommended
the house is clean and well stocked with furniture plenty of beds and seating.
Just as described and great value. Everything you need and clean with very comfy beds!
If you have a big family, it’ll be great value for money.

It was a pleasant stay for me and my other ten friends from September 5th until September 12th 2018 at George's place. The photos didn't do the house justice since it's far more spacious in real life. It's perfect for big groups and family. The Macquarie Fields train station isn't that far away and it goes straight to Central Station and Opera House! George was extremely responsive including in the middle of the night. Ask for anything, he will make sure your request will be granted as soon as he could. If there's any improvement I could recommend is only the entrance. George, that huge tree in front of the house got to go mate. Anything else was PERFECT! Thank you so much George. You are awesome! Looking forward to my next stay next year.
Nice place to live for the best value. I will recommend it

The place is more like a home rather than a sensational hotel. 
It has everything you need, and George is very considerate. The price is very economical compared with others. 
A good choice to choose while in Sydney.

Comfortable and clean house. We were a large crowd and thoroughly enjoyed the provided amenities and the large backyard. Above all thanks for the great communications from George and the help from George when the house key got locked in the roll down desk.

Super spacious and very homely styled house. Everything was very clean, all beds were made beautifully and George was a wonderful host. He always replied within the hour and was very helpful throughout the whole stay and even with checking out. Would highly recommend! Lovely large backyard too perfect for the big group we had
George was an excellent host. Very hospitable and kind. He went out of his way to drive my friends to the grocery and the clinic. He is truly amazing.

A great place to stay with very homely feel and room for a large family or group. Catered very well for our large group at great value. Host was very informative and provided good timely communication.
Easy check in and check out with no hassles.
Would stay here again.

George is a very helpful and fast responsive person. He answered all our queries and help in provide the transport and places to visit. The house is very spacious and fully equipped would recommend for big group.

Home, sweet home, we arrived late, George had turned on the lights & music for us. The house is in great location, easy drive to Blue Mountain, direct train to town with only AUD2.70 on Sunday, free parking at the train station. Slightly far from city but we live like local, driving around the township is a great experience. George is extremely friendly & helpful, very informative. Jetstar lost our luggage when we returned from Melbourne, George helped us to keep the luggage as we were not around when Jetstar returned our luggage. Great host, great stay, we enjoy our stay.
幾好,但地方距離市中心較遠遠
Excellent accommodation for a big family or group, Best price. The property had a lot that you need, including a very spacious backyard. We enjoyed our stay very much. Thanks George.

I found the accomodation to be homely and has plenty of character and history. One can tell that those who grew up in this home pursued many interests and hobbies. It was perfect for our overnight trip to Sydney. There were more than enough beds for the 9 of us. The large dining table indoors was a perfect place for mealtime conversations. If we were staying longer and if the weather was not as hot, we would have loved using the large backyard for some outdoor activities. George made sure the house was clean and ready before we arrived.

We had a wonderful stay here. It was perfect for our family of 6 & George was amazing at keeping in touch with us before we arrived, during our stay & after we left. it was much appreciated. The house has a lot of character & I am sure a bit of history as it is an older building as most are in the area but for us that was what we loved.
George was a very good host. He responded to our queries on time. The house was clean and the beds were so comfy. Its so homey and welcoming. Thank you so much.
George is lovely.
Nice and cozy place. We enjoyed our stay here.
Very beautiful house, suitable for family or group, nice owner.

name: Bright and quiet room in the heart of Montréal
summary: Brand new condo in the village, at 1 minute of St-Catherine street, the heart of Montreal life. Bars and restaurants are on the street just behind. It's really quiet and you have an incredible view from the balcony. Most beautiful places of montreal are available by foot in 15 minutes. Many public transport are available at less than 5 minutes by foot, including Berry-UQAM subway station (main of MTL).
space: The apartment is really bright hand have a really nice view on several attractions of montreal : Jacques Cartier Bridge, St Helene Island, Parc Jean Drapeau, Biosphere, Clock Tower, Molson factory ... The kitchen is fully open on the living with a huge and useful kitchen island. You have full access to hight speed internet to prepare your trip and TV if you're tired or if the weather is not with you (hope that will not happen).

neighborhood_overview: The village is the perfect neighborhood, you can find any atmosphere that you want. There is a lot of bars, restaurants and theaters.
notes: Our cat luna is very cute and just ask for hugs (and food).
transit: Near all montreal public transports : _ Berry-UQAM subway station (main of the network) at 6 minutes by foot (5 minutes to be in Parc Jean Drapeau or old Montreal) _ Beaudry subway station at 5 minutes _ Bixi station (bike sharing) at the next block _ Bus station juste in front of the building Many free parking slots in streets just behind.

host.host_about: Je suis installé sur Montréal depuis janvier 2016, j'ai envie de découvrir du pays et des endroits atypiques (Lacs, rivères, Parc Naturels...). J'aime la randonnée et tout ce qui attrait à la nature. À la recherche d'expériences incroyables et de bons moments de partages.

reviews.comments: Clement and Pascaline were extremely gracious, warm and welcoming hosts.  Luna, their cat, is also very affectionate!  The apartment was immaculate and beautiful and the location proved to be perfect.  The roof deck was a fantastic bonus.  Highly recommended!

name: Marriott Waiohai Beach Club 2Bd Villa 2020
summary: Please contact me at least 13 months in advance of your planned trip in order for me to be able to try to fulfill your specific date request for either a 2 week vacation for yourself or 2 concurrent weeks for you to share with your family or friends.   Spoil your family with a stay in our Poipu Beach 2 bedroom 2 bath vacation rental that sleeps 8.  This full feature Marriott resort has everything you need to enjoy your stay on Kauai.
space: You'll feel at home the moment you step into your chic modern villa, which is equipped with everything you need to relax and enjoy your vacation on Hawaii's "Garden Isle". Make use of perks including full kitchen, living and dining areas, free Wi-Fi and luxurious master suites, as well as washer/dryers in every villa. Step out of your villa and enjoy the many facilities our luxury resort has to offer, from swimming and sunbathing at our three outdoor pools to al fresco dining at Honu Pool Bar.
